 655  859B                  INCLUDE "./Variables/random_number.asm"
# file opened: ./Variables/random_number.asm
   1+ 859B              doRandom2:									; .DORND2	\ -> &3F85 \ Restricted for explosion dust.
   2+ 859B              doRND2:
   3+ 859B A7           	and		a								; fast clear carry  leave bit0 of RAND+2 at 0.
   4+ 859C              doRandom:									;.DORND	\ -> &3F86 \ do random, new A, X.
   5+ 859C              ; "doRandom, Random Seed update, new value in A & C)"
   6+ 859C              ; uses a c h l registers
   7+ 859C              doRND:                  ;exx                                     ; protect bc,de,hl
   8+ 859C 3A F6 7E                             ld		a,(RandomSeed)					; Get Seed 0
   9+ 859F CB 17                                rl		a								; Rotate L including carry
  10+ 85A1 4F                                   ld		c,a								; c =  double lo
  11+ 85A2 21 F8 7E     .AddSeed2:              ld		hl,RandomSeed2
  12+ 85A5 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)							; RAND+2
  13+ 85A6 32 F6 7E     .SaveAtoSeed:           ld		(RandomSeed),a					; and save RAND
  14+ 85A9 08           .SaveBtoSeed2:          ex		af,af'
  15+ 85AA 79                                   ld		a,c
  16+ 85AB 32 F8 7E                             ld		(RandomSeed2),a
  17+ 85AE 08                                   ex		af,af'
  18+ 85AF 3A F7 7E                             ld		a,(RandomSeed1)
  19+ 85B2 4F                                   ld		c,a								; C = Seed1
  20+ 85B3 21 F9 7E     .AddSeed3:              ld		hl,RandomSeed3
  21+ 85B6 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)
  22+ 85B7 32 F7 7E                             ld		(RandomSeed1),a
  23+ 85BA 08                                   ex		af,af'
  24+ 85BB 79                                   ld		a,c
  25+ 85BC 32 F9 7E                             ld		(RandomSeed3),a
  26+ 85BF 08                                   ex		af,af'
  27+ 85C0                                      ;exx                                     ; get bc,de,hl back
  28+ 85C0 C9                                   ret
  29+ 85C1
  30+ 85C1 21 F6 7E     saveRandomSeeds:        ld      hl,RandomSeed
  31+ 85C4 11 FA 7E                             ld      de,RandomSeedSave
  32+ 85C7 01 04 00                             ld      bc,4
  33+ 85CA ED A0                                ldi
  34+ 85CC ED A0                                ldi
  35+ 85CE ED A0                                ldi
  36+ 85D0 ED A0                                ldi
  37+ 85D2 C9                                   ret
  38+ 85D3
  39+ 85D3 21 FA 7E     restoreRandomSeeds:     ld      hl,RandomSeedSave
  40+ 85D6 11 F6 7E                             ld      de,RandomSeed
  41+ 85D9 01 04 00                             ld      bc,4
  42+ 85DC ED A0                                ldi
  43+ 85DE ED A0                                ldi
  44+ 85E0 ED A0                                ldi
  45+ 85E2 ED A0                                ldi
  46+ 85E4 C9                                   ret

   1+ 85E5 47 41 4C 41  GALAXYSEED DB "GALAXYSEED"
   1+ 85E9 58 59 53 45
   1+ 85ED 45 44
   2+ 85EF 21 9D 80     copy_galaxy_to_system:  ld		hl,GalaxySeeds
   3+ 85F2 11 79 80                             ld		de,SystemSeed
   4+ 85F5 ED A0        copy_seed:		        ldi
   5+ 85F7 ED A0                                ldi
   6+ 85F9 ED A0                                ldi
   7+ 85FB ED A0                                ldi
   8+ 85FD ED A0                                ldi
   9+ 85FF ED A0                                ldi
  10+ 8601 C9                                   ret
  11+ 8602
  12+ 8602 21 79 80     copy_system_to_galaxy:  ld		hl,SystemSeed
  13+ 8605 11 9D 80                             ld		de,GalaxySeeds
  14+ 8608 18 EB                                jr		copy_seed
  15+ 860A
  16+ 860A 21 9D 80     copy_galaxy_to_working: ld		hl,GalaxySeeds
  17+ 860D 11 91 80                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  18+ 8610 18 E3                                jr		copy_seed
  19+ 8612
  20+ 8612 21 91 80     copy_working_to_galaxy: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  21+ 8615 11 9D 80                             ld		de,GalaxySeeds
  22+ 8618 18 DB                                jr		copy_seed
  23+ 861A
  24+ 861A 21 91 80     copy_working_to_system: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  25+ 861D 11 79 80                             ld		de,SystemSeed
  26+ 8620 18 D3                                jr		copy_seed
  27+ 8622
  28+ 8622 21 79 80     copy_system_to_working: ld		hl,SystemSeed
  29+ 8625 11 91 80                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  30+ 8628 18 CB                                jr		copy_seed
  31+ 862A
  32+ 862A              next_system_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  33+ 862A CD 2D 86     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  34+ 862D              .NextStep:
  35+ 862D CD 30 86     		call	process_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  36+ 8630              process_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  37+ 8630 3A 79 80     		ld		a,(SystemSeed)				; QQ15
  38+ 8633 B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  39+ 8634 21 7B 80     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  40+ 8637 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 + QQ152
  41+ 8638 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo
  42+ 8639 3A 7A 80     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)
  43+ 863C 21 7C 80     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  44+ 863F 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  45+ 8640 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  46+ 8641 3A 7B 80     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+2)
  47+ 8644 32 79 80     		ld		(SystemSeed+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150
  48+ 8647 3A 7C 80     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)
  49+ 864A 32 7A 80     		ld		(SystemSeed+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151
  50+ 864D 3A 7E 80     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+5)
  51+ 8650 32 7C 80     		ld		(SystemSeed+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153
  52+ 8653 3A 7D 80     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+4)
  53+ 8656 32 7B 80     		ld		(SystemSeed+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152
  54+ 8659 B7           		or		a
  55+ 865A 78           		ld		a,b
  56+ 865B 21 7B 80     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  57+ 865E 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  58+ 865F 32 7D 80     		ld		(SystemSeed+4),a
  59+ 8662 79           		ld		a,c
  60+ 8663 21 7C 80     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  61+ 8666 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  62+ 8667 32 7E 80     		ld		(SystemSeed+5),a
  63+ 866A C9           		ret
  64+ 866B
  65+ 866B              next_working_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  66+ 866B CD 6E 86     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  67+ 866E              .NextStep:
  68+ 866E CD 71 86     		call	working_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  69+ 8671              working_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  70+ 8671              ; x = a + c
  71+ 8671 3A 91 80     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds)			; QQ15
  72+ 8674 B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  73+ 8675 21 93 80     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2			; hl -> qq+2 [c]
  74+ 8678 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 [a]+ QQ15 [c]
  75+ 8679 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo [x]
  76+ 867A              ; y = b + d	+ carry
  77+ 867A 3A 92 80     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+1)          ; [b]
  78+ 867D 21 94 80     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 [d] we don't inc as it affects carry)
  79+ 8680 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  80+ 8681 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  81+ 8682 3A 93 80     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+2)
  82+ 8685 32 91 80     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150 [a] = [c]
  83+ 8688 3A 94 80     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
  84+ 868B 32 92 80     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151 [b] = [d]
  85+ 868E 3A 96 80     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
  86+ 8691 32 94 80     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153 [d] = [f]
  87+ 8694 3A 95 80     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+4)
  88+ 8697 32 93 80     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152 [c] = [e]
  89+ 869A B7           		or		a
  90+ 869B 78           		ld		a,b
  91+ 869C 21 93 80     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2		    ; hl -> qq+2
  92+ 869F 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  93+ 86A0 32 95 80     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+4),a			; e = x + [c]
  94+ 86A3 79           		ld		a,c
  95+ 86A4 21 94 80     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  96+ 86A7 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  97+ 86A8 32 96 80     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+5),a			; f = y + [d] + carry
  98+ 86AB C9           		ret
  99+ 86AC
 100+ 86AC 32           working_distX	DB 50
 101+ 86AD 32           working_distY	DB 50
 102+ 86AE 00           current_distY	DB 0
 103+ 86AF
 104+ 86AF AF           find_present_system:    xor		a
 105+ 86B0 32 06 80                             ld		(XSAV),a
 106+ 86B3 3A 7A 80     .CounterLoop:           ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)				; QQ15+1 \ seed Ycoord of star
 107+ 86B6 4F                                   ld		c,a
 108+ 86B7 3A A4 80     .calcLocaldy:           ld		a,(PresentSystemY)
 109+ 86BA 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 110+ 86BB 79                                   ld		a,c
 111+ 86BC 90                                   sub		b
 112+ 86BD CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 113+ 86BF 28 02                                jr		z,.positivedy
 114+ 86C1 ED 44        .negativedy:            neg
 115+ 86C3 32 AE 86     .positivedy:            ld		(current_distY),a				; save cuirrent_dist Y as we need it maybe
 116+ 86C6 ED 5B AC 86                          ld		de,(working_distX)
 117+ 86CA BA                                   cp		d
 118+ 86CB 30 24                                jr		nc,.toofar
 119+ 86CD 3A 7C 80     .calcLocaldx:           ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)				; QQ15+3 \ seed Xcoord of star
 120+ 86D0 4F                                   ld		c,a
 121+ 86D1 3A A3 80                             ld		a,(PresentSystemX)
 122+ 86D4 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 123+ 86D5 79                                   ld		a,c
 124+ 86D6 90                                   sub		b
 125+ 86D7 CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 126+ 86D9 28 02                                jr		z,.positivedx
 127+ 86DB ED 44        .negativedx:            neg
 128+ 86DD 4F           .positivedx:            ld		c,a
 129+ 86DE BB                                   cp		e
 130+ 86DF 30 10                                jr		nc,.toofar
 131+ 86E1 3A AE 86     .Nearer:			    ld		a,(current_distY) 				; we have a closer system
 132+ 86E4 47                                   ld		b,a								; we have c to recall Y into b
 133+ 86E5 ED 43 AC 86                          ld		(working_distX),bc
 134+ 86E9 C5                                   push	bc
 135+ 86EA CD 22 86                             call 	copy_system_to_working
 136+ 86ED C1                                   pop		bc
 137+ 86EE 78                                   ld		a,b								;
 138+ 86EF B1                                   or		c								;
 139+ 86F0 C8                                   ret		z								; if we have distance 0 then bang on
 140+ 86F1 CD 2A 86     .toofar:                call	next_system_seed
 141+ 86F4 3A 06 80                             ld		a,(XSAV)
 142+ 86F7 3D                                   dec		a
 143+ 86F8 FE 00                                cp		0
 144+ 86FA C8                                   ret		z
 145+ 86FB 32 06 80                             ld		(XSAV),a
 146+ 86FE 18 B3                                jr		.CounterLoop
 147+ 8700
 148+ 8700              get_planet_data_working_seed:
 149+ 8700 3A 92 80     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+1)
 150+ 8703 E6 07        		and		7
 151+ 8705 32 BE 80     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 152+ 8708 3A 93 80     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+2)
 153+ 870B CB 3F        		srl	a
 154+ 870D CB 3F        		srl	a
 155+ 870F CB 3F        		srl	a
 156+ 8711 CB 3F        		srl	a								; c/8
 157+ 8713 E6 07        		and		7
 158+ 8715 32 BF 80     		ld		(DisplayGovernment),a
 159+ 8718 CB 3F        		srl	a
 160+ 871A FE 00        		cp		0
 161+ 871C 20 08        		jr		nz,.CanBeRich
 162+ 871E              .Fedual:
 163+ 871E 3A BE 80     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 164+ 8721 F6 02        		or		2							; Adjust Eco for Anarchy and Feudal, set bit 1.
 165+ 8723 32 BE 80     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 166+ 8726              .CanBeRich:
 167+ 8726 3A BE 80     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 168+ 8729 EE 07        		xor		7							; flip economy so Rich is now 7
 169+ 872B 32 C0 80     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Flipped Eco, EcoEOR7, Rich Ind = 7
 170+ 872E 47           		ld		b,a
 171+ 872F 3A 94 80     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 172+ 8732 E6 03        		and		3
 173+ 8734 80           		add		a,b
 174+ 8735 32 C0 80     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek Level += seed d & 3
 175+ 8738 3A BF 80     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 176+ 873B CB 3F        		srl		a 							; gov/2
 177+ 873D 47           		ld		b,a
 178+ 873E 3A C0 80     		ld		a,(DisplayTekLevel)
 179+ 8741 80           		add		a,b
 180+ 8742 32 C0 80     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek += gov /2
 181+ 8745 CB 27        		sla		a
 182+ 8747 CB 27        		sla		a							; Onto Population (TL-1)*= 4
 183+ 8749 47           		ld		b,a
 184+ 874A 3A BE 80     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 185+ 874D 80           		add		a,b                  		; TechLevel*4 + Eco   7-56
 186+ 874E 47           		ld		b,a
 187+ 874F 3A BF 80     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)
 188+ 8752 3C           		inc		a  							; +Government, 0 is Anarchy + 1
 189+ 8753 32 C1 80     		ld		(DisplayPopulation),a
 190+ 8756 3A BE 80     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 191+ 8759 EE 07        		xor		7							; Onto productivity
 192+ 875B C6 03        		add		3							;  (Flipped eco +3)
 193+ 875D 57           		ld		d,a
 194+ 875E 3A BF 80     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 195+ 8761 C6 04        		add		4
 196+ 8763 5F           		ld		e,a
 197+ 8764 ED 30        		mul									; ; DE = d*e, Productivity part 1. has hsb in A, lsb in P.
 198+ 8766 3A C1 80     		ld		a,(DisplayPopulation)		; then we use d for radius
 199+ 8769 57           		ld		d,a
 200+ 876A ED 30        		mul
 201+ 876C CB 23        		sla		e
 202+ 876E CB 1A        		rr		d
 203+ 8770 CB 23        		sla		e
 204+ 8772 CB 1A        		rr		d
 205+ 8774 CB 23        		sla		e
 206+ 8776 CB 1A        		rr		d							; de * 8
 207+ 8778 ED 53 C3 80  		ld		(DisplayProductivity),de
 208+ 877C              .DoRadius:
 209+ 877C 3A 94 80     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 210+ 877F 4F           		ld		c,a
 211+ 8780 3A 96 80     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
 212+ 8783 E6 0F        		and		$0F							;  lower 4 bits of w2_h determine planet radius
 213+ 8785 C6 0B        		add		11							;  radius min = 256*11 = 2816 km
 214+ 8787 47           		ld		b,a							;
 215+ 8788 ED 43 C7 80  		ld		(DisplayRadius),bc
 216+ 878C C9           		ret

  36+ 88D3              RankingEQMostly		EQU 1
  37+ 88D3              RankingEQPoor		EQU 2
  38+ 88D3              RankingEQAverage	EQU 3
  39+ 88D3              RankingEQAbove		EQU 4
  40+ 88D3              RankingEQCompetent  EQU 5
  41+ 88D3              RankingEQDangerous	EQU 6
  42+ 88D3              RankingEQDeadly		EQU 7
  43+ 88D3              RankingEQElite		EQU 8
  44+ 88D3              RankingEQSkollob	EQU 9

  49+ 88D3 5E 88 67 88  RankingNameIdx		dw RankingName1,RankingName2,RankingName3,RankingName4,RankingName5,RankingName6,RankingName7,RankingName8,RankingName9,RankingName10,RankingName11
  49+ 88D7 77 88 7C 88
  49+ 88DB 84 88 92 88
  49+ 88DF 9C 88 A6 88
  49+ 88E3 AD 88 C0 88
  49+ 88E7 CC 88
  50+ 88E9              RankingNameIdxLen EQU $ - RankingNameIdx
  51+ 88E9
  52+ 88E9
  53+ 88E9              getTableText:
  54+ 88E9              ; ">getTableText, hl = indexlist, a = textnbr, returns with hl = porinter to head of text"
  55+ 88E9              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  56+ 88E9 D5           	push	de								; save DE as we will likley need it in caller
  57+ 88EA ED 31        	add		hl,a							; 0 based ref, and its 2 bytes
  58+ 88EC ED 31        	add		hl,a
  59+ 88EE 5E           	ld		e,(hl)
  60+ 88EF 23           	inc		hl
  61+ 88F0 56           	ld		d,(hl)							; de = indexed address
  62+ 88F1 EB           	ex		de,hl							; flip it to hl
  63+ 88F2 D1           	pop		de								; retrieve de
  64+ 88F3 C9           	ret										; return with hl as start entry
  65+ 88F4
  66+ 88F4
  67+ 88F4              ;               CF      ZF      Result
  68+ 88F4              ;               -----------------------------------
  69+ 88F4              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  70+ 88F4              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  71+ 88F4              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  72+ 88F4              ;               1       1       Impossible
  73+ 88F4              getRankIndex:
  74+ 88F4              ; ">getRank, de = kill count, returns a = index,hl destroyed"
  75+ 88F4              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  76+ 88F4 7A           	ld		a,d
  77+ 88F5 B3           	or		e
  78+ 88F6 FE 00        	cp		0
  79+ 88F8 C8           	ret		z								; quicks skip for 0 kills
  80+ 88F9 AF           	xor 	a
  81+ 88FA 21 32 88     	ld		hl,RankingTableLow
  82+ 88FD              .testLoop:
  83+ 88FD 4E           	ld		c,(hl)
  84+ 88FE 23           	inc		hl
  85+ 88FF 46           	ld		b,(hl)							; bc = ranking
  86+ 8900 E5           	push	hl
  87+ 8901 60           	ld		h,b
  88+ 8902 69           	ld		l,c
  89+ 8903 CD A7 99     	call	compare16HLDE
  90+ 8906 38 06        	jr		c,.HLLTDE
  91+ 8908              .HLGTEDE									; Found the correct rank
  92+ 8908 E1           	pop		hl
  93+ 8909 23           	inc		hl								; move to next value
  94+ 890A 23           	inc		hl
  95+ 890B 3C           	inc		a								; we canloop forever as if kills was $FFFF then hits nutter rank but also +1 = 0000 as its 16 bit
  96+ 890C 18 EF        	jr		.testLoop
  97+ 890E              .HLLTDE:									; HL < Kills so found correct rank
  98+ 890E E1           	pop		hl
  99+ 890F C9           	ret
 100+ 8910
# file closed: ./Tables/text_tables.asm

 238+ 8F63              .CapLoop:
 239+ 8F63 23           	inc		hl
 240+ 8F64 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 241+ 8F65 FE 00        	cp		0
 242+ 8F67 C8           	ret		z
 243+ 8F68 FE 5B        	cp		'Z'+1
 244+ 8F6A 30 F7        	jr		nc,.CapLoop
 245+ 8F6C FE 41        	cp		'A'
 246+ 8F6E 38 F3        	jr		c,.CapLoop
 247+ 8F70              .LowerCase:

 249+ 8F72 77           	ld		(hl),a
 250+ 8F73 18 EE        	jr		.CapLoop

 256+ 8F7E ED 31        WordLookup:             add		hl,a
 257+ 8F80 ED 31                                add		hl,a
 258+ 8F82 D5                                   push	de
 259+ 8F83 5E                                   ld		e,(hl)
 260+ 8F84 23                                   inc		hl
 261+ 8F85 56                                   ld		d,(hl)
 262+ 8F86 EB                                   ex		de,hl

 264+ 8F88 C9                                   ret

 272+ 8F92              .ReadLoop:
 273+ 8F92 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 274+ 8F93 FE 00        	cp		0
 275+ 8F95 28 1B        	jr		z,.ReadDone
 276+ 8F97 E5           	push	hl
 277+ 8F98 D5           	push	de
 278+ 8F99 21 8E 8D     	ld		hl,WordIdx
 279+ 8F9C CD E9 88     	call	getTableText
 280+ 8F9F D1           	pop		de
 281+ 8FA0              .WordExpandLoop:
 282+ 8FA0 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 283+ 8FA1 FE 00        	cp		0
 284+ 8FA3 28 05        	jr		z,.AddSpace
 285+ 8FA5              ;.GetChar:
 286+ 8FA5 12           	ld		(de),a
 287+ 8FA6 13           	inc		de
 288+ 8FA7 23           	inc		hl
 289+ 8FA8 18 F6        	jr		.WordExpandLoop
 290+ 8FAA              .AddSpace:
 291+ 8FAA 3E 20        	ld		a,' '
 292+ 8FAC 12           	ld		(de),a
 293+ 8FAD 13           	inc		de
 294+ 8FAE E1           	pop		hl
 295+ 8FAF 23           	inc		hl
 296+ 8FB0 18 E0        	jr		.ReadLoop
 297+ 8FB2              .ReadDone:
 298+ 8FB2 1B           	dec		de
 299+ 8FB3 AF           	xor		a
 300+ 8FB4 12           	ld		(de),a
 301+ 8FB5 C9           	ret

 116+ 9050              ;		.TT43	\ Token > 127 page4 token or planet digram.
 117+ 9050              ;C9 A0                   CMP #&A0	      \ >= #160 ?
 118+ 9050              ;B0 14                   BCS TT47	      \ more page4, subtract #160
 119+ 9050              ;29 7F                   AND #&7F	      \ else token 128to159  -> 0 to 31
 120+ 9050              ;0A                      ASL A		      \ *= 2
 121+ 9050              ;A8                      TAY 		      \ digram index = 0to62
 122+ 9050              ;B9 80 08                LDA &0880,Y \ QQ16,Y  \ ALLEXEGEZACEBISOUSESARMAINDIREA?ER  etc.
 123+ 9050              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 124+ 9050              ;B9 81 08                LDA &0881,Y \ QQ16+1,Y \ 2nd character of diagram. Flight copied down from docked code.
 125+ 9050              ;C9 3F                   CMP #&3F	      \ is second letter '?'
 126+ 9050              ;F0 40                   BEQ TT48    	      \ rts, name has odd-number of letters.
 127+ 9050              ;4C 9A 33                JMP &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 128+ 9050              ;
 129+ 9050              ;	.TT47	\ more page4, subtract #160
 130+ 9050              ;E9 A0                   SBC #&A0	\ -= 160
 131+ 9050              ;	.ex	\ -> &342D \ extra, token >= 96 or Acc = 128to145 or -=160
 132+ 9050              ;AA                      TAX 		\ copy of word index
 133+ 9050              ;A9 00                   LDA #0		\ page 4 words lo  #QQ18 MOD 256
 134+ 9050              ;85 22                   STA &22		\ V
 135+ 9050              ;A9 04                   LDA #4		\ page 4 words hi  #QQ18 DIV 256
 136+ 9050              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 137+ 9050              ;A0 00                   LDY #0
 138+ 9050              ;8A                      TXA 		\ token = word index
 139+ 9050              ;F0 13                   BEQ TT50	\ if X=0 then Y offset to word correct
 140+ 9050              ;	.TT51	\ counters Y letter, X token
 141+ 9050              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 142+ 9050              ;F0 07                   BEQ TT49	\ exit as word ended
 143+ 9050              ;C8                      INY 		\ letter count
 144+ 9050              ;D0 F9                   BNE TT51	\ loop Y
 145+ 9050              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1 \ next page as Y reached 256
 146+ 9050              ;D0 F5                   BNE TT51    	\ guaranteed, loop Y letter
 147+ 9050              ;	.TT49	\ word ended
 148+ 9050              ;C8                      INY
 149+ 9050              ;D0 02                   BNE TT59    	\ next word
 150+ 9050              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1	\ next page as Y reached 256
 151+ 9050              ;	.TT59	\ next word
 152+ 9050              ;CA                      DEX 		\ token count
 153+ 9050              ;D0 ED                   BNE TT51	\ loop X token
 154+ 9050              ;	.TT50	\ token X = 0, counter Y offset to word correct
 155+ 9050              ;98                      TYA
 156+ 9050              ;48                      PHA 		\ store Yindex
 157+ 9050              ;A5 23                   LDA &23		\ V+1
 158+ 9050              ;48                      PHA 		\ correct pointer hi
 159+ 9050              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y 	\ (V),Y
 160+ 9050              ;49 23                   EOR #&23	\ decode '#'
 161+ 9050              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A \ TT27 \ process text token to next depth
 162+ 9050              ;68                      PLA 		\ restore this depth's Vhi
 163+ 9050              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 164+ 9050              ;68                      PLA
 165+ 9050              ;A8                      TAY 		\ restore this depth's Yindex
 166+ 9050              ;C8                      INY 		\ next letter
 167+ 9050              ;D0 02                   BNE P%+4	\ not zero so skip next page
 168+ 9050              ;E6 23                   INC &23		\ V+1
 169+ 9050              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 170+ 9050              ;D0 E6                   BNE TT50    	\ loop Y for next letter of page4 token
 171+ 9050              ;	.TT48 	\ rts
 172+ 9050              ;60                      RTS 		\ end of flight token printing TT27
 173+ 9050              ;
 174+ 9050              ;
 175+ 9050              ;
 176+ 9050              ;
 177+ 9050              ;
 178+ 9050              ;
 179+ 9050              ;		.TT27	\ -> &36E0 \ process flight text Token in Acc
 180+ 9050              ;;AA                      TAX		\ copy token to count down
 181+ 9050              ;;F0 DE                   BEQ csh		\ Acc = 0, up to Cash
 182+ 9050              ;30 74                   BMI TT43	\ if token is >  127 down, page4 token or digram
 183+ 9050              ;CA                      DEX
 184+ 9050              ;F0 BC                   BEQ tal		\ Acc == 1, up, print Galaxy number.
 185+ 9050              ;CA                      DEX
 186+ 9050              ;F0 A3                   BEQ ypl		\ Acc == 2, up, present planet in QQ2.
 187+ 9050              ;CA                      DEX
 188+ 9050              ;D0 03                   BNE P%+5	\ hop over, else X == 0
 189+ 9050              ;4C 0A 33                JMP &330A \ cpl \ Acc = 3 print Planet name for seed QQ15
 190+ 9050              ;CA                      DEX
 191+ 9050              ;F0 8A                   BEQ cmn		\ Acc == 4, up, commander name.
 192+ 9050              ;CA                      DEX
 193+ 9050              ;F0 B5                   BEQ fwl		\ Acc == 5, up, fuel followed by cash.
 194+ 9050              ;CA                      DEX
 195+ 9050              ;D0 05                   BNE  P%+7	\ hop over, else X == 0
 196+ 9050              ;A9 80                   LDA #&80	\ Acc == 6, set bit 7 TT27m
 197+ 9050              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 198+ 9050              ;60                      RTS
 199+ 9050              ;CA                      DEX 		\ skip Acc ==7
 200+ 9050              ;CA                      DEX
 201+ 9050              ;D0 03                   BNE P%+5	\ hop over to continue Acc 9to127
 202+ 9050              ;86 72                   STX &72	 \ QQ17	\ else Acc ==8, QQ17 set to X = 0
 203+ 9050              ;60                      RTS
 204+ 9050              ;CA                      DEX 		\ continue 9to127 tokens
 205+ 9050              ;F0 38                   BEQ crlf	\ Acc == 9, down, colon on right.
 206+ 9050              ;C9 60                   CMP #&60	\ discard X, look at Acc = token >= 96
 207+ 9050              ;B0 66                   BCS ex   	\ extra >= #&60, far down
 208+ 9050              ;C9 0E                   CMP #14		\ < 14 ?
 209+ 9050              ;90 04                   BCC P%+6	\ goes to Token < 14 or > 31
 210+ 9050              ;C9 20                   CMP #32		\ < 32 ?
 211+ 9050              ;90 28                   BCC qw   	\ 14 <= token A < 32 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 212+ 9050              ;		\ Token  < 14 or > 31
 213+ 9050              ;A6 72                   LDX &72	 	\ QQ17
 214+ 9050              ;F0 3D                   BEQ TT74 	\ if QQ17 = 0 Upper case, jmp TT26, print character.
 215+ 9050              ;30 11                   BMI TT41 	\ if bit7 set
 216+ 9050              ;24 72                   BIT &72		\ QQ17 has bit6 set too
 217+ 9050              ;70 30                   BVS TT46 	\ If only bit6 set, clear bit6 and print as Upper
 218+ 9050              ;	.TT42	\ Uppercase to lowercase
 219+ 9050              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 220+ 9050              ;90 06                   BCC TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 221+ 9050              ;C9 5B                   CMP #&5B	\ >= ascii 'Z'+1
 222+ 9050              ;B0 02                   BCS TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 223+ 9050              ;69 20                   ADC #&20	\ else Upper to lowercase
 224+ 9050              ;	.TT44	\ print character as is with TT26
 225+ 9050              ;4C FC 1E                JMP &1EFC \ TT26 \ print character
 226+ 9050              ;
 227+ 9050              ;	.TT41	\ QQ17 bit7 set
 228+ 9050              ;24 72                   BIT &72		\ QQ17
 229+ 9050              ;70 17                   BVS TT45	\ bit6 set too, Nothing or lower.
 230+ 9050              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 231+ 9050              ;90 22                   BCC TT74 	\ print as is using TT26
 232+ 9050              ;48                      PHA 		\ else store token Acc
 233+ 9050              ;8A                      TXA 		\ QQ17 copy
 234+ 9050              ;09 40                   ORA #&40	\ set bit6 in QQ17 so subsequent ones lower
 235+ 9050              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 236+ 9050              ;68                      PLA 		\ restore token
 237+ 9050              ;D0 EC                   BNE TT44	\ guaranteed up, print as Uppercase with TT26.
 238+ 9050              ;
 239+ 9050              ;	.qw	\ Acc = 14to31 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 240+ 9050              ;69 72                   ADC #&72	\ A+=114 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 241+ 9050              ;D0 32                   BNE ex		\ guaranteed down, extra.
 242+ 9050              ;
 243+ 9050              ;	.crlf	\ Acc == 9,  colon on right
 244+ 9050              ;A9 15                   LDA #21		\ on right
 245+ 9050              ;85 2C                   STA &2C		\ XC
 246+ 9050              ;D0 97                   BNE TT73	\ guaranteed up, print colon.
 247+ 9050              ;
 248+ 9050              ;	.TT45	\ QQ17 bits 7,6 set. Nothing or lower.
 249+ 9050              ;E0 FF                   CPX #&FF	\ if QQ17 = #&FF
 250+ 9050              ;F0 63                   BEQ TT48	\ rts
 251+ 9050              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ >= ascii 'A' ?
 252+ 9050              ;B0 D0                   BCS TT42	\ Uppercase to lowercase, up.
 253+ 9050              ;	.TT46	\ clear bit6 QQ17 and print as is using TT26
 254+ 9050              ;48                      PHA 		\ push token
 255+ 9050              ;8A                      TXA 		\ QQ17 copy
 256+ 9050              ;29 BF                   AND #&BF	\ clear bit6
 257+ 9050              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 258+ 9050              ;68                      PLA 		\ pull token
 259+ 9050              ;	.TT74	\ TT26, print character.
 260+ 9050              ;4C FC 1E                JMP &1EFC	\ TT26
 261+ 9050              ;
 262+ 9050              ;	.TT43	\ Token > 127 page4 token or planet digram.
 263+ 9050              ;C9 A0                   CMP #&A0	      \ >= #160 ?
 264+ 9050              ;B0 14                   BCS TT47	      \ more page4, subtract #160
 265+ 9050              ;29 7F                   AND #&7F	      \ else token 128to159  -> 0 to 31
 266+ 9050              ;0A                      ASL A		      \ *= 2
 267+ 9050              ;A8                      TAY 		      \ digram index = 0to62
 268+ 9050              ;B9 80 08                LDA &0880,Y \ QQ16,Y  \ ALLEXEGEZACEBISOUSESARMAINDIREA?ER  etc.
 269+ 9050              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 270+ 9050              ;B9 81 08                LDA &0881,Y \ QQ16+1,Y \ 2nd character of diagram. Flight copied down from docked code.
 271+ 9050              ;C9 3F                   CMP #&3F	      \ is second letter '?'
 272+ 9050              ;F0 40                   BEQ TT48    	      \ rts, name has odd-number of letters.
 273+ 9050              ;4C 9A 33                JMP &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 274+ 9050              ;
 275+ 9050              ;	.TT47	\ more page4, subtract #160
 276+ 9050              ;E9 A0                   SBC #&A0	\ -= 160
 277+ 9050              ;	.ex	\ -> &342D \ extra, token >= 96 or Acc = 128to145 or -=160
 278+ 9050              ;AA                      TAX 		\ copy of word index
 279+ 9050              ;A9 00                   LDA #0		\ page 4 words lo  #QQ18 MOD 256
 280+ 9050              ;85 22                   STA &22		\ V
 281+ 9050              ;A9 04                   LDA #4		\ page 4 words hi  #QQ18 DIV 256
 282+ 9050              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 283+ 9050              ;A0 00                   LDY #0
 284+ 9050              ;8A                      TXA 		\ token = word index
 285+ 9050              ;F0 13                   BEQ TT50	\ if X=0 then Y offset to word correct
 286+ 9050              ;	.TT51	\ counters Y letter, X token
 287+ 9050              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 288+ 9050              ;F0 07                   BEQ TT49	\ exit as word ended
 289+ 9050              ;C8                      INY 		\ letter count
 290+ 9050              ;D0 F9                   BNE TT51	\ loop Y
 291+ 9050              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1 \ next page as Y reached 256
 292+ 9050              ;D0 F5                   BNE TT51    	\ guaranteed, loop Y letter
 293+ 9050              ;	.TT49	\ word ended
 294+ 9050              ;C8                      INY
 295+ 9050              ;D0 02                   BNE TT59    	\ next word
 296+ 9050              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1	\ next page as Y reached 256
 297+ 9050              ;	.TT59	\ next word
 298+ 9050              ;CA                      DEX 		\ token count
 299+ 9050              ;D0 ED                   BNE TT51	\ loop X token
 300+ 9050              ;	.TT50	\ token X = 0, counter Y offset to word correct
 301+ 9050              ;98                      TYA
 302+ 9050              ;48                      PHA 		\ store Yindex
 303+ 9050              ;A5 23                   LDA &23		\ V+1
 304+ 9050              ;48                      PHA 		\ correct pointer hi
 305+ 9050              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y 	\ (V),Y
 306+ 9050              ;49 23                   EOR #&23	\ decode '#'
 307+ 9050              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A \ TT27 \ process text token to next depth
 308+ 9050              ;68                      PLA 		\ restore this depth's Vhi
 309+ 9050              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 310+ 9050              ;68                      PLA
 311+ 9050              ;A8                      TAY 		\ restore this depth's Yindex
 312+ 9050              ;C8                      INY 		\ next letter
 313+ 9050              ;D0 02                   BNE P%+4	\ not zero so skip next page
 314+ 9050              ;E6 23                   INC &23		\ V+1
 315+ 9050              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 316+ 9050              ;D0 E6                   BNE TT50    	\ loop Y for next letter of page4 token

# file opened: ./Maths/DIVD3B2.asm
   1+ 9092              ;INPUTS: ahl = dividend cde = divisor
   2+ 9092              ;OUTPUTS: cde = quotient ahl = remainder
   3+ 9092 47           Div24by24:              ld b,a
   4+ 9093 E5                                   push hl
   5+ 9094 DD E1                                pop ix
   6+ 9096 2E 18                                ld l,24
   7+ 9098 E5                                   push hl
   8+ 9099 AF                                   xor a
   9+ 909A 67                                   ld h,a
  10+ 909B 6F                                   ld l,a
  11+ 909C DD 29        .Div24by24loop:         add ix,ix
  12+ 909E CB 10                                rl b
  13+ 90A0 ED 6A                                adc hl,hl
  14+ 90A2 17                                   rla
  15+ 90A3 B9                                   cp c
  16+ 90A4 38 0C                                jr c,.Div24by24skip
  17+ 90A6 20 05                                jr nz,.Div24by24setbit
  18+ 90A8 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
  19+ 90AA 19                                   add hl,de
  20+ 90AB 38 05                                jr c,.Div24by24skip
  21+ 90AD ED 52        .Div24by24setbit:       sbc hl,de
  22+ 90AF 99                                   sbc a,c
  23+ 90B0 DD 23                                inc ix
  24+ 90B2 E3           .Div24by24skip:         ex (sp),hl
  25+ 90B3 2D                                   dec l
  26+ 90B4 E3                                   ex (sp),hl
  27+ 90B5 20 E5                                jr nz,.Div24by24loop
  28+ 90B7 D1                                   pop de
  29+ 90B8 48                                   ld c,b
  30+ 90B9 DD E5                                push ix
  31+ 90BB D1                                   pop de
  32+ 90BC C9                                   ret
  33+ 90BD
  34+ 90BD FD 67        Div24by24ASigned:       ld      iyh,a
  35+ 90BF E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  36+ 90C1 CD 92 90                             call    Div24by24
  37+ 90C4 F5                                   push    af
  38+ 90C5 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
  39+ 90C7 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  40+ 90C9 B1                                   or      c
  41+ 90CA 4F                                   ld      c,a
  42+ 90CB F1                                   pop     af
  43+ 90CC C9                                   ret
  44+ 90CD
  45+ 90CD                                      ; CDE = AHL/CDE, AHL = remainder
  46+ 90CD FD 67        Div24by24LeadSign:      ld      iyh,a           ; Preserve signed in IYL
  47+ 90CF A9                                   xor     c               ; flip sign if negative
  48+ 90D0 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit    ; .
  49+ 90D2 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a           ; .
  50+ 90D4 79                                   ld      a,c             ; make both values ABS
  51+ 90D5 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; .
  52+ 90D7 4F                                   ld      c,a             ; .
  53+ 90D8 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; .
  54+ 90DA E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; .
  55+ 90DC CD 92 90                             call    Div24by24       ; do abs divide
  56+ 90DF FD B5                                or      iyl             ; bring in sign bit
  57+ 90E1 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save a
  58+ 90E3 79                                   ld      a,c             ; sort sign for c
  59+ 90E4 FD B5                                or      iyl             ;
  60+ 90E6 4F                                   ld      c,a             ;
  61+ 90E7 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; sort sign of a
  62+ 90E9 C9                                   ret
  63+ 90EA
  64+ 90EA              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
  65+ 90EA              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
  66+ 90EA              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
  67+ 90EA              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
  68+ 90EA 47           PROJ256mulAdivQ:        ld      b,a
  69+ 90EB 0E 00                                ld      c,0
  70+ 90ED 16 00                                ld      d,0
  71+ 90EF 3A 01 80                             ld      a,(varQ)
  72+ 90F2 5F                                   ld      e,a
  73+ 90F3 21 00 00     PROJDIV16UNDOC:         ld      hl,0
  74+ 90F6 78                                   ld      a,b
  75+ 90F7 06 10                                ld      b,16
  76+ 90F9 CB 31        PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP:     sll     c       ; unroll 16 times
  77+ 90FB 17                                   rla             ; ...
  78+ 90FC ED 6A                                adc     hl,hl       ; ...
  79+ 90FE ED 52                                sbc     hl,de       ; ...
  80+ 9100 30 02                                jr      nc,PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP       ; ...
  81+ 9102 19                                   add     hl,de       ; ...
  82+ 9103 0D                                   dec     c       ; ...
  83+ 9104 10 F3        PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP:     djnz    PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP
  84+ 9106 79                                   ld      a,c
  85+ 9107 32 02 80                             ld      (varR),a
  86+ 910A C9                                   ret

   1+ 910B              HLequSRmulQdiv256:      ;X.Y=x1lo.S*M/256  	\ where M/256 is gradient
   2+ 910B 2A 02 80                             ld  hl,(varRS)
   3+ 910E 3A 01 80                             ld  a,(varQ)
   4+ 9111 C5 D5        HLeqyHLmulAdiv256:      push    bc,,de
   5+ 9113 11 00 00                             ld  de,0        ; de = XY
   6+ 9116 47                                   ld  b,a         ; b = Q
   7+ 9117                                      ShiftHLRight1
   7+ 9117 CB 3C       >			   srl h
   7+ 9119 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
   8+ 911B CB 20                                sla b
   9+ 911D 30 03                                jr  nc,.LL126
  10+ 911F EB           .LL125:                 ex de,hl
  11+ 9120 19                                   add hl,de
  12+ 9121 EB                                   ex  de,hl       ; de = de + rs
  13+ 9122              .LL126:                 ShiftHLRight1
  13+ 9122 CB 3C       >			   srl h
  13+ 9124 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  14+ 9126 CB 20                                sla b
  15+ 9128 38 F5                                jr      c,.LL125
  16+ 912A 20 F6                                jr      nz,.LL126
  17+ 912C EB                                   ex      de,hl   ; hl = result
  18+ 912D D1 C1                                pop     bc,,de
  19+ 912F C9                                   ret

  21+ 9130              ; FMLTU - A = A * Q / 256
  22+ 9130 57           AequAmulQdiv256usgn:    ld      d,a
  23+ 9131 3A 01 80                             ld      a,(varQ)
  24+ 9134 5F                                   ld      e,a
  25+ 9135              asm_defmutl:

  27+ 9135 ED 30        AequDmulEdiv256usgn:    mul     de

  35+ 9139              MacroDEEquQmulASigned:  MACRO
  36+ 9139 ~                                    ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  37+ 9139 ~                                    ld      a,(varQ)
  38+ 9139 ~                                    ld      e,a
  39+ 9139 ~                                    xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  40+ 9139 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
  41+ 9139 ~                                    ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  42+ 9139 ~                                    ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  43+ 9139 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  44+ 9139 ~                                    ld      d,a
  45+ 9139 ~                                    ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  46+ 9139 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  47+ 9139 ~                                    ld      e,a
  48+ 9139 ~                                    mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  49+ 9139 ~                                    ld      a,d
  50+ 9139 ~                                    or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  51+ 9139 ~                                    ld      d,a
  52+ 9139                                      ENDM

  66+ 916B 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  66+ 916C ED 30       >                        mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  66+ 916E 7A          >                        ld      a,d
  66+ 916F B0          >                        or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  66+ 9170 57          >                        ld      d,a
  67+ 9171 2A 02 80                             ld		hl,(varR)
  68+ 9174 CD 7A 91                             call	madXAAddHLDESigned
  69+ 9177 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = R.S + DE
  70+ 9178                                      ClearCarryFlag
  70+ 9178 B7          >                        or a
  71+ 9179 C9                                   ret
  72+ 917A
  73+ 917A 7C           madXAAddHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
  74+ 917B E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  75+ 917D 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
  76+ 917E AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
  77+ 917F                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
  77+ 917F FA 97 91    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
  78+ 9182 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:       ld      a,b
  79+ 9183 B2                                   or      d
  80+ 9184                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  80+ 9184 FA 89 91    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
  81+ 9187 19                                   add     hl,de
  82+ 9188 C9                                   ret
  83+ 9189 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
  84+ 918A E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  85+ 918C 67                                   ld      h,a
  86+ 918D 7A                                   ld      a,d
  87+ 918E E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  88+ 9190 57                                   ld      d,a
  89+ 9191 19                                   add     hl,de
  90+ 9192 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
  91+ 9194 B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  92+ 9195 67                                   ld      h,a
  93+ 9196 C9                                   ret
  94+ 9197 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:          ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit                     ; here HL and DE are opposite
  95+ 9198 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  96+ 919A 67                                   ld      h,a
  97+ 919B 7A                                   ld      a,d
  98+ 919C E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  99+ 919E 57                                   ld      d,a
 100+ 919F B7                                   or      a
 101+ 91A0 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 102+ 91A2 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
 103+ 91A4 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 104+ 91A5 B4                                   or      h
 105+ 91A6 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 106+ 91A7 C9                                   ret
 107+ 91A8              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:       NegHL                                                   ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
 107+ 91A8 AF          >                    xor a
 107+ 91A9 95          >                    sub l
 107+ 91AA 6F          >                    ld l,a
 107+ 91AB 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 107+ 91AC 94          >                    sub h
 107+ 91AD 67          >                    ld h,a
 108+ 91AE 78                                   ld      a,b
 109+ 91AF EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 110+ 91B1 B4                                   or      h
 111+ 91B2 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 112+ 91B3 C9                                   ret
 113+ 91B4
 114+ 91B4
 115+ 91B4                  ; multiplication of 16-bit number and 8-bit number into a 24-bit product
 116+ 91B4                  ;
 117+ 91B4                  ; enter : hl = 16-bit multiplier   = x
 118+ 91B4                  ;          e =  8-bit multiplicand = y
 119+ 91B4                  ;
 120+ 91B4                  ; exit  : ahl = 24-bit product
 121+ 91B4                  ;         carry reset
 122+ 91B4                  ;
 123+ 91B4                  ; uses  : af, de, hl
 124+ 91B4 54           AHLequHLmulE:           ld d,h                      ; xh
 125+ 91B5 63                                   ld h,e                      ; yl
 126+ 91B6 ED 30                                mul de                      ; xh*yl
 127+ 91B8 EB                                   ex de,hl
 128+ 91B9 ED 30                                mul de                      ; yl*xl, hl = xh*yl
 129+ 91BB
 130+ 91BB 7A                                   ld  a,d                     ; sum products
 131+ 91BC 85                                   add a,l
 132+ 91BD 57                                   ld  d,a
 133+ 91BE EB                                   ex de,hl
 134+ 91BF
 135+ 91BF 7A                                   ld  a,d
 136+ 91C0 CE 00                                adc a,0
 137+ 91C2 C9                                   ret
 138+ 91C3
 139+ 91C3 54           HLE0quH0mulE:           ld      d,h                 ; .
 140+ 91C4 63                                   ld      h,e                 ; .
 141+ 91C5 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; de = xh * yl
 142+ 91C7 EB                                   ex      de,hl
 143+ 91C8 C9                                   ret
 144+ 91C9
 145+ 91C9                 ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 32-bit product
 146+ 91C9                 ;
 147+ 91C9                 ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand = y
 148+ 91C9                 ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand = x
 149+ 91C9                 ;
 150+ 91C9                 ; exit  : dehl = 32-bit product
 151+ 91C9                 ;         carry reset
 152+ 91C9                 ;
 153+ 91C9                 ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 154+ 91C9
 155+ 91C9
 156+ 91C9
 157+ 91C9 45           DEHLequDEmulHL:         ld b,l                      ; x0
 158+ 91CA 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; y0
 159+ 91CB 5D                                   ld e,l                      ; x0
 160+ 91CC 6A                                   ld l,d
 161+ 91CD E5                                   push hl                     ; x1 y1
 162+ 91CE 69                                   ld l,c                      ; y0
 163+ 91CF              ; bc = x0 y0, de = y1 x0,  hl = x1 y0,  stack = x1 y1
 164+ 91CF ED 30                                mul de                      ; y1*x0
 165+ 91D1 EB                                   ex de,hl
 166+ 91D2 ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y0
 167+ 91D4
 168+ 91D4 AF                                   xor a                       ; zero A
 169+ 91D5 19                                   add hl,de                   ; sum cross products p2 p1
 170+ 91D6 8F                                   adc a,a                     ; capture carry p3
 171+ 91D7
 172+ 91D7 59                                   ld e,c                      ; x0
 173+ 91D8 50                                   ld d,b                      ; y0
 174+ 91D9 ED 30                                mul de                      ; y0*x0
 175+ 91DB
 176+ 91DB 47                                   ld b,a                      ; carry from cross products
 177+ 91DC 4C                                   ld c,h                      ; LSB of MSW from cross products
 178+ 91DD
 179+ 91DD 7A                                   ld a,d
 180+ 91DE 85                                   add a,l
 181+ 91DF 67                                   ld h,a
 182+ 91E0 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; LSW in HL p1 p0
 183+ 91E1
 184+ 91E1 D1                                   pop de
 185+ 91E2 ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y1
 186+ 91E4
 187+ 91E4 EB                                   ex de,hl
 188+ 91E5 ED 4A                                adc hl,bc
 189+ 91E7 EB                                   ex de,hl                    ; de = final MSW
 190+ 91E8
 191+ 91E8 C9                                   ret
 192+ 91E9
 193+ 91E9              ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 16-bit product
 194+ 91E9              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 195+ 91E9              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 196+ 91E9              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 197+ 91E9              ;         carry reset
 198+ 91E9              ; maths is
 199+ 91E9              ;        hl = y , de= x
 200+ 91E9              ;        hl = xhi,ylo + (yhigh * xlow)
 201+ 91E9              ;        hl = yhih & xlo + x
 202+ 91E9              ;
 203+ 91E9              ;
 204+ 91E9              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 205+ 91E9 C5           mulDEbyHL:              push    bc
 206+ 91EA 7A                                   ld a,d                      ; a = xh
 207+ 91EB 54                                   ld d,h                      ; d = yh
 208+ 91EC 67                                   ld h,a                      ; h = xh
 209+ 91ED 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; c = xl
 210+ 91EE 45                                   ld b,l                      ; b = yl
 211+ 91EF ED 30                                mul                         ; yh * yl
 212+ 91F1 EB                                   ex de,hl
 213+ 91F2 ED 30                                mul                         ; xh * yl
 214+ 91F4 19                                   add hl,de                   ; add cross products
 215+ 91F5 59                                   ld e,c
 216+ 91F6 50                                   ld d,b
 217+ 91F7 ED 30                                mul                         ; yl * xl
 218+ 91F9 7D                                   ld a,l                      ; cross products lsb
 219+ 91FA 82                                   add a,d                     ; add to msb final
 220+ 91FB 67                                   ld h,a
 221+ 91FC 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; hl = final
 222+ 91FD                                      ; 83 cycles, 19 bytes
 223+ 91FD AF                                   xor a                       ; reset carry
 224+ 91FE C1                                   pop     bc
 225+ 91FF C9                                   ret
 226+ 9200
 227+ 9200
 228+ 9200              ; CHL = multiplicand D = multiplier
 229+ 9200              ; DCHL = CHL * D
 230+ 9200 7A           mulCHLbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 231+ 9201 AC                                   xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 232+ 9202 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 233+ 9204 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 234+ 9206 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; now CHL = ABS (CHL)
 235+ 9207 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 236+ 9209 4F                                   ld      c,a                 ; .
 237+ 920A 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 238+ 920B E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 239+ 920D              ; At this point CHL = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 240+ 920D 57           .mul1:                  ld      d,a                 ; first do D * L
 241+ 920E 5D                                   ld      e,l                 ; .
 242+ 920F ED 30                                mul     de                  ; DE = L * D
 243+ 9211 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; save multiplier
 244+ 9212 6B                                   ld      l,e                 ; L = p0
 245+ 9213 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; carry byte
 246+ 9214 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; retrieve muliplier and save carry byte along with flags
 247+ 9215 5C           .mul2:                  ld      e,h                 ; byte 2 of multiplicand
 248+ 9216 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; and multiplier
 249+ 9217 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; now its D & L
 250+ 9219 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; get back carry byte with flags
 251+ 921A 83           .carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; add low byte carry to result and retain carry too through next instructions
 252+ 921B 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; h = P1
 253+ 921C 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; a = carry byte
 254+ 921D 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; save carry byte and get back multiplier with flags
 255+ 921E 59           .mul3:                  ld      e,c                 ; byte 3 of multiplicand
 256+ 921F 57                                   ld      d,a                 ;
 257+ 9220 ED 30                                mul     de                  ;
 258+ 9222 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; get back carry byte and carry prior to first add
 259+ 9223 8B                                   adc     a,e                 ;
 260+ 9224 FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; recover saved resultant sign
 261+ 9226 4F                                   ld      c,a                 ; c byte 3. Note the value range allowed can never cause a byte 3 carry
 262+ 9227 C9                                   ret
 263+ 9228
 264+ 9228              ;  CHL = 53456 D = 1E
 265+ 9228              ;  56 * 1E = A14 L = 14 carry = 0A
 266+ 9228              ;  34 * 1E = 618 H = 18 +A = 22 carry = 6
 267+ 9228              ;  5  * 1E = 096 C = 96 + 6 = 9C
 268+ 9228              ;  CHL = 9C2214
 269+ 9228              ;mult3
 270+ 9228              ; DELC = HLE * D, uses HL, DE, C , A , IYH
 271+ 9228              ; HLE = multiplicand D = multiplier
 272+ 9228              ; tested by mathstestsun.asm all passed
 273+ 9228              ; Algorithm
 274+ 9228              ; AC =  E * D   (save carry)         H    L    E
 275+ 9228              ; DE =  L * D                                  D
 276+ 9228              ;  L =  A + E + carry                         E*D (lo)
 277+ 9228              ; DE =  H * D                             L*D+ ^ (hi)
 278+ 9228              ;  E =  A + E + carry                H*D (lo) + carry
 279+ 9228              ;
 280+ 9228              ;
 281+ 9228 7A           mulHLbyDE2sc:           ld      a,d
 282+ 9229 AC                                   xor     h
 283+ 922A E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 284+ 922C FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; save sign bit for result
 285+ 922E 7C                                   ld      a,h
 286+ 922F E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 287+ 9231 28 06                                jr      z,.HLPositive
 288+ 9233              .HLNegative:            NegHL
 288+ 9233 AF          >                    xor a
 288+ 9234 95          >                    sub l
 288+ 9235 6F          >                    ld l,a
 288+ 9236 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 288+ 9237 94          >                    sub h
 288+ 9238 67          >                    ld h,a
 289+ 9239 7A           .HLPositive:            ld      a,d
 290+ 923A E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 291+ 923C 28 06                                jr      z,.DEPositive
 292+ 923E              .DENegative:            NegDE
 292+ 923E AF          >                    xor a
 292+ 923F 93          >                    sub e
 292+ 9240 5F          >                    ld e,a
 292+ 9241 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 292+ 9242 92          >                    sub d
 292+ 9243 57          >                    ld d,a
 293+ 9244 CD E9 91     .DEPositive:            call    mulDEbyHL           ; now do calc
 294+ 9247 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
 295+ 9249 A7                                   and     a                   ; if its 0 then we are good
 296+ 924A C8                                   ret     z
 297+ 924B
 298+ 924B
 299+ 924B
 300+ 924B 7A           mulHLEbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 301+ 924C AC                                   xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 302+ 924D E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 303+ 924F FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 304+ 9251 7C                                   ld      a,h                 ; now HLE = ABS (HLE)
 305+ 9252 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 306+ 9254 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; .
 307+ 9255 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 308+ 9256 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 309+ 9258 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
 310+ 9259 B7           .testEitherSideZero:    or      a
 311+ 925A 28 24                                jr      z,.ResultZero
 312+ 925C 7C                                   ld      a,h
 313+ 925D B5                                   or      l
 314+ 925E B3                                   or      e
 315+ 925F 28 1F                                jr      z,.ResultZero
 316+ 9261              ; At this point HLE = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 317+ 9261 42                                   ld      b,d                 ; save Quotient
 318+ 9262 ED 30        .mul1:                  mul     de                  ; C = E * D
 319+ 9264 4B                                   ld      c,e                 ; C = p0
 320+ 9265 FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d               ; save carry (p1)
 321+ 9267 5D           .mul2:                  ld      e,l                 ; L = L * D
 322+ 9268 50                                   ld      d,b                 ; .
 323+ 9269 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
 324+ 926B FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl               ; get back p1
 325+ 926D 83           .carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; L = L + E
 326+ 926E 6F                                   ld      l,a                 ; .
 327+ 926F FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d               ; save new carry byte
 328+ 9271 5C           .mul3:                  ld      e,h                 ; E = H * D
 329+ 9272 50                                   ld      d,b                 ; .
 330+ 9273 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
 331+ 9275 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl
 332+ 9277 8B                                   adc     a,e                 ; .
 333+ 9278 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
 334+ 9279 7A           .ItsNotZero:            ld      a,d                 ;
 335+ 927A CE 00                                adc     a,0                 ; final carry bit
 336+ 927C FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; bring back sign
 337+ 927E 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; s = sign
 338+ 927F C9                                   ret
 339+ 9280 11 00 00     .ResultZero:            ld      de,0
 340+ 9283                                      ZeroA
 340+ 9283 AF          >                        xor a
 341+ 9284 4F                                   ld      c,a
 342+ 9285 6F                                   ld      l,a
 343+ 9286 C9                                   ret
 344+ 9287
 345+ 9287              ;;;
 346+ 9287              ;;;
 347+ 9287              ;;;mulHLEbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 348+ 9287              ;;;                        xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 349+ 9287              ;;;                        and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 350+ 9287              ;;;                        ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 351+ 9287              ;;;                        ld      a,h                 ; now HLE = ABS (HLE)
 352+ 9287              ;;;                        and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 353+ 9287              ;;;                        ld      h,a                 ; .
 354+ 9287              ;;;                        ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 355+ 9287              ;;;                        and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 356+ 9287              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 357+ 9287              ;;;.testEitherSideZero:    or      a
 358+ 9287              ;;;                        jr      z,.ResultZero
 359+ 9287              ;;;                        ld      a,h
 360+ 9287              ;;;                        or      l
 361+ 9287              ;;;                        or      e
 362+ 9287              ;;;                        jr      z,.ResultZero
 363+ 9287              ;;;; At this point HLE = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 364+ 9287              ;;;.mul1:                  mul     de                  ; C = E * D
 365+ 9287              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; save mulitplier
 366+ 9287              ;;;                        ld      c,e                 ; C = p0
 367+ 9287              ;;;                        ld      a,d                 ; save carry (p1)
 368+ 9287              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 369+ 9287              ;;;.mul2:                  ld      e,l                 ; L = L * D
 370+ 9287              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 371+ 9287              ;;;                        mul     de                  ; .
 372+ 9287              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 373+ 9287              ;;;.carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; L = L + E
 374+ 9287              ;;;                        ld      l,a                 ; .
 375+ 9287              ;;;                        ld      a,d
 376+ 9287              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; save new carry byte
 377+ 9287              ;;;.mul3:                  ld      e,h                 ; E = H * D
 378+ 9287              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 379+ 9287              ;;;                        mul     de                  ; .
 380+ 9287              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 381+ 9287              ;;;                        adc     a,e                 ; .
 382+ 9287              ;;;                        ld      e,a                 ; .
 383+ 9287              ;;;.ItsNotZero:            ld      a,d                 ;
 384+ 9287              ;;;                        adc     a,0                 ; final carry bit
 385+ 9287              ;;;                        or      iyh                 ; bring back sign
 386+ 9287              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; s = sign
 387+ 9287              ;;;                        ret
 388+ 9287              ;;;.ResultZero:            ld      de,0
 389+ 9287              ;;;                        ZeroA
 390+ 9287              ;;;                        ld      c,a
 391+ 9287              ;;;                        ld      l,a
 392+ 9287              ;;;                        ret
 393+ 9287
 394+ 9287              ; multiplication of two S156-bit numbers into a 16-bit 2'd compliment product
 395+ 9287              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 396+ 9287              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 397+ 9287              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 398+ 9287              ;         carry reset
 399+ 9287              ;
 400+ 9287              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 401+ 9287 00           mulDEbyHLSignByte       DB      0
 402+ 9288 AF           mulDEbyHLSgnTo2c:       xor     a
 403+ 9289 32 87 92                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 404+ 928C 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 405+ 928D ED 27 80                             test    $80
 406+ 9290 28 08                                jr      z,.SignHL
 407+ 9292 E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 408+ 9294 57                                   ld      d,a
 409+ 9295 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 410+ 9297 32 87 92                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 411+ 929A 7C           .SignHL:                ld      a,h
 412+ 929B ED 27 80                             test    $80
 413+ 929E 28 0B                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 414+ 92A0 E6 7F        .NegativeHL:            and     $7F
 415+ 92A2 67                                   ld      h,a
 416+ 92A3 3A 87 92                             ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 417+ 92A6 EE 80                                xor     $80
 418+ 92A8 32 87 92                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 419+ 92AB CD E9 91     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 420+ 92AE 3A 87 92     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 421+ 92B1 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 422+ 92B4 C8                                   ret     z
 423+ 92B5 AF           .Negateghl: 			xor 	a
 424+ 92B6 95                                   sub 	l
 425+ 92B7 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 426+ 92B8 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 427+ 92B9 94                                   sub 	h
 428+ 92BA 67                                   ld 		h,a
 429+ 92BB C9                                   ret
 430+ 92BC
 431+ 92BC AF           mulDESgnbyHLUnsgnTo2c:  xor     a
 432+ 92BD 32 87 92                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 433+ 92C0 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 434+ 92C1 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 435+ 92C4 28 08                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 436+ 92C6 E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 437+ 92C8 57                                   ld      d,a
 438+ 92C9 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 439+ 92CB 32 87 92                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 440+ 92CE CD E9 91     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 441+ 92D1 3A 87 92     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 442+ 92D4 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 443+ 92D7 C8                                   ret     z
 444+ 92D8 AF           .Negateghl:             xor 	a
 445+ 92D9 95                                   sub 	l
 446+ 92DA 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 447+ 92DB 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 448+ 92DC 94                                   sub 	h
 449+ 92DD 67                                   ld 		h,a
 450+ 92DE C9                                   ret
