 637+ 97F5 D2 F9 97    >                        jp      nc,.skip_revert0 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 637+ 97F8 09          >                        add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 637+ 97F9 3F          >.skip_revert0:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 637+ 97FA CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 637+ 97FE EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 637+ 97FF CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 637+ 9803 EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 637+ 9804 B7 ED 42    >                        sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 637+ 9807 D2 0B 98    >                        jp      NC,.skip_revert1 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 637+ 980A 09          >                        add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 637+ 980B 3F          >.skip_revert1:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 638+ 980C                                      L_DIV_0_ITERATION
 638+ 980C CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 638+ 9810 EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 638+ 9811 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 638+ 9815 EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 638+ 9816 B7 ED 42    >                        sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 638+ 9819 D2 1D 98    >                        jp      nc,.skip_revert0 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 638+ 981C 09          >                        add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 638+ 981D 3F          >.skip_revert0:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 638+ 981E CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 638+ 9822 EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 638+ 9823 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 638+ 9827 EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 638+ 9828 B7 ED 42    >                        sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 638+ 982B D2 2F 98    >                        jp      NC,.skip_revert1 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 638+ 982E 09          >                        add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 638+ 982F 3F          >.skip_revert1:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 639+ 9830                                      L_DIV_0_ITERATION
 639+ 9830 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 639+ 9834 EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 639+ 9835 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 639+ 9839 EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 639+ 983A B7 ED 42    >                        sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 639+ 983D D2 41 98    >                        jp      nc,.skip_revert0 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 639+ 9840 09          >                        add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 639+ 9841 3F          >.skip_revert0:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 639+ 9842 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 639+ 9846 EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 639+ 9847 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 639+ 984B EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 639+ 984C B7 ED 42    >                        sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 639+ 984F D2 53 98    >                        jp      NC,.skip_revert1 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 639+ 9852 09          >                        add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 639+ 9853 3F          >.skip_revert1:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 640+ 9854                                      L_DIV_0_ITERATION
 640+ 9854 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 640+ 9858 EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 640+ 9859 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 640+ 985D EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 640+ 985E B7 ED 42    >                        sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 640+ 9861 D2 65 98    >                        jp      nc,.skip_revert0 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 640+ 9864 09          >                        add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 640+ 9865 3F          >.skip_revert0:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 640+ 9866 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 640+ 986A EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 640+ 986B CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 640+ 986F EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 640+ 9870 B7 ED 42    >                        sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 640+ 9873 D2 77 98    >                        jp      NC,.skip_revert1 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 640+ 9876 09          >                        add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 640+ 9877 3F          >.skip_revert1:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 641+ 9878                                      L_DIV_0_ITERATION
 641+ 9878 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 641+ 987C EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 641+ 987D CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 641+ 9881 EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 641+ 9882 B7 ED 42    >                        sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 641+ 9885 D2 89 98    >                        jp      nc,.skip_revert0 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 641+ 9888 09          >                        add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 641+ 9889 3F          >.skip_revert0:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 641+ 988A CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 641+ 988E EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 641+ 988F CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 641+ 9893 EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 641+ 9894 B7 ED 42    >                        sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 641+ 9897 D2 9B 98    >                        jp      NC,.skip_revert1 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 641+ 989A 09          >                        add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 641+ 989B 3F          >.skip_revert1:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 642+ 989C CB 13 CB 12                          rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 643+ 98A0 EB                                   ex      de,hl           ;dividend<>remainder
 644+ 98A1 C9                                   ret
 645+ 98A2
 646+ 98A2
 647+ 98A2
 648+ 98A2 11 FE FF     LLHLdivC:               ld      de,$FFFE                    ; set XY to &FFFE at start, de holds XY
 649+ 98A5              .LL130:                 ShiftHLLeft1                        ; RS *= 2
 649+ 98A5 CB 25       >			   sla l
 649+ 98A7 CB 14       >			   rl  h
 650+ 98A9 7C                                   ld      a,h
 651+ 98AA 38 04                                jr      c,.LL131                    ; if S overflowed skip Q test and do subtractions
 652+ 98AC                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .LL132            ; if S <  Q = 256/gradient skip subtractions
 652+ 98AC B9          >                        cp      c
 652+ 98AD DA B8 98    >                        jp		c, .LL132
 653+ 98B0 3F           .LL131:                 ccf                                 ; compliment carry
 654+ 98B1 99                                   sbc     a,c                         ; q
 655+ 98B2 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; h (s)
 656+ 98B3 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; r
 657+ 98B4 DE 00                                sbc     a,0                         ; 0 - so in effect SR - Q*256
 658+ 98B6 37                                   scf                                 ; set carry for next rolls
 659+ 98B7 3F                                   ccf
 660+ 98B8              .LL132:                 RollDELeft1                         ; Rotate de bits left
 660+ 98B8 CB 13       >               rl  e
 660+ 98BA CB 12       >               rl  d
 661+ 98BC 38 E7                                jr      c,.LL130                    ;
 662+ 98BE EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = result
 663+ 98BF C9                                   ret
 664+ 98C0
 665+ 98C0
 666+ 98C0 AF           div_hl_c:               xor	a
 667+ 98C1 06 10                                ld	b, 16
 668+ 98C3 29           .loop:                  add	hl, hl
 669+ 98C4 17                                   rla
 670+ 98C5 38 03                                jr	c, $+5
 671+ 98C7 B9                                   cp	c
 672+ 98C8 38 02                                jr	c, $+4
 673+ 98CA 91                                   sub	c
 674+ 98CB 2C                                   inc	l
 675+ 98CC 10 F5                                djnz	.loop
 676+ 98CE C9                                   ret
 677+ 98CF              ;l_div, signed division
 678+ 98CF              ; comes in with DE and HL
 679+ 98CF              ; HL = DE / HL, DE = DE % HL
 680+ 98CF 4A           l_div:                  ld      c,d             ;sign of dividend
 681+ 98D0 44                                   ld      b,h             ;sign of divisor
 682+ 98D1 C5                                   push    bc              ;save signs
 683+ 98D2 4D                                   ld      c,l             ;divisor to bc
 684+ 98D3 7A                                   ld      a,d
 685+ 98D4 B7                                   or      a
 686+ 98D5 F2 DE 98                             jp      p,.NotDENeg
 687+ 98D8              .DeNegate:              macronegate16de
 687+ 98D8 AF          >					xor 	a
 687+ 98D9 93          >                    sub 	e
 687+ 98DA 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
 687+ 98DB 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 687+ 98DC 92          >                    sub 	d
 687+ 98DD 57          >                    ld 		d,a
 688+ 98DE 78           .NotDENeg:              ld      a,b
 689+ 98DF B7                                   or      a
 690+ 98E0 F2 E9 98                             jp      p,.NotBCNeg     ; if signs are opposite them flip
 691+ 98E3                                      macronegate16bc
 691+ 98E3 AF          >					xor 	a
 691+ 98E4 91          >                    sub 	c
 691+ 98E5 4F          >                    ld 		c,a
 691+ 98E6 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 691+ 98E7 90          >                    sub 	b
 691+ 98E8 47          >                    ld 		b,a
 692+ 98E9 CD 79 97     .NotBCNeg:              call    l_div_0         ;unsigned HL = DE / BC, DE = DE % BC
 693+ 98EC                                      ; C standard requires that the result of division satisfy a = (a/b)*b + a%b emainder takes sign of the dividend
 694+ 98EC C1                                   pop     bc              ;restore sign info
 695+ 98ED 78                                   ld      a,b
 696+ 98EE A9                                   xor     c               ;quotient, sign of dividend^divisor
 697+ 98EF F2 F8 98                             jp      p,.NotHLNeg
 698+ 98F2                                      macronegate16hl
 698+ 98F2 AF          >					xor 	a
 698+ 98F3 95          >					sub 	l
 698+ 98F4 6F          >					ld 		l,a
 698+ 98F5 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
 698+ 98F6 94          >					sub 	h
 698+ 98F7 67          >					ld 		h,a
 699+ 98F8 79           .NotHLNeg:              ld      a,c
 700+ 98F9 B7                                   or      a,a             ;remainder, sign of dividend
 701+ 98FA F0                                   ret     p
 702+ 98FB                                      macronegate16de
 702+ 98FB AF          >					xor 	a
 702+ 98FC 93          >                    sub 	e
 702+ 98FD 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
 702+ 98FE 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 702+ 98FF 92          >                    sub 	d
 702+ 9900 57          >                    ld 		d,a
 703+ 9901 C9                                   ret
 704+ 9902
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
 675  9902                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
   1+ 9902              asm_tis2:
   2+ 9902              ; ">TIS2 A = (A / Q * 96) so A = -96 ---- 96  range "
   3+ 9902              ; ">DOES NOT DO SIGNED YET"
   4+ 9902 F5           	push af
   5+ 9903 E6 7F            and SignMask8Bit
   6+ 9905 57           	ld d,a				;; d = A
   7+ 9906 3A 01 80     	ld a,(varQ)
   8+ 9909 5F           	ld e,a
   9+ 990A 7A           	ld a,d
  10+ 990B BB           	cp e
  11+ 990C 30 11        	jr nc, .tis2_set96	;; jump if a >= Q
  12+ 990E 1E 60        	ld e, 96
  13+ 9910 ED 30        	mul				; de = d * 96 (also a * 96 )
  14+ 9912 EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ 9913 3A 01 80     	ld a,(varQ)
  16+ 9916 4F           	ld c,a
  17+ 9917 CD 6F 96     	call asm_div16
  18+ 991A F1           	pop af
  19+ 991B E6 80        	and $80
  20+ 991D B5           	or l
  21+ 991E C9           	ret
  22+ 991F              .tis2_set96:
  23+ 991F F1           	pop af
  24+ 9920 E6 80        	and $80
  25+ 9922 F6 96        	or $96
  26+ 9924 C9           	ret
  27+ 9925
  28+ 9925
  29+ 9925              asm_unit_vector:
  30+ 9925              squareregfx:
  31+ 9925 3A A6 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  32+ 9928 57           	ld d,a
  33+ 9929 5F           	ld e,a
  34+ 992A ED 30        	mul
  35+ 992C EB           	ex de,hl
  36+ 992D              squareregfy:
  37+ 992D 3A A8 C0     	ld a, (UBnkYScaled)
  38+ 9930 57           	ld d,a
  39+ 9931 5F           	ld e,a
  40+ 9932 ED 30        	mul
  41+ 9934 19           	add hl,de
  42+ 9935              squareregfz:
  43+ 9935 3A AA C0     	ld a, (UBnkZScaled)
  44+ 9938 57           	ld d,a
  45+ 9939 5F           	ld e,a
  46+ 993A ED 30        	mul
  47+ 993C 19           	add hl,de
  48+ 993D EB           	ex de,hl			; de de to number to root
  49+ 993E              hlequsquareroot:
  50+ 993E CD E6 92     	call asm_sqrt		; hl = sqrt (fx^2 + fy^2 + fx^2)
  51+ 9941 E5           	push hl				; save it for work 3 copies
  52+ 9942 E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  53+ 9943 E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  54+ 9944              normfx:
  55+ 9944 3A A6 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  56+ 9947 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #1
  57+ 9948 7D           	ld a,l				; we assume only l had worthwhile data but could spill into h
  58+ 9949 4F           	ld c,a
  59+ 994A CD 02 99     	call asm_tis2
  60+ 994D 32 A6 C0     	ld (UBnkXScaled),a
  61+ 9950              normfy:
  62+ 9950 3A A8 C0     	ld a,(UBnkYScaled)
  63+ 9953 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  64+ 9954 7D           	ld a,l
  65+ 9955 4F           	ld c,a
  66+ 9956 CD 02 99     	call asm_tis2
  67+ 9959 32 A8 C0     	ld (UBnkYScaled),a
  68+ 995C              normfz:
  69+ 995C 3A AA C0     	ld a,(UBnkZScaled)
  70+ 995F E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  71+ 9960 7D           	ld a,l
  72+ 9961 4F           	ld c,a
  73+ 9962 CD 02 99     	call asm_tis2
  74+ 9965 32 AA C0     	ld (UBnkZScaled),a
  75+ 9968              asm_unit_vector_end:
  76+ 9968 C9           	ret

 676  9969                  INCLUDE "./Maths/compare16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/compare16.asm
   1+ 9969              ; Input:
   2+ 9969              ;       HL = 1st value
   3+ 9969              ;       DE = 2nd value
   4+ 9969              ; Output:
   5+ 9969              ;       CF, ZF = results of comparison:
   6+ 9969              ;
   7+ 9969              ;               CF      ZF      Result
   8+ 9969              ;               -----------------------------------
   9+ 9969              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  10+ 9969              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  11+ 9969              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  12+ 9969              ;               1       1       Impossible
  13+ 9969              ;
  14+ 9969
  15+ 9969
  16+ 9969 E5           CompareBCDESigned:  push    hl
  17+ 996A A7                               and     a
  18+ 996B 60 69                            ld      hl,bc
  19+ 996D ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  20+ 996F E1                               pop     hl
  21+ 9970 C9                               ret
  22+ 9971
  23+ 9971 E5           CompareDEBCSigned:  push    hl
  24+ 9972 A7                               and     a
  25+ 9973 62 6B                            ld      hl,de
  26+ 9975 ED 42                            sbc     hl,bc
  27+ 9977 E1                               pop     hl
  28+ 9978 C9                               ret
  29+ 9979
  30+ 9979
  31+ 9979              ;### CMPGTE -> test if A>=B
  32+ 9979              ;### Input      HL=A, DE=B if hl=> de no carry else de > hl and set carry
  33+ 9979 7C           CompareHLDESgn:     ld a,h
  34+ 997A AA                               xor d
  35+ 997B FA 85 99                         jp m, .cmpgte2
  36+ 997E ED 52                            sbc hl,de
  37+ 9980 30 09                            jr nc, .cmpgte3
  38+ 9982 19           .cmpgte1            add hl,de
  39+ 9983                                  SetCarryFlag
  39+ 9983 37          >                        scf
  40+ 9984 C9                               ret
  41+ 9985 CB 7A        .cmpgte2            bit 7,d
  42+ 9987 28 05                            jr z,.cmpgte4
  43+ 9989              .cmpgte5:           ClearCarryFlag
  43+ 9989 B7          >                        or a
  44+ 998A C9                               ret
  45+ 998B 19           .cmpgte3            add hl,de
  46+ 998C                                  ClearCarryFlag
  46+ 998C B7          >                        or a
  47+ 998D C9                               ret
  48+ 998E              .cmpgte4:           SetCarryFlag
  48+ 998E 37          >                        scf
  49+ 998F C9                               ret
  50+ 9990
  51+ 9990              ; Compares HL and DE sets z flag if same, else nz
  52+ 9990 7C           CompareHLDESame:    ld  a,h
  53+ 9991 BA                               cp  d
  54+ 9992 C0                               ret nz
  55+ 9993 7D                               ld  a,l
  56+ 9994 BB                               cp  e
  57+ 9995 C9                               ret
  58+ 9996
  59+ 9996
  60+ 9996
  61+ 9996 7C           CompareHLBCSgn:     ld a,h
  62+ 9997 A8                               xor b
  63+ 9998 FA A1 99                         jp m, .cmpgte2
  64+ 999B ED 42                            sbc hl,bc
  65+ 999D 30 06                            jr nc, .cmpgte3
  66+ 999F              .cmpgte1            SetCarryFlag
  66+ 999F 37          >                        scf
  67+ 99A0 C9                               ret
  68+ 99A1 CB 78        .cmpgte2            bit 7,b
  69+ 99A3 28 FA                            jr z,.cmpgte1
  70+ 99A5              .cmpgte3            ClearCarryFlag
  70+ 99A5 B7          >                        or a
  71+ 99A6 C9                               ret
  72+ 99A7
  73+ 99A7              CompareHLDESigned:
  74+ 99A7 E5           compare16HLDE:      push    hl
  75+ 99A8 A7                               and     a
  76+ 99A9 ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  77+ 99AB E1                               pop     hl
  78+ 99AC C9                               ret
  79+ 99AD              CompareHLBCSigned:
  80+ 99AD E5           CompareHLBC:        push    hl
  81+ 99AE A7                               and     a
  82+ 99AF ED 42                            sbc     hl,bc
  83+ 99B1 E1                               pop     hl
  84+ 99B2 C9                               ret
  85+ 99B3
  86+ 99B3              ; With compare signed we do ABS comparison
  87+ 99B3              ; this is used for view ports as we just want to know if its +/- out side of 90 degrees
  88+ 99B3
  89+ 99B3 E5 D5        compare16HLDEABS:   push    hl,,de
  90+ 99B5 7C                               ld      a,h                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  91+ 99B6 E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  92+ 99B8 67                               ld      h,a
  93+ 99B9 7A                               ld      a,d                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  94+ 99BA E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  95+ 99BC 57                               ld      d,a
  96+ 99BD A7                               and     a
  97+ 99BE ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  98+ 99C0 D1 E1                            pop     hl,,de
  99+ 99C2 C9                               ret

 677  99C3                  INCLUDE "./Maths/normalise96.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
   1+ 99C3              ; a equal a / d * 96
   2+ 99C3
   3+ 99C3
   4+ 99C3 DD 7E 00     NormaliseIXVector:      ld		a,(ix+0)	        ; XX15+0
   5+ 99C6 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit        ; a = unsigned version
   6+ 99C8              .n96SQX:	            inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
   6+ 99C8 5F          >			ld	e,a
   6+ 99C9 57          >			ld  d,a
   6+ 99CA ED 30       >			mul
   7+ 99CC 62 6B                                ld		hl,de		 		; h == varR d = varO e= varA
   8+ 99CE DD 7E 01     .n96SQY:                ld		a,(ix+1)
   9+ 99D1 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit        ; = abs
  10+ 99D3                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[y]^2
  10+ 99D3 5F          >			ld	e,a
  10+ 99D4 57          >			ld  d,a
  10+ 99D5 ED 30       >			mul
  11+ 99D7 19                                   add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2
  12+ 99D8 DD 7E 02     .n96SQZ:                ld		a,(ix+2)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
  13+ 99DB E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit        ; unsigned
  14+ 99DD                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[z]^2
  14+ 99DD 5F          >			ld	e,a
  14+ 99DE 57          >			ld  d,a
  14+ 99DF ED 30       >			mul
  15+ 99E1 19           .n96SQADD:              add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2
  16+ 99E2 EB                                   ex		de,hl				; hl => de ready for square root
  17+ 99E3 CD E6 92     .n96SQRT:               call	asm_sqrt			; hl = de = sqrt(XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2), we just are interested in l which is the new Q
  18+ 99E6 DD 7E 00     .n96NORMX:              ld		a,(ix+0)
  19+ 99E9 4F                                   ld		c,a                 ; save copy into c
  20+ 99EA E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  21+ 99EC 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  22+ 99ED CD E0 9B                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  23+ 99F0 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  24+ 99F1 79                                   ld      a,c
  25+ 99F2 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit			    ;++SGN
  26+ 99F4 B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  27+ 99F5 DD 77 00                             ld		(ix+0),a
  28+ 99F8 DD 7E 01     .n96NORMY:              ld		a,(ix+1)
  29+ 99FB 4F                                   ld		c,a                 ; save copy into c
  30+ 99FC E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  31+ 99FE 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  32+ 99FF CD E0 9B                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  33+ 9A02 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  34+ 9A03 79                                   ld      a,c
  35+ 9A04 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit			    ;++SGN
  36+ 9A06 B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  37+ 9A07 DD 77 01                             ld		(ix+1),a
  38+ 9A0A DD 7E 02     .n96NORMZ:              ld		a,(ix+2)
  39+ 9A0D 4F                                   ld		c,a                 ; save copy into c
  40+ 9A0E E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  41+ 9A10 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  42+ 9A11 CD E0 9B                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  43+ 9A14 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  44+ 9A15 79                                   ld      a,c
  45+ 9A16 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit			    ;++SGN
  46+ 9A18 B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  47+ 9A19 DD 77 02                             ld		(ix+2),a
  48+ 9A1C C9                                   ret
  49+ 9A1D
  50+ 9A1D              ; .NORM	\ -> &3BD6 \ Normalize 3-vector length of XX15
  51+ 9A1D 3A A6 C0     normaliseXX1596S7:      ld		a,(XX15VecX)	    ; XX15+0
  52+ 9A20 DD 67                                ld		ixh,a               ; ixh = signed x component
  53+ 9A22 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit        ; a = unsigned version
  54+ 9A24              .n96SQX:	            inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  54+ 9A24 5F          >			ld	e,a
  54+ 9A25 57          >			ld  d,a
  54+ 9A26 ED 30       >			mul
  55+ 9A28 62                                   ld		h,d					; h == varR d = varO e= varA
  56+ 9A29 6B                                   ld		l,e					; l == varQ  															:: so HL = XX15[x]^2
  57+ 9A2A 3A A7 C0     .n96SQY:                ld		a,(XX15VecY)
  58+ 9A2D DD 6F                                ld		ixl,a               ; ixl = signed y componet
  59+ 9A2F E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit                 ; = abs
  60+ 9A31                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[y]^2
  60+ 9A31 5F          >			ld	e,a
  60+ 9A32 57          >			ld  d,a
  60+ 9A33 ED 30       >			mul
  61+ 9A35 19                                   add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2
  62+ 9A36 3A A8 C0     .n96SQZ:                ld		a,(XX15VecZ)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
  63+ 9A39 FD 67                                ld		iyh,a               ; iyh = signed
  64+ 9A3B E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit                 ; unsigned
  65+ 9A3D                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[z]^2
  65+ 9A3D 5F          >			ld	e,a
  65+ 9A3E 57          >			ld  d,a
  65+ 9A3F ED 30       >			mul
  66+ 9A41 19           .n96SQADD:              add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2
  67+ 9A42 EB                                   ex		de,hl				; hl => de ready for square root
  68+ 9A43 CD E6 92     .n96SQRT:               call	asm_sqrt			; hl = de = sqrt(XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2), we just are interested in l which is the new Q
  69+ 9A46 3A A6 C0     .n96NORMX:              ld		a,(XX15VecX)
  70+ 9A49 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  71+ 9A4B 4F                                   ld		c,a
  72+ 9A4C 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  73+ 9A4D CD E0 9B                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  74+ 9A50 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  75+ 9A51 DD 7C                                ld		a,ixh			    ;++SGN
  76+ 9A53 E6 80                                and		$80				    ;++SGN
  77+ 9A55 B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  78+ 9A56 32 A6 C0                             ld		(XX15VecX),a
  79+ 9A59 3A A7 C0     .n96NORMY:              ld		a,(XX15VecY)
  80+ 9A5C E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  81+ 9A5E 4F                                   ld		c,a
  82+ 9A5F 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  83+ 9A60 CD E0 9B                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit     	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  84+ 9A63 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  85+ 9A64 DD 7D                                ld		a,ixl			    ;++SGN
  86+ 9A66 E6 80                                and		$80				    ;++SGN
  87+ 9A68 B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  88+ 9A69 32 A7 C0                             ld		(XX15VecY),a
  89+ 9A6C 3A A8 C0     .n96NORMZ:              ld		a,(XX15VecZ)
  90+ 9A6F E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  91+ 9A71 4F                                   ld		c,a
  92+ 9A72 55                                   ld		d,l				; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  93+ 9A73 CD E0 9B                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  94+ 9A76 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  95+ 9A77 FD 7C                                ld		a,iyh			    ;++SGN
  96+ 9A79 E6 80                                and		$80				    ;++SGN
  97+ 9A7B B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  98+ 9A7C 32 A8 C0                             ld		(XX15VecZ),a
  99+ 9A7F C9                                   ret
 100+ 9A80
 101+ 9A80              ; Normalise vector
 102+ 9A80              ; scale Q = Sqrt (X^2 + Y^2 + Z^2)
 103+ 9A80              ; X = X / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e X = X / Q * 3/8
 104+ 9A80              ; Y = Y / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Y = Y / Q * 3/8
 105+ 9A80              ; Z = Z / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Z = Z / Q * 3/8
 106+ 9A80
# file closed: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
 678  9A80                  INCLUDE "./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
   1+ 9A80              ;Number in hl to decimal ASCII
   2+ 9A80              ;Thanks to z80 Bits
   3+ 9A80              ;inputs:	hl = number to ASCII
   4+ 9A80              ;example: hl=300 outputs '00300'
   5+ 9A80              ;destroys: af, bc, hl, de used
   6+ 9A80              DispHLtoDE:
   7+ 9A80              ; "DispHL, writes HL to DE address"
   8+ 9A80 01 F0 D8     	ld	bc,-10000
   9+ 9A83 CD 99 9A     	call	Num1
  10+ 9A86 01 18 FC     	ld	bc,-1000
  11+ 9A89 CD 99 9A     	call	Num1
  12+ 9A8C 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  13+ 9A8F CD 99 9A     	call	Num1
  14+ 9A92 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  15+ 9A94 CD 99 9A     	call	Num1
  16+ 9A97 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  17+ 9A99              Num1:
  18+ 9A99 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  19+ 9A9B              .Num2:
  20+ 9A9B 3C           	inc	a
  21+ 9A9C 09           	add	hl,bc
  22+ 9A9D 38 FC        	jr	c,.Num2
  23+ 9A9F ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  24+ 9AA1 12           	ld	(de),a
  25+ 9AA2 13           	inc	de
  26+ 9AA3 C9           	ret
  27+ 9AA4
  28+ 9AA4              DispAtoDE:
  29+ 9AA4 26 00        	ld h,0
  30+ 9AA6 6F           	ld l,a
  31+ 9AA7 C3 80 9A     	jp DispHLtoDE
  32+ 9AAA
  33+ 9AAA              DispPriceAtoDE:
  34+ 9AAA 26 00        	ld h,0
  35+ 9AAC 6F           	ld l,a
  36+ 9AAD 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  37+ 9AB0 CD C0 9A     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  38+ 9AB3 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  39+ 9AB5 CD 99 9A     	call	Num1
  40+ 9AB8 3E 2E        	ld		a,'.'					; we could assume preformat but
  41+ 9ABA                                  DISPLAY "TODO:  optimise "
  42+ 9ABA 12           	ld		(de),a					; we can optimse that later TODO
  43+ 9ABB 13           	inc		de						; with just an inc De
  44+ 9ABC 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  45+ 9ABE 18 D9        	jr		Num1
  46+ 9AC0              .NumLeadBlank1:
  47+ 9AC0 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  48+ 9AC2              .NumLeadBlank2:
  49+ 9AC2 3C           	inc	a
  50+ 9AC3 09           	add	hl,bc
  51+ 9AC4 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  52+ 9AC6 FE 30        	cp	'0'
  53+ 9AC8 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  54+ 9ACA              .Blank:
  55+ 9ACA 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  56+ 9ACC              .DontBlank:
  57+ 9ACC ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  58+ 9ACE 12           	ld	(de),a
  59+ 9ACF 13           	inc	de
  60+ 9AD0 C9           	ret
  61+ 9AD1
  62+ 9AD1              DispQtyAtoDE:
  63+ 9AD1 FE 00        	cp	0
  64+ 9AD3 28 23        	jr	z,.NoStock
  65+ 9AD5 26 00        	ld h,0
  66+ 9AD7 6F           	ld l,a
  67+ 9AD8 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  68+ 9ADB CD E7 9A     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  69+ 9ADE 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  70+ 9AE0 CD E7 9A     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  71+ 9AE3 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  72+ 9AE5 18 B2        	jr		Num1
  73+ 9AE7              .NumLeadBlank1:
  74+ 9AE7 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  75+ 9AE9              .NumLeadBlank2:
  76+ 9AE9 3C           	inc	a
  77+ 9AEA 09           	add	hl,bc
  78+ 9AEB 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  79+ 9AED FE 30        	cp	'0'
  80+ 9AEF 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  81+ 9AF1              .Blank:
  82+ 9AF1 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  83+ 9AF3              .DontBlank:
  84+ 9AF3 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  85+ 9AF5 12           	ld	(de),a
  86+ 9AF6 13           	inc	de
  87+ 9AF7 C9           	ret
  88+ 9AF8              .NoStock:
  89+ 9AF8 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  90+ 9AFA 12           	ld	(de),a
  91+ 9AFB 13           	inc	de
  92+ 9AFC 12           	ld	(de),a
  93+ 9AFD 13           	inc	de
  94+ 9AFE 3E 2D        	ld	a,'-'
  95+ 9B00 12           	ld	(de),a
  96+ 9B01 13           	inc de
  97+ 9B02 C9           	ret
  98+ 9B03
  99+ 9B03
 100+ 9B03              ;### CLCN32 -> Converts 32Bit-Value in ASCII-String (terminated by 0)
 101+ 9B03              ;### Input      DE,IX=32bit value, IY=destination address
 102+ 9B03              ;### Output     IY=last char in destination string
 103+ 9B03              ;### Destroyed AF,BC,DE,HL,IX
 104+ 9B03 01 00 00 00  clcn32t dw 1,0,     10,0,     100,0,     1000,0,       10000,0
 104+ 9B07 0A 00 00 00
 104+ 9B0B 64 00 00 00
 104+ 9B0F E8 03 00 00
 104+ 9B13 10 27 00 00
 105+ 9B17 A0 86 01 00          dw $86a0,1, $4240,$0f, $9680,$98, $e100,$05f5, $ca00,$3b9a
 105+ 9B1B 40 42 0F 00
 105+ 9B1F 80 96 98 00
 105+ 9B23 00 E1 F5 05
 105+ 9B27 00 CA 9A 3B
 106+ 9B2B 00 00 00 00  clcn32z ds 4
 107+ 9B2F
 108+ 9B2F              ; As per display but shifts final digit by 1 and puts in "." for 1 decimal place
 109+ 9B2F CD 3E 9B     DispDEIXtoIY1DP:        call    DispDEIXtoIY
 110+ 9B32 FD 7E 00                             ld      a,(IY+0)
 111+ 9B35 FD 77 01                             ld      (IY+1),a
 112+ 9B38 3E 2E                                ld      a,"."
 113+ 9B3A FD 77 00                             ld      (IY+0),a
 114+ 9B3D C9                                   ret
 115+ 9B3E
 116+ 9B3E DD 22 2B 9B  DispDEIXtoIY:           ld (clcn32z),ix
 117+ 9B42 ED 53 2D 9B                          ld (clcn32z+2),de
 118+ 9B46 DD 21 27 9B                          ld ix,clcn32t+36
 119+ 9B4A 06 09                                ld b,9
 120+ 9B4C 0E 00                                ld c,0
 121+ 9B4E 3E 30        .clcn321:               ld a,'0'
 122+ 9B50 B7                                   or a
 123+ 9B51 DD 5E 00     .clcn322:               ld e,(ix+0)
 124+ 9B54 DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 125+ 9B57 2A 2B 9B                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 126+ 9B5A ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 127+ 9B5C 22 2B 9B                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 128+ 9B5F DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 129+ 9B62 DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 130+ 9B65 2A 2D 9B                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 131+ 9B68 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 132+ 9B6A 22 2D 9B                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 133+ 9B6D 38 04                                jr c,.clcn325
 134+ 9B6F 0C                                   inc c
 135+ 9B70 3C                                   inc a
 136+ 9B71 18 DE                                jr .clcn322
 137+ 9B73 DD 5E 00     .clcn325:               ld e,(ix+0)
 138+ 9B76 DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 139+ 9B79 2A 2B 9B                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 140+ 9B7C 19                                   add hl,de
 141+ 9B7D 22 2B 9B                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 142+ 9B80 DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 143+ 9B83 DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 144+ 9B86 2A 2D 9B                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 145+ 9B89 ED 5A                                adc hl,de
 146+ 9B8B 22 2D 9B                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 147+ 9B8E 11 FC FF                             ld de,-4
 148+ 9B91 DD 19                                add ix,de
 149+ 9B93 0C                                   inc c
 150+ 9B94 0D                                   dec c
 151+ 9B95 28 05                                jr z,.clcn323
 152+ 9B97 FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 153+ 9B9A FD 23                                inc iy
 154+ 9B9C 10 B0        .clcn323:               djnz .clcn321
 155+ 9B9E 3A 2B 9B                             ld a,(clcn32z)
 156+ 9BA1 C6 30                                add A,'0'
 157+ 9BA3 FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 158+ 9BA6 FD 36 01 00                          ld (iy+1),0
 159+ 9BAA C9                                   ret

 679  9BAB                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
   1+ 9BAB              AequAdivQmul96ABS:      JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
   1+ 9BAB BA          >                        cp     d
   1+ 9BAC D2 C7 9B    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
   2+ 9BAF 06 FE                                ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
   3+ 9BB1 CB 27        .TIS2RollTLoop:			sla			a
   4+ 9BB3                                      JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub           ; a < d so don;t subtract
   4+ 9BB3 BA          >                        cp      d
   4+ 9BB4 DA CA 9B    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
   5+ 9BB7 9A                                   sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
   6+ 9BB8 37                                   scf
   7+ 9BB9 CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
   8+ 9BBB 38 F4                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
   9+ 9BBD 78           .TIS2SKIPCont:	        ld			a,b							; T
  10+ 9BBE CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 2
  11+ 9BC0 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 4
  12+ 9BC2 47                                   ld			b,a							; t = t /4
  13+ 9BC3 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 8
  14+ 9BC5 80                                   add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  15+ 9BC6 C9                                   ret
  16+ 9BC7 3E 60        .TIS2AccGTEQ:           ld			a,$60							; unity
  17+ 9BC9 C9                                   ret
  18+ 9BCA B7           .TIS2SkipSub:           or			a
  19+ 9BCB CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  20+ 9BCD 38 E2                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  21+ 9BCF C3 BD 9B                             jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  22+ 9BD2
  23+ 9BD2
  24+ 9BD2              ; USES 			A DE BC
  25+ 9BD2              ; DOES NOT USE 	HL
  26+ 9BD2              TIS2962C:		; two's compliment entry point, exits not 2's compliment
  27+ 9BD2 CB 7F        	bit			7,a
  28+ 9BD4 28 04        	jr			z,AequAdivQmul96
  29+ 9BD6 ED 44        	neg										; revers 2s'c and just set neg bit
  30+ 9BD8 CB FF        	set			7,a
  31+ 9BDA              ; Note negative numbers are bit 7 set not 2's compliment
  32+ 9BDA              AequAdivQmul96:								; TIS296:			; .tis2 A = A /Q *96 (or A = A * 3/8 * Q) Reduce Acc in NORM routine i.e. *96/Q clamps at +- 96
  33+ 9BDA              TIS2:
  34+ 9BDA 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc
  35+ 9BDB 3A 01 80     	ld			a,(varQ)
  36+ 9BDE 57           	ld			d,a							; d = varQ
  37+ 9BDF 79           	ld			a,c							; recover a
  38+ 9BE0              AequAdivDmul967Bit:
  39+ 9BE0 4F               ld          c,a
  40+ 9BE1 7A               ld          a,d
  41+ 9BE2 CB 27            sla         a
  42+ 9BE4 30 10            jr          nc, .OKToDivide
  43+ 9BE6              .ScaleDown:
  44+ 9BE6 B7               or          a
  45+ 9BE7 CB 3A            srl         d
  46+ 9BE9
  47+ 9BE9 79               ld          a,c
  48+ 9BEA E6 7F            and         SignMask8Bit
  49+ 9BEC CB 3F            srl         a
  50+ 9BEE 47               ld          b,a
  51+ 9BEF 79               ld          a,c
  52+ 9BF0 E6 80            and         $80
  53+ 9BF2 B0               or          b
  54+ 9BF3 C3 F7 9B         jp          AequAdivDmul96
  55+ 9BF6              .OKToDivide:
  56+ 9BF6 79               ld          a,c
  57+ 9BF7              AequAdivDmul96:
  58+ 9BF7 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc as we need the sign, alternate entry point assuming D preloaded, wastes an "ld c,a" but simplifies code
  59+ 9BF8 E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit				; ignore sign
  60+ 9BFA              	JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
  60+ 9BFA BA          >                        cp     d
  60+ 9BFB D2 1B 9C    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
  61+ 9BFE 06 FE        	ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
  62+ 9C00              .TIS2RollTLoop:									; .TIL2	; roll T
  63+ 9C00 CB 27        	sla			a
  64+ 9C02              	JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub           ; a < d so don;t subtract
  64+ 9C02 BA          >                        cp      d
  64+ 9C03 DA 21 9C    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
  65+ 9C06 9A           	sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
  66+ 9C07 37           	scf                                     ; set carrry to roll into b
  67+ 9C08 CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  68+ 9C0A 38 F4        	jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop			; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  69+ 9C0C              .TIS2SKIPCont:
  70+ 9C0C 78           	ld			a,b							; A = T = 4 / 4
  71+ 9C0D CB 3F        	srl			a							; .
  72+ 9C0F CB 3F        	srl			a							; .
  73+ 9C11 47           	ld			b,a							; .
  74+ 9C12 CB 3F        	srl			a							; A = A / 2 (i.e. T /8)
  75+ 9C14 80           	add			a,b							; A = T/8 + T/4 (3T/8)
  76+ 9C15 47           	ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
  77+ 9C16 79           	ld			a,c							; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
  78+ 9C17 E6 80        	and			$80							; recover sign only
  79+ 9C19 B0           	or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
  80+ 9C1A C9           	ret
  81+ 9C1B              .TIS2AccGTEQ:
  82+ 9C1B              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
  83+ 9C1B 79           	ld			a,c
  84+ 9C1C E6 80        	and			$80							; copy of Acc
  85+ 9C1E F6 60        	or			$60							; unity
  86+ 9C20 C9           	ret
  87+ 9C21              .TIS2SkipSub:
  88+ 9C21              	ClearCarryFlag                          ; Clear carry as it needs to be empty to roll in 0
  88+ 9C21 B7          >                        or a
  89+ 9C22 CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  90+ 9C24 38 DA        	jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop			; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  91+ 9C26 C3 0C 9C     	jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  92+ 9C29
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
 680  9C29                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
   1+ 9C29              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=A*Q/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   2+ 9C29              fmltu:
   3+ 9C29 57           AequAmulQdiv256:        ld	d,a
   4+ 9C2A 3A 01 80                             ld	a,(varQ)
   5+ 9C2D 5F                                   ld	e,a
   6+ 9C2E ED 30                                mul
   7+ 9C30 7A                                   ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
   8+ 9C31 C9                                   ret
   9+ 9C32
  10+ 9C32 5F           AequAmulDdiv256:        ld  e,a
  11+ 9C33 ED 30                                mul
  12+ 9C35 7A                                   ld  a,d
  13+ 9C36 C9                                   ret
  14+ 9C37
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
 681  9C37                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
   1+ 9C37              ; "DV42,DV42IYH DE = P.R, c = R"
   2+ 9C37              DV42IYH:									; as per DV42 but using iyl for Y reg
   3+ 9C37 21 AD 81     		ld		hl,varDustZ
   4+ 9C3A FD 7D        		ld		a,iyl
   5+ 9C3C ED 31        		add		hl,a
   6+ 9C3E 7E           		ld		a,(hl)
   7+ 9C3F C3 4B 9C     		jp		DV41
   8+ 9C42              DV42:										; travel step of dust particle front/rear
   9+ 9C42 21 AD 81     		ld		hl,varDustZ
  10+ 9C45 3A EB 7E     		ld		a,(regY)
  11+ 9C48 ED 31        		add		hl,a
  12+ 9C4A 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; a = SZ[y]
  13+ 9C4B              DV41:										; P.R = speed/ (ZZ/8) dust left/right
  14+ 9C4B 5F           		ld		e,a							; using E as Q var replacement
  15+ 9C4C 3A FB 7F     		ld		a,(DELTA)					; DELTA \ speed, how far has dust moved based on its z-coord.
  16+ 9C4F              DVID4:										; P-R=A/Qunsg  \P.R = A/Q unsigned called by Hall
  17+ 9C4F 06 08        		ld		b,8							; counter
  18+ 9C51 CB 27        		sla		a							;
  19+ 9C53 57           		ld		d,a							; use d for - p = delta * 2
  20+ 9C54 AF           		xor		a
  21+ 9C55              DVL4:										; counter x loop (b reg)
  22+ 9C55 CB 17        		rl		a							; a = a * 2
  23+ 9C57 38 03        		jr		c,DV8						; jump on carry
  24+ 9C59 BB           		cp		e							; var Q
  25+ 9C5A 38 02        		jr		c,DV5						; skip subtraction
  26+ 9C5C              DV8:
  27+ 9C5C 9B           		sbc		a,e							; a = a - q (with carry)
  28+ 9C5D 37           		scf									;  carry gets set
  29+ 9C5E              DV5:										; skipped subtraction
  30+ 9C5E CB 12        		rl		d							; d (P hi)
  31+ 9C60 10 F3        		djnz	DVL4						; dec b and loop loop X, hi left in P.
  32+ 9C62              .CalcRemainder:								; BFRDIV R=A*256/Q
  33+ 9C62              ; Note we are not going to call LL28+4 but inline code here:
  34+ 9C62 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; remainder R for AofQ *256/Q
  35+ 9C64 4F           		ld		c,a							; use c as R var
  36+ 9C65              .RollRemainder:
  37+ 9C65 CB 27        		sla		a
  38+ 9C67 38 11        		jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  39+ 9C69 B8           		cp		b							; a < q?
  40+ 9C6A 30 01        		jr		nc,.DontSBC
  41+ 9C6C              .DoSBC:										; a is < q
  42+ 9C6C 98           		sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  43+ 9C6D              .DontSBC:
  44+ 9C6D CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1
  45+ 9C6F 38 F4        		jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  46+ 9C71 79           		ld		a,c
  47+ 9C72 32 02 80     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  48+ 9C75 7A           		ld		a,d
  49+ 9C76 32 01 7F     		ld		(varP),a
  50+ 9C79 C9           		ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  51+ 9C7A              .Reduce:									; a geneated a carry
  52+ 9C7A 98           		sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  53+ 9C7B 37           		scf									; set carry flag for rl
  54+ 9C7C CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  55+ 9C7E 38 E5        		jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  56+ 9C80 79           		ld		a,c
  57+ 9C81 32 02 80     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  58+ 9C84 7A           		ld		a,d
  59+ 9C85 32 01 7F     		ld		(varP),a
  60+ 9C88 C9           		ret
  61+ 9C89              .AnswerTooBig:
  62+ 9C89 0E FF        		ld		c,$FF						; arse its too big
  63+ 9C8B 79           		ld		a,c
  64+ 9C8C 32 02 80     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  65+ 9C8F 7A           		ld		a,d
  66+ 9C90 32 01 7F     		ld		(varP),a
  67+ 9C93 C9           		ret
  68+ 9C94
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
 682  9C94              ;    INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm" Moved to general multiply code
 683  9C94
 684  9C94                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
   1+ 9C94              APequQmulA:
   2+ 9C94              asm_mult1:
   3+ 9C94              ; "ASM_MULT1 (DE) A(hi).P(lo) = Q * A first part of MAD, multiply and add. Visited Quite often. A=hi P = lo also returns result in DE"
   4+ 9C94 FE 00        	cp	0
   5+ 9C96 28 1F        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its Q * 0
   6+ 9C98 5F           	ld	e,a
   7+ 9C99 3A 01 80     	ld	a,(varQ)
   8+ 9C9C 57           	ld	d,a
   9+ 9C9D FE 00        	cp	0				; compare a
  10+ 9C9F 28 16        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its 0 * a
  11+ 9CA1 AB           	xor	e				; -- = + +- = - -+ = - ++ = +
  12+ 9CA2 E6 80        	and $80				; get the resultant sign and save into b
  13+ 9CA4 47           	ld	b,a
  14+ 9CA5 7A           	ld	a,d
  15+ 9CA6 E6 7F        	and	SignMask8Bit	; now strip off sign bits
  16+ 9CA8 57           	ld	d,a
  17+ 9CA9 7B           	ld	a,e
  18+ 9CAA E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  19+ 9CAC 5F           	ld	e,a
  20+ 9CAD ED 30        	mul					; zxn de = d * e
  21+ 9CAF 7B           	ld	a,e
  22+ 9CB0 32 01 7F     	ld	(varP),a		; p = lo
  23+ 9CB3 7A           	ld	a,d				; a = hi
  24+ 9CB4 B0           	or	b				; de goes to a and varP also re-do sign bit
  25+ 9CB5 57           	ld	d,a				; we will work with de having result as we may bin vars later
  26+ 9CB6 C9           	ret
  27+ 9CB7              .mul0:
  28+ 9CB7 AF           	xor	a
  29+ 9CB8 32 01 7F     	ld	(varP),a
  30+ 9CBB 57           	ld	d,a
  31+ 9CBC 5F           	ld  e,a
  32+ 9CBD C9           	ret
  33+ 9CBE
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
 685  9CBE                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm
   1+ 9CBE              baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
   2+ 9CBE              SAEquSRPlusAQ:
   3+ 9CBE              ; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
   4+ 9CBE              ;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
   5+ 9CBE              ; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
   6+ 9CBE              ; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
   7+ 9CBE              ; so need to fix the issue with carry flag not returning a fault correctly
   8+ 9CBE              LL38:
   9+ 9CBE              ;	ld		d,a
  10+ 9CBE              ;	ld		a,(varQ)
  11+ 9CBE              ;	ld		e,a
  12+ 9CBE              ;	ld		a,(varS)
  13+ 9CBE              ;	ld		h,a
  14+ 9CBE              ;	ld		a,(varR)
  15+ 9CBE              ;	ld		l,a
  16+ 9CBE              ;	call	ADDHLDESignedv3
  17+ 9CBE              ;	ld		a,h
  18+ 9CBE              ;	ld		(varS),a
  19+ 9CBE              ;	ld		a,l
  20+ 9CBE              ;	ret
  21+ 9CBE              ; calculation table
  22+ 9CBE              ;   R     Q    Op            Sign calc
  23+ 9CBE              ;	10    5    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  24+ 9CBE              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  25+ 9CBE              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  26+ 9CBE              ;	-10  -5    ABS Add       -    sign same add R sign
  27+ 9CBE              ;   5    10    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  28+ 9CBE              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  29+ 9CBE              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  30+ 9CBE              ;   -5   -10   ABS  add      -    sign same add R sign
  31+ 9CBE
  32+ 9CBE              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  33+ 9CBE              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  34+ 9CBE              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  35+ 9CBE              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  36+ 9CBE
  37+ 9CBE
  38+ 9CBE              ; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  39+ 9CBE 21 03 80     	ld		hl,varS							;
  40+ 9CC1 AE           	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  41+ 9CC2 FA CD 9C     	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  42+ 9CC5 3A 01 80     	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  43+ 9CC8 21 02 80     	ld		hl,varR
  44+ 9CCB 86           	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  45+ 9CCC C9           	ret										; Done carry set if overflow
  46+ 9CCD              .LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
  47+ 9CCD 3A 02 80     	ld		a,(varR)						; a = R
  48+ 9CD0 21 01 80     	ld		hl,varQ                         ; Q
  49+ 9CD3              ;--	JumpIfALTMemHLusng LL39SwapSubtraction	; if a < (hl) then do LL39SwapSubtraction
  50+ 9CD3              	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
  50+ 9CD3 B7          >                        or a
  51+ 9CD4 9E           	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q which as R >= Q will always be a positive result
  52+ 9CD5 38 01            jr      c,.LL39SignCorrection
  53+ 9CD7              ;--    jr      a,.LL39ResultZero
  54+ 9CD7              ;--   JumpIfNegative LL39SignCorrection		; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
  55+ 9CD7              ;--	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
  56+ 9CD7 C9           	ret
  57+ 9CD8              .LL39SignCorrection:
  58+ 9CD8 FE 00            cp      0                               ; if its 0 then neg will affect flag so we just zero result to save compute
  59+ 9CDA 28 0E            jr      z,.LL39ResultZero
  60+ 9CDC ED 44            neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
  61+ 9CDE 08           	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
  62+ 9CDF 3A 03 80     	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
  63+ 9CE2 EE 80        	xor		$80							    ;
  64+ 9CE4 32 03 80     	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
  65+ 9CE7 08           	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
  66+ 9CE8                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry as NEG instrunction sets it for non zero
  66+ 9CE8 B7          >                        or a
  67+ 9CE9 C9           	ret
  68+ 9CEA              .LL39ResultZero:
  69+ 9CEA 32 03 80         ld      (varS),a                        ; a is zero at this stage so set sign as well
  70+ 9CED                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry
  70+ 9CED B7          >                        or a
  71+ 9CEE C9               ret
  72+ 9CEF              ;--LL39SwapSubtraction:
  73+ 9CEF              ;--	push	bc
  74+ 9CEF              ;--	ld		b,a
  75+ 9CEF              ;--	ld		a,(hl)
  76+ 9CEF              ;--	sub		b
  77+ 9CEF              ;--	pop		bc
  78+ 9CEF              ;--	ex		af,af'							; do we flip here or negate. i think its flip as its overflowed unsigned
  79+ 9CEF              ;--	ld		a,(varS)
  80+ 9CEF              ;--	xor		$80
  81+ 9CEF              ;--	ld		(varS),a
  82+ 9CEF              ;--	ex		af,af'
  83+ 9CEF              ;--	ret
  84+ 9CEF
  85+ 9CEF              ;;;;	baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
  86+ 9CEF              ;;;;; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
  87+ 9CEF              ;;;;;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
  88+ 9CEF              ;;;;; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
  89+ 9CEF              ;;;;; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
  90+ 9CEF              ;;;;LL38:
  91+ 9CEF              ;;;;; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  92+ 9CEF              ;;;;	ld		hl,varS							;
  93+ 9CEF              ;;;;	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  94+ 9CEF              ;;;;	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  95+ 9CEF              ;;;;	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  96+ 9CEF              ;;;;	ld		hl,varR
  97+ 9CEF              ;;;;	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  98+ 9CEF              ;;;;	ret										; Done
  99+ 9CEF              ;;;;.LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
 100+ 9CEF              ;;;;	ld		hl,varQ                         ;
 101+ 9CEF              ;;;;	ld		a,(hl)
 102+ 9CEF              ;;;;	JumpIfAGTENusng 128,LL39Sub16bit		; does this need to be 16 bit
 103+ 9CEF              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)						;
 104+ 9CEF              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
 105+ 9CEF              ;;;;	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q
 106+ 9CEF              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection				; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
 107+ 9CEF              ;;;;	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
 108+ 9CEF              ;;;;	ret
 109+ 9CEF              ;;;;.SignCorrection:
 110+ 9CEF              ;;;;    neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
 111+ 9CEF              ;;;;	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
 112+ 9CEF              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 113+ 9CEF              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 114+ 9CEF              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 115+ 9CEF              ;;;;	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
 116+ 9CEF              ;;;;	ret
 117+ 9CEF              ;;;;LL39Sub16Bit:
 118+ 9CEF              ;;;;	ld		e,a
 119+ 9CEF              ;;;;	ld		d,0
 120+ 9CEF              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)
 121+ 9CEF              ;;;;	ld		l,a
 122+ 9CEF              ;;;;	ld		h,0
 123+ 9CEF              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag
 124+ 9CEF              ;;;;	sbc		hl,de
 125+ 9CEF              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection16bit
 126+ 9CEF              ;;;;	bit		7,h
 127+ 9CEF              ;;;;	jr		z,.GoodToReturn
 128+ 9CEF              ;;;;.Needtonegate:
 129+ 9CEF              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 130+ 9CEF              ;;;;.GoodToReturn
 131+ 9CEF              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 132+ 9CEF              ;;;;	or		a
 133+ 9CEF              ;;;;	ret
 134+ 9CEF              ;;;;.SignCorrection16bit:
 135+ 9CEF              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 136+ 9CEF              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 137+ 9CEF              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 138+ 9CEF              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 139+ 9CEF              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 140+ 9CEF              ;;;;	ret

   1+ 9CEF              ;;;LL28:
   2+ 9CEF              ;;;    ld      c,a                         ;
   3+ 9CEF              ;;;    ld      a,(varQ)                    ;
   4+ 9CEF              ;;;    ld      b,a                         ;
   5+ 9CEF              ;;;    ld      a,c                         ; Get varQ into b and retain c
   6+ 9CEF              ;;;RequAmul256divB:                        ;
   7+ 9CEF              ;;;LL28Breg:
   8+ 9CEF              ;;;; "BFRDIV R = (A * 256 / Q)  byte from remainder of division, not signed a = a, b = q, c = r"
   9+ 9CEF              ;;;	cp		b							; Check A >= Q
  10+ 9CEF              ;;;	jr		nc, .AnswerTooBig			; A >= Q? yes too big
  11+ 9CEF              ;;;.CalcRemainder:

  13+ 9CEF              ;;;.RollRemainder:

  16+ 9CEF              ;;;	cp		b							; a < q?

  18+ 9CEF              ;;;.DoSBC:									; a is < q
  19+ 9CEF              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  20+ 9CEF              ;;;.DontSBC:
  21+ 9CEF              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1
  22+ 9CEF              ;;;	jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue

  40+ 9CEF              BCequAmul256DivC:
  41+ 9CEF 59             ld    e,c
  42+ 9CF0 67             ld    h,a
  43+ 9CF1 2E 00          ld    l,0
  44+ 9CF3              AdivEDivide:                             ; this routine performs the operation BC=HL/E
  45+ 9CF3 7B             ld a,e                                 ; checking the divisor; returning if it is zero
  46+ 9CF4 B7             or a                                   ; from this time on the carry is cleared
  47+ 9CF5 C8             ret z
  48+ 9CF6 01 FF FF       ld bc,-1                               ; BC is used to accumulate the result
  49+ 9CF9 16 00          ld d,0                                 ; clearing D, so DE holds the divisor
  50+ 9CFB              AdivEDivLoop:                            ; subtracting DE from HL until the first overflow
  51+ 9CFB ED 52          sbc hl,de                              ; since the carry is zero, SBC works as if it was a SUB
  52+ 9CFD 03             inc bc                                 ;  note that this instruction does not alter the flags
  53+ 9CFE 30 FB          jr nc,AdivEDivLoop                     ; no carry means that there was no overflow
  54+ 9D00 C9             ret
  55+ 9D01
  56+ 9D01              HL_Div_C:
  57+ 9D01              ; Integer divides HL by C
  58+ 9D01              ; Result in HL, remainder in A
  59+ 9D01              ; Clobbers F, B
  60+ 9D01 06 10                ld b,16
  61+ 9D03 AF                   xor a
  62+ 9D04              HL_Div_C_Loop:
  63+ 9D04 29                   add hl,hl
  64+ 9D05 17                   rla
  65+ 9D06 B9                   cp c
  66+ 9D07 38 02                jr c,HL_DivC_Skip
  67+ 9D09 91                   sub c
  68+ 9D0A 2C                   inc l
  69+ 9D0B              HL_DivC_Skip:
  70+ 9D0B 10 F7                djnz HL_Div_C_Loop
  71+ 9D0D 7D                   ld   a,l
  72+ 9D0E 32 02 80             ld  (varR),a
  73+ 9D11 C9                   ret
  74+ 9D12
  75+ 9D12
  76+ 9D12
  77+ 9D12              ; Entry point if varQ is populated with demoninator
  78+ 9D12              RequAmul256divQ:
  79+ 9D12              BFRDIV:
  80+ 9D12 F5           		push	af
  81+ 9D13 3A 01 80     		ld		a,(varQ)
  82+ 9D16 4F           		ld		c,a
  83+ 9D17 F1           		pop		af
  84+ 9D18 FE 00        		cp		0
  85+ 9D1A CA 31 9D     		jp		z, HLDIVC_0_BY	; fast exit if numerator is 0
  86+ 9D1D              RequAmul256divC:
  87+ 9D1D 2E 00        		ld		l,0
  88+ 9D1F 67           		ld		h,a
  89+ 9D20              HL_Div_Cold:						; fast entry point if C and HL are already set
  90+ 9D20 06 10        		ld b,16
  91+ 9D22 AF           		xor a
  92+ 9D23              LOOPPOINT:
  93+ 9D23 29           		add hl,hl
  94+ 9D24 17           		rla
  95+ 9D25 B9           		cp c
  96+ 9D26 38 02        		jr c,SKIPINCSUB
  97+ 9D28 2C           		inc l
  98+ 9D29 91           		sub c
  99+ 9D2A              SKIPINCSUB:
 100+ 9D2A 10 F7        		djnz LOOPPOINT
 101+ 9D2C 7D           		ld		a,l
 102+ 9D2D 32 02 80     		ld 		(varR),a
 103+ 9D30 C9           		ret
 104+ 9D31              HLDIVC_0_BY:
 105+ 9D31 32 02 80     		ld		(varR),a
 106+ 9D34 C9           		ret
 107+ 9D35              ;	push	af
 108+ 9D35              ;	ld		a,b
 109+ 9D35              ;	ld		(varQ),a
 110+ 9D35              ;	pop		af
 111+ 9D35              ;RequAmul256divQ:
 112+ 9D35              ;BFRDIV:									;BFRDIV R=A*256/Q   byte from remainder of division
 113+ 9D35              ;	ld		hl,varQ
 114+ 9D35              ;	JumpIfAGTENusng	(hl),LL2			;  is A >=  Q ?, if yes, answer too big for 1 byte, R=#&FF
 115+ 9D35              ;	ld		b,$FE						; b = X
 116+ 9D35              ;	ld		c,a							; c = R	div roll counter
 117+ 9D35              ;LL31:									; roll R
 118+ 9D35              ;	sla		a
 119+ 9D35              ;	jr		c,LL29						; hop to Reduce
 120+ 9D35              ;	JumpIfALTNusng (hl)					; Q skip sbc if a < Q
 121+ 9D35              ;	sbc		a,(hl)						; a = a - Q
 122+ 9D35              ;	rl		c							; rotate R left
 123+ 9D35              ;	jr		c,LL31						; loop if R poped out a carry bit
 124+ 9D35              ;	jr		LL2Good
 125+ 9D35              ;LL29:									; Reduce
 126+ 9D35              ;	sbc		a,(hl)
 127+ 9D35              ;	scf
 128+ 9D35              ;	rl		c							; roll a carry flag into R
 129+ 9D35              ;	jr		c,LL31						;  loop R
 130+ 9D35              ;	jr		LL2Good
 131+ 9D35              ;LL2:
 132+ 9D35              ;	ld		c,$FF
 133+ 9D35              ;LL2Good:
 134+ 9D35              ;	ld		a,c
 135+ 9D35              ;	ld		(varR),a
 136+ 9D35              ;	ret
 137+ 9D35
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm
 689  9D35                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm
   1+ 9D35              RequAdivQ:
   2+ 9D35              	; R = A/Q, U = remainder, code looked a little odd as if R is reminader and U = result
   3+ 9D35              LL61:										; Handling division R=A/Q for case further down
   4+ 9D35 4F           	ld		c,a								; c = A
   5+ 9D36 3A 01 80     	ld		a,(varQ)						; test for divide by 0
   6+ 9D39 FE 00        	cp		0
   7+ 9D3B 28 16        	jr		z,LL84							; divide by zero error
   8+ 9D3D 57           	ld		d,a								; now we can do C/D
   9+ 9D3E 06 08            ld b,8
  10+ 9D40 AF               xor a
  11+ 9D41              LL63:										; roll divide loop
  12+ 9D41 CB 21            sla c
  13+ 9D43 17               rla
  14+ 9D44 BA               cp d
  15+ 9D45 38 02            jr c,LL64
  16+ 9D47 0C               inc c
  17+ 9D48 92               sub d
  18+ 9D49              LL64:
  19+ 9D49 10 F6            djnz LL63
  20+ 9D4B 32 00 80     	ld	(varU),a							; store remainder in U
  21+ 9D4E 79           	ld	a,c
  22+ 9D4F 32 02 80     	ld	(varR),a							; store remainder in R
  23+ 9D52 C9               ret
  24+ 9D53              LL84:										; div error  R=U=#5
  25+ 9D53 3E 32        	ld		a,50
  26+ 9D55 32 02 80     	ld		(varR),a
  27+ 9D58 32 00 80     	ld		(varU),a
  28+ 9D5B C9           	ret
  29+ 9D5C
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm
 690  9D5C                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RSequQmulA-MULT12.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RSequQmulA-MULT12.asm
   1+ 9D5C              asm_mult12:
   2+ 9D5C              RSequQmulA:
   3+ 9D5C              ; "asm_ult12  R.S = Q * A \ visited quite often S = hi, R = lo, odd that its opposite to mult1"
   4+ 9D5C CD 94 9C     	call APequQmulA
   5+ 9D5F 08           	ex 	af,af'
   6+ 9D60 7A           	ld	a,d
   7+ 9D61 32 03 80     	ld	(varS),a
   8+ 9D64 7B           	ld	a,e
   9+ 9D65 32 02 80     	ld	(varR),a
  10+ 9D68 08           	ex 	af,af'
  11+ 9D69 C9           	ret
  12+ 9D6A
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RSequQmulA-MULT12.asm

 694  9DFA                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/tidy.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/tidy.asm
   1+ 9DFA              ;rotmap0xLo: DB	0				; INWK +9
   2+ 9DFA              ;rotmap0xHi: DB	0				; INWK +10
   3+ 9DFA              ;rotmat0yLo: DB	0				; INWK +11
   4+ 9DFA              ;rotmat0yHi: DB	0				; INWK +12
   5+ 9DFA              ;rotmat0zLo:	DB 	0				; INWK +13
   6+ 9DFA              ;rotmat0zHi:	DB 	0				; INWK +14
   7+ 9DFA              ;rotmap1xLo: DB	0				; INWK +15
   8+ 9DFA              ;rotmap1xHi:	DB	0				; INWK +16
   9+ 9DFA              ;rotmat1yLo:	DB	0				; INWK +17
  10+ 9DFA              ;rotmat1yHi:	DB	0				; INWK +18
  11+ 9DFA              ;rotmat1zLo:	DB	0				; INWK +19
  12+ 9DFA              ;rotmat1zHi:	DB	0				; INWK +20
  13+ 9DFA              ;rotmat2xLo: DB	0				; INWK +21
  14+ 9DFA              ;rotmat2xHi:	DB	0				; INWK +22
  15+ 9DFA              ;rotmat2yLo:	DB	0				; INWK +23
  16+ 9DFA              ;rotmat2yHi:	DB	0				; INWK +24
  17+ 9DFA              ;rotmat2zLo:	DB	0				; INWK +25
  18+ 9DFA              ;rotmat2zHi:	DB	0				; INWK +26
  19+ 9DFA              ;

  22+ 9DFA              ;rotmatFz	equ	rotmat0zHi
