  26+ 9DFA              ;
  27+ 9DFA              ;inwkarray			equ		INWK+10
  28+ 9DFA
  29+ 9DFA
  30+ 9DFA
  31+ 9DFA
  32+ 9DFA              ; Divide that sets value to FFFF if divide by 0 unless main value is 0, then 0
  33+ 9DFA
  34+ 9DFA              ; (P+1 A) = (A P) / Q
  35+ 9DFA              ;  B A    = (A P) / Q
  36+ 9DFA              ; TESTED OK
  37+ 9DFA
  38+ 9DFA
  39+ 9DFA 2A A6 C0     NormalizeXX15:          ld      hl, (XX15VecX)              ; h= VecX, l = VecY
  40+ 9DFD 3A A8 C0                             ld      a,  (XX15VecZ)              ; a = VecZ, d we don't care
  41+ 9E00 E6 7F        .ABSZ:                  and     SignMask8Bit
  42+ 9E02 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                       ; iyh = abs z
  43+ 9E04 57           .ZSquared:              ld      d,a
  44+ 9E05 5F                                   ld      e,a
  45+ 9E06 ED 30                                mul     de
  46+ 9E08 42 4B                                ld      bc,de                       ; bc = z squared
  47+ 9E0A 7D           .ABSX:                  ld      a,l
  48+ 9E0B E6 7F        .XSquared:              and     SignMask8Bit
  49+ 9E0D DD 67                                ld      ixh,a                       ; ixh = abs x
  50+ 9E0F 57                                   ld      d,a
  51+ 9E10 5F                                   ld      e,a
  52+ 9E11 ED 30                                mul     de
  53+ 9E13 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = x squared
  54+ 9E14 7A           .ABSY:                  ld      a,d                         ; as h was swapped into d
  55+ 9E15 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  56+ 9E17 DD 6F                                ld      ixl,a                       ; ixl = abs y
  57+ 9E19 5F           .YSquared:              ld      e,a
  58+ 9E1A 57                                   ld      d,a
  59+ 9E1B ED 30                                mul     de                          ; de = y squared
  60+ 9E1D 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + de + bc
  61+ 9E1E 09                                   add     hl,bc                       ;
  62+ 9E1F EB                                   ex      de,hl
  63+ 9E20 CD E6 92                             call    asm_sqrt                    ; d = iyl =hl = sqrt (de) = sqrt (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2 + z ^ 2)
  64+ 9E23 55                                   ld      d,l
  65+ 9E24 FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d
  66+ 9E26 DD 7C        .NormaliseX:            ld      a,ixh                       ; normalise x
  67+ 9E28 CD E0 9B                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit
  68+ 9E2B 57                                   ld      d,a
  69+ 9E2C 3A A6 C0                             ld      a,(XX15VecX)
  70+ 9E2F E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  71+ 9E31 B2                                   or      d
  72+ 9E32 32 A6 C0                             ld      (XX15VecX),a
  73+ 9E35 DD 7D        .NormaliseY:            ld      a,ixl                       ; normalise y
  74+ 9E37 55                                   ld      d,l
  75+ 9E38 CD E0 9B                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit
  76+ 9E3B 57                                   ld      d,a
  77+ 9E3C 3A A7 C0                             ld      a,(XX15VecY)
  78+ 9E3F E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  79+ 9E41 B2                                   or      d
  80+ 9E42 32 A7 C0                             ld      (XX15VecY),a
  81+ 9E45 FD 7C        .NormaliseZ:            ld      a,iyh                       ; normalise z
  82+ 9E47 55                                   ld      d,l
  83+ 9E48 CD E0 9B                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit
  84+ 9E4B 57                                   ld      d,a
  85+ 9E4C 3A A8 C0                             ld      a,(XX15VecZ)
  86+ 9E4F E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  87+ 9E51 B2                                   or      d
  88+ 9E52 32 A8 C0                             ld      (XX15VecZ),a
  89+ 9E55 C9                                   ret
  90+ 9E56
  91+ 9E56              TidyNormaliseNoseV:     MACRO
  92+ 9E56 ~                                    call	CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15	    ; copy over matrix row 3 (Nosev)
  93+ 9E56 ~                                    call	NormalizeXX15			    ; normalise z hi, its really TIS3 and write back to matrix
  94+ 9E56 ~                                    call	CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV       ; .
  95+ 9E56                                      ENDM
  96+ 9E56              TidyNormaliseRoofV:     MACRO
  97+ 9E56 ~                                    call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15
  98+ 9E56 ~                                    call	NormalizeXX15			; normalise z hi, its really TIS3
  99+ 9E56 ~                                    call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV
 100+ 9E56                                      ENDM
 101+ 9E56
 102+ 9E56
 103+ 9E56              TidyUbnK:               ;break
 104+ 9E56                                      TidyNormaliseNoseV
 104+ 9E56 CD 6A 9D    >                        call	CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15	    ; copy over matrix row 3 (Nosev)
 104+ 9E59 CD FA 9D    >                        call	NormalizeXX15			    ; normalise z hi, its really TIS3 and write back to matrix
 104+ 9E5C CD A3 9D    >                        call	CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV       ; .
 105+ 9E5F 3A 36 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)      ; Now check and see which vector elemetn we are going to
 106+ 9E62 E6 60                                and     %01100000                   ; if X is not small then we go straigth to roofx
 107+ 9E64 C2 FC 9E                             jp      nz,.ProcessRoofX            ; .
 108+ 9E67 3A 38 C0     .TidyXIsSmall:          ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)      ; Else we test Y on to using
 109+ 9E6A E6 60                                and     %01100000                   ; if Y is not small we process roofz
 110+ 9E6C 20 47                                jr      nz,.ProcessRoofZ            ; .
 111+ 9E6E              ;...roofv_y = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y
 112+ 9E6E 3A 36 C0     .ProcessRoofY:          ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 113+ 9E71 32 01 80                             ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 114+ 9E74 3A 30 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)	    ;roov z
 115+ 9E77 CD 5C 9D                             call	RSequQmulA
 116+ 9E7A 3A 3A C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 117+ 9E7D 32 01 80                             ld		(varQ),a					; b = regX for now
 118+ 9E80 3A 34 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	    ; roofv y
 119+ 9E83 CD 5B 91                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS
 120+ 9E86 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ; flip sign bit
 121+ 9E87 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 122+ 9E89 57                                   ld      d,a
 123+ 9E8A 3A 38 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 124+ 9E8D 32 01 80                             ld      (varQ),a
 125+ 9E90 7A           .YTest0Div:             ld      a,d
 126+ 9E91 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 127+ 9E93 B3                                   or      e
 128+ 9E94 FE 00                                cp      0
 129+ 9E96 20 0E                                jr      nz,.SkipYZeroTest
 130+ 9E98                                      ZeroA
 130+ 9E98 AF          >                        xor a
 131+ 9E99 C3 F6 9E                             jp      .SetRoofZ
 132+ 9E9C FE 00        .YTestDiv0:             cp      0
 133+ 9E9E 20 06                                jr      nz,.SkipYZeroTest
 134+ 9EA0 3E 60        .YDivideByZero:         ld      a,96
 135+ 9EA2 B2                                   or      d
 136+ 9EA3 C3 F6 9E                             jp      .SetRoofZ
 137+ 9EA6 7B           .SkipYZeroTest:         ld      a,e
 138+ 9EA7 32 01 7F                             ld      (varP),a
 139+ 9EAA 7A                                   ld      a,d
 140+ 9EAB CD E8 94                             call    DVIDT
 141+ 9EAE 78                                   ld      a,b
 142+ 9EAF 32 32 C0     .SetRoofY:              ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1),a
 143+ 9EB2 C3 40 9F                             jp      .DoneRoof
 144+ 9EB5              ;...roofv_z = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_y * roofv_y) / nosev_z
 145+ 9EB5 3A 36 C0     .ProcessRoofZ:          ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)      ; Failing that we default to Z
 146+ 9EB8 32 01 80                             ld		(varQ),a				    ; q = nosev_y
 147+ 9EBB 3A 30 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)	    ;roov z
 148+ 9EBE CD 5C 9D                             call	RSequQmulA
 149+ 9EC1 3A 38 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)	    ; nosev z
 150+ 9EC4 32 01 80                             ld		(varQ),a				    ; b = regX for now
 151+ 9EC7 3A 32 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; roofv y
 152+ 9ECA CD 5B 91                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS
 153+ 9ECD 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ; flip sign bit
 154+ 9ECE EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 155+ 9ED0 57                                   ld      d,a
 156+ 9ED1 3A 3A C0                             ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 157+ 9ED4 32 01 80                             ld      (varQ),a
 158+ 9ED7 7A           .ZTest0Div:             ld      a,d
 159+ 9ED8 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 160+ 9EDA B3                                   or      e
 161+ 9EDB FE 00                                cp      0
 162+ 9EDD 20 0E                                jr      nz,.SkipZZeroTest
 163+ 9EDF                                      ZeroA
 163+ 9EDF AF          >                        xor a
 164+ 9EE0 C3 F6 9E                             jp      .SetRoofZ
 165+ 9EE3 FE 00        .ZTestDiv0:             cp      0
 166+ 9EE5 20 06                                jr      nz,.SkipZZeroTest
 167+ 9EE7 3E 60        .ZDivideByZero:         ld      a,96
 168+ 9EE9 B2                                   or      d
 169+ 9EEA C3 F6 9E                             jp      .SetRoofZ
 170+ 9EED 7B           .SkipZZeroTest:         ld      a,e

 176+ 9EF9 C3 40 9F                             jp      .DoneRoof
 177+ 9EFC              ;...roofv_x = -(nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_x
 178+ 9EFC 3A 38 C0     .ProcessRoofX:          ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)      ; so we set Q to Nose Y
 179+ 9EFF 32 01 80                             ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y

 185+ 9F11 CD 5B 91                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS
 186+ 9F14 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ; flip sign bit
 187+ 9F15 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit

 190+ 9F1B 32 01 80                             ld      (varQ),a

 195+ 9F24 20 0E                                jr      nz,.SkipXZeroTest

 198+ 9F2A FE 00        .XTestDiv0:             cp      0
 199+ 9F2C 20 06                                jr      nz,.SkipXZeroTest
 200+ 9F2E 3E 60        .XDivideByZero:         ld      a,96
 201+ 9F30 B2                                   or      d
 202+ 9F31 C3 3D 9F                             jp      .SetRoofX
 203+ 9F34 7B           .SkipXZeroTest:         ld      a,e
 204+ 9F35 32 01 7F                             ld      (varP),a
 205+ 9F38 7A                                   ld      a,d
 206+ 9F39 CD E8 94                             call    DVIDT
 207+ 9F3C 78                                   ld      a,b
 208+ 9F3D 32 30 C0     .SetRoofX:              ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1),a
 209+ 9F40              .DoneRoof:              TidyNormaliseRoofV
 209+ 9F40 CD 7D 9D    >                        call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15
 209+ 9F43 CD FA 9D    >                        call	NormalizeXX15			; normalise z hi, its really TIS3
 209+ 9F46 CD C0 9D    >                        call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV
 210+ 9F49              ;...sidex = ((nosez * roofy) - nosey * roofz) / 96
 211+ 9F49 3A 3A C0     .DoSidevX:              ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)      ;  -(-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 212+ 9F4C EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 213+ 9F4E 32 01 80                             ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 214+ 9F51 3A 32 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	     ;roov z
 215+ 9F54 CD 5C 9D                             call	RSequQmulA
 216+ 9F57 3A 38 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)		; nosev z
 217+ 9F5A 32 01 80                             ld		(varQ),a							; b = regX for now
 218+ 9F5D 3A 34 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	    ; roofv y
 219+ 9F60 CD 5B 91                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS
 220+ 9F63 CD 30 95                             call    BAequDEdiv96
 221+ 9F66 78                                   ld      a,b
 222+ 9F67 32 2A C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a
 223+ 9F6A              ;...sidey = ((nosex * roofz) - nosez * roofx) / 96
 224+ 9F6A 3A 36 C0     .DoSidevY:              ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)      ; -(-nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 225+ 9F6D EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 226+ 9F6F 32 01 80                             ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 227+ 9F72 3A 34 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	    ; roov z
 228+ 9F75 CD 5C 9D                             call	RSequQmulA                  ; rs = nosex * roofz
 229+ 9F78 3A 3A C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 230+ 9F7B 32 01 80                             ld		(varQ),a					; b = regX for now
 231+ 9F7E 3A 34 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	    ; roofv y
 232+ 9F81 CD 5B 91                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS          ; DE = noseyz* roofz +
 233+ 9F84 CD 30 95                             call    BAequDEdiv96
 234+ 9F87 78                                   ld      a,b
 235+ 9F88 32 2C C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a         ;-(-nosev_y * roofv_x + nosev_x * roofv_y) / 96
 236+ 9F8B              ;...sidez = ((nosey * roofx) - nosex * roofy) / 96
 237+ 9F8B 3A 38 C0     .DoSidevZ:              ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)      ;
 238+ 9F8E EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 239+ 9F90 32 01 80                             ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 240+ 9F93 3A 34 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	     ;roov z
 241+ 9F96 CD 5C 9D                             call	RSequQmulA
 242+ 9F99 3A 36 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)		; nosev z
 243+ 9F9C 32 01 80                             ld		(varQ),a							; b = regX for now
 244+ 9F9F 3A 32 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; roofv y
 245+ 9FA2 CD 5B 91                             call	madDEequQmulAaddRS
 246+ 9FA5 CD 30 95                             call    BAequDEdiv96
 247+ 9FA8 78                                   ld      a,b
 248+ 9FA9 32 2E C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevZ+1),a
 249+ 9FAC                                      ZeroA
 249+ 9FAC AF          >                        xor a
 250+ 9FAD 32 29 C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevX),a
 251+ 9FB0 32 2B C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevY),a
 252+ 9FB3 32 2D C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevZ),a
 253+ 9FB6 C9                                   ret
 254+ 9FB7
 255+ 9FB7
 256+ 9FB7              TidySub1:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
 257+ 9FB7              		; b = regX on entry
 258+ 9FB7              TIS1Prep:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
 259+ 9FB7 08           		ex		af,af'
 260+ 9FB8 78           		ld		a,b
 261+ 9FB9 32 01 80     		ld		(varQ),a
 262+ 9FBC 08           		ex		af,af'
 263+ 9FBD EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
 264+ 9FBF CD 39 91     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
 265+ 9FC2              ; USES 				A BC E
 266+ 9FC2              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
 267+ 9FC2              Tis1Div96:							   		; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
 268+ 9FC2 4F           		ld		c,a							; Store sign bit in  ct (we use e reg for that)
 269+ 9FC3 E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit						; ..
 270+ 9FC5 5F           		ld		e,a							; ..
 271+ 9FC6 79           		ld		a,c							; a = high byte again with sign bit cleared
 272+ 9FC7 E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit							; ..
 273+ 9FC9 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; slide counter T1
 274+ 9FCB              TIS1RollTLoop								; roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
 275+ 9FCB CB 27        		sla		a
 276+ 9FCD              		JumpIfALTNusng $60, TIS1SkipSub
 276+ 9FCD FE 60       >                        cp      $60
 276+ 9FCF DA DC 9F    >                        jp		c, TIS1SkipSub
 277+ 9FD2 DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							; subtract 96
 278+ 9FD4 37           		scf
 279+ 9FD5 CB 10        		rl		b							;  T1
 280+ 9FD7 38 F2        		jr		c,TIS1RollTLoop
 281+ 9FD9              TIS1KIPCont:
 282+ 9FD9 78           		ld		a,b							;   T1
 283+ 9FDA B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
 284+ 9FDB C9           		ret
 285+ 9FDC              TIS1SkipSub:
 286+ 9FDC B7           	or			a
 287+ 9FDD CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
 288+ 9FDF 38 EA        	jr			c,TIS1RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
 289+ 9FE1 C3 D9 9F     	jp			TIS1KIPCont
 290+ 9FE4
 291+ 9FE4              ;.TIDY	\ -> &4679 \ Orthogonalize rotation matrix that uses 0x60 as unity returns INWK(16,18,20) = INWK(12*18+14*20, 10*16+14*20, 10*16+12*18) / INWK(10,12,14)
 292+ 9FE4              ; Ux,Uy,Uz = -(FyUy+FzUz, FxUx+FzUz, FxUx+FyUy)/ Fx,Fy,Fz

 345+ A03D                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideXNoNeg
 345+ A03D A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags

 346+ A041 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_x

 377+ A087 06 09        		ld		b,9
 378+ A089 AF                   xor     a
 379+ A08A              .ClearLoLoop:
 380+ A08A 77           		ld		(hl),a						; zero out lo bytes

 392+ A099              CalcRoofvX:
 393+ A099              Tidy1RX:										; roofv_x = -(nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_x
 394+ A099              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ
 394+ A099 3A 3A C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)

 397+ A0A5              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 397+ A0A5 3A 38 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 397+ A0A8 32 01 80    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 398+ A0AB 3A 32 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 399+ A0AE CD 39 91     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; DE = nosey hi * roofy hi + rs
 400+ A0B1 7A           		ld		a,d
 401+ A0B2 E6 80        		and 	$80
 402+ A0B4 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 403+ A0B6              ;DEBUG		ld		c,a
 404+ A0B6 3A 36 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)					; get nosev x sign
 405+ A0B9 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 406+ A0BA E6 80        		and		$80
 407+ A0BC FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 408+ A0BE FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 409+ A0C0 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 410+ A0C1 E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 411+ A0C3 42           		ld		b,d
 412+ A0C4 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z
 413+ A0C5 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 414+ A0C6 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 415+ A0C8 CD BD 96     		call	BC_Div_DE
 416+ A0CB FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh							; get back sign from nosevx
 417+ A0CD EE 80        		xor		$80								; flip sign
 418+ A0CF E6 80        		and		$80								; keep sign bit only
 419+ A0D1 B0           		or		b
 420+ A0D2 C9           		ret

 695  A147                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
   1+ A147
   2+ A147              LL28Amul256DivD:        JumpIfAGTENusng  d, .Ll28Exit255
   2+ A147 BA          >                        cp     d
   2+ A148 D2 66 A1    >                        jp		nc,.Ll28Exit255
   3+ A14B 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
   4+ A14D CB 27        .LL31:                  sla     a
   5+ A14F 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
   6+ A151                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
   6+ A151 BA          >                        cp      d
   6+ A152 DA 57 A1    >                        jp		c, .SkipSub
   7+ A155 92                                   sub     d
   8+ A156                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
   8+ A156 B7          >                        or a
   9+ A157 3F           .SkipSub:               ccf                                 ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
  10+ A158 CB 13                                rl      e
  11+ A15A 38 F1                                jr      c,.LL31
  12+ A15C 7B                                   ld      a,e
  13+ A15D C9                                   ret
  14+ A15E 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  15+ A15F 37                                   scf                                 ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  16+ A160 CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
  17+ A162 38 E9                                jr      c,.LL31                     ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
  18+ A164 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
  19+ A165 C9                                   ret
  20+ A166 3E FF        .Ll28Exit255:           ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
  21+ A168 C9                                   ret
  22+ A169
  23+ A169              ;-- Name: LL28 Calculate R = 256 * A / Q
  24+ A169              ;-- LL28+4              Skips the A >= Q check and always returns with C flag cleared, so this can be called if we know the division will work
  25+ A169              ;-- LL31                Skips the A >= Q check and does not set the R counter, so this can be used for jumping straight into the division loop if R is already set to 254 and we know the division will work
  26+ A169              ;   Reg mapping 6502  Z80
  27+ A169              ;               a     a
  28+ A169              ;               b     x
  29+ A169              ;               c     q
  30+ A169              ;               d     r
  31+ A169              ;
  32+ A169 21 B2 F1     LL28Amul256DivD_6502:   ld      hl,Qvar                 ; CMP Q                  \ If A >= Q, then the answer will not fit in one byte,
  33+ A16C 4E                                   ld      c,(hl)                  ; using c as Q var
  34+ A16D B9                                   cp      c
  35+ A16E                                      FlipCarryFlag
  35+ A16E 3F          >                        ccf
  36+ A16F DA 97 A1                             jp      c, .LL2_6502            ; BCS LL2                \ so jump to LL2 to return 255
  37+ A172 06 FE                                ld      b,$FE                   ; LDX #%11111110         \ Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7 loop iterations, getting a 1 each time, and then we use b as Rvar
  38+ A174 CB 27        .LL31_6502:             sla     a                       ; ASL A                  \ Shift A to the left
  39+ A176 DA 8B A1                             jp      c,.LL29_6502            ; BCS LL29               \ If bit 7 of A was set, then jump straight to the subtraction
  40+ A179                                      FlipCarryFlag                   ;                          If A < N, then C flag is set.
  40+ A179 3F          >                        ccf
  41+ A17A                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502 ; CMP Q              \ If A < Q, skip the following subtraction
  41+ A17A B9          >                        cp      c
  41+ A17B DA 80 A1    >                        jp		c, .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502
  42+ A17E                                                                      ; BCC P%+4
  43+ A17E 91                                   sub     c                       ; SBC Q                  \ A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  44+ A17F                                      ClearCarryFlag
  44+ A17F B7          >                        or a
  45+ A180              .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502:     FlipCarryFlag
  45+ A180 3F          >                        ccf
  46+ A181 CB 10                                rl      b                       ; ROL R                  \ Rotate the counter in R to the left, and catch the result bit into bit 0 (which will be a 0 if we didn't do the subtraction, or 1 if we did)
  47+ A183 DA 74 A1                             jp      c, .LL31_6502           ; BCS LL31               \ If we still have set bits in R, loop back to LL31 to do the next iteration of 7
  48+ A186 78                                   ld      a,b
  49+ A187 32 B3 F1                             ld      (Rvar),a
  50+ A18A C9                                   ret                             ; RTS                    \ R left with remainder of division
  51+ A18B 91           .LL29_6502:             sub     c                       ; SBC Q                  \ A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  52+ A18C                                      SetCarryFlag                    ; SEC                    \ Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  52+ A18C 37          >                        scf
  53+ A18D CB 10                                rl      b                       ; ROL R                  \ Rotate the counter in R to the left, and catch the result bit into bit 0 (which will be a 0 if we didn't do the subtraction, or 1 if we did)
  54+ A18F DA 74 A1                             jp      c, .LL31_6502           ; BCS LL31               \ If we still have set bits in R, loop back to LL31 to do the next iteration of 7
  55+ A192 78                                   ld      a,b                     ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine with R containing the
  56+ A193 32 B3 F1                             ld      (Rvar),a                ; .
  57+ A196 C9                                   ret                             ; .                      \ remainder of the division
  58+ A197 3E FF        .LL2_6502:              ld      a,$FF                   ; LDA #255               \ The division is very close to 1, so return the closest
  59+ A199 32 B3 F1                             ld      (Rvar),a                ; STA R                  \ possible answer to 256, i.e. R = 255
  60+ A19C                                      SetCarryFlag                    ; we failed so need carry flag set
  60+ A19C 37          >                        scf
  61+ A19D C9                                   ret                             ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
  62+ A19E
  63+ A19E
  64+ A19E 21 01 80     LL28Amul256DivQ_6502:   ld      hl,varQ                 ; CMP Q                  \ If A >= Q, then the answer will not fit in one byte,
  65+ A1A1 4E                                   ld      c,(hl)                  ; using c as Q var
  66+ A1A2 B9                                   cp      c
  67+ A1A3                                      FlipCarryFlag
  67+ A1A3 3F          >                        ccf
  68+ A1A4 DA CC A1                             jp      c, .LL2_6502            ; BCS LL2                \ so jump to LL2 to return 255
  69+ A1A7 06 FE                                ld      b,$FE                   ; LDX #%11111110         \ Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7 loop iterations, getting a 1 each time, and then we use b as Rvar
  70+ A1A9 CB 27        .LL31_6502:             sla     a                       ; ASL A                  \ Shift A to the left
  71+ A1AB DA C0 A1                             jp      c,.LL29_6502            ; BCS LL29               \ If bit 7 of A was set, then jump straight to the subtraction
  72+ A1AE                                      FlipCarryFlag                   ;                          If A < N, then C flag is set.
  72+ A1AE 3F          >                        ccf
  73+ A1AF                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502 ; CMP Q              \ If A < Q, skip the following subtraction
  73+ A1AF B9          >                        cp      c
  73+ A1B0 DA B5 A1    >                        jp		c, .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502
  74+ A1B3                                                                      ; BCC P%+4
  75+ A1B3 91                                   sub     c                       ; SBC Q                  \ A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  76+ A1B4                                      ClearCarryFlag
  76+ A1B4 B7          >                        or a
  77+ A1B5              .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502:     FlipCarryFlag
  77+ A1B5 3F          >                        ccf
  78+ A1B6 CB 10                                rl      b                       ; ROL R                  \ Rotate the counter in R to the left, and catch the result bit into bit 0 (which will be a 0 if we didn't do the subtraction, or 1 if we did)
  79+ A1B8 DA A9 A1                             jp      c, .LL31_6502           ; BCS LL31               \ If we still have set bits in R, loop back to LL31 to do the next iteration of 7
  80+ A1BB 78                                   ld      a,b
  81+ A1BC 32 02 80                             ld      (varR),a
  82+ A1BF C9                                   ret                             ; RTS                    \ R left with remainder of division
  83+ A1C0 91           .LL29_6502:             sub     c                       ; SBC Q                  \ A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  84+ A1C1                                      SetCarryFlag                    ; SEC                    \ Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  84+ A1C1 37          >                        scf
  85+ A1C2 CB 10                                rl      b                       ; ROL R                  \ Rotate the counter in R to the left, and catch the result bit into bit 0 (which will be a 0 if we didn't do the subtraction, or 1 if we did)
  86+ A1C4 DA A9 A1                             jp      c, .LL31_6502           ; BCS LL31               \ If we still have set bits in R, loop back to LL31 to do the next iteration of 7
  87+ A1C7 78                                   ld      a,b                     ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine with R containing the
  88+ A1C8 32 02 80                             ld      (varR),a                ; .
  89+ A1CB C9                                   ret                             ; .                      \ remainder of the division
  90+ A1CC 3E FF        .LL2_6502:              ld      a,$FF                   ; LDA #255               \ The division is very close to 1, so return the closest
  91+ A1CE 32 02 80                             ld      (varR),a                ; STA R                  \ possible answer to 256, i.e. R = 255
  92+ A1D1                                      SetCarryFlag                    ; we failed so need carry flag set
  92+ A1D1 37          >                        scf
  93+ A1D2 C9                                   ret                             ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
  94+ A1D3
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
 696  A1D3                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm
   1+ A1D3              XAequMinusXAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
   2+ A1D3              TIS1:
   3+ A1D3 08           		ex		af,af'
   4+ A1D4 3A EA 7E     		ld		a,(regX)
   5+ A1D7 47           		ld		b,a
   6+ A1D8 08           		ex		af,af'
   7+ A1D9              BAequMinusBAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
   8+ A1D9 08           		ex		af,af'
   9+ A1DA 78           		ld		a,b
  10+ A1DB 32 01 80     		ld		(varQ),a
  11+ A1DE 08           		ex		af,af'
  12+ A1DF EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
  13+ A1E1 CD 39 91     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
  14+ A1E4              ; USES 				A BC E
  15+ A1E4              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
  16+ A1E4              Div96:										; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
  17+ A1E4 47           		ld		b,a
  18+ A1E5 E6 80        		and		$80							;	hi sign
  19+ A1E7 5F           		ld		e,a							;   e = varT
  20+ A1E8 78           		ld		a,b
  21+ A1E9 E6 7F        		and		$7F							;	hi A7
  22+ A1EB 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						;   slide counter
  23+ A1ED 48           		ld		c,b							;   c == T1 ::  T1
  24+ A1EE              .DVL3:										;   roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
  25+ A1EE CB 27        		sla		a
  26+ A1F0 FE 60        		cp		$60							; max 96
  27+ A1F2 30 02        		jr		nc,.DV4
  28+ A1F4 DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							;  SBC #&60
  29+ A1F6              .DV4:										; skip subtraction
  30+ A1F6 CB 11        		rl		c							;  T1
  31+ A1F8 38 F4        		jr		c,.DVL3
  32+ A1FA 79           		ld		a,c							;   T1
  33+ A1FB B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
  34+ A1FC C9           		ret
  35+ A1FD
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm

   8+ A1FD              MISSILEMINROLL          equ -3

  30+ A1FD 33 A7 0B A4  ShipAIJumpTable:      DW    NormalAI,   MissileAIV3,  StationAI,  JunkAI,     ScoopableAI
  30+ A201 30 A2 31 A2
  30+ A205 32 A2
  31+ A207 33 A2 34 A2                        DW    ThargoidAI, NoAI,       NoAI,       NoAI,       NoAI
  31+ A20B 34 A2 34 A2
  31+ A20F 34 A2
  32+ A211              ShipAiJumpTableMax:   EQU ($ - ShipAIJumpTable)/2
  33+ A211
  34+ A211
  35+ A211
  36+ A211              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  37+ A211              ; Main entry point to tactics. Every time it will do a a tidy and the do AI logic
  38+ A211              UpdateShip:             ;  call    DEBUGSETNODES ;       call    DEBUGSETPOS
  39+ A211 21 9D 68                            ld      hl,TidyCounter
  40+ A214 35                                  dec     (hl)
  41+ A215                                     DISPLAY "TODO: SEE IF THIS IS AN ISSUE"
  42+ A215 CC 56 9E                            call     z,TidyUbnK  ;TODO SEE IF THIS IS AN ISSUE"
  43+ A218                                     ; This shoudl be a call nz to tidy *****ret     nz
  44+ A218 3E 10                               ld      a,16
  45+ A21A 32 9D 68                            ld      (TidyCounter),a
  46+ A21D                                     ;call    TidyUbnK
  47+ A21D                                     ; add AI in here too
  48+ A21D 3A 0D C4                            ld       a,(ShipTypeAddr)
  49+ A220                                                 DISPLAY "TODO: capture duff jumps"
  50+ A220                                     ReturnIfAGTEusng ShipAiJumpTableMax              ; TODO capture duff jumps whilst debugging in case a new shjip type code is added
  50+ A220 FE 0A       >                        cp    ShipAiJumpTableMax
  50+ A222 D0          >                        ret	 nc
  51+ A223 21 FD A1                            ld       hl,ShipAIJumpTable
  52+ A226 ED 31                               add      hl,a
  53+ A228 ED 31                               add      hl,a
  54+ A22A 7E                                  ld       a,(hl)                                  ; contrary to the name
  55+ A22B 23                                  inc      hl                                      ; jp (hl) is really
  56+ A22C 66                                  ld       h,(hl)                                  ; jp hl
  57+ A22D 6F                                  ld       l,a                                     ;
  58+ A22E E9                                  jp       hl                                      ; Follow the AI Jump Table
  59+ A22F C9                                  ret                                              ; not needed as jp handles this
  60+ A230
  61+ A230
  62+ A230
  63+ A230              ; used  when no pre-checks are requrired, e.g. if forcing a space station from main loop
  64+ A230
  65+ A230
  66+ A230 C9           StationAI:              ret
  67+ A231 C9           JunkAI:                 ret
  68+ A232 C9           ScoopableAI:            ret
  69+ A233 C9           ThargoidAI:             ret
  70+ A234 C9           NoAI:                   ret
  71+ A235              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  72+ A235              CalculateAgression:     IFDEF   ALWAYSANGRY
  73+ A235 ~                                        jp  UltraHostile
  74+ A235                                      ENDIF
  75+ A235 3A 0F C4                             ld      a,(ShipAIFlagsAddr)
  76+ A238 47                                   ld      b,a
  77+ A239 E6 02                                and     %00000010
  78+ A23B 20 20                                jr      nz,.UltraHostile
  79+ A23D 78                                   ld      a,b
  80+ A23E E6 F0                                and     %11110000                               ; if it can can anger a fighter bay then generally more hostile as implies its a large ship
  81+ A240 21 5C C0                             ld      hl,UBnKMissilesLeft                     ; more missiles more agression
  82+ A243 B6                                   or      (hl)
  83+ A244 47                                   ld      b,a
  84+ A245 3A 0E C4                             ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)
  85+ A248 E6 4E                                and     %01001110                               ; We look at if its a bounty hunter, hostile already, pirate and cop
  86+ A24A B0                                   or      b
  87+ A24B 47                                   ld      b,a
  88+ A24C 3A 53 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKShipAggression)
  89+ A24F                                      JumpIfALTNusng 64,.NotAlreadyAgressive
  89+ A24F FE 40       >                        cp      64
  89+ A251 DA 58 A2    >                        jp		c, .NotAlreadyAgressive
  90+ A254 78                                   ld      a,b
  91+ A255 F6 80                                or      %10000000                               ; if its already at least 64 agressive then likley to stay so
  92+ A257 47                                   ld      b,a
  93+ A258 78           .NotAlreadyAgressive:   ld      a,b
  94+ A259 32 53 C0                             ld      (UBnKShipAggression),a
  95+ A25C C9                                   ret
  96+ A25D 3E FF        .UltraHostile:          ld      a,$FF
  97+ A25F 32 53 C0                             ld      (UBnKShipAggression),a
  98+ A262 C9                                   ret
  99+ A263              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 100+ A263              ; set angry if possible, if its an innocent then flag the space station to get angry
 101+ A263 3A 0E C4     MakeHostile:            ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)                     ; Check bit 5 of newb flags
 102+ A266                                      ;break
 103+ A266                                      JumpIfMemEqNusng ShipTypeAddr, ShipTypeStation, .SetNewbHostile
 103+ A266 3A 0D C4    >                        ld  a,(ShipTypeAddr)
 103+ A269 FE 02       >                        cp  ShipTypeStation
 103+ A26B CA 8A A2    >                        jp  z,.SetNewbHostile
 104+ A26E E6 20        .ItsNotAStation:        and     ShipIsBystander                         ; check if space station present if its a bystander
 105+ A270 C4 C4 A2                             call    nz, SetStationHostile                   ; Set Space Station if present, Angry
 106+ A273 3A 54 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)                        ; get AI data
 107+ A276                                      ReturnOnBitClear a, ShipAIEnabledBitNbr         ; if 0 then no AI attached so it can't get angry
 107+ A276 CB 7F       >                        bit 	ShipAIEnabledBitNbr,a
 107+ A278 C8          >                        ret		z
 108+ A279 4F                                   ld      c,a                                     ; Copy to c in case we need it later
 109+ A27A                                      SetMemToN UBnKAccel, 2                          ; set accelleration to 2 to speed up
 109+ A27A 3E 02       >                        ld      a,2
 109+ A27C 32 47 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 110+ A27F CB 27                                sla     a                                       ; set pitch to 4
 111+ A281 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a                     ; .
 112+ A284 3A 0F C4                             ld      a,(ShipAIFlagsAddr)
 113+ A287                                      ReturnIfBitMaskClear ShipCanAnger
 113+ A287 E6 80       >                        and     ShipCanAnger
 113+ A289 C8          >                        ret     z
 114+ A28A CD 1A C6     .SetNewbHostile:        call    SetShipHostile
 115+ A28D C9                                   ret

 119+ A28E C9           MissileDidHitUs:        ret ; TODO

 121+ A28F              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 122+ A28F              PlayerHitByMissile:     MMUSelectLayer1
 122+ A28F ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
 123+ A293 3E 05                                ld      a,L1ColourInkCyan
 124+ A295 CD B4 E0                             call    l1_set_border
 125+ A298 3A 3C C0                             ld      a,(UBnKMissileBlastDamage)
 126+ A29B 47                                   ld      b,a                                     ; b = damage
 127+ A29C 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)
 128+ A29F E6 80                                and     $80
 129+ A2A1 20 0A                                jr      nz,.HitRear
 130+ A2A3 3A 82 82     .HitFront:              ld      a,(ForeShield)
 131+ A2A6 CD 64 64                             call    ApplyDamage
 132+ A2A9 32 82 82                             ld      (ForeShield),a
 133+ A2AC C9                                   ret
 134+ A2AD 3A 83 82     .HitRear:               ld      a,(AftShield)
 135+ A2B0 CD 64 64                             call    ApplyDamage
 136+ A2B3 32 83 82                             ld      (AftShield),a
 137+ A2B6                                                  DISPLAY "TODO: Set up blast radius"
 138+ A2B6 C9                                   ret; TODO , do hit set up blast radius etc

 140+ A2B7 ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
 141+ A2BB 3E 02                                ld      a,L1ColourInkRed
 142+ A2BD CD B4 E0                             call    l1_set_border
 143+ A2C0 CD 61 C7                             call    UnivExplodeShip
 144+ A2C3                                                  DISPLAY "TODO:  hit ship do explosion"
 145+ A2C3 C9                                   ret; TODO hit ship do explosion, check for near by and if player is near and missile type logic, e.g. AP or HE
 146+ A2C4              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 147+ A2C4 CD 2D 85     SetStationHostile:      call    IsSpaceStationPresent                   ; only if present
 148+ A2C7 D8                                   ret     c
 149+ A2C8 3A 40 C0                             ld      a,(UbnKShipUnivBankNbr)                     ; save current bank
 150+ A2CB FD 67                                ld      iyh,a
 151+ A2CD                                      MMUSelectUniverseN 0                            ; space station is always 0
 151+ A2CD ED 91 56 46 >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       BankUNIVDATA0+0
 152+ A2D1 CD 1A C6                             call    SetShipHostile
 153+ A2D4 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh                                   ; get prev bank back
 154+ A2D6                                      MMUSelectUniverseA                              ;
 154+ A2D6 C6 46       >                     add    a,BankUNIVDATA0
 154+ A2D8 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 155+ A2DB C9                                   ret
 156+ A2DC
 157+ A2DC              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 158+ A2DC              CheckMissileBlastInit:  ZeroA
 158+ A2DC AF          >                        xor a
 159+ A2DD 32 D3 81                             ld      (CurrentMissileCheck),a
 160+ A2E0 21 20 C0                             ld      hl,UBnKxlo                      ; Copy Blast Coordinates
 161+ A2E3 01 0C 00                             ld      bc,12                           ; and Damage stats
 162+ A2E6 11 DA 80                             ld      de,MissileXPos
 163+ A2E9 ED B0                                ldir
 164+ A2EB                                      ZeroA                                   ; we have processd enque request
 164+ A2EB AF          >                        xor a
 165+ A2EC 32 44 C0                             ld      (UBnKMissleHitToProcess),a      ;
 166+ A2EF CD 35 A3                             call    CheckIfBlastHitUs               ; If we are in Range
 167+ A2F2 DC 8E A2                             call    c, MissileDidHitUs              ; Then we get hit
 168+ A2F5 C9                                   ret

 172+ A2F6              ;;ReadyfordeletionposttestCheckPointRange:        MACRO   ShipPos, ShipSign, MissilePos, MissileSign
 173+ A2F6              ;;Readyfordeletionposttest                        ld      a,(MissilePos)                      ; check X Coord
 174+ A2F6              ;;Readyfordeletionposttest                        ld      hl,(ShipSign)
 175+ A2F6              ;;Readyfordeletionposttest                        xor     (hl)
 176+ A2F6              ;;Readyfordeletionposttest                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 177+ A2F6              ;;Readyfordeletionposttest                        ld      hl,(ShipPos)
 178+ A2F6              ;;Readyfordeletionposttest                        ld      de,(MissilePos)
 179+ A2F6              ;;Readyfordeletionposttest                        jr      z,.SignsDiffernt
 180+ A2F6              ;;Readyfordeletionposttest.XSame:                 and     a
 181+ A2F6              ;;Readyfordeletionposttest                        sbc     hl,de                               ; distance = Ship X - Missile X
 182+ A2F6              ;;Readyfordeletionposttest                        JumpIfPositive      .CheckDiff              ; if result was -ve
 183+ A2F6              ;;Readyfordeletionposttest                        NegHL
 184+ A2F6              ;;Readyfordeletionposttest                        jp      .CheckDiff
 185+ A2F6              ;;Readyfordeletionposttest.SignsDiffernt:         add     hl,de
 186+ A2F6              ;;Readyfordeletionposttest                        ReturnIfNegative                            ; if we overflowed then return
 187+ A2F6              ;;Readyfordeletionposttest.CheckDiff:             ld      a,h                                 ; if we have an h outside blast raidus
 188+ A2F6              ;;Readyfordeletionposttest                        ReturnIfANotZero
 189+ A2F6              ;;Readyfordeletionposttest                        ld      a,l
 190+ A2F6              ;;Readyfordeletionposttest                        and     a
 191+ A2F6              ;;Readyfordeletionposttest                        ReturnIfAGTEMemusng   CurrentMissileBlastRange
 192+ A2F6              ;;Readyfordeletionposttest                        ENDM
 193+ A2F6              ;...................................................................
 194+ A2F6              ; We only do one test per loop for spreading the load of work
 195+ A2F6 3A D3 81     CheckMissileBlastLoop:  ld      a,(CurrentMissileCheck)
 196+ A2F9                                      ReturnIfAGTENusng   UniverseSlotListSize
 196+ A2F9 FE 0C       >                        cp    UniverseSlotListSize
 196+ A2FB D0          >                        ret	 nc
 197+ A2FC FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a
 198+ A2FE 3C                                   inc     a                                   ; update for next slot so re can fast return on distance checks
 199+ A2FF 32 D3 81                             ld      (CurrentMissileCheck),a
 200+ A302                                      ReturnIfSlotAEmpty
 200+ A302 21 D5 81    >                        ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
 200+ A305 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 200+ A307 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 200+ A308 3C          >                        inc     a
 200+ A309 C8          >                        ret     z           ; if slot was ff inc would make it 0
 200+ A30A 3D          >                        dec     a           ; get original value back for later
 201+ A30B CD 2D 85                             call    IsSpaceStationPresent               ; If its a station its imune to missiles
 202+ A30E D8                                   ret     c                                   ; if we have a special mission to kill a staion then its type won't be space station for game logic
 203+ A30F 3A 51 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKexplDsp)                     ; Don't explode a ship twice
 204+ A312 E6 20                                and     ShipExploding                       ;
 205+ A314                                      ReturnIfNotZero                             ;
 205+ A314 C0          >                        ret     nz
 206+ A315 3A FB 80                             ld      a,(CurrentMissileBlastRange)
 207+ A318 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                               ; iyh = missile blast depending on type
 208+ A31A FD 7D        .CheckRange:            ld      a,iyl                               ; now page in universe data
 209+ A31C                                      MMUSelectUniverseA
 209+ A31C C6 46       >                     add    a,BankUNIVDATA0
 209+ A31E ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 210+ A321 DD 21 20 C0                          ld      ix,UBnKxlo
 211+ A325 FD 21 DA 80                          ld      iy,MissileXPos
 212+ A329                                      MMUSelectMathsBankedFns
 212+ A329 ED 91 50 66 >                     nextreg MathsBankedFnsMMU, BankMathsBankedFns
 212+ A32D CD B2 01       call CheckInCollisionRange
 213+ A330                                      ;CheckPointRange UBnKxlo, UBnKxsgn, MissileXPos, MissileXSgn  ; its a square but its good enough
 214+ A330                                      ;CheckPointRange UBnKylo, UBnKysgn, MissileYPos, MissileYSgn
 215+ A330                                      ;CheckPointRange UBnKzlo, UBnKzsgn, MissileZPos, MissileZSgn
 216+ A330 D0                                   ret     nc                                  ; no collision means no carry

 219+ A335              ;...................................................................

 225+ A33F 4F                                   ld      c,a
 226+ A340              ;...................................................................
 227+ A340 2A 20 C0     MissileHitUsCheckPos:   ld      hl, (UBnKxlo)                       ; to check for us collision
 228+ A343 ED 5B 23 C0                          ld      de, (UBnKylo)                       ; we can cheat as a missile will only ever be
 229+ A347 ED 4B 26 C0                          ld      bc, (UBnKzlo)                       ; 16 bit + sign bit in sign byte
 230+ A34B 7C                                   ld      a,h
 231+ A34C B2                                   or      d
 232+ A34D B0                                   or      b
 233+ A34E              .PrepForNoHit:          ClearCarryFlag
 233+ A34E B7          >                        or a
 234+ A34F                                      ReturnIfNotZero
 234+ A34F C0          >                        ret     nz
 235+ A350              .PrepForHit:            SetCarryFlag
 235+ A350 37          >                        scf
 236+ A351 C9                                   ret
 237+ A352
 238+ A352                                      ZeroA
 238+ A352 AF          >                        xor a
 239+ A353 B4                                   or      h
 240+ A354                                      ClearCarryFlag
 240+ A354 B7          >                        or a
 241+ A355                                      ReturnIfNotZero                             ; will return with carry clear if way far away
 241+ A355 C0          >                        ret     nz
 242+ A356 7D                                   ld      a,l
 243+ A357                                      ReturnIfAGTENusng    c                      ; return no carry if x far
 243+ A357 B9          >                        cp    c
 243+ A358 D0          >                        ret	 nc
 244+ A359 2A 23 C0     .CheckY:                ld      hl,(UBnKylo)

 245+ A35C AF          >                        xor a
 246+ A35D B5                                   or      l
 247+ A35E                                      ClearCarryFlag
 247+ A35E B7          >                        or a
 248+ A35F                                      ReturnIfNotZero                             ; will return with carry clear if way far away

  59++A485                                      FlipSignBitA

  61++A488                                      SelectMissileBank

 108++A4FB
 109++A4FB 47                                   ld      b,a
 110++A4FC CD 2F 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 111++A4FF 22 BC A3                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ),hl
 112++A502 32 BE A3                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 113++A505              ; by here missile in in memory and TacticsVector now holds distance
 114++A505              ; if or ABS all high bytes is <> 0
 115++A505              .CheckDistance:         IFDEF MISSILEDOHIT
 116++A505 2A B5 A3                                 ld      hl,(TacticsVectorX+1)              ; test if high bytes are set (value is assumed to be 24 bit, though calcs are only 16 so this is uneeded)
 117++A508 7C                                       ld      a,h                                ; .
 118++A509 ED 5B B9 A3                              ld      de,(TacticsVectorY+1)              ; .
 119++A50D B2                                       or      d                                  ; .
 120++A50E ED 4B BD A3                              ld      bc,(TacticsVectorZ+1)              ; .
 121++A512 B0                                       or      b                                  ; .
 122++A513                                          ClearSignBitA                              ; .
 122++A513 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
 123++A515                                          JumpIfNotZero       .FarAway               ; .
 123++A515 C2 24 A5    >                        jp	nz,.FarAway
 124++A518 B5                                       or      l                                    ; test for low byte bit 7, i.e high of 16 bit values
 125++A519 B3                                       or      e                                  ; .
 126++A51A B1                                       or      c                                  ; .
 127++A51B                                          JumpIfNotZero       .FarAway               ; .
 127++A51B C2 24 A5    >                        jp	nz,.FarAway
 128++A51E                                      ELSE
 129++A51E ~                                        jp                  .FarAway
 130++A51E                                      ENDIF
 131++A51E              ; If we get here its close enough to detonate
 132++A51E 3A 45 C0     .CloseMissileExplode:   ld      a,(UBnKMissileTarget)
 133++A521 C3 B7 A2                             jp      MissileHitShipA
 134++A524                          DISPLAY "TODO: far away ** TODO need to set memory read write on page 0"
 135++A524              .FarAway:               SelectTargetBank
 135++A524 FD 7D       >                        ld      a,iyl
 135++A526             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
 135++A526 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 136++A529                                      JumpIfMemFalse      UBnKECMFitted, .NoECM                   ; if target has ECM and enough energy to use it
 136++A529 3A 5A C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKECMFitted)
 136++A52C A7          >                        and     a
 136++A52D C2 4A A5    >                        jp      nz, .NoECM
 137++A530                                      JumpIfMemLTNusng    UBnKEnergy,    ECMCounterMax, .NoECM    ; .
 137++A530 3A 58 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKEnergy)
 137++A533 FE 80       >                        cp      ECMCounterMax
 137++A535 DA 4A A5    >                        jp	  c,.NoECM
 138++A538                                      JumpIfMemIsNotZero   ECMCountDown, .NoECM                ; . ECM is already active
 138++A538 3A 16 7F    >                        ld      a,(ECMCountDown)
 138++A53B A7          >                        and     a
 138++A53C C2 4A A5    >                        jp	    nz,.NoECM
 139++A53F 3A F8 7E     .TestIfUsingECM:        ld      a,(RandomSeed2)                                             ; if random < 16
 140++A542                                      JumpIfAGTENusng     16, .UpdateMissilePos                           ;   then fire ECM destroying missile
 140++A542 FE 10       >                        cp     16
 140++A544 D2 4A A5    >                        jp		nc,.UpdateMissilePos
 141++A547              ;. If we get here then target is still paged in to fire ECM
 142++A547 C3 42 C6     .ZeroPageFireECM:       jp      FireECM                                             ; with an implicit return
 143++A54A              ;                       implicit ret
 144++A54A              ;. If we get here then target is still paged in with no ECM
 145++A54A              .NoECM:
 146++A54A                                    ;;;         ** can do 16 bit maths as we can take teh view that once a object/space station is 24 bit value away then
 147++A54A                                    ;;;         ** targeting computer looses track and destructs missiles
 148++A54A              ;--- Now we can actually update the missile AI
 149++A54A              .UpdateMissilePos:      ;break
 150++A54A                                      SelectMissileBank
 150++A54A FD 7C       >                        ld      a,iyh
 150++A54C             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
 150++A54C ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 151++A54F                                      ;break
 152++A54F                                      ;call    ORTHOGALISE
 153++A54F              .NormaliseDirection:    IFDEF MISSILEBREAK
 154++A54F ~                                        break
 155++A54F                                      ENDIF
 156++A54F CD AE AA                             call    NormalizeTactics                    ; Normalise vector down to 7 bit + sign byte (.TA19->TAS2)
 157++A552                                      IFDEF TACTICSDEBUG
 158++A552 CD 75 A9                                 call DebugTacticsCopy
 159++A555                                      ENDIF
 160++A555              .NegateDirection:       FlipSignMem TacticsVectorX+2                ; negate vector in XX15 so it points opposite direction
 160++A555 3A B6 A3    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorX+2)
 160++A558 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 160++A55A 32 B6 A3    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 161++A55D                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorY+2                ; we have already negated the dot product above
 161++A55D 3A BA A3    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorY+2)
 161++A560 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 161++A562 32 BA A3    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 162++A565                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorZ+2                ; .
 162++A565 3A BE A3    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)
 162++A568 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 162++A56A 32 BE A3    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 163++A56D CD 84 A5                             call    SeekingLogic
 164++A570 C9                                   ret
 165++A571 3A D3 81     .ProcessMissileHit:     ld      a,(CurrentMissileCheck)
 166++A574                                      ReturnIfAGTENusng UniverseSlotListSize  ; need to wait another loop
 166++A574 FE 0C       >                        cp    UniverseSlotListSize
 166++A576 D0          >                        ret	 nc
 167++A577 C3 DC A2     .ActivateNewExplosion:  jp  CheckMissileBlastInit               ; initialise
 168++A57A                                      ; DUMMY RET get a free return by using jp
 169++A57A CD 61 C7     .ECMIsActive:           call    UnivExplodeShip                 ; ECM detonates missile
 170++A57D                                      SetMemTrue  UBnKMissleHitToProcess      ; Enque an explosion
 170++A57D AF          >                        xor     a
 170++A57E 32 44 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKMissleHitToProcess),a
 171++A581 C3 71 A5                             jp      .ProcessMissileHit              ; lets see if we can enqueue now
 172++A584                                      ; DUMMY RET get a free return as activenewexplosion does jp to init with a free ret
 173++A584
 174++A584 CD BA A9     SeekingLogic:           call    XX12EquTacticsDotNosev              ; SA = nose . XX15                           (     ->TAS3)
 175++A587 32 77 A3                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct1),a              ; CNT = A (high byte of dot product)
 176++A58A 3A 03 80                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; get sign from dot product
 177++A58D 32 7B A3                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 178++A590 CD 10 AA     .RoofDotProduct:        call    XX12EquTacticsDotRoofv              ; Now tran the roof for rotation
 179++A593 32 7A A3                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2),a              ; so if its +ve then the roof is similar so pull up to head towards it
 180++A596 3A 03 80                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; .
 181++A599 32 7B A3                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 182++A59C CD A6 A5                             call    SimplifiedShipPitchv3
 183++A59F CD CA A5                             call    SimplifiedShipRollv3
 184++A5A2 CD F8 A5                             call    SimplifiedShipSpeedv3
 185++A5A5 C9                                   ret
 186++A5A6
 187++A5A6              SimplifiedShipPitchv3:  ;break
 188++A5A6 2A 7A A3                             ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct2)            ; pitch counter sign = opposite sign to roofdir sign
 189++A5A9 7C                                   ld      a,h                                ; .
 190++A5AA EE 80                                xor     $80                                ; .
 191++A5AC E6 80                                and     $80                                ; .
 192++A5AE 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h  = flipped sign
 193++A5AF 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = value * 2
 194++A5B0 CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 195++A5B2                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16, .skipPitchZero         ; if its > 16 then update pitch
 195++A5B2 FE 10       >                        cp     16
 195++A5B4 D2 C0 A5    >                        jp		nc,.skipPitchZero
 196++A5B7                                      ZeroA                                      ; else we zero pitch but
 196++A5B7 AF          >                        xor a
 197++A5B8 B4                                   or      h                                  ; we need to retain the sign
 198++A5B9 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a                ; .
 199++A5BC                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 200++A5BC 32 07 A4                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 201++A5BF                                      ENDIF
 202++A5BF C9                                   ret
 203++A5C0 3E 02        .skipPitchZero:         ld      a,2
 204++A5C2 B4                                   or      h
 205++A5C3 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 206++A5C6                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 207++A5C6 32 07 A4                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 208++A5C9                                      ENDIF
 209++A5C9 C9                                   ret
 210++A5CA
 211++A5CA              ;Direct on dot product nose is $24
 212++A5CA              ; Position                  Pitch   Roll    Speed
 213++A5CA              ; Top left forwards         up      -ve     +
 214++A5CA              ; Top right forwards        up      +ve     +
 215++A5CA              ; Bottom left forwards      down    -ve     +
 216++A5CA              ; Bottom right forwards     down    +ve     +
 217++A5CA              ; Top left rear             up      -ve     -
 218++A5CA              ; Top right rear            up      +ve     -
 219++A5CA              ; Bottom left rear          down    -ve     -
 220++A5CA              ; Bottom right rear         down    +ve     -
 221++A5CA
 222++A5CA
 223++A5CA
 224++A5CA              SimplifiedShipRollv3:  ; ld      a,(UBnKRotXCounter)               ; get current roll
 225++A5CA                                     ; sla     a                                 ; * 2 to also abs
 226++A5CA                                     ; ReturnIfAGTENusng 32                      ; and so if >32 skip
 227++A5CA CD 16 AA                             call    XX12EquTacticsDotSidev             ; calculate side dot protuct
 228++A5CD 32 7D A3                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3),a             ; .
 229++A5D0 6F                                   ld      l,a                                ; .
 230++A5D1 3A 03 80                             ld      a,(varS)                           ; .
 231++A5D4 32 7E A3                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3+1),a           ; .
 232++A5D7 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h = sign sidev
 233++A5D8 3A 7B A3                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2+1)           ; get flipped pitch counter sign
 234++A5DB                                      ;xor     $80                               ; .
 235++A5DB                                      ;xor     h                                 ; b = flip against pitch sign
 236++A5DB                                      ;and     $80                               ; .
 237++A5DB                                      ;xor $80
 238++A5DB 47                                   ld      b,a                                ; b = roof product
 239++A5DC 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = abs sidev  * 2
 240++A5DD CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 241++A5DF                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16,.skipRollZero           ;
 241++A5DF FE 10       >                        cp     16
 241++A5E1 D2 ED A5    >                        jp		nc,.skipRollZero
 242++A5E4                                      ZeroA                                      ; if its zoer then set rotx to zero
 242++A5E4 AF          >                        xor a
 243++A5E5 B0                                   or      b
 244++A5E6 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 245++A5E9                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 246++A5E9 32 05 A4                                 ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 247++A5EC                                      ENDIF
 248++A5EC C9                                   ret
 249++A5ED 3E 02        .skipRollZero:          ld      a,2
 250++A5EF B4                                   or      h
 251++A5F0 A8                                   xor     b
 252++A5F1 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 253++A5F4                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 254++A5F4 32 05 A4                                 ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 255++A5F7                                      ENDIF
 256++A5F7 C9                                   ret
 257++A5F8
 258++A5F8 2A 77 A3     SimplifiedShipSpeedv3:  ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)
 259++A5FB 7C                                   ld      a,h
 260++A5FC A7                                   and     a
 261++A5FD 20 13                                jr      nz,.SlowDown
 262++A5FF ED 5B 7A A3                          ld      de,(TacticsDotProduct2)             ; dot product is +ve so heading at each other
 263++A603 7D                                   ld      a,l
 264++A604                                      JumpIfALTNusng  22,.SlowDown                                  ; nose dot product <
 264++A604 FE 16       >                        cp      22
 264++A606 DA 12 A6    >                        jp		c, .SlowDown
 265++A609 3E 03        .Accelerate:            ld      a,3                                 ; else
 266++A60B 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a                       ;  accelleration = 3
 267++A60E                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 268++A60E 32 09 A4                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 269++A611                                      ENDIF
 270++A611 C9                                   ret                                         ;  .
 271++A612              .SlowDown:              JumpIfALTNusng 18, .NoSpeedChange
 271++A612 FE 12       >                        cp      18
 271++A614 DA 20 A6    >                        jp		c, .NoSpeedChange
 272++A617 3E FE        .Deccelerate:           ld      a,-2
 273++A619 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 274++A61C                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 275++A61C 32 09 A4                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 276++A61F                                      ENDIF
 277++A61F C9                                   ret
 278++A620              .NoSpeedChange:         ZeroA                                       ; else no change
 278++A620 AF          >                        xor a
 279++A621 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 280++A624                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 281++A624 32 09 A4                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 282++A627                                      ENDIF
 283++A627 C9                                   ret
 284++A628
 285++A628
 286++A628 CD 67 A6     SimplifiedShipSpeedv3b:  call    GetDistance                         ;
 287++A62B 7C                                   ld      a,h
 288++A62C A7                                   and     a
 289++A62D 06 16                                ld      b,22
 290++A62F 20 08                                jr      nz,.NotSlow
 291++A631 7D           .CloseSlowTest:         ld      a,l
 292++A632                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 30, .NotSlow
 292++A632 FE 1E       >                        cp     30
 292++A634 D2 39 A6    >                        jp		nc,.NotSlow
 293++A637 06 3C                                ld      b,60
 294++A639 2A 77 A3     .NotSlow:               ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)             ; if nosedir is negative (pointing the wrong way)
 295++A63C 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ; or nosedir < 22 (very far off)
 296++A63D E6 80                                and     $80                                 ; do decelleration test
 297++A63F C2 50 A6                             jp      nz,.DecelTest                       ; .
 298++A642 7D                                   ld      a,l                                 ; .
 299++A643                                      JumpIfALTNusng b, .DecelTest                ; .
 299++A643 B8          >                        cp      b
 299++A644 DA 50 A6    >                        jp		c, .DecelTest
 300++A647 3E 03        .Accelerate:            ld      a,3                                 ; else
 301++A649 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a                       ;  accelleration = 3
 302++A64C                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 303++A64C 32 09 A4                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 304++A64F                                      ENDIF
 305++A64F C9                                   ret                                         ;  .
 306++A650 7D           .DecelTest:             ld      a,l                                 ; if abs acelleration > 18
 307++A651                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 18 ,.Deccelerate             ;    decelerate by 2
 307++A651 FE 12       >                        cp     18
 307++A653 D2 5E A6    >                        jp		nc,.Deccelerate
 308++A656              .NoSpeedChange:         ZeroA                                       ; else no change
 308++A656 AF          >                        xor a
 309++A657 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 310++A65A                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 311++A65A 32 09 A4                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 312++A65D                                      ENDIF
 313++A65D C9                                   ret
 314++A65E 3E FE        .Deccelerate:           ld      a,-2
 315++A660 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 316++A663                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 317++A663 32 09 A4                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 318++A666                                      ENDIF
 319++A666 C9                                   ret
 320++A667
 321++A667 2A B4 A3     GetDistance:            ld      hl,(TacticsVectorX)
 322++A66A ED 5B B8 A3                          ld      de,(TacticsVectorY)
 323++A66E ED 4B BC A3                          ld      bc,(TacticsVectorZ)
 324++A672 7C                                   ld      a,h
 325++A673 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 326++A675 67                                   ld      h,a
 327++A676 78                                   ld      a,b
 328++A677 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 329++A679 47                                   ld      b,a
 330++A67A 7A                                   ld      a,d
 331++A67B E6 7F                                and     $7F
 332++A67D 57                                   ld      d,a
 333++A67E 09                                   add     hl,bc
 334++A67F 19                                   add     hl,de
 335++A680                                      ShiftHLRight1
 335++A680 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 335++A682 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 336++A684                                      ShiftHLRight1
 336++A684 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 336++A686 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 337++A688 C9                                   ret
