  74++A761              .NotDocking:            ;break
  75++A761                                      ;       calcuilate vector to planet
  76++A761                                      ;       move towards planet
  77++A761                                      ;       return
  78++A761 C9                                   ret
  79++A762 3A 0E C4     .ItsHostile:            ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)
  80++A765 E6 08        .IsItPirate:            and     ShipIsPirate
  81++A767 20 0E                                jr      nz,.NotAPirate
  82++A769              .IsItInSafeZone:        ;      if we are not in space station safe zone
  83++A769 3A 0E C4     .InSafeZone:            ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)
  84++A76C F6 81                                or      Bit7Only | ShipIsTrader
  85++A76E CD 4D AA     .NotSafeZone:           call    SetPlayerAsTarget
  86++A771 CD 28 AA                             call    CopyPosToVector
  87++A774 CD AE AA                             call    NormalizeTactics
  88++A777              .NotAPirate:
  89++A777 3A 5E C0     .SpawnFighter:          ld      a,(UBnKFightersLeft)
  90++A77A A7                                   and     a
  91++A77B 28 0C                                jr      z,.NoFighters
  92++A77D CD 9C 85     .CanSpawnFighter:       call    doRandom
  93++A780                                      JumpIfALTNusng 200, .NoFighters
  93++A780 FE C8       >                        cp      200
  93++A782 DA 89 A7    >                        jp		c, .NoFighters
  94++A785                                      ;break
  95++A785                                      ;SPAWN FIGHTER of Type UBnKFighterShipId at Y - 20 z - 20
  96++A785 21 5E C0                             ld      hl,UBnKFightersLeft             ;reduced figters left
  97++A788 35                                   dec     (hl)
  98++A789                                      ;inherits parent's ai angry
  99++A789 3A F9 7E     .NoFighters:            ld      a,(RandomSeed3)                 ;if random >= 250
 100++A78C F6 68                                or      104                             ;set a noticable roll
 101++A78E 3A 05 C4     .CheckEnergyLevels:     ld      a,(EnergyAddr)
 102++A791 47                                   ld      b,a
 103++A792 3A 58 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKEnergy)
 104++A795 CB 38                                srl     b                               ; max energy / 2
 105++A797                                      JumpIfAGTENusng b,.EnergyOverHalf       ; if ship max energy / 2 < current enerhy
 105++A797 B8          >                        cp     b
 105++A798 D2 BB A7    >                        jp		nc,.EnergyOverHalf
 106++A79B CB 38                                srl     b
 107++A79D                                      JumpIfAGTENusng b,.EnergyOverQuater     ; if ship max enery / 4 < current energy
 107++A79D B8          >                        cp     b
 107++A79E D2 BB A7    >                        jp		nc,.EnergyOverQuater
 108++A7A1 3A 0E C4                             ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)
 109++A7A4 E6 80                                and     ShipHasEscapePod
 110++A7A6 28 13                                jr      z, .NoEscapePod
 111++A7A8 3A F8 7E                             ld      a,(RandomSeed2)
 112++A7AB                                      JumpIfALTNusng 230,.NoEscapePod         ;if random >= 230
 112++A7AB FE E6       >                        cp      230
 112++A7AD DA BB A7    >                        jp		c, .NoEscapePod
 113++A7B0 3A 54 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)                ;  disable ship AI hostily and ECM
 114++A7B3 E6 7F                                and     ShipAIDisabled                  ;  .
 115++A7B5 32 54 C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a                ;  .
 116++A7B8                                      ;ZeroA                                   ;  .
 117++A7B8 32 5A C0                             ld      (UBnKECMFitted),a               ;  .
 118++A7BB              .LaunchEscapePod:       ;break
 119++A7BB                                      ;            goto spawn escape pod
 120++A7BB              .EnergyOverHalf:
 121++A7BB              .EnergyOverQuater:
 122++A7BB 3A 5C C0     .NoEscapePod:           ld      a,(UBnKMissilesLeft)            ;      if missiles > 0
 123++A7BE 47                                   ld      b,a
 124++A7BF                                      JumpIfAIsZero .NoMissileLaunch
 124++A7BF A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 124++A7C0 CA D6 A7    >                        jp	    z, .NoMissileLaunch
 125++A7C3 3A F9 7E     .MissileLaunchTest:     ld      a,(RandomSeed3)                 ;         if random and 15 > = nbr missiles
 126++A7C6 E6 0F                                and     15
 127++A7C8                                      JumpIfALTNusng b, .NoMissileLaunch
 127++A7C8 B8          >                        cp      b
 127++A7C9 DA D6 A7    >                        jp		c, .NoMissileLaunch
 128++A7CC 3A 16 7F                             ld      a,(ECMCountDown)
 129++A7CF                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero  .NoMissileLaunch
 129++A7CF A7          >                        and     a
 129++A7D0 C2 D6 A7    >                        jp	    nz,.NoMissileLaunch
 130++A7D3 C3 C8 61                             jp    LaunchEnemyMissile                ; jump out and return if firing missile
 131++A7D6 3A 21 C0     .NoMissileLaunch:       ld      a,(UBnKxhi)
 132++A7D9 2A 24 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKyhi)
 133++A7DC B6                                   or      (hl)
 134++A7DD 2A 27 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKzhi)
 135++A7E0 B6                                   or      (hl)
 136++A7E1                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 160, .TooFarForLaser   ; if in laser range (all highs order together < 160)
 136++A7E1 FE A0       >                        cp     160
 136++A7E3 D2 0A A8    >                        jp		nc,.TooFarForLaser
 137++A7E6 CD BA A9                             call    XX12EquTacticsDotNosev
 138++A7E9 47                                   ld      b,a
 139++A7EA 3A 03 80                             ld      a,(varS)
 140++A7ED                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero .TooFarForLaser        ;   if dot product of ship < 160 i.e. > -32
 140++A7ED A7          >                        and     a
 140++A7EE C2 0A A8    >                        jp	    nz,.TooFarForLaser
 141++A7F1 78                                   ld      a,b                            ;    .
 142++A7F2                                      JumpIfALTNusng    32, .DoneLaserShot  ;    .
 142++A7F2 FE 20       >                        cp      32
 142++A7F4 DA 05 A8    >                        jp		c, .DoneLaserShot
 143++A7F7              .FireLaser:             ;break                        ;      do fire laser logic (drain energy, add beam to lines as random line from ship to a random edge of screen)
 144++A7F7 78                                   ld      a,b ;; need to see if b gets corrupted by laser fire
 145++A7F8                                      JumpIfAEqNusng      35, .LaserHitPlayer
 145++A7F8 FE 23       >                        cp     35
 145++A7FA CA 05 A8    >                        jp      z,.LaserHitPlayer
 146++A7FD                                      JumpIfAEqNusng      36, .LaserHitPlayer
 146++A7FD FE 24       >                        cp     36
 146++A7FF CA 05 A8    >                        jp      z,.LaserHitPlayer
 147++A802 C3 05 A8     .LaserMissedPlayer:     jp      .DoneLaserShot
 148++A805              .LaserHitPlayer:        ;break ;         do direct hit logic
 149++A805 21 47 C0     .DoneLaserShot:         ld      hl,UBnKAccel                   ;      Half attacking ship's accelleration in byte 28 (dec so must be 0 1 or 2)
 150++A808 CB 26                                sla     (hl)
 151++A80A              .TooFarForLaser:
 152++A80A              .UpdateShip             ;break
 153++A80A CD 35 A2                             call    CalculateAgression              ; refresh aggression levels
 154++A80D 3A 27 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzhi)
 155++A810                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 3, .ShipFarAway
 155++A810 FE 03       >                        cp     3
 155++A812 D2 20 A8    >                        jp		nc,.ShipFarAway
 156++A815 3A 21 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKxhi)
 157++A818 2A 24 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKyhi)
 158++A81B B6                                   or      (hl)
 159++A81C E6 FE                                and     %11111110
 160++A81E 28 26                                jr      z,.ShipTurnAway
 161++A820 3A F8 7E     .ShipFarAway:           ld      a,(RandomSeed2)                     ; if random with bit 7 set < ship AI byte 32 flag
 162++A823                                      ;or      %10000000               ; .
 163++A823                                      JumpIfAGTEMemusng UBnKShipAggression, .ShipTurnAway
 163++A823 21 53 C0    >                        ld      hl,UBnKShipAggression
 163++A826 BE          >                        cp      (hl)
 163++A827 D2 46 A8    >                        jp		nc,.ShipTurnAway
 164++A82A                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorX+2                ; negate vector in XX15 so it points opposite direction
 164++A82A 3A B6 A3    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorX+2)
 164++A82D EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 164++A82F 32 B6 A3    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 165++A832                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorY+2                ; we have already negated the dot product above
 165++A832 3A BA A3    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorY+2)
 165++A835 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 165++A837 32 BA A3    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 166++A83A                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorZ+2                ; .
 166++A83A 3A BE A3    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)
 166++A83D EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 166++A83F 32 BE A3    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 167++A842 CD 4A A8                             call    ShipSeekingLogic            ;    seek as per missile
 168++A845 C9                                   ret
 169++A846 CD 4A A8     .ShipTurnAway:          call    ShipSeekingLogic            ; move away (ie.. as per missile but dot products not reversed)
 170++A849                                      ;              consider a random roll
 171++A849 C9                                   ret
 172++A84A
 173++A84A CD BA A9     ShipSeekingLogic:       call    XX12EquTacticsDotNosev              ; SA = nose . XX15                           (     ->TAS3)
 174++A84D 32 77 A3                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct1),a              ; CNT = A (high byte of dot product)
 175++A850 3A 03 80                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; get sign from dot product
 176++A853 32 7B A3                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 177++A856 CD 10 AA     .RoofDotProduct:        call    XX12EquTacticsDotRoofv              ; Now tran the roof for rotation
 178++A859 32 7A A3                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2),a              ; so if its +ve then the roof is similar so pull up to head towards it
 179++A85C 3A 03 80                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; .
 180++A85F 32 7B A3                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 181++A862 CD 6C A8                             call    ShipPitchv3
 182++A865 CD 90 A8                             call    ShipRollv3
 183++A868 CD BE A8                             call    ShipSpeedv3
 184++A86B C9                                   ret
 185++A86C
 186++A86C 2A 7A A3     ShipPitchv3:            ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct2)            ; pitch counter sign = opposite sign to roofdir sign
 187++A86F 7C                                   ld      a,h                                ; .
 188++A870 EE 80                                xor     $80                                ; .
 189++A872 E6 80                                and     $80                                ; .
 190++A874 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h  = flipped sign
 191++A875 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = value * 2
 192++A876 CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 193++A878                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16, .skipPitchZero         ; if its > 16 then update pitch
 193++A878 FE 10       >                        cp     16
 193++A87A D2 86 A8    >                        jp		nc,.skipPitchZero
 194++A87D                                      ZeroA                                      ; else we zero pitch but
 194++A87D AF          >                        xor a
 195++A87E B4                                   or      h                                  ; we need to retain the sign
 196++A87F 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a                ; .
 197++A882                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 198++A882 32 07 A4                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 199++A885                                      ENDIF
 200++A885 C9                                   ret
 201++A886 3E 02        .skipPitchZero:         ld      a,2
 202++A888 B4                                   or      h
 203++A889 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 204++A88C                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 205++A88C 32 07 A4                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 206++A88F                                      ENDIF
 207++A88F C9                                   ret
 208++A890
 209++A890 CD 16 AA     ShipRollv3:             call    XX12EquTacticsDotSidev             ; calculate side dot protuct
 210++A893 32 7D A3                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3),a             ; .
 211++A896 6F                                   ld      l,a                                ; .
 212++A897 3A 03 80                             ld      a,(varS)                           ; .
 213++A89A 32 7E A3                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3+1),a           ; .
 214++A89D 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h = sign sidev
 215++A89E 3A 7B A3                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2+1)           ; get flipped pitch counter sign
 216++A8A1 47                                   ld      b,a                                ; b = roof product
 217++A8A2 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = abs sidev  * 2
 218++A8A3 CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 219++A8A5                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16,.skipRollZero           ;
 219++A8A5 FE 10       >                        cp     16
 219++A8A7 D2 B3 A8    >                        jp		nc,.skipRollZero
 220++A8AA                                      ZeroA                                      ; if its zoer then set rotx to zero
 220++A8AA AF          >                        xor a
 221++A8AB B0                                   or      b
 222++A8AC 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 223++A8AF                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 224++A8AF 32 05 A4                                 ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 225++A8B2                                      ENDIF
 226++A8B2 C9                                   ret
 227++A8B3 3E 02        .skipRollZero:          ld      a,2
 228++A8B5 B4                                   or      h
 229++A8B6 A8                                   xor     b
 230++A8B7 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 231++A8BA                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 232++A8BA 32 05 A4                                 ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 233++A8BD                                      ENDIF
 234++A8BD C9                                   ret
 235++A8BE
 236++A8BE 2A 77 A3     ShipSpeedv3:            ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)
 237++A8C1 7C                                   ld      a,h
 238++A8C2 A7                                   and     a
 239++A8C3 20 13                                jr      nz,.SlowDown
 240++A8C5 ED 5B 7A A3                          ld      de,(TacticsDotProduct2)             ; dot product is +ve so heading at each other
 241++A8C9 7D                                   ld      a,l
 242++A8CA                                      JumpIfALTNusng  22,.SlowDown                                  ; nose dot product <
 242++A8CA FE 16       >                        cp      22
 242++A8CC DA D8 A8    >                        jp		c, .SlowDown
 243++A8CF 3E 03        .Accelerate:            ld      a,3                                 ; else
 244++A8D1 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a                       ;  accelleration = 3
 245++A8D4                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 246++A8D4 32 09 A4                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 247++A8D7                                      ENDIF
 248++A8D7 C9                                   ret                                         ;  .
 249++A8D8              .SlowDown:              JumpIfALTNusng 18, .NoSpeedChange
 249++A8D8 FE 12       >                        cp      18
 249++A8DA DA E6 A8    >                        jp		c, .NoSpeedChange
 250++A8DD 3E FF        .Deccelerate:           ld      a,-1
 251++A8DF 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 252++A8E2                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 253++A8E2 32 09 A4                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 254++A8E5                                      ENDIF
 255++A8E5 C9                                   ret
 256++A8E6              .NoSpeedChange:         ZeroA                                       ; else no change
 256++A8E6 AF          >                        xor a
 257++A8E7 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 258++A8EA                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 259++A8EA 32 09 A4                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 260++A8ED                                      ENDIF
 261++A8ED C9                                   ret
 262++A8EE              ;;;ShipPitchv2:  ;break

 264++A8EE              ;;;                        ld      a,h                                ; .
 265++A8EE              ;;;                        xor     $80                                ; .
 266++A8EE              ;;;                        and     $80                                ; .
 267++A8EE              ;;;                        ld      h,a                                ; h  = flipped sign
 268++A8EE              ;;;                        ld      a,l                                ; a = value * 2
 269++A8EE              ;;;                        sla     a                                  ;
 270++A8EE              ;;;                        JumpIfAGTENusng 16, .skipPitchZero         ; if its > 16 then update pitch
 271++A8EE              ;;;                        ZeroA                                      ; else we zero pitch but
 272++A8EE              ;;;                        or      h                                  ; we need to retain the sign

 275++A8EE              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 276++A8EE              ;;;                        ENDIF

 278++A8EE              ;;;.skipPitchZero:         ld      a,3
 279++A8EE              ;;;                        or      h
 280++A8EE              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 281++A8EE              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 282++A8EE              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 283++A8EE              ;;;                        ENDIF
 284++A8EE              ;;;                        ret

 290++A8EE              ;;;                        ret     z
 291++A8EE              ;;;                        call    XX12EquTacticsDotSidev             ; calculate side dot protuct
 292++A8EE              ;;;                        ld      (TacticsDotProduct3),a             ; .

 315++A8EE              ;;;                        ENDIF
 316++A8EE              ;;;                        ret
 317++A8EE              ;;;
 318++A8EE              ;;;ShipSpeedv2:            ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)

 321++A8EE              ;;;                        jr      nz,.SlowDown
 322++A8EE              ;;;                        ld      de,(TacticsDotProduct2)             ; dot product is +ve so heading at each other
 323++A8EE              ;;;                        ld      a,l
 324++A8EE              ;;;                        JumpIfALTNusng  22,.SlowDown                                  ; nose dot product <
 325++A8EE              ;;;.Accelerate:            ld      a,2                                 ; else
 326++A8EE              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKAccel),a                       ;  accelleration = 3
 327++A8EE              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG

 336++A8EE              ;;;                        ENDIF

 339++A8EE              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 340++A8EE              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG

 342++A8EE              ;;;                        ENDIF

 350++A8EE              ;;;
 351++A8EE              ;;;
 352++A8EE              ;;;ShipPitch:              ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct2)            ; pitch counter sign = opposite sign to roofdir sign

 358++A8EE              ;;;                        sla     a                                  ;

 380++A8EE              ;;;                        ld      a,(varS)                           ; .

 382++A8EE              ;;;                        ld      h,a                                ; h = sign sidev
 383++A8EE              ;;;                        ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2+1)           ; get flipped pitch counter sign

 385++A8EE              ;;;                        ld      a,l                                ; a = abs sidev  * 2
 386++A8EE              ;;;                        sla     a                                  ;

 395++A8EE              ;;;.skipRollZero:          ld      a,1
 396++A8EE              ;;;                        or      h

 398++A8EE              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 399++A8EE              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 400++A8EE              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 401++A8EE              ;;;                        ENDIF
 402++A8EE              ;;;                        ret
 403++A8EE              ;;;
 404++A8EE              ;;;ShipSpeed:              ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)
 405++A8EE              ;;;                        ld      a,h
 406++A8EE              ;;;                        and     a
 407++A8EE              ;;;                        jr      nz,.SlowDown
 408++A8EE              ;;;                        ld      de,(TacticsDotProduct2)             ; dot product is +ve so heading at each other
 409++A8EE              ;;;                        ld      a,l
 410++A8EE              ;;;                        JumpIfALTNusng  22,.SlowDown                                  ; nose dot product <
 411++A8EE              ;;;.Accelerate:            ld      a,3                                 ; else
 412++A8EE              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKAccel),a                       ;  accelleration = 3
 413++A8EE              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 414++A8EE              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 415++A8EE              ;;;                        ENDIF
 416++A8EE              ;;;                        ret                                         ;  .
 417++A8EE              ;;;.SlowDown:              JumpIfALTNusng 18, .NoSpeedChange
 418++A8EE              ;;;.Deccelerate:           ld      a,-1
 419++A8EE              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 420++A8EE              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 421++A8EE              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 422++A8EE              ;;;                        ENDIF
 423++A8EE              ;;;                        ret
 424++A8EE              ;;;.NoSpeedChange:         ZeroA                                       ; else no change
 425++A8EE              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 426++A8EE              ;;;                        IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 427++A8EE              ;;;                            ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 428++A8EE              ;;;                        ENDIF
 429++A8EE              ;;;                        ret
 430++A8EE
# file closed: ./GameEngine/../GameEngine/NormalAI.asm
 276+ A8EE
 277+ A8EE              ; On Entry A = TacticsDotProduct2 sign (i.e. roof direction)
 278+ A8EE              ; on exit a == new roll
 279+ A8EE EE 80        calcNPitch:             xor     SignOnly8Bit                    ; c = sign flipped of dot product only
 280+ A8F0 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                    ; .
 281+ A8F2 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ; . (varT in effect)
 282+ A8F3 F6 03                                or      MISSILEMAXPITCH                 ; a = flipped sign max pitch
 283+ A8F5 3A 49 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKRotZCounter)             ; b = abs (currentz pitch)
 284+ A8F8 C9                                   ret
 285+ A8F9
 286+ A8F9 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                    ; . which will initially be 0
 287+ A8FB 47                                   ld      b,a                             ; .
 288+ A8FC 3A 7A A3                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2)          ; a = abs roof dot product
 289+ A8FF                                      JumpIfALTNusng MISSILEMAXPITCH+1, .calcNPitch2    ; if a >= roll threshold
 289+ A8FF FE 04       >                        cp      MISSILEMAXPITCH+1
 289+ A901 DA 0E A9    >                        jp		c, .calcNPitch2
 290+ A904 78                                   ld      a,b
 291+ A905 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 292+ A907                                      ;jr      z,.NPitchPositive
 293+ A907                                     ; ld      a,
 294+ A907 3E 03                                ld      a,MISSILEMAXPITCH                         ;    z rot = z rot * dot product flipped sign
 295+ A909 B1                                   or      c                               ;    i.e. zrot = current magnitude but dot product sign flipped
 296+ A90A 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a             ;    .
 297+ A90D C9                                   ret                                     ; else (a LT current abs z)
 298+ A90E B1           .calcNPitch2:           or      c                               ;     rot z = dot product with sign flipped
 299+ A90F 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a             ;
 300+ A912 C9                                   ret                                     ;
 301+ A913
 302+ A913 3A 49 C0     calcNRoll:              ld      a,(UBnKRotZCounter)
 303+ A916 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 304+ A918 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                    ; flip sign of dot product
 305+ A91A F6 05                                or      5
 306+ A91C 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 307+ A91F C9                                   ret
 308+ A920
 309+ A920 4F                                   ld      c,a
 310+ A921 F6 03                                or      MISSILEMAXPITCH
 311+ A923 3A 48 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKRotXCounter)
 312+ A926 C9                                   ret
 313+ A927
 314+ A927
 315+ A927
 316+ A927 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                    ; get ABS value
 317+ A929 47                                   ld      b,a
 318+ A92A 3A 7A A3                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2)          ; now we have the dot product abs value
 319+ A92D                                      JumpIfALTNusng MISSILEMAXROLL+1, .calcNRoll2
 319+ A92D FE 04       >                        cp      MISSILEMAXROLL+1
 319+ A92F DA 39 A9    >                        jp		c, .calcNRoll2
 320+ A932 3E 03                                ld      a,MISSILEMAXROLL
 321+ A934 B1                                   or      c
 322+ A935 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 323+ A938 C9                                   ret
 324+ A939 B1           .calcNRoll2:            or      c                               ;     rot z = dot product with sign flipped
 325+ A93A 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 326+ A93D C9                                   ret

 328+ A93E
 329+ A93E 21 2A C0     CopyRotSideToTacticsMat:ld      hl,UBnkrotmatSidevX+1
 330+ A941 C3 4D A9                             jp      CopyRotmatToTacticsMat
 331+ A944
 332+ A944 21 36 C0     CopyRotNoseToTacticsMat:ld      hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX+1
 333+ A947 C3 4D A9                             jp      CopyRotmatToTacticsMat
 334+ A94A
 335+ A94A 21 30 C0     CopyRotRoofToTacticsMat:ld      hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1
 336+ A94D              ; Coy rotation matrix high byte to trans rot mat, strip off sign and separate to rotmat byte 2
 337+ A94D 11 98 A3     CopyRotmatToTacticsMat: ld      de,TacticsRotMatX
 338+ A950 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)              ; matrix high byte of x
 339+ A951 47                                   ld      b,a
 340+ A952 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 341+ A954 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat value
 342+ A955 13                                   inc     de
 343+ A956 78                                   ld      a,b
 344+ A957 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 345+ A959 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat sign
 346+ A95A 13                                   inc     de                  ; move to next rot mat element
 347+ A95B 23                                   inc     hl
 348+ A95C 23                                   inc     hl                  ; matrix high byte of y
 349+ A95D 7E           .processYElement:       ld      a,(hl)              ; matrix high byte of y
 350+ A95E 47                                   ld      b,a
 351+ A95F E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 352+ A961 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat value
 353+ A962 13                                   inc     de
 354+ A963 78                                   ld      a,b
 355+ A964 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 356+ A966 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat sign
 357+ A967 13                                   inc     de                  ; move to next rot mat element
 358+ A968 23                                   inc     hl
 359+ A969 23                                   inc     hl                  ; matrix high byte of z
 360+ A96A 7E           .ProcessZElement:       ld      a,(hl)              ; matrix high byte of z
 361+ A96B 47                                   ld      b,a
 362+ A96C E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 363+ A96E 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat value
 364+ A96F 13                                   inc     de
 365+ A970 78                                   ld      a,b
 366+ A971 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 367+ A973 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat sign
 368+ A974 C9                                   ret

 396+ A9B8 00 00        TacticsVarResult        DW 0
 397+ A9BA CD 44 A9     XX12EquTacticsDotNosev: call    CopyRotNoseToTacticsMat
 398+ A9BD 21 98 A3     XX12EquTacticsDotHL:    ld      hl,TacticsRotMatX; UBnkTransmatNosevX    ; ROTMATX HI
 399+ A9C0 7E           .CalcXValue:            ld      a,(hl)                              ; DE = RotMatX & Vect X
 400+ A9C1 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; .
 401+ A9C2 3A B4 A3                             ld      a,(TacticsVectorX)                  ; .
 402+ A9C5 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; .
 403+ A9C6 ED 30                                mul                                         ; .
 404+ A9C8 7A                                   ld      a,d                                 ; S = A = Hi (RotMatX & Vect X)
 405+ A9C9 32 03 80                             ld      (varS),a                            ; .
 406+ A9CC 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 407+ A9CD 3A B6 A3     .CalcXSign:             ld      a,(TacticsVectorX+2)                ; B  = A = Sign VecX xor sign RotMatX
 408+ A9D0 AE                                   xor     (hl)                                ; .
 409+ A9D1 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; .
 410+ A9D2 23           .MoveToY:               inc     hl                                  ; Move on to Y component
 411+ A9D3 7E           .CalcYValue:            ld      a,(hl)                              ; D = 0, E = Hi (RotMatY & Vect Y)
 412+ A9D4 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; .
 413+ A9D5 3A B8 A3                             ld      a,(TacticsVectorY)                  ; .
 414+ A9D8 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; .
 415+ A9D9 ED 30                                mul     de                                  ; .
 416+ A9DB 5A                                   ld      e,d                                 ; .
 417+ A9DC 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; .
 418+ A9DE 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 419+ A9DF 3A BA A3     .CalcYSign:             ld      a,(TacticsVectorY+2)                ; c = sign of y_sign * sidev_y
 420+ A9E2 AE                                   xor     (hl)                                ;
 421+ A9E3 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ;
 422+ A9E4 23           .MoveToZ:               inc     hl                                  ; Move on to Z component
 423+ A9E5 E5           .AddXandY:              push    hl                                  ; but save HL as we need that
 424+ A9E6 3A 03 80                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; hl = Hi (RotMatX & Vect X) b= sign
 425+ A9E9 26 00                                ld      h,0                                 ; de = Hi (RotMatY & Vect Y) c= sign
 426+ A9EB 6F                                   ld      l,a                                 ;
 427+ A9EC CD 2F 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ; a(sign) hl = sum
 428+ A9EF 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; b = sign of result
 429+ A9F0 22 B8 A9                             ld      (TacticsVarResult),hl               ; save sub in TacticsVarResult
 430+ A9F3 E1           .CalcZValue:            pop     hl                                  ; get back to the rotation mat z
 431+ A9F4 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                              ; D = 0, E = Hi (RotMatZ & Vect Z)
 432+ A9F5 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; .
 433+ A9F6 3A BC A3                             ld      a,(TacticsVectorZ)                  ; .
 434+ A9F9 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; .
 435+ A9FA ED 30                                mul     de                                  ; .
 436+ A9FC 5A                                   ld      e,d                                 ; .
 437+ A9FD 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; .
 438+ A9FF 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 439+ AA00 3A BE A3     .CalcZSign:             ld      a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)
 440+ AA03 AE                                   xor     (hl)
 441+ AA04 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; Set C to the sign of z_sign * sidev_z
 442+ AA05 2A B8 A9                             ld      hl, (TacticsVarResult)              ; CHL = x + y, BDE = z products
 443+ AA08 CD 2F 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ; so AHL = X y z products
 444+ AA0B 32 03 80                             ld      (varS),a                            ; for backwards compatibility
 445+ AA0E 7D                                   ld      a,l                                  ; .
 446+ AA0F C9                                   ret

 460+ AA28              ; Copies 24 bit XYZ Vector to tactics vectors

 463+ AA2E                                      ;xor     $80
 464+ AA2E 22 B4 A3                             ld      (TacticsVectorX),hl

 466+ AA34

 471+ AA3D 32 BA A3                             ld      (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 472+ AA40

 475+ AA46                                      ;xor     $80
 476+ AA46 22 BC A3                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ),hl
 477+ AA49 32 BE A3                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ+2),a

 479+ AA4D
 480+ AA4D              SetPlayerAsTarget:      ZeroA
 480+ AA4D AF          >                        xor a
 481+ AA4E 21 A4 A3                             ld      hl,TacticsTargetX
 482+ AA51 06 09                                ld      b, 3*3
 483+ AA53 77           .ZeroLoop:              ld      (hl),a                              ; player is always at 0,0,0
 484+ AA54 23                                   inc     hl
 485+ AA55 10 FC                                djnz    .ZeroLoop
 486+ AA57 C9                                   ret

 488+ AA58 CD 4D AA     CalcVectorToMyShip:     call    SetPlayerAsTarget
 489+ AA5B CD 28 AA                             call    CopyPosToVector
 490+ AA5E                                      ;call    CopyToTargetVector
 491+ AA5E                                      ;FlipSignMem     TacticsTargetX+2

 495+ AA5F
 496+ AA5F ED 5B A4 A3  CalcTargetVector:       ld      de,(TacticsTargetX)                        ; get target ship X
 497+ AA63 3A A6 A3                             ld      a,(TacticsTargetX+2)                       ; and flip sign so we have missile - target
 498+ AA66                                      FlipSignBitA
 498+ AA66 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
 499+ AA68 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
 500+ AA69 2A 20 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)                        ; get missile x
 501+ AA6C 3A 22 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)                        ; get missile x sign
 502+ AA6F 47                                   ld      b,a
 503+ AA70 CD 2F 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 504+ AA73 22 B4 A3                             ld      (TacticsVectorX),hl
 505+ AA76 32 B6 A3                             ld      (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 506+ AA79 ED 5B A7 A3  .UpdateTargetingShipY:  ld      de,(TacticsTargetY)
 507+ AA7D 3A A9 A3                             ld      a,(TacticsTargetY+2)
 508+ AA80                                      FlipSignBitA
 508+ AA80 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
 509+ AA82 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
 510+ AA83 2A 23 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKylo)                        ; get missile x
 511+ AA86 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)                        ; get missile x sign
 512+ AA89 47                                   ld      b,a
 513+ AA8A CD 2F 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 514+ AA8D 22 B8 A3                             ld      (TacticsVectorY),hl
 515+ AA90 32 BA A3                             ld      (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 516+ AA93 ED 5B AA A3  .UpdateTargetingShipZ:  ld      de,(TacticsTargetZ)
 517+ AA97 3A AC A3                             ld      a,(TacticsTargetZ+2)
 518+ AA9A                                      FlipSignBitA
 518+ AA9A EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
 519+ AA9C 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
 520+ AA9D 2A 26 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                        ; get missile x
 521+ AAA0 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                        ; get missile x sign
 522+ AAA3 47                                   ld      b,a
 523+ AAA4 CD 2F 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 524+ AAA7 22 BC A3                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ),hl
 525+ AAAA 32 BE A3                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 526+ AAAD C9                                   ret
 527+ AAAE
 528+ AAAE              ;-- Now its scaled we can normalise
 529+ AAAE              ;-- Scale down so that h d &b are zero, then do once again so l e and c are 7 bit
 530+ AAAE              ;-- use 7 bit mul96 to ensure we don;t get odd maths
 531+ AAAE 2A B4 A3     NormalizeTactics:       ld      hl, (TacticsVectorX)        ; pull XX15 into registers
 532+ AAB1 ED 5B B8 A3                          ld      de, (TacticsVectorY)        ; .
 533+ AAB5 ED 4B BC A3                          ld      bc, (TacticsVectorZ)        ; .
 534+ AAB9 7C           .ScaleLoop:             ld      a,h
 535+ AABA B2                                   or      d
 536+ AABB B0                                   or      b
 537+ AABC 28 0F                                jr      z,.DoneScaling
 538+ AABE                                      ShiftHLRight1
 538+ AABE CB 3C       >			   srl h
 538+ AAC0 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 539+ AAC2                                      ShiftDERight1
 539+ AAC2 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 539+ AAC4 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 540+ AAC6                                      ShiftBCRight1
 540+ AAC6 CB 38       >			   srl b
 540+ AAC8 CB 19       >			   rr  c
 541+ AACA C3 B9 AA                             jp      .ScaleLoop
 542+ AACD              .DoneScaling:           ShiftHLRight1                       ; as the values now need to be sign magnitued
 542+ AACD CB 3C       >			   srl h
 542+ AACF CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 543+ AAD1                                      ShiftDERight1                       ; e.g. S + 7 bit we need an extra shift
 543+ AAD1 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 543+ AAD3 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 544+ AAD5                                      ShiftBCRight1                       ; now values are in L E C
 544+ AAD5 CB 38       >			   srl b
 544+ AAD7 CB 19       >			   rr  c
 545+ AAD9 E5 D5 C5                             push    hl,,de,,bc                  ; save vecrtor x y and z nwo they are scaled to 1 byte
 546+ AADC 53                                   ld      d,e                         ; hl = y(e) ^ 2
 547+ AADD ED 30                                mul     de                          ; .
 548+ AADF EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; .
 549+ AAE0 53                                   ld      d,e                         ; de = x(l) ^ 2
 550+ AAE1 ED 30                                mul     de                          ; .
 551+ AAE3 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + de
 552+ AAE4 51                                   ld      d,c                         ; de = y(c)^ 2 + x ^ 2
 553+ AAE5 59                                   ld      e,c                         ; .
 554+ AAE6 ED 30                                mul     de                          ; .
 555+ AAE8 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; hl =  y^ 2 + x ^ 2 + z ^ 2
 556+ AAE9 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; fix as hl was holding square
 557+ AAEA CD E6 92                             call    asm_sqrt                    ; IYH = A = hl = sqrt (de) = sqrt (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2 + z ^ 2)
 558+ AAED                                      ; add in logic if h is low then use lower bytes for all
 559+ AAED 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ;
 560+ AAEE FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                       ;
 561+ AAF0 57                                   ld      d,a                         ; D = sqrt
 562+ AAF1 C1                                   pop     bc                          ; retrive tacticsvectorz scaled
 563+ AAF2 79                                   ld      a,c                         ; a = scaled byte
 564+ AAF3 CD E0 9B                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96Unsg          ; This rountine I think is wrong and retuins bad values
 565+ AAF6 32 BC A3                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ),a          ; z = normalised z
 566+ AAF9 D1                                   pop     de
 567+ AAFA 7B                                   ld      a,e
 568+ AAFB FD 54                                ld      d,iyh
 569+ AAFD CD E0 9B                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96Unsg
 570+ AB00 32 B8 A3                             ld      (TacticsVectorY),a
 571+ AB03 E1                                   pop     hl
 572+ AB04 7D                                   ld      a,l
 573+ AB05 FD 54                                ld      d,iyh
 574+ AB07 CD E0 9B                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96Unsg
 575+ AB0A 32 B4 A3                             ld      (TacticsVectorX),a
 576+ AB0D                                      ; BODGE FOR NOW
 577+ AB0D                                     ; BODGE FOR NOW
 578+ AB0D                                      ZeroA                              ;; added to help debugging
 578+ AB0D AF          >                        xor a
 579+ AB0E 32 B5 A3                             ld      (TacticsVectorX+1),a       ;; added to help debugging
 580+ AB11 32 B9 A3                             ld      (TacticsVectorY+1),a       ;; added to help debugging
 581+ AB14 32 BD A3                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ+1),a       ;; added to help debugging
 582+ AB17                                      SignBitOnlyMem TacticsVectorX+2     ; now upper byte is sign only
 582+ AB17 3A B6 A3    >                        ld      a, (TacticsVectorX+2)
 582+ AB1A E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 582+ AB1C 32 B6 A3    >                        ld      (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 583+ AB1F                                      SignBitOnlyMem TacticsVectorY+2     ; (could move it to lower perhaps later if
 583+ AB1F 3A BA A3    >                        ld      a, (TacticsVectorY+2)
 583+ AB22 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 583+ AB24 32 BA A3    >                        ld      (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 584+ AB27                                      SignBitOnlyMem TacticsVectorZ+2     ;  its worth it)
 584+ AB27 3A BE A3    >                        ld      a, (TacticsVectorZ+2)
 584+ AB2A E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 584+ AB2C 32 BE A3    >                        ld      (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 585+ AB2F C9                                   ret

 791+ AB30
 792+ AB30 2A B4 A3     ReduceTacticVectors:ld      hl, (TacticsVectorX)        ; pull XX15 into registers
 793+ AB33 ED 5B B8 A3                      ld      de, (TacticsVectorY)        ; .
 794+ AB37 ED 4B BC A3                      ld      bc, (TacticsVectorZ)        ; .
 795+ AB3B 3A B6 A3                         ld      a,(TacticsVectorX+2)        ; .
 796+ AB3E FD 67                            ld      iyh,a                       ; iyh = X sign
 797+ AB40 3A BA A3                         ld      a,(TacticsVectorY+2)        ; .
 798+ AB43 FD 6F                            ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = Y sign
 799+ AB45 3A BE A3                         ld      a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)        ; .
 800+ AB48 DD 67                            ld      ixh,a                       ; ixh = z sign
 801+ AB4A FD B4        .ScaleLoop:         or      iyh                         ; now check if upper has value
 802+ AB4C FD B5                            or      iyl                         ; .
 803+ AB4E                                  ClearSignBitA                       ;  exluding sign bit
 803+ AB4E E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
 804+ AB50 28 21                            jr      z,.DoneScaling              ; and exit loop if upper byte is only sign component
 805+ AB52 FD 7C        .ScaledDownBy2:     ld      a,iyh
 806+ AB54 CB 2F                            sra     a
 807+ AB56 FD 67                            ld      iyh,a                       ; actually we can keep sign bit so just sr then rr
 808+ AB58 CB 1C                            rr      h                           ; Deal with X
 809+ AB5A CB 1D                            rr      l                           ;
 810+ AB5C FD 7D                            ld      a,iyl
 811+ AB5E CB 2F                            sra     a                           ; actually we can keep sign bit so just sr then rr
 812+ AB60 FD 6F                            ld      iyl,a
 813+ AB62 CB 1A                            rr      d                           ; Deal with Y
 814+ AB64 CB 1B                            rr      e                           ;
 815+ AB66 DD 7D                            ld      a, ixl                      ; actually we can keep sign bit so just sr then rr
 816+ AB68 CB 2F                            sra     a
 817+ AB6A DD 6F                            ld      ixl,a
 818+ AB6C CB 18                            rr      b                           ; Deal with Z
 819+ AB6E CB 19                            rr      c                           ;
 820+ AB70 C3 4A AB                         jp      .ScaleLoop
 821+ AB73 7C           .DoneScaling:       ld      a,h
 822+ AB74 B2                               or      d
 823+ AB75 B0                               or      b
 824+ AB76                                  SignBitOnlyA                        ; check if new sign bit has a value rotated in,
 824+ AB76 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 825+ AB78 28 0C                            jr      z,.OKToNormalise
 826+ AB7A              .ShiftTo15Bit:      ShiftHLRight1                       ; one last shift to 15 bit we don't need
 826+ AB7A CB 3C       >			   srl h
 826+ AB7C CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 827+ AB7E                                  ShiftDERight1                       ; to do sign bytes
 827+ AB7E CB 3A       >			   srl d
 827+ AB80 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 828+ AB82                                  ShiftBCRight1                       ; as value must be 0
 828+ AB82 CB 38       >			   srl b
 828+ AB84 CB 19       >			   rr  c
 829+ AB86 7C           .OKToNormalise:     ld      a,h                         ; iyh now can only hold sign
 830+ AB87 FD B4                            or      iyh                         ; so by the end of here
 831+ AB89 67                               ld      h,a                         ;   hl = x
 832+ AB8A 7A                               ld      a,d                         ;   de = y
 833+ AB8B FD B5                            or      iyl                         ;   bc = z
 834+ AB8D 57                               ld      d,a                         ; all scaled to 15 bit + sign
 835+ AB8E 78                               ld      a,b                         ;
 836+ AB8F DD B4                            or      ixh                         ;
 837+ AB91 47                               ld      b,a                         ;
 838+ AB92 22 C4 A3                         ld      (TacticsNormX),hl
 839+ AB95 22 C8 A3                         ld      (TacticsNormY),hl
 840+ AB98 22 CC A3                         ld      (TacticsNormZ),hl
 841+ AB9B C9                               ret
 842+ AB9C                                 ; ***SIgn bits*** need to be in byte 3
 843+ AB9C

  21+ AB9C              ; Success 1 = default drive, carry reset
  22+ AB9C              ; Failure HL = -1 , carry set, errno set
  23+ AB9C F5 C5 D5 E5  GetDefaultDrive:        push	af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix
  23+ ABA0 DD E5
  24+ ABA2 AF                                   xor	    a	; a = 0 means get default drive into A
  25+ ABA3 CF                                   rst	    $08
  26+ ABA4 89                                   db	    M_GETSETDRV
  27+ ABA5 32 3A AC                             ld	    (DefaultDrive),a
  28+ ABA8 DD E1 E1 D1                          pop		af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix
  28+ ABAC C1 F1
  29+ ABAE C9                                   ret

 191+ ABBD              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 192+ ABBD              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
 193+ ABBD              ;	In:		ix  = address to read into
 194+ ABBD              ;			bc  = amount to read
 195+ ABBD              ;	ret:		carry set = error
 196+ ABBD              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 197+ ABBD B7           fRead:                  or   	a             ; is it zero?
 198+ ABBE C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
 199+ ABBF E5                                   push    hl
 200+ ABC0 DD E5 E1                             ld      hl,ix    	 ; load ix into hl and save hl for later
 201+ ABC3 CF                                   rst	    $08
 202+ ABC4 9D                                   db	    F_READ
 203+ ABC5 E1                                   pop	    hl
 204+ ABC6 C9                                   ret
 205+ ABC7
 206+ ABC7              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 207+ ABC7              ;	Function	Write bytes to the open file
 208+ ABC7              ;	In:		ix  = address to read from
 209+ ABC7              ;			bc  = amount to write
 210+ ABC7              ;	ret:		carry set = error
 211+ ABC7              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 212+ ABC7 B7           fWrite:                 or   	a             ; is it zero?
 213+ ABC8 C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
 214+ ABC9 E5                                   push	hl
 215+ ABCA DD E5 E1                             ld      hl,ix
 216+ ABCD CF                                   rst	    $08
 217+ ABCE 9E                                   db	    F_WRITE
 218+ ABCF E1                                   pop	    hl
 219+ ABD0 C9                                   ret
 220+ ABD1
 221+ ABD1              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 222+ ABD1              ;	Function:	Close open file
 223+ ABD1              ;	In:		a  = handle
 224+ ABD1              ;	ret		a  = handle, 0 on error
 225+ ABD1              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 226+ ABD1 B7           fClose:		            or   	a             ; is it zero?
 227+ ABD2 C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
 228+ ABD3 CF                                   rst	    $08
 229+ ABD4 9B                                   db	    F_CLOSE
 230+ ABD5 C9                                   ret
 231+ ABD6
 232+ ABD6              ;fSeekHome:              push    bc,,de,,hl,,ix
 233+ ABD6              ;                        ld      bc,0
 234+ ABD6              ;                        ld      de,0
 235+ ABD6              ;                        ld      l,0
 236+ ABD6              ;                        call    fSeek
 237+ ABD6              ;                        pop     bc,,de,,hl,,ix
 238+ ABD6              ;                        ret
 239+ ABD6              ;
 240+ ABD6              ;fSeekForward256:        push    bc,,de,,hl,,ix
 241+ ABD6              ;                        ld      bc,0
 242+ ABD6              ;                        ld      de,256
 243+ ABD6              ;                        ld      l,1
 244+ ABD6              ;                        call    fSeek
 245+ ABD6              ;                        pop     bc,,de,,hl,,ix
 246+ ABD6              ;                        ret
 247+ ABD6
 248+ ABD6              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 249+ ABD6              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
 250+ ABD6              ;	In:		a   = file handle
 251+ ABD6              ;			L   = Seek mode (0=start, 1=rel, 2=-rel)
 252+ ABD6              ;			BCDE = bytes to seek
 253+ ABD6              ;	ret:		BCDE = file pos from start
 254+ ABD6              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 255+ ABD6 DD E5 E5     fSeek:                  push	ix,,hl
 256+ ABD9 CF                                   rst	    $08
 257+ ABDA 9F                                   db	    F_SEEK
 258+ ABDB E1 DD E1                             pop	    ix,,hl
 259+ ABDE C9                                   ret
 260+ ABDF
 261+ ABDF              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 262+ ABDF              ; Init the file system
 263+ ABDF              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 264+ ABDF CD 9C AB     InitFileSystem:         call    GetDefaultDrive
 265+ ABE2 C9                                   ret
 266+ ABE3
 267+ ABE3              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 268+ ABE3              ; Function:	Load a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
 269+ ABE3              ; In:		hl = file data pointer
 270+ ABE3              ;		    ix = address to load to
 271+ ABE3              ;           bc = filelength
 272+ ABE3              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 273+ ABE3 CD 9C AB     FileLoad:	            call    GetDefaultDrive
 274+ ABE6 C5 D5 F5                             push	bc,,de,,af
 275+ ABE9                                      ; get file size
 276+ ABE9 C5 DD E5                             push	bc,,ix			; store size, load address,
 277+ ABEC E5 DD E1                             ld      ix,hl
 278+ ABEF 06 01                                ld      b,FA_READ		; mode open for reading
 279+ ABF1 CD AF AB                             call    fOpen
 280+ ABF4 38 17                                jr	    c,.error_opening; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 281+ ABF6 FE 00                                cp	    0				; was file handle 0?
 282+ ABF8 28 13                                jr	    z,.error_opening; of so there was an error opening.
 283+ ABFA DD E1 C1                             pop     bc,,ix          ; get load address back and size back
 284+ ABFD F5                                   push	af				; remember handle
 285+ ABFE CD BD AB                             call	fRead			; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 286+ AC01 38 0C                                jr	    c,.error_reading
 287+ AC03 F1                                   pop	    af			    ; get handle back
 288+ AC04 CD D1 AB                             call	fClose			; close file
 289+ AC07 38 07                                jr	    c,.error_closing
 290+ AC09 F1 D1 C1                             pop     bc,,de,,af      ; normal exit
 291+ AC0C C9                                   ret
 292+ AC0D              ;
 293+ AC0D              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it
 294+ AC0D              ;
 295+ AC0D DD E1        .error_opening:         pop	ix
 296+ AC0F C1           .error_reading:		    pop	bc	; don't pop a, need error code
 297+ AC10
 298+ AC10              .error_closing:
 299+ AC10 C1           .NormalError:  	        pop	bc	; don't pop into A, return with error code
 300+ AC11 D1                                   pop	de
 301+ AC12 C1                                   pop	bc
 302+ AC13 C9                                   ret
 303+ AC14
 304+ AC14              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 305+ AC14              ; Function:	Save a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
 306+ AC14              ; In:		hl = file name
 307+ AC14              ;		    ix = address to save from
 308+ AC14              ;		    bc = size
 309+ AC14              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 310+ AC14 CD 9C AB     FileSave:	            call    GetDefaultDrive		; need to do this each time?!?!?
 311+ AC17 C5 DD E5                             push	bc,,ix   			; store size& save address
 312+ AC1A E5 DD E1                             ld      ix,hl               ; get name into ix
 313+ AC1D 06 0C                                ld      b,FA_OVERWRITE		; mode open for writing
 314+ AC1F CD AF AB                             call    fOpen
 315+ AC22 38 12                                jr	    c,.error_opening	; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 316+ AC24 FE 00                                cp	    0			        ; was file handle 0?
 317+ AC26 28 0E                                jr	    z,.error_opening	; of so there was an error opening.
 318+ AC28 DD E1 C1                             pop	    bc,,ix			    ; get lenght and save address back
 319+ AC2B F5                                   push	af			        ; remember handle
 320+ AC2C CD C7 AB                             call	fWrite			    ; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 321+ AC2F 38 04                                jr	c,.error
 322+ AC31 F1                                   pop	af			            ; get handle back
 323+ AC32 CD D1 AB                             call	fClose			    ; close file
 324+ AC35 C9           .error:                 ret
 325+ AC36              ;
 326+ AC36              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it
 327+ AC36              ;
 328+ AC36 DD E1 C1     .error_opening:         pop	bc,,ix                  ; don't pop a, need error code
 329+ AC39 C9                                   ret
 330+ AC3A
 331+ AC3A 00           DefaultDrive:	        DB	0
 332+ AC3B 00           FileHandle:             DB  0
 333+ AC3C 00           CardFlags               DB  0
 334+ AC3D 00 00        TargetSize              DW  0
 335+ AC3F 00 00        FileStreamPort          DW  0
 336+ AC41 00 00 00...  FileBuffer              DS  512                     ; block of data
 337+ AE41 00           FilereadsPerformed      DB  0
 338+ AE42 00 00        FilemapBlockCount       DW  0
 339+ AE44 00 00        FilemapBufferPointer    DW  0
 340+ AE46 00 00        FilemapBufferLast       DW  0
 341+ AE48 00 00 00...  FilemapBuffer           DS  FILEMAP_BLOCK_SIZE * FILEMAP_SIZE        ; expecting 60 to be overkill as most should be 1
 342+ AF08
# file closed: ./Hardware/drive_access.asm

 724  B109              SoundInterrupt      EQU IM2Sound

 726  B109              AttractInterrrupt   EQU IM2AttractMode

 729  B109              StartOfInterruptHandler:
 730  B109                  DISPLAY "Non Banked Code Ends At", StartOfInterruptHandler
 731  B109
 732  B109                              ; NOTE play then equeue simplifies ligic, more chance slot free
 733  B109                              org $B1B1
 734  B1B1                  DISPLAY "Interrupt Handler Starts at",$
 735  B1B1              ; keeping the handler to a minimal size in order to make best use of
 736  B1B1              ; non pageable memory
 737  B1B1              IM2Routine:             IFDEF INTERRUPT_BLOCKER
 738  B1B1 ~                                            DISPLAY "Interrupt Blocker Enabled"
 739  B1B1 ~                                            ei
 740  B1B1 ~                                            reti
 741  B1B1                                      ELSE
 742  B1B1                                              DISPLAY "Interrupt Blocker Disabled"
 743  B1B1                                      ENDIF
 744  B1B1 F5 C5 D5 E5                          push    af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix,,iy
 744  B1B5 DD E5 FD E5
 745  B1B9 08                                   ex      af,af'
 746  B1BA D9                                   exx
 747  B1BB F5 C5 D5 E5                          push    af,,bc,,de,,hl
 748  B1BF 21 FF 7F                             ld      hl,InterruptCounter
 749  B1C2 34                                   inc     (hl)                        ; cycles each interrupt
 750  B1C3                                      ;break
 751  B1C3 CD D7 B1     IM2SoundHandler:        call    IM2Sound                    ; This is a self modifying code address to change the actual sound vector if we are doing special music e.g. intro or docking
 752  B1C6 E1 D1 C1 F1                          pop    af,,bc,,de,,hl
 753  B1CA 08                                   ex      af,af'
 754  B1CB D9                                   exx
 755  B1CC FD E1 DD E1                          pop     af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix,,iy
 755  B1D0 E1 D1 C1 F1
 756  B1D4 FB           .IMFinishup:            ei
 757  B1D5 ED 4D                                reti
 758  B1D7                  DISPLAY "Interrupt Handler Ends at",$
 759  B1D7              EndOfNonBanked:
 760  B1D7                  DISPLAY "Non Banked Code + Interrupt Handler Ends At", EndOfNonBanked
 761  B1D7
 762  B1D7
 763  B1D7              SaveMMU6:               MACRO
 764  B1D7 ~                                    GetNextReg  MMU_SLOT_6_REGISTER
 765  B1D7 ~                                    ld      (SavedMMU6),a
 766  B1D7                                      ENDM
 767  B1D7
 768  B1D7              RestoreMMU6:            MACRO
 769  B1D7 ~                                    ld      a,(SavedMMU6)               ; now restore up post interrupt
 770  B1D7 ~                                    nextreg MMU_SLOT_6_REGISTER,a       ; Restore MMU7
 771  B1D7                                      ENDM
 772  B1D7
 773  B1D7              SaveMMU7:               MACRO
 774  B1D7 ~                                    GetNextReg  MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
 775  B1D7 ~                                    ld      (SavedMMU7),a
 776  B1D7                                      ENDM
 777  B1D7
 778  B1D7              RestoreMMU7:            MACRO
 779  B1D7 ~                                    ld      a,(SavedMMU7)               ; now restore up post interrupt
 780  B1D7 ~                                    nextreg MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER,a       ; Restore MMU7
 781  B1D7                                      ENDM
 782  B1D7
 783  B1D7              IM2Sound:               SaveMMU7
 783  B1D7             >                        GetNextReg  MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
 783  B1D7 01 3B 24    >            ld bc,$243B
 783  B1DA 3E 57       >            ld a,MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
 783  B1DC ED 79       >            out (c),a
 783  B1DE 04          >            inc b
 783  B1DF ED 78       >            in a,(c)
 783  B1E1 32 08 B1    >                        ld      (SavedMMU7),a
 784  B1E4                                      MMUSelectSound
 784  B1E4 ED 91 57 64 >                     nextreg SoundMMU,		    BankSound
 785  B1E8                                      ; This is a self modifying code address to change the
 786  B1E8                                      ; actual sound vector if we are doing special music
 787  B1E8                                      ; e.g. intro or docking
 788  B1E8 CD 00 E0     .IM2SoundHandler:       call    SoundInterruptHandler       ; this does the work
 789  B1EB              .DoneInterrupt:         RestoreMMU7
 789  B1EB 3A 08 B1    >                        ld      a,(SavedMMU7)               ; now restore up post interrupt
 789  B1EE ED 92 57    >                        nextreg MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER,a       ; Restore MMU7
 790  B1F1 C9                                   ret
 791  B1F2
 792  B1F2
 793  B1F2              IM2PlayDanube:          SaveMMU7
 793  B1F2             >                        GetNextReg  MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
 793  B1F2 01 3B 24    >            ld bc,$243B
 793  B1F5 3E 57       >            ld a,MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
 793  B1F7 ED 79       >            out (c),a
 793  B1F9 04          >            inc b
 793  B1FA ED 78       >            in a,(c)
 793  B1FC 32 08 B1    >                        ld      (SavedMMU7),a
 794  B1FF                                      MMUSelectSound
 794  B1FF ED 91 57 64 >                     nextreg SoundMMU,		    BankSound
 795  B203                                      ; This is a self modifying code address to change the
 796  B203                                      ; actual sound vector if we are doing special music
 797  B203                                      ; e.g. intro or docking
 798  B203 CD 1B E4     .IM2SoundHandler:       call    PlayDanube                  ; this does the work
 799  B206              .DoneInterrupt:         RestoreMMU7
 799  B206 3A 08 B1    >                        ld      a,(SavedMMU7)               ; now restore up post interrupt
 799  B209 ED 92 57    >                        nextreg MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER,a       ; Restore MMU7
 800  B20C C9                                   ret
 801  B20D
 802  B20D              IM2AttractMode:         ;break
 803  B20D                                  IFDEF SKIPATTRACTMUSIC
 804  B20D ~                                    DISPLAY "Attract mode Music disabled"
 805  B20D                                  ELSE
 806  B20D                                      DISPLAY "Attract mode Music enabled"
 807  B20D CD F2 B1                             call    IM2PlayDanube
 808  B210                                  ENDIF
 809  B210                                  IFDEF SKIPATTRACTGRAPHICS
 810  B210 ~                                    DISPLAY "Attract mode graphics disabled"
 811  B210                                  ELSE
 812  B210                                      DISPLAY "Attract mode graphics enabled"
 813  B210                                      SaveMMU6
 813  B210             >                        GetNextReg  MMU_SLOT_6_REGISTER
 813  B210 01 3B 24    >            ld bc,$243B
 813  B213 3E 56       >            ld a,MMU_SLOT_6_REGISTER
 813  B215 ED 79       >            out (c),a
 813  B217 04          >            inc b
 813  B218 ED 78       >            in a,(c)
 813  B21A 32 07 B1    >                        ld      (SavedMMU6),a
 814  B21D                                      SaveMMU7
 814  B21D             >                        GetNextReg  MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
 814  B21D 01 3B 24    >            ld bc,$243B
 814  B220 3E 57       >            ld a,MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
 814  B222 ED 79       >            out (c),a
 814  B224 04          >            inc b
 814  B225 ED 78       >            in a,(c)
 814  B227 32 08 B1    >                        ld      (SavedMMU7),a
 815  B22A                                      ;break
 816  B22A CD 74 79                             call    AttractModeUpdate
 817  B22D                                      RestoreMMU6
 817  B22D 3A 07 B1    >                        ld      a,(SavedMMU6)               ; now restore up post interrupt
 817  B230 ED 92 56    >                        nextreg MMU_SLOT_6_REGISTER,a       ; Restore MMU7
 818  B233                                      RestoreMMU7
 818  B233 3A 08 B1    >                        ld      a,(SavedMMU7)               ; now restore up post interrupt
 818  B236 ED 92 57    >                        nextreg MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER,a       ; Restore MMU7
 819  B239                                  ENDIF
 820  B239 C9                                   ret

 823  B23A              ;INCLUDE "./title_page.asm"

  33+ C0C2              SRM_print_boiler_text:  INCLUDE "Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C0C2
   2++C0C2              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C0C2 C5           .BoilerTextLoop:        push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   4++C0C3 4E                                   ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   5++C0C4 23                                   inc			hl
   6++C0C5 46                                   ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   7++C0C6 23                                   inc			hl
   8++C0C7 5E                                   ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
   9++C0C8 23                                   inc			hl
  10++C0C9 56                                   ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  11++C0CA 23                                   inc			hl
  12++C0CB E5                                   push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  13++C0CC EB                                   ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  14++C0CD 1E FF                                ld			e,txt_status_colour
  15++C0CF C5                                   push		bc
  16++C0D0 D1                                   pop			de
  17++C0D1                                      MMUSelectLayer1
  17++C0D1 ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  18++C0D5 CD D7 E0                             call		l1_print_at
  19++C0D8 E1                                   pop			hl
  20++C0D9 C1                                   pop			bc
  21++C0DA 10 E6                                djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  22++C0DC C9                                   ret
  23++C0DD
# file closed: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm

  71+ C130              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  72+ C130              SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair:
  73+ C130 ED 4B A5 80                          ld		bc,(TargetSystemX)              ; bc = selected jump
  74+ C134 ED 5B A3 80                          ld		de,(PresentSystemX)
  75+ C138 79                                   ld		a,c                             ; a = target x pos
  76+ C139 93                                   sub		e                               ; a = target x - present x
  77+ C13A F2 4B C1                             jp      p,.NoFlipX                      ; if > 0 skip next bit
  78+ C13D ED 44                                neg                                     ; c = a = abs a * 4
  79+ C13F CB 27                                sla		a                               ; .
  80+ C141 CB 27                                sla		a                               ; .
  81+ C143 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ;  .
  82+ C144 3E 80                                ld      a,src_x_centre                  ; c = a = centre screen - c
  83+ C146 91                                   sub     c                               ; .
  84+ C147 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ; .
  85+ C148 C3 52 C1                             jp      .fixY                           ;. now do Y
  86+ C14B CB 27        .NoFlipX:               sla		a
  87+ C14D CB 27                                sla		a
  88+ C14F C6 80                                add		a,src_x_centre
  89+ C151 4F                                   ld      c,a
  90+ C152 78           .fixY:                  ld		a,b                             ; for Y its * 2
  91+ C153 92                                   sub		d
  92+ C154 F2 63 C1                             jp      p,.NoFlipY
  93+ C157 ED 44                                neg
  94+ C159 CB 27                                sla     a
  95+ C15B 47                                   ld      b,a
  96+ C15C 3E 60                                ld      a,src_y_centre
  97+ C15E 90                                   sub     b
  98+ C15F 47                                   ld      b,a
  99+ C160 C3 68 C1                             jp      .RedrawSprite
 100+ C163 CB 27        .NoFlipY                sla		a
