 231+ C632 AF                                   xor     a
 232+ C633 CD 9C 7E                             call    memfill_dma
 233+ C636 C9                                   ret
 234+ C637              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 235+ C637 21 20 C0     ResetUbnkPosition:      ld      hl,UBnKxlo
 236+ C63A 06 09                                ld      b, 3*3
 237+ C63C AF                                   xor     a
 238+ C63D 77           .zeroLoop:              ld      (hl),a
 239+ C63E 23                                   inc     hl
 240+ C63F 10 FC                                djnz    .zeroLoop
 241+ C641 C9                                   ret
 242+ C642
 243+ C642 3E 80        FireECM:                ld      a,ECMCounterMax                 ; set ECM time
 244+ C644 32 59 C0                             ld      (UBnKECMCountDown),a            ;
 245+ C647 3A 16 7F                             ld      a,(ECMCountDown)
 246+ C64A                                      ReturnIfALTNusng ECMCounterMax
 246+ C64A FE 80       >                        cp    ECMCounterMax
 246+ C64C D8          >                        ret	 c
 247+ C64D 3E 80                                ld      a,ECMCounterMax
 248+ C64F 32 16 7F                             ld      (ECMCountDown),a
 249+ C652 C9                                   ret
 250+ C653
 251+ C653 3A 58 C0     RechargeEnergy:         ld      a,(UBnKEnergy)
 252+ C656                                      ReturnIfAGTEMemusng EnergyAddr
 252+ C656 21 05 C4    >                        ld      hl,EnergyAddr
 252+ C659 BE          >                        cp      (hl)
 252+ C65A D0          >                        ret	    nc
 253+ C65B 3C                                   inc     a
 254+ C65C 32 58 C0                             ld      (UBnKEnergy),a
 255+ C65F C9                                   ret
 256+ C660              ; A ship normally needs enough energy to fire ECM but if its shot then
 257+ C660              ; it may be too low, in which case the ECM does a saftey shutdown and returns 1 energy
 258+ C660              ; plus a 50% chance it will blow the ECM up
 259+ C660 3A 59 C0     UpdateECM:              ld      a,(UBnKECMCountDown)
 260+ C663                                      ReturnIfAIsZero
 260+ C663 A7          >                        and     a
 260+ C664 C8          >                        ret     z
 261+ C665 3D                                   dec     a
 262+ C666 32 59 C0                             ld      (UBnKECMCountDown),a
 263+ C669 21 58 C0                             ld      hl,UBnKEnergy
 264+ C66C 35                                   dec     (hl)
 265+ C66D F0                                   ret     p
 266+ C66E CD 61 C7     .ExhaustedEnergy:       call    UnivExplodeShip                 ; if it ran out of energy it was as it was also shot or collided as it checks in advance. Main ECM loop will continue as a compromise as multiple ships can fire ECM simultaneously
 267+ C671 C9                                   ret
 268+ C672
 269+ C672              ;-- This takes an Axis and subtracts 1, handles leading sign and boundary of 0 going negative
 270+ C672              JumpOffSet:             MACRO   Axis
 271+ C672 ~                                    ld      hl,(Axis)
 272+ C672 ~                                    ld      a,h
 273+ C672 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
 274+ C672 ~                                    jr      nz,.NegativeAxis
 275+ C672 ~            .PositiveAxis:          dec     l
 276+ C672 ~                                    jp      m,.MovingNegative
 277+ C672 ~                                    jp      .Done
 278+ C672 ~            .NegativeAxis:          inc     l                               ; negative means increment the z
 279+ C672 ~                                    jp      .Done
 280+ C672 ~            .MovingNegative:        ld      hl,$8001                        ; -1
 281+ C672 ~            .Done                   ld      (Axis),hl
 282+ C672                                      ENDM
 283+ C672
 284+ C672
 285+ C672              WarpOffset:             JumpOffSet  UBnKzhi                     ; we will simplify on just moving Z
 285+ C672 2A 27 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKzhi)
 285+ C675 7C          >                        ld      a,h
 285+ C676 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 285+ C678 20 07       >                        jr      nz,.NegativeAxis
 285+ C67A 2D          >.PositiveAxis:          dec     l
 285+ C67B FA 85 C6    >                        jp      m,.MovingNegative
 285+ C67E C3 88 C6    >                        jp      .Done
 285+ C681 2C          >.NegativeAxis:          inc     l                               ; negative means increment the z
 285+ C682 C3 88 C6    >                        jp      .Done
 285+ C685 21 01 80    >.MovingNegative:        ld      hl,$8001                        ; -1
 285+ C688 22 27 C0    >.Done                   ld      (UBnKzhi),hl
 286+ C68B C9                                   ret
 287+ C68C
 288+ C68C 44           WarpUnivByHL:           ld      b,h
 289+ C68D 4D                                   ld      c,l
 290+ C68E 26 00                                ld      h,0
 291+ C690 ED 5B 27 C0                          ld      de,(UBnKzhi)
 292+ C694 3A 26 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzlo)
 293+ C697 6F                                   ld      l,a
 294+ C698                                      MMUSelectMathsBankedFns
 294+ C698 ED 91 50 66 >                     nextreg MathsBankedFnsMMU, BankMathsBankedFns
 294+ C69C CD 0C 01       call  SubBCHfromDELsigned
 295+ C69F ED 53 27 C0                          ld      (UBnKzhi),de
 296+ C6A3 7D                                   ld      a,l
 297+ C6A4 32 26 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),a
 298+ C6A7 C9                                   ret
 299+ C6A8
 300+ C6A8              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 301+ C6A8              ; update ship speed and pitch based on adjustments from AI Tactics
 302+ C6A8 3A 47 C0     UpdateSpeedAndPitch:    ld      a,(UBnKAccel)                   ; only apply non zero accelleration
 303+ C6AB                                      JumpIfAIsZero .SkipAccelleration
 303+ C6AB A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 303+ C6AC CA CA C6    >                        jp	    z, .SkipAccelleration
 304+ C6AF 47                                   ld      b,a                             ; b = accelleration in 2's c
 305+ C6B0 3A 46 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKSpeed)                   ; a = speed + accelleration
 306+ C6B3                                      ClearCarryFlag
 306+ C6B3 B7          >                        or a
 307+ C6B4 88                                   adc     a,b
 308+ C6B5                                      JumpIfPositive  .DoneAccelleration      ; if speed < 0
 308+ C6B5 F2 B9 C6    >                        jp		p, .DoneAccelleration
 309+ C6B8              .SpeedNegative:         ZeroA                                   ;    then speed = 0
 309+ C6B8 AF          >                        xor a
 310+ C6B9 47           .DoneAccelleration:     ld      b,a                             ; if speed > speed limit
 311+ C6BA 3A 06 C4                             ld      a,(SpeedAddr)                   ;    speed = limit
 312+ C6BD                                      JumpIfAGTENusng b, .SpeedInLimits       ; .
 312+ C6BD B8          >                        cp     b
 312+ C6BE D2 C2 C6    >                        jp		nc,.SpeedInLimits
 313+ C6C1 47                                   ld      b,a                             ; .
 314+ C6C2 78           .SpeedInLimits:         ld      a,b                             ; .
 315+ C6C3 32 46 C0                             ld      (UBnKSpeed),a                   ; .
 316+ C6C6                                      ZeroA                                   ; acclleration = 0
 316+ C6C6 AF          >                        xor a
 317+ C6C7 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a                   ; for next AI update
 318+ C6CA              .SkipAccelleration:     ; handle roll and pitch rates
 319+ C6CA C9                                   ret
 320+ C6CB
 321+ C6CB 21 89 A6     UnivSetEnemyMissile:    ld      hl,NewLaunchUBnKX               ; Copy launch ship matrix
 322+ C6CE 11 20 C0                             ld      de,UBnKxlo                      ;
 323+ C6D1 01 1B 00                             ld      bc,NewLaunchDataBlockSize       ; positon + 3 rows of 3 bytes
 324+ C6D4 ED B0                                ldir                                    ;
 325+ C6D6 3E 03        .SetUpSpeed:            ld      a,3                             ; set accelleration
 326+ C6D8 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a                   ;
 327+ C6DB                                      ZeroA
 327+ C6DB AF          >                        xor a
 328+ C6DC 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 329+ C6DF 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 330+ C6E2 3E 03                                ld      a,3                             ; these are max roll and pitch rates for later
 331+ C6E4 32 4A C0                             ld      (UBnKRAT),a
 332+ C6E7 3C                                   inc     a
 333+ C6E8 32 4B C0                             ld      (UBnKRAT2),a
 334+ C6EB 3E 16                                ld      a,22
 335+ C6ED 32 4D C0                             ld      (UBnKCNT2),a
 336+ C6F0                                      MaxUnivSpeed                            ; and immediatley full speed (for now at least) TODO
 336+ C6F0 3E 1F       >                        ld      a,31
 336+ C6F2 32 46 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKSpeed),a
 337+ C6F5                                      SetMemFalse UBnKMissleHitToProcess
 337+ C6F5 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 337+ C6F7 32 44 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKMissleHitToProcess),a
 338+ C6FA 3E 80                                ld      a,ShipAIEnabled
 339+ C6FC 32 54 C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a
 340+ C6FF CD 1A C6                             call    SetShipHostile
 341+ C702 3E 96        .SetupPayload:          ld      a,150
 342+ C704 32 3C C0                             ld      (UBnKMissileBlastDamage),a
 343+ C707 32 3E C0                             ld      (UBnKMissileDetonateDamage),a
 344+ C70A 3E 05                                ld      a,5
 345+ C70C 32 3B C0                             ld      (UBnKMissileBlastRange),a
 346+ C70F 32 3D C0                             ld      (UBnKMissileDetonateRange),a
 347+ C712 C9                                   ret
 348+ C713              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 349+ C713              ; This sets the position of the current ship if its a player launched missile
 350+ C713 CD 13 CA     UnivSetPlayerMissile:   call    InitialisePlayerMissileOrientation  ; Copy in Player  facing
 351+ C716 CD 37 C6                             call    ResetUbnkPosition               ; home position
 352+ C719 3E 05                                ld      a,MissileDropHeight             ; the missile launches from underneath
 353+ C71B 32 23 C0                             ld      (UBnKylo),a                     ; so its -ve drop height
 354+ C71E                                      IFDEF DEBUGMISSILELAUNCH
 355+ C71E ~                                        ld      a,$20       ; DEBUG
 356+ C71E ~                                        ld      (UBnKzlo),a
 357+ C71E                                      ENDIF
 358+ C71E 3E 80                                ld      a,$80                           ;
 359+ C720 32 25 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a                    ;
 360+ C723 3E 03                                ld      a,3                             ; set accelleration
 361+ C725 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a                   ;
 362+ C728                                      ZeroA
 362+ C728 AF          >                        xor a
 363+ C729 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 364+ C72C 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 365+ C72F 3E 03                                ld      a,3                             ; these are max roll and pitch rates for later
 366+ C731 32 4A C0                             ld      (UBnKRAT),a
 367+ C734 3C                                   inc     a
 368+ C735 32 4B C0                             ld      (UBnKRAT2),a
 369+ C738 3E 16                                ld      a,22
 370+ C73A 32 4D C0                             ld      (UBnKCNT2),a
 371+ C73D                                      MaxUnivSpeed                            ; and immediatley full speed (for now at least) TODO
 371+ C73D 3E 1F       >                        ld      a,31
 371+ C73F 32 46 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKSpeed),a
 372+ C742                                      SetMemFalse UBnKMissleHitToProcess
 372+ C742 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 372+ C744 32 44 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKMissleHitToProcess),a
 373+ C747 3E 80                                ld      a,ShipAIEnabled
 374+ C749 32 54 C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a
 375+ C74C                                      ;break
 376+ C74C CD 23 C6                             call    ClearShipHostile                ; its a player missile
 377+ C74F C9                                   ret
 378+ C750              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 379+ C750              ; this applies blast damage to ship
 380+ C750 3A FC 80     ShipMissileBlast:       ld      a,(CurrentMissileBlastDamage)
 381+ C753 47                                   ld      b,a
 382+ C754 3A 58 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKEnergy)                   ; Reduce Energy
 383+ C757 90                                   sub     b
 384+ C758 C3 61 C7                             jp      UnivExplodeShip
 385+ C75B 18 04                                jr      UnivExplodeShip
 386+ C75D 32 58 C0                             ld      (UBnKEnergy),a
 387+ C760 C9                                   ret
 388+ C761              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 389+ C761              ; This sets the ship as a shower of explosiondwd
 390+ C761 3A 54 C0     UnivExplodeShip:        ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)
 391+ C764 F6 30                                or      ShipExploding | ShipKilled      ; Set Exlpoding flag and mark as just been killed
 392+ C766 E6 7F                                and     Bit7Clear                       ; Remove AI
 393+ C768 32 54 C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a
 394+ C76B AF                                   xor     a
 395+ C76C 32 58 C0                             ld      (UBnKEnergy),a
 396+ C76F                                      ;TODO
 397+ C76F C9                                   ret
 398+ C770
 399+ C770 CD B9 C8     UnivSetDemoPostion:     call    UnivSetSpawnPosition
 400+ C773 3E 81                                ld      a,%10000001                     ; AI Enabled has 1 missile
 401+ C775 32 54 C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a                ; set hostinle, no AI, has ECM
 402+ C778 32 0E C4                             ld      (ShipNewBitsAddr),a             ; initialise new bits logic
 403+ C77B 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
 404+ C77D 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a             ; no pitch
 405+ C780 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a             ; set roll to maxi on station
 406+ C783                                      ZeroA
 406+ C783 AF          >                        xor a
 407+ C784 32 22 C0                             ld      (UBnKxsgn),a
 408+ C787 32 25 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a
 409+ C78A 32 28 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a
 410+ C78D 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0
 411+ C790 22 20 C0                             ld      (UBnKxlo),hl
 412+ C793 22 23 C0                             ld      (UBnKylo),hl
 413+ C796 3A 0D C4                             ld      a,(ShipTypeAddr)
 414+ C799 21 B0 05                             ld      hl,$05B0                            ; so its a negative distance behind
 415+ C79C                                      JumpIfANENusng ShipTypeStation, .SkipFurther
 415+ C79C FE 02       >                        cp     ShipTypeStation
 415+ C79E C2 A5 C7    >                        jp      nz,.SkipFurther
 416+ C7A1 3E 05                                ld      a,5
 417+ C7A3 84                                   add     h
 418+ C7A4 67                                   ld      h,a
 419+ C7A5 22 26 C0     .SkipFurther            ld      (UBnKzlo),hl
 420+ C7A8 C9                                   ret
 421+ C7A9                  DISPLAY "Tracing 1", $
 422+ C7A9
 423+ C7A9              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 424+ C7A9              CopyPlanetGlobaltoSpaceStation:
 425+ C7A9 21 C9 80                             ld      hl,ParentPlanetX
 426+ C7AC 11 20 C0                             ld      de,UBnKxlo
 427+ C7AF 01 09 00                             ld      bc,3*3
 428+ C7B2 ED B0                                ldir
 429+ C7B4 C9                                   ret
 430+ C7B5              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 431+ C7B5              CopySpaceStationtoPlanetGlobal:
 432+ C7B5 21 20 C0                             ld      hl,UBnKxlo
 433+ C7B8 11 C9 80                             ld      de,ParentPlanetX
 434+ C7BB 01 09 00                             ld      bc,3*3
 435+ C7BE ED B0                                ldir
 436+ C7C0 C9                                   ret
 437+ C7C1              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 438+ C7C1              ; generate space station type based on seed values
 439+ C7C1              ; returns space station type in a
 440+ C7C1 3A BE 80     UnivSelSpaceStationType:ld      a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 441+ C7C4 2A BF 80                             ld      hl,(DisplayGovernment)          ; h = TekLevel, l = Government
 442+ C7C7 ED 5B C1 80                          ld      de,(DisplayPopulation)          ; d = productivity e = Population
 443+ C7CB                                      ; so its economdy + government - TekLevel + productivity - population %00000001
 444+ C7CB 85                                   add     a,l
 445+ C7CC 9C                                   sbc     a,h
 446+ C7CD 82                                   add     a,d
 447+ C7CE 9B                                   sbc     a,e
 448+ C7CF E6 01                                and     $01
 449+ C7D1 21 87 78                             ld      hl,MasterStations               ; in main memory
 450+ C7D4 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 451+ C7D6 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 452+ C7D7 C9                                   ret
 453+ C7D8              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 454+ C7D8              CalculateSpaceStationWarpPositon:
 455+ C7D8 3A 92 80     .CalcZPosition:         ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+1)      ; seed d & 7
 456+ C7DB E6 07                                and     %00000111               ; .
 457+ C7DD C6 07                                add     a,7                     ; + 7
 458+ C7DF CB 2F                                sra     a                       ; / 2
 459+ C7E1 32 28 C0     .SetZPosition:          ld      (UBnKzsgn),a            ; << 16 (i.e. load into z sign byte
 460+ C7E4 21 00 00                             ld      hl, $0000               ; now set z hi and lo
 461+ C7E7 22 26 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl            ;
 462+ C7EA 3A 96 80     .CalcXandYPosition:     ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+5)      ; seed f & 3
 463+ C7ED E6 03                                and     %00000011               ; .
 464+ C7EF C6 03                                add     a,3                     ; + 3
 465+ C7F1 47                                   ld      b,a
 466+ C7F2 3A 95 80                             ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+4)      ; get low bit of seed e
 467+ C7F5 E6 01                                and     %00000001
 468+ C7F7 1F                                   rra                             ; roll bit 0 into bit 7
 469+ C7F8 B0                                   or      b                       ; now calc is f & 3 * -1 if seed e is odd
 470+ C7F9 32 22 C0     .SetXandYPosition:      ld      (UBnKxsgn),a            ; set into x and y sign byte
 471+ C7FC 32 25 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a            ; .
 472+ C7FF 78                                   ld      a,b                     ; we want just seed f & 3 here
 473+ C800 32 21 C0                             ld      (UBnKxhi),a             ; set into x and y high byte
 474+ C803 32 24 C0                             ld      (UBnKyhi),a             ; .
 475+ C806                                      ZeroA
 475+ C806 AF          >                        xor a
 476+ C807 32 20 C0                             ld      (UBnKxlo),a
 477+ C80A 32 23 C0                             ld      (UBnKylo),a
 478+ C80D              .CaclculateSpaceStationOffset:
 479+ C80D 3A 93 80     .CalculateOffset:       ld      a,(WorkingSeeds+2)
 480+ C810 E6 03                                and     %00000011
 481+ C812 4F                                   ld      c,a
 482+ C813 3A 91 80                             ld      a,(WorkingSeeds)
 483+ C816 E6 01                                and     %00000001
 484+ C818 17                                   rla
 485+ C819 47                                   ld      b,a
 486+ C81A 61                                   ld      h,c
 487+ C81B 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 488+ C81D C5 E5        .TransposeX:            push    bc,,hl
 489+ C81F ED 5B 21 C0                          ld      de,(UBnKxhi)
 490+ C823 3A 22 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)
 491+ C826 6F                                   ld      l,a
 492+ C827                                      MMUSelectMathsBankedFns
 492+ C827 ED 91 50 66 >                     nextreg MathsBankedFnsMMU, BankMathsBankedFns
 492+ C82B CD 10 01       call        AddBCHtoDELsigned
 493+ C82E ED 53 21 C0                          ld      (UBnKxhi),de
 494+ C832 7D                                   ld      a,l
 495+ C833 32 22 C0                             ld      (UBnKxsgn),a
 496+ C836 E1 C1        .TransposeY:            pop     bc,,hl
 497+ C838 C5 E5                                push    bc,,hl
 498+ C83A ED 5B 24 C0                          ld      de,(UBnKyhi)
 499+ C83E 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
 500+ C841 6F                                   ld      l,a
 501+ C842                                      MMUSelectMathsBankedFns
 501+ C842 ED 91 50 66 >                     nextreg MathsBankedFnsMMU, BankMathsBankedFns
 501+ C846 CD 10 01       call        AddBCHtoDELsigned
 502+ C849 ED 53 24 C0                          ld      (UBnKyhi),de
 503+ C84D 7D                                   ld      a,l
 504+ C84E 32 25 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a
 505+ C851 E1 C1        .TransposeZ:            pop     bc,,hl
 506+ C853 ED 5B 27 C0                          ld      de,(UBnKzhi)
 507+ C857 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)
 508+ C85A 6F                                   ld      l,a
 509+ C85B                                      MMUSelectMathsBankedFns
 509+ C85B ED 91 50 66 >                     nextreg MathsBankedFnsMMU, BankMathsBankedFns
 509+ C85F CD 10 01       call        AddBCHtoDELsigned
 510+ C862 ED 53 27 C0                          ld      (UBnKzhi),de
 511+ C866 7D                                   ld      a,l
 512+ C867 32 28 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a
 513+ C86A C9                                   ret
 514+ C86B              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 515+ C86B              UnivSpawnSpaceStationLaunched:
 516+ C86B CD 8E C8                             call    UnivSpawnSpaceStation
 517+ C86E CD B5 C7                             call    CopySpaceStationtoPlanetGlobal
 518+ C871 CD 3B C9                             call    ResetStationLaunch
 519+ C874 C9                                   ret
 520+ C875                                      DISPLAY "TODO:fall into SpaceStation Launch Position once startup fixed"
 521+ C875                                      DISPLAY "TODO: Fault is probably as maths for xyz is 16 bit and shoudl be 24"
 522+ C875              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 523+ C875              SpaceStationLaunchPositon:
 524+ C875 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0
 525+ C878                                      ZeroA
 525+ C878 AF          >                        xor a
 526+ C879 22 20 C0                             ld      (UBnKxlo),hl
 527+ C87C 32 22 C0                             ld      (UBnKxsgn),a
 528+ C87F 22 23 C0                             ld      (UBnKylo),hl
 529+ C882 32 25 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a
 530+ C885 3E 81                                ld      a,$81
 531+ C887 22 26 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl
 532+ C88A 32 28 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a
 533+ C88D C9                                   ret
 534+ C88E              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 535+ C88E              UnivSpawnSpaceStation:  ;    UnivSelSpaceStationType ; set a to type
 536+ C88E                                      ;ld      c,13                    ; c to slot 13 which is space station
 537+ C88E                                      ;call    SpawnShipTypeASlotC     ; load inito universe slot
 538+ C88E CD A9 C7     .CalculatePosition:     call    CopyPlanetGlobaltoSpaceStation
 539+ C891 CD D8 C7     .CalcOrbitOffset:       call    CalculateSpaceStationWarpPositon
 540+ C894 CD F0 C9                             call    InitialiseOrientation
 541+ C897              .SetRollCounters:       ZeroUnivPitch
 541+ C897 AF          >                        xor     a
 541+ C898 32 49 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 542+ C89B                                      InfiniteRoll
 542+ C89B 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 542+ C89D 32 48 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 543+ C8A0              .SetOrientation:        FlipSignMem UBnkrotmatNosevX+1;  as its 0 flipping will make no difference
 543+ C8A0 3A 36 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 543+ C8A3 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 543+ C8A5 32 36 C0    >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevX+1),a
 544+ C8A8                                      FlipSignMem UBnkrotmatNosevY+1;  as its 0 flipping will make no difference
 544+ C8A8 3A 38 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 544+ C8AB EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 544+ C8AD 32 38 C0    >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevY+1),a
 545+ C8B0                                      FlipSignMem UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1
 545+ C8B0 3A 3A C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 545+ C8B3 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 545+ C8B5 32 3A C0    >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1),a
 546+ C8B8 C9                                   ret
 547+ C8B9              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 548+ C8B9              ; This sets the position of the current ship randomly, called after spawing
 549+ C8B9              ; Spawns in withink 16 bit range so 24 bit friendly
 550+ C8B9 CD F0 C9     UnivSetSpawnPosition:   call    InitialiseOrientation
 551+ C8BC                                      RandomUnivPitchAndRoll
 551+ C8BC CD 9C 85    >                        call    doRandom
 551+ C8BF F6 6F       >                        or      %01101111
 551+ C8C1 32 48 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 551+ C8C4 CD 9C 85    >                        call    doRandom
 551+ C8C7 F6 6F       >                        or      %01101111
 551+ C8C9 32 49 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 552+ C8CC CD 9C 85                             call    doRandom                        ; set x lo and y lo to random
 553+ C8CF 32 20 C0     .setXlo:                ld      (UBnKxlo),a
 554+ C8D2 32 23 C0     .setYlo:                ld      (UBnKylo),a
 555+ C8D5 0F           .setXsign:              rrca                                    ; rotate by 1 bit right
 556+ C8D6 47                                   ld      b,a
 557+ C8D7 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 558+ C8D9 32 22 C0                             ld      (UBnKxsgn),a
 559+ C8DC 78           .setYSign:              ld      a,b                             ; get random back again
 560+ C8DD 0F                                   rrca                                    ; rotate by 1 bit right
 561+ C8DE 47                                   ld      b,a
 562+ C8DF E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                    ; and set y sign
 563+ C8E1 32 25 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a
 564+ C8E4 CB 08        .setYHigh:              rrc     b                               ; as value is in b rotate again
 565+ C8E6 78                                   ld      a,b                             ;
 566+ C8E7 E6 1F                                and     31                              ; set y hi to random 0 to 31
 567+ C8E9 32 24 C0                             ld      (UBnKyhi),a                     ;
 568+ C8EC CB 08        .setXHigh:              rrc     b                               ; as value is in b rotate again
 569+ C8EE 78                                   ld      a,b
 570+ C8EF E6 1F                                and     31                              ; set x hi to random 0 to 31
 571+ C8F1 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ; save shifted into c as well
 572+ C8F2 32 21 C0                             ld      (UBnKxhi),a
 573+ C8F5 3E 50        .setZHigh:              ld      a,80                            ; set z hi to 80 - xhi - yhi - carry
 574+ C8F7 98                                   sbc     b
 575+ C8F8 99                                   sbc     c
 576+ C8F9 32 27 C0                             ld      (UBnKzhi),a
 577+ C8FC 3A 0D C4     .CheckIfBodyOrJunk:     ld      a,(ShipTypeAddr)
 578+ C8FF                                      ReturnIfAEqNusng ShipTypeJunk
 578+ C8FF FE 03       >                        cp      ShipTypeJunk
 578+ C901 C8          >                        ret     z
 579+ C902                                      ReturnIfAEqNusng ShipTypeScoopable
 579+ C902 FE 04       >                        cp      ShipTypeScoopable
 579+ C904 C8          >                        ret     z
 580+ C905 78                                   ld      a,b                             ; its not junk to set z sign
 581+ C906 0F                                   rrca                                    ; as it can jump in
 582+ C907 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 583+ C909 32 28 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a
 584+ C90C C9                                   ret
 585+ C90D
 586+ C90D              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 587+ C90D              ; This sets the cargo type or carryflag set for not cargo
 588+ C90D              ; Later this will be done via a loadable lookup table

 590+ C910                                      JumpIfAEqNusng ShipID_CargoType5, .CargoCanister
 590+ C910 FE 04       >                        cp     ShipID_CargoType5
 590+ C912 CA 29 C9    >                        jp      z,.CargoCanister
 591+ C915              .IsItThargon:           JumpIfAEqNusng ShipID_Thargon,    .Thargon
 591+ C915 FE 27       >                        cp     ShipID_Thargon
 591+ C917 CA 2F C9    >                        jp      z,.Thargon
 592+ C91A              .IsItAlloy:             JumpIfAEqNusng ShipID_Plate,      .Plate
 592+ C91A FE 1D       >                        cp     ShipID_Plate
 592+ C91C CA 32 C9    >                        jp      z,.Plate
 593+ C91F              .IsItSplinter:          JumpIfAEqNusng ShipID_Splinter,   .Splinter
 593+ C91F FE 24       >                        cp     ShipID_Splinter
 593+ C921 CA 35 C9    >                        jp      z,.Splinter
 594+ C924              .IsItEscapePod:         JumpIfAEqNusng ShipID_Escape_Pod, .EscapePod

 599+ C931 C9                                   ret

 601+ C934 C9                                   ret
 602+ C935 3E 0D        .Splinter:              ld      a,MineralsIndex
 603+ C937 C9                                   ret
 604+ C938 3E 04        .EscapePod:             ld      a,SlavesIndex
 605+ C93A C9                                   ret

 638+ C95B 22 26 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl

 640+ C95F 32 22 C0                             ld      (UBnKxsgn),a

 667+ C98D 32 40 C0                             ld      (UbnKShipUnivBankNbr),a

 672+ C99B 78                                   ld      a,b                          ; this will mostly be debugging info
 673+ C99C 32 42 C0                             ld      (UBnKShipModelNbr),a         ; this will mostly be debugging info
 674+ C99F 3A 0A C4     .SetUpMissileCount:     ld      a,(LaserAddr)                ; get laser and missile details
 675+ C9A2 E6 0F                                and     ShipMissileCount
 676+ C9A4 4F                                   ld      c,a
 677+ C9A5 3A F7 7E                             ld      a,(RandomSeed1)              ; missile flag limit
 678+ C9A8 A1                                   and     c                            ; .
 679+ C9A9 32 5C C0                             ld      (UBnKMissilesLeft),a
 680+ C9AC 3A 0A C4     .SetupLaserType         ld      a,(LaserAddr)
 681+ C9AF E6 F0                                and     ShipLaserPower
 682+ C9B1 ED 23                                swapnib
 683+ C9B3 32 5B C0                             ld      (UBnKLaserPower),a
 684+ C9B6 3A 0F C4     .SetUpFighterBays:      ld      a,(ShipAIFlagsAddr)
 685+ C9B9 4F                                   ld      c,a
 686+ C9BA E6 70                                and     ShipFighterBaySize
 687+ C9BC                                      JumpIfANENusng ShipFighterBaySizeInf, .LimitedBay
 687+ C9BC FE 70       >                        cp     ShipFighterBaySizeInf
 687+ C9BE C2 C3 C9    >                        jp      nz,.LimitedBay
 688+ C9C1 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF                       ; force unlimited ships
 689+ C9C3 ED 23        .LimitedBay:            swapnib                             ; as its bits 6 to 4 and we have removed bit 7 we can cheat with a swapnib
 690+ C9C5 32 5E C0                             ld      (UBnKFightersLeft),a
 691+ C9C8 79           .SetUpFighterType:      ld      a,c                         ; get back AI flags
 692+ C9C9 E6 0C                                and     ShipFighterType             ; fighter type is bits 2 and 3
 693+ C9CB CB 1F                                rr      a                           ; so get them down to 0 and 1
 694+ C9CD CB 1F                                rr      a                           ;
 695+ C9CF 21 6E C9                             ld      hl,FighterTypeMapping       ; then use the lookup table
 696+ C9D2 ED 31                                add     hl,a                        ; for the respective ship id
 697+ C9D4 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; we work on this for optimisation
 698+ C9D5 32 5D C0                             ld      (UBnKFighterShipId),a       ; ship data holds index to this table
 699+ C9D8 3A 10 C4     .SetUpECM:              ld      a,(ShipECMFittedChanceAddr) ; Now handle ECM
 700+ C9DB 47                                   ld      b,a
 701+ C9DC 3A F9 7E     .FetchLatestRandom:     ld      a,(RandomSeed3)
 702+ C9DF                                      JumpIfALTNusng b, .ECMFitted
 702+ C9DF B8          >                        cp      b
 702+ C9E0 DA EB C9    >                        jp		c, .ECMFitted
 703+ C9E3              .ECMNotFitted:          SetMemFalse UBnKECMFitted
 703+ C9E3 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 703+ C9E5 32 5A C0    >                        ld      (UBnKECMFitted),a
 704+ C9E8 C3 EF C9                             jp      .DoneECM
 705+ C9EB              .ECMFitted:             SetMemTrue  UBnKECMFitted
 705+ C9EB AF          >                        xor     a
 705+ C9EC 32 5A C0    >                        ld      (UBnKECMFitted),a
 706+ C9EF              .DoneECM:               ; TODO set up laser power
 707+ C9EF C9                                   ret
 708+ C9F0                  DISPLAY "Tracing 2", $
 709+ C9F0
 710+ C9F0                                      include "Universe/Ships/InitialiseOrientation.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/Ships/InitialiseOrientation.asm
   1++C9F0              ;  sidev = (1,  0,  0)  sidev = (&6000, 0, 0)
   2++C9F0              ;  roofv = (0,  1,  0)  roofv = (0, &6000, 0)
   3++C9F0              ;  nosev = (0,  0, -1)  nosev = (0, 0, &E000)   E000 = SignBit[96]
   4++C9F0              InitialiseOrientation:
   5++C9F0 21 00 00     ZI1:                    ld      hl, 0
   6++C9F3 22 2B C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevY),hl                ; set the zeroes
   7++C9F6 22 2D C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevZ),hl                ; set the zeroes
   8++C9F9 22 2F C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvX),hl                ; set the zeroes
   9++C9FC 22 33 C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvZ),hl                ; set the zeroes
  10++C9FF 22 35 C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatNosevX),hl                ; set the zeroes
  11++CA02 22 37 C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatNosevY),hl                ; set the zeroes
  12++CA05              ; Optimised as already have 0 in l
  13++CA05 26 60                                ld      h, $60	             				; 96 in hi byte
  14++CA07                                      ;ld      hl,1
  15++CA07 22 29 C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevX),hl
  16++CA0A 22 31 C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvY),hl
  17++CA0D              ; Optimised as already have 0 in l
  18++CA0D 26 E0                                ld      h, $E0					            ; -96 in hi byte which is +96 with hl bit 7 set
  19++CA0F 22 39 C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatNosevZ),hl
  20++CA12 C9                                   ret
  21++CA13
  22++CA13              InitialisePlayerMissileOrientation:
  23++CA13 CD F0 C9                             call    InitialiseOrientation
  24++CA16 21 00 60                             ld      hl,$6000
  25++CA19 22 39 C0                             ld      (UBnkrotmatNosevZ),hl           ; mius
  26++CA1C C9                                   ret
  27++CA1D
  28++CA1D
  29++CA1D              ;  sidev = (1,  0,  0)  sidev = (&6000, 0, 0)
  30++CA1D              ;  roofv = (0,  1,  0)  roofv = (0, &6000, 0)
  31++CA1D              ;  nosev = (-0,  -0, 1) nosev = (0, 0, &6000)
  32++CA1D CD F0 C9     LaunchedOrientation:    call    InitialiseOrientation
  33++CA20                                      FlipSignMem UBnkrotmatNosevX+1;  as its 0 flipping will make no difference
  33++CA20 3A 36 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
  33++CA23 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
  33++CA25 32 36 C0    >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevX+1),a
  34++CA28                                      FlipSignMem UBnkrotmatNosevY+1;  as its 0 flipping will make no difference
  34++CA28 3A 38 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
  34++CA2B EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
  34++CA2D 32 38 C0    >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevY+1),a
  35++CA30                                      FlipSignMem UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1
  35++CA30 3A 3A C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
  35++CA33 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
  35++CA35 32 3A C0    >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1),a
  36++CA38 C9                                   ret
  37++CA39
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/InitialiseOrientation.asm
 711+ CA39
 712+ CA39              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 713+ CA39              ;OrientateVertex:
 714+ CA39              ;                      [ sidev_x sidev_y sidev_z ]   [ x ]
 715+ CA39              ;  projected [x y z] = [ roofv_x roofv_y roofv_z ] . [ y ]
 716+ CA39              ;                      [ nosev_x nosev_y nosev_z ]   [ z ]
 717+ CA39              ;
 718+ CA39
 719+ CA39              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 720+ CA39              ;TransposeVertex:
 721+ CA39              ;                      [ sidev_x roofv_x nosev_x ]   [ x ]
 722+ CA39              ;  projected [x y z] = [ sidev_y roofv_y nosev_y ] . [ y ]
 723+ CA39              ;                      [ sidev_z roofv_z nosev_z ]   [ z ]
 724+ CA39              ; VectorToVertex:
 725+ CA39              ;                     [ sidev_x roofv_x nosev_x ]   [ x ]   [ x ]
 726+ CA39              ;  vector to vertex = [ sidev_y roofv_y nosev_y ] . [ y ] + [ y ]
 727+ CA39              ;                     [ sidev_z roofv_z nosev_z ]   [ z ]   [ z ]
 728+ CA39              ;INPUTS:    bhl = dividend  cde = divisor where b and c are sign bytes
 729+ CA39              ;OUTPUTS:   cahl = quotient cde = divisor
 730+ CA39              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 731+ CA39                                      ;include "./ModelRender/EraseOldLines-EE51.asm"
 732+ CA39               ; OBSOLETE                       include "./ModelRender/TrimToScreenGrad-LL118.asm"
 733+ CA39                                      include "./ModelRender/CLIP-LL145.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/CLIP-LL145.asm
   1++CA39              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++CA39
   3++CA39 00           clipDx                  DB      0           ; also XX12+2
   4++CA3A 00           clipDxHigh              DB      0           ; also XX12+3
   5++CA3B 00           clipDxHighNonABS        DB      0           ; also XX12+3
   6++CA3C 00           clipDy                  DB      0           ; also XX12+4
   7++CA3D 00           clipDyHigh              DB      0           ; also XX12+5
   8++CA3E 00           clipGradient            DB      0
   9++CA3F 00           clipDxySign             DB      0
  10++CA40              varX12p3                equ     clipDxySign
  11++CA40 00           clipXGTY                DB      0
  12++CA41 00           clipFlags               DB      0
  13++CA42 00           SWAP                    DB      0
  14++CA43 00 00        varYX                   DW      0
  15++CA45              ;varRegX                 DB      0
  16++CA45              ;varXX12p2               DB      0
  17++CA45 00           clipXX13                 DB      0
  18++CA46 00           Gradient                DB      0
  19++CA47              ; for start and end y. bit7 of lower determines its not been setup yet
  20++CA47
  21++CA47              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  22++CA47                      IFNDEF       CLIPVersion3
  23++CA47 ED 4B A8 C0  ClipLine:               ld      bc,(UbnkPreClipY1)          ; bc - XX15(2,3) Y1
  24++CA4B DD 2A AC C0                          ld      ix,(UbnkPreClipY2)          ; ix - XX12(0,1) Y2
  25++CA4F 2A A6 C0                             ld      hl,(UbnkPreClipX1)          ; hl - XX15(0,1) X1
  26++CA52 ED 5B AA C0                          ld      de,(UbnkPreClipX2)          ; de - XX15(4,5) X2
  27++CA56 AF                                   xor     a
  28++CA57 32 42 CA                             ld      (SWAP),a                    ; SWAP = 0
  29++CA5A 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ; A = X2Hi
  30++CA5B FD 26 BF     .LL147:                 ld      iyh,$BF                     ; we need to be 191 as its 128 + another bit set from 0 to 6, we are using iyh as regX (128 will actually do)
  31++CA5E DD B4                                or      ixh                         ; if (X2Hi L-OR Y2 Hi <> 0) goto LL107             -- X2Y2 off screen
  32++CA60 20 0A                                jr      nz, .LL107
  33++CA62 DD 7D                                ld      a,ixl
  34++CA64 ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ; if screen hight < y2 lo, i.e y2 lo >127 goto LL107,
  35++CA67 20 03                                jr      nz,.LL107
  36++CA69 FD 26 00                             ld      iyh, 0                      ; else iyh = regX = 0                                                                        -- X2Y2 on screen
  37++CA6C              ; XX13 = regX (i.e. iyh)      ( if XX13 = XX13 is 191 if (x2, y2) is off-screen else 0) we bin XX13 as not needed
  38++CA6C              ; so XX13 = 0 if x2_hi = y2_hi = 0, y2_lo is on-screen,  XX13 = 191 if x2_hi or y2_hi are non-zero or y2_lo is off the bottom of the screen
  39++CA6C FD 7C        .LL107                  ld      a,iyh
  40++CA6E 32 45 CA                             ld      (clipXX13),a                ; debug copy iyh to xx13
  41++CA71 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; If (X1 hi L-OR Y1) hi  goto LL83                   -- X1Y1 off screen and maybe X2Y2
  42++CA72 B0                                   or      b                           ;
  43++CA73 20 27                                jr      nz,.LL83                    ;
  44++CA75 79                                   ld      a,c                         ; or (y1 lo > bottom of screen)
  45++CA76 ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ; i.e  screen height < y1)
  46++CA79 20 21                                jr      nz,.LL83
  47++CA7B              ; If we get here, (x1, y1) is on-screen
  48++CA7B FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh                       ; iyh = xx13 at this point if  XX13 <> 0 goto LL108                                                        -- X1Y1 on screen, if we flagged X2Y2 off screen goto LL108
  49++CA7D FE 00                                cp      0
  50++CA7F 20 15                                jr      nz, .LL108
  51++CA81              ; Finished clipping exit point ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  52++CA81 79           .ClipDone:              ld      a,c                         ; LL146 (Clip Done)               Y1 = y1 lo, x2 = x2 lo, x1 = x1 lo y1 = y1 lo                                   -- Nothing off screen
  53++CA82 32 A7 C0                             ld      (UBnkNewY1),a
  54++CA85 DD 7D                                ld      a,ixl
  55++CA87 32 A9 C0                             ld      (UBnkNewY2),a
  56++CA8A 7D                                   ld      a,l
  57++CA8B 32 A6 C0                             ld      (UBnkNewX1),a
  58++CA8E 7B                                   ld      a,e
  59++CA8F 32 A8 C0                             ld      (UBnkNewX2),a
  60++CA92                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; carry is clear so valid to plot is in XX15(0to3)
  60++CA92 B7          >                        or a
  61++CA93 C9                                   ret                                 ; 2nd pro different, it swops based on swop flag around here.
  62++CA94              ; Finished out of bounds exit point -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  63++CA94              .PointsOutofBounds:     SetCarryFlag                        ; LL109 (ClipFailed) carry flag set as not visible
  63++CA94 37          >                        scf
  64++CA95 C9                                   ret
  65++CA96 FD 7C        .LL108:                 ld      a,iyh
  66++CA98 B7                                   or      a
  67++CA99 1F                                   rra
  68++CA9A FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                       ; (X2Y2 Off Screen)         XX13 = 95 (i.e. divide it by 2)                                                 -- X1Y1 on screen X2Y2 off screen
  69++CA9C FD 7C        .LL83:                  ld      a,iyh                       ; (Line On screen Test)      if XX13 < 128 then only 1 point is on screen so goto LL115                      -- We only need to deal with X2Y2
  70++CA9E ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ;
  71++CAA1 28 28                                jr      z, .LL115                   ;
  72++CAA3              ;                       Check for X1 and X2 negative
  73++CAA3 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; If both x1_hi and x2_hi have bit 7 set, jump to LL109  to return from the subroutine with the C flag set, as the entire line is above the top of the screen
  74++CAA4 A2                                   and     d
  75++CAA5                                      JumpIfNegative  .PointsOutofBounds
  75++CAA5 FA 94 CA    >                        jp		m, .PointsOutofBounds
  76++CAA8              ;                       Check for Y1 and Y2 negative
  77++CAA8 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; If both y1_hi and y2_hi have bit 7 set, jump to LL109  to return from the subroutine with the C flag set, as the entire line is above the top of the screen
  78++CAA9 DD A4                                and     ixh
  79++CAAB                                      JumpIfNegative  .PointsOutofBounds
  79++CAAB FA 94 CA    >                        jp		m, .PointsOutofBounds
  80++CAAE              ;                       Check for X1 and X2 both > 255
  81++CAAE 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; If neither (x1_hi - 1) or (x2_hi - 1) have bit 7 set, jump to LL109 to return from the subroutine with the C  flag set, as the line doesn't fit on-screen
  82++CAAF 3D                                   dec     a
  83++CAB0 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                       ; using iyl as XX12+2 var
  84++CAB2 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ; a = x2 hi
  85++CAB3 3D                                   dec     a
  86++CAB4 FD B5                                or      iyl                         ; (x2 hi -1 ) or (x1 hi -1)
  87++CAB6                                      JumpIfPositive .PointsOutofBounds   ; if both x1 and x2hi were > 0 then subtracting 1 would result in 0..254 so either being negative means it was 0 before
  87++CAB6 F2 94 CA    >                        jp		p, .PointsOutofBounds
  88++CAB9              ; by here we have eliminated -ve Y1 bounds so can just test for positive high and bit 7 of lo
  89++CAB9 DD 7C                                ld      a,ixh
  90++CABB 3D                                   dec     a
  91++CABC FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a
  92++CABE 78                                   ld      a,b
  93++CABF 3D                                   dec     a
  94++CAC0 FD B5                                or      iyl
  95++CAC2                                      JumpIfPositive .PointsOutofBounds   ; if both x1 and x2hi were > 0 then subtracting 1 would result in 0..254 so either being negative means it was 0 before
  95++CAC2 F2 94 CA    >                        jp		p, .PointsOutofBounds
  96++CAC5 79                                   ld      a,c
  97++CAC6 DD A5                                and     ixl
  98++CAC8                                      JumpIfNegative .PointsOutofBounds   ; really if both are > 127
  98++CAC8 FA 94 CA    >                        jp		m, .PointsOutofBounds
  99++CACB              ; Clip line: calulate the line's gradient
 100++CACB              ; here as an optimisation we make sure X1 is always < X2  later on
 101++CACB              .LL115:                 ClearCarryFlag
 101++CACB B7          >                        or a
 102++CACC E5 D5        .CalcDX:                push    hl,,de
 103++CACE EB                                   ex      hl,de                       ; so hl is x2 and de = x1
 104++CACF ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 105++CAD1 22 39 CA                             ld      (clipDx),hl
 106++CAD4 7C                                   ld      a,h
 107++CAD5 32 3B CA                             ld      (clipDxHighNonABS),a
 108++CAD8              .CalcDy:                ClearCarryFlag
 108++CAD8 B7          >                        or a
 109++CAD9 DD E5 E1                             ld      hl,ix
 110++CADC ED 42                                sbc     hl,bc
 111++CADE 54 5D                                ld      de,hl           ;;OPTIMISATION 6/11/21
 112++CAE0 22 3C CA                             ld      (clipDy),hl     ;OPTIMISATION 6/11/21 commented out
 113++CAE3 7C           .CalcQuadrant:          ld      a,h
 114++CAE4 32 3D CA                             ld      (clipDyHigh),a              ; so A = sign of deltay in effect
 115++CAE7              ; So we now have delta_x in XX12(3 2), delta_y in XX12(5 4)  where the delta is (x1, y1) - (x2, y2))
 116++CAE7 21 3A CA                             ld      hl,clipDxHigh
 117++CAEA AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; now a = sign dx xor sign dy
 118++CAEB 32 03 80                             ld      (varS),a                    ; DEBGU putting it in var S too for now
 119++CAEE 32 3F CA                             ld      (clipDxySign),a
 120++CAF1 3A 3D CA     .AbsDy:                 ld      a,(clipDyHigh)
 121++CAF4 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 122++CAF7 28 0E                                jr      z,.LL110                    ; If delta_y_hi is positive, jump down to LL110 to skip the following
 123++CAF9 ED 5B 3C CA                          ld      de,(clipDy)                 ;OPTIMISATION 6/11/21 commented out
 124++CAFD                                      macronegate16de                     ; Otherwise flip the sign of delta_y to make it  positive, starting with the low bytes
 124++CAFD AF          >					xor 	a
 124++CAFE 93          >                    sub 	e
 124++CAFF 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
 124++CB00 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 124++CB01 92          >                    sub 	d
 124++CB02 57          >                    ld 		d,a
 125++CB03 ED 53 3C CA                          ld      (clipDy),de                 ;OPTIMISATION 6/11/21 commented out
 126++CB07 2A 39 CA     .LL110:                 ld      hl,(clipDx)
 127++CB0A 3A 3A CA                             ld      a,(clipDxHigh)
 128++CB0D ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ; is it a negative X
 129++CB10 28 06                                jr      z,.LL111                    ; If delta_x_hi is positive, jump down to LL110 to skip the following
 130++CB12                                      ;ld      hl,(clipDx)                 ;OPTIMISATION 6/11/21 commented out
 131++CB12                                      macronegate16hl                     ; Otherwise flip the sign of delta_y to make it  positive, starting with the low bytes
 131++CB12 AF          >					xor 	a
 131++CB13 95          >					sub 	l
 131++CB14 6F          >					ld 		l,a
 131++CB15 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
 131++CB16 94          >					sub 	h
 131++CB17 67          >					ld 		h,a
 132++CB18              .LL111:
 133++CB18 7C           .ScaleLoop:             ld      a,h                         ; At this point DX and DY are ABS values
 134++CB19 B2                                   or      d
 135++CB1A 28 0A                                jr      z,.CalculateDelta
 136++CB1C                                      ShiftDERight1
 136++CB1C CB 3A       >			   srl d
 136++CB1E CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 137++CB20                                      ShiftHLRight1
 137++CB20 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 137++CB22 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 138++CB24 18 F2                                jr      .ScaleLoop                  ; scaled down Dx and Dy to 8 bit, Dy may have been negative
 139++CB26              .CalculateDelta:
 140++CB26              ; By now, the high bytes of both |delta_x| and |delta_y| are zero We know that h and d are both = 0 as that's what we tested with a BEQ
 141++CB26 AF           .LL113:                 xor     a
 142++CB27 32 1D 80                             ld      (varT),a                    ; t = 0
 143++CB2A 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; If delta_x_lo < delta_y_lo, so our line is more vertical than horizontal, jump to LL114
 144++CB2B                                      JumpIfALTNusng  e, .LL114           ;
 144++CB2B BB          >                        cp      e
 144++CB2C DA 3C CB    >                        jp		c, .LL114
 145++CB2F              ; Here Dx >= Dy sp calculate Delta Y / delta X
 146++CB2F 32 01 80     .DxGTEDy:               ld      (varQ),a                    ; Set Q = delta_x_lo
 147++CB32 57                                   ld      d,a                         ; d = also Q for calc
 148++CB33 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; Set A = delta_y_lo
 149++CB34 CD 7F 95                             call    AEquAmul256DivD; LL28Amul256DivD             ; Call LL28 to calculate:  R (actually a reg) = 256 * A / Q   = 256 * delta_y_lo / delta_x_lo
 150++CB37 32 02 80                             ld      (varR),a                    ;
 151++CB3A 18 10                                jr      .LL116                      ; Jump to LL116, as we now have the line's gradient in R
 152++CB3C              ; Here Delta Y > Delta X so calulate delta X / delta Y
 153++CB3C 7B           .LL114:                 ld      a,e                         ; Set Q = delta_y_lo
 154++CB3D 57                                   ld      d,a
 155++CB3E 32 01 80                             ld      (varQ),a
 156++CB41 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; Set A = delta_x_lo
 157++CB42 CD 7F 95                             call    AEquAmul256DivD; LL28Amul256DivD             ; Call LL28 to calculate: R = 256 * A / Q  = 256 * delta_x_lo / delta_y_lo
 158++CB45 32 02 80                             ld      (varR),a                    ;
 159++CB48 21 1D 80                             ld      hl,varT                     ; T was set to 0 above, so this sets T = &FF
 160++CB4B 35                                   dec     (hl)
 161++CB4C D1           .LL116:                 pop     de                          ; get back X2
 162++CB4D E1                                   pop     hl                          ; get back X1 into hl,
 163++CB4E 3A 02 80                             ld      a,(varR)                    ; Store the gradient in XX12+2 this can be optimised later
 164++CB51 32 3E CA                             ld      (clipGradient),a
 165++CB54 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a
 166++CB56 3A 03 80                             ld      a,(varS)
 167++CB59 32 3F CA                             ld      (clipDxySign),a             ;  Store the type of slope in XX12+3, bit 7 clear means ?Not needed as clipDxySign is used for varS earlier?
 168++CB5C                                                                          ; top left to bottom right, bit 7 set means top right to bottom left **CODE IS WRONG HERE A TEST IS BL to TR
 169++CB5C FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh                       ; iyh was XX13 from earlier
 170++CB5E FE 00                                cp      0                           ; If XX13 = 0, skip the following instruction
 171++CB60 28 05                                jr      z,.LL138                    ;
 172++CB62 ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ; If XX13 is positive, it must be 95. This means (x1, y1) is on-screen but (x2, y2) isn't, so we jump to LLX117 to swap the (x1, y1) and (x2, y2)
 173++CB65 28 13                                jr      z,.LLX117                   ; coordinates around before doing the actual clipping, because we need to clip (x2, y2) but the clipping routine at LL118 only clips (x1, y1)
 174++CB67              ; If we get here, XX13 = 0 or 191, so (x1, y1) is off-screen and needs clipping
 175++CB67 CD 8E CB     .LL138                  call    ClipPointHLBC               ; Call LL118 to move (x1, y1) along the line onto the screen, i.e. clip the line at the (x1, y1) end
 176++CB6A FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh                       ; If XX13 = 0, i.e. (x2, y2) is on-screen, jump down to LL124 to return with a successfully clipped line
 177++CB6C ED 27 80                             test    $80
 178++CB6F 28 1A                                jr      z,.LL124
 179++CB71              ; If we get here, XX13 = 191 (both coordinates are off-screen)
 180++CB71 7C           .LL117:                 ld      a,h                         ; If either of x1_hi or y1_hi are non-zero, jump to
 181++CB72 B0                                   or      b                           ; LL137 to return from the subroutine with the C flag
 182++CB73 C2 94 CA                             jp      nz, .PointsOutofBounds      ; set, as the line doesn't fit on-screen
 183++CB76 B1                                   or      c                           ; if x1 and y1 hi are both zero test bit 8 or Y1 to see if its > 128
 184++CB77 FA 94 CA                             jp      m, .PointsOutofBounds       ; set, as the line doesn't fit on-screen
 185++CB7A              ; If we get here, XX13 = 95 or 191, and in both cases (x2, y2) is off-screen, so we now need to swap the (x1, y1) and (x2, y2) coordinates around before doing
 186++CB7A              ; the actual clipping, because we need to clip (x2, y2) but the clipping routine at LL118 only clips (x1, y1)
 187++CB7A EB           .LLX117:                ex      de,hl                       ;  swap X1 and X2
 188++CB7B DD E5                                push    ix                          ;  swap Y1 and Y2
 189++CB7D C5                                   push    bc
 190++CB7E DD E1                                pop     ix
 191++CB80 C1                                   pop     bc
 192++CB81 CD 8E CB                             call    ClipPointHLBC               ;  Call LL118 to move (x1, y1) along the line onto the screen, i.e. clip the line at the (x1, y1) end
 193++CB84 3A 42 CA                             ld      a,(SWAP)
 194++CB87 3D                                   dec     a
 195++CB88 32 42 CA                             ld      (SWAP),a                    ; Set SWAP = &FF to indicate that we just clipped the line at the (x2, y2) end by swapping the coordinates (the DEC does this as we set SWAP to 0 at the start of this subroutine)
 196++CB8B C3 81 CA     .LL124:                 jp      .ClipDone                    ; now put points in place
 197++CB8E              ; Move a point along a line until it is on-screen point is held in HL(X) BC(Y) LL118
 198++CB8E              ; iyh still holds XX13 iyl still holds gradient
 199++CB8E 7C           ClipPointHLBC:          ld      a,h                         ; If x1_hi is positive, jump down to LL119 to skip the following
 200++CB8F ED 27 80                             test    $80
 201++CB92 28 17                                jr      z,.LL119
 202++CB94 32 03 80     .X1isNegative:          ld      (varS),a                    ;  Otherwise x1_hi is negative, i.e. off the left of the screen, so set S = x1_hi
 203++CB97 E5 D5 C5                             push    hl,,de,,bc
 204++CB9A CD 10 CC                             call    LL120                       ;  Call LL120 to calculate:   (Y X) = (S x1_lo) * XX12+2      if T = 0   = x1 * gradient
 205++CB9D                                                                          ;                             (Y X) = (S x1_lo) / XX12+2      if T <> 0  = x1 / gradient
 206++CB9D                                                                          ;  with the sign of (Y X) set to the opposite of the line's direction of slope
 207++CB9D C1 D1 E1                             pop    hl,,de,,bc                   ;  get coordinates back
 208++CBA0 2A 43 CA                             ld      hl,(varYX)
 209++CBA3 09                                   add     hl,bc                       ; y1 = y1 + varYX
 210++CBA4 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl
 211++CBA6 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0                        ; Set x1 = 0
 212++CBA9 18 1A                                jr      .LL134                      ; in BBC is set x to 0 to force jump, we will just jump
 213++CBAB FE 00        .LL119:                 cp      0
 214++CBAD 28 16                                jr      z,.LL134                    ;  If x1_hi = 0 then jump down to LL134 to skip the following, as the x-coordinate is already on-screen (as 0 <= (x_hi x_lo) <= 255)
 215++CBAF 3D                                   dec     a
 216++CBB0 32 03 80                             ld      (varS),a                    ;  Otherwise x1_hi is positive, i.e. x1 >= 256 and off the right side of the screen, so set S = x1_hi - 1
 217++CBB3 E5 D5 C5                             push    hl,,de,,bc
 218++CBB6 CD 10 CC                             call    LL120                      ;  Call LL120 to calculate: (Y X) = (S x1_lo) * XX12+2      if T = 0  = (x1 - 256) * gradient
 219++CBB9                                                                          ;                           (Y X) = (S x1_lo) / XX12+2      if T <> 0 = (x1 - 256) / gradient
 220++CBB9                                                                          ;  with the sign of (Y X) set to the opposite of theline's direction of slope
 221++CBB9 C1 D1 E1                             pop     hl,,de,,bc
 222++CBBC 2A 43 CA                             ld      hl,(varYX)
 223++CBBF 09                                   add     hl,bc                        ;OPTIMISATION 6/11/21 simplfied post debug
 224++CBC0 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl                        ;OPTIMISATION 6/11/21 simplfied post debug
 225++CBC2 21 FF 00                             ld      hl,255                      ; Set x1 = 255
 226++CBC5              ; We have moved the point so the x-coordinate is on screen (i.e. in the range 0-255), so now for they-coordinate
 227++CBC5 78           .LL134:                 ld      a,b                         ; If y1_hi is positive, jump down to LL135  to skip the following
 228++CBC6 ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ;
 229++CBC9 28 1A                                jr      z,.LL135                    ;
 230++CBCB 32 03 80                             ld      (varS),a                    ; Otherwise y1_hi is negative, i.e. off the top of the screen, so set S = y1_hi
 231++CBCE 79                                   ld      a,c                         ; Set R = y1_lo
 232++CBCF 32 02 80                             ld      (varR),a                    ;
 233++CBD2 E5 D5 C5                             push    hl,,de,,bc
 234++CBD5 CD 71 CC                             call    LL123                       ;  Call LL123 to calculate: (Y X) = (S R) / XX12+2      if T = 0  = y1 / gradient
 235++CBD8                                                                          ;                           (Y X) = (S R) * XX12+2      if T <> 0 = y1 * gradient
 236++CBD8                                                                          ;  with the sign of (Y X) set to the opposite of the line's direction of slope
 237++CBD8 C1 D1 E1                             pop     hl,,de,,bc
 238++CBDB D5                                   push    de
 239++CBDC EB                                   ex      hl,de                       ; de = x1
 240++CBDD 2A 43 CA                             ld      hl,(varYX)                  ; hl = varYX
 241++CBE0 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; we don't need to swap back as its an add, Set x1 = x1 + (Y X)
 242++CBE1 D1                                   pop     de                          ; de = x2 again
 243++CBE2 01 00 00                             ld      bc,0                        ; Set y1 = 0
 244++CBE5 79           .LL135:                 ld      a,c                         ; if bc < 128 then no work to do
 245++CBE6 E6 80                                and     $80
 246++CBE8 B0                                   or      b                           ; here we see if c bit 8 is set or anything in b as we know if its 0 this would mean there is no need to clip
 247++CBE9 C8                                   ret     z
 248++CBEA E5                                   push    hl
 249++CBEB 60 69                                ld      hl,bc
 250++CBED 01 80 00                             ld      bc,128
 251++CBF0 B7                                   or      a
 252++CBF1 ED 42                                sbc     hl,bc                       ; hl =  (S R) = (y1_hi y1_lo) - 128
 253++CBF3 22 02 80                             ld      (varRS), hl                 ; and now RS (or SR)
 254++CBF6 7C                                   ld      a,h
 255++CBF7 E1                                   pop     hl
 256++CBF8 ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ; If the subtraction underflowed, i.e. if y1 < 192, then y1 is already on-screen, so jump to LL136 to return from the subroutine, as we are done
 257++CBFB C0                                   ret     nz
 258++CBFC              ; If we get here then y1 >= 192, i.e. off the bottom of the screen
 259++CBFC E5 D5 C5     .LL139:                 push    hl,,de,,bc
 260++CBFF CD 71 CC                             call    LL123                       ;  Call LL123 to calculate: (Y X) = (S R) / XX12+2      if T = 0  = y1 / gradient
 261++CC02                                                                          ;                           (Y X) = (S R) * XX12+2      if T <> 0 = y1 * gradient
 262++CC02                                                                          ;  with the sign of (Y X) set to the opposite of the line's direction of slope
 263++CC02 C1 D1 E1                             pop     hl,,de,,bc
 264++CC05 D5                                   push    de
 265++CC06 EB                                   ex      hl,de
 266++CC07 2A 43 CA                             ld      hl,(varYX)
 267++CC0A 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; we don't need to swap back as its an add, Set x1 = x1 + (Y X)
 268++CC0B 01 7F 00                             ld      bc,127                      ; set bc to 127 bottom of screen
 269++CC0E D1                                   pop     de
 270++CC0F C9           .LL136:                 ret                                 ;  Return from the subroutine
 271++CC10                      ENDIF
 272++CC10
 273++CC10              ; Calculate the following:   * If T = 0  (more vertical than horizontal), (Y X) = (S x1_lo) * XX12+2
 274++CC10              ;                            * If T <> 0 (more horizontal than vertical), (Y X) = (S x1_lo) / XX12+2
 275++CC10              ;                              giving (Y X) the opposite sign to the slope direction in XX12+3.
 276++CC10              ; Other entry points        LL122                Calculate (Y X) = (S R) * Q and set the sign to the opposite of the top byte on the stack
 277++CC10 7D           LL120:                  ld      a,l                          ; Set R = x1_lo
 278++CC11 32 02 80                             ld      (varR),a
 279++CC14 CD CE CC                             call    LL129                        ;  Call LL129 to do the following:  Q = XX12+2   = line gradient  A = S EOR XX12+3 = S EOR slope direction (S R) = |S R| So A contains the sign of S * slope direction
 280++CC17 F5                                   push    af                           ;  Store A on the stack so we can use it later
 281++CC18 C5                                   push    bc
 282++CC19 47                                   ld      b,a
 283++CC1A 3A 1D 80                             ld      a,(varT)                     ; instead : (Y X) = (S R ) / Q
 284++CC1D FE 00                                cp      0
 285++CC1F 78                                   ld      a,b
 286++CC20 C1                                   pop     bc                           ; we can't use af as that would disrupt the flags
 287++CC21 C2 38 CC                             jp      nz, .LL121
 288++CC24              ; The following calculates:  (Y X) = (S R) * Q using the same shift-and-add algorithm that's documented in MULT1
 289++CC24 3A 3E CA     .LL122:                  ld      a,(clipGradient)
 290++CC27 32 01 80                             ld      (varQ),a; optimise
 291++CC2A CD 0B 91                             call    HLequSRmulQdiv256
 292++CC2D 22 43 CA                             ld      (varYX),hl
 293++CC30 F1                                   pop     af
 294++CC31 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 295++CC34 CA 64 CC                             jp      z,.LL133
 296++CC37 C9                                   ret
 297++CC38 11 FE FF     .LL121:                  ld      de,$FFFE                    ; set XY to &FFFE at start, de holds XY
 298++CC3B 2A 02 80                             ld      hl,(varRS)                  ; hl = RS
 299++CC3E 3A 01 80                             ld      a,(varQ)
 300++CC41 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; b = q
 301++CC42              .LL130:                 ShiftHLLeft1                        ; RS *= 2
 301++CC42 CB 25       >			   sla l
 301++CC44 CB 14       >			   rl  h
 302++CC46 7C                                   ld      a,h
 303++CC47 38 04                                jr      c,.LL131                    ; if S overflowed skip Q test and do subtractions
 304++CC49                                      JumpIfALTNusng b, .LL132            ; if S <  Q = 256/gradient skip subtractions
 304++CC49 B8          >                        cp      b
 304++CC4A DA 55 CC    >                        jp		c, .LL132
 305++CC4D 3F           .LL131:                 ccf                                 ; compliment carry
 306++CC4E 98                                   sbc     a,b                         ; q
 307++CC4F 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; h (s)
 308++CC50 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; r
 309++CC51 DE 00                                sbc     a,0                         ; 0 - so in effect SR - Q*256
 310++CC53 37                                   scf                                 ; set carry for next rolls
 311++CC54 3F                                   ccf
 312++CC55              .LL132:                 RollDELeft1                         ; Rotate de bits left
 312++CC55 CB 13       >               rl  e
 312++CC57 CB 12       >               rl  d
 313++CC59 38 E7                                jr      c,.LL130                    ;
 314++CC5B ED 53 43 CA                          ld      (varYX),de
 315++CC5F F1                                   pop     af              ; get back sign
 316++CC60 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 317++CC63 C8                                   ret     z               ; if negative then return with value as is reversed sign
 318++CC64 2A 43 CA     .LL133:                 ld      hl,(varYX)      ; may not actually need this?
 319++CC67                                      NegHL
 319++CC67 AF          >                    xor a
 319++CC68 95          >                    sub l
 319++CC69 6F          >                    ld l,a
 319++CC6A 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 319++CC6B 94          >                    sub h
 319++CC6C 67          >                    ld h,a
 320++CC6D 22 43 CA                             ld      (varYX),hl
 321++CC70 C9           .LL128:                 ret
 322++CC71
 323++CC71
 324++CC71
 325++CC71
 326++CC71              ; Calculate the following: * If T = 0,  calculate (Y X) = (S R) / XX12+2 (actually SR & XX12+2 /256)
 327++CC71              ;                          * If T <> 0, calculate (Y X) = (S R) * XX12+2
 328++CC71              ;                          giving (Y X) the opposite sign to the slope direction in XX12+3.
 329++CC71              ;
 330++CC71              ; Other entry points:      LL121                Calculate (Y X) = (S R) / Q and set the sign to the opposite of the top byte on the stack
 331++CC71              ;                          LL133                Negate (Y X) and return from the subroutine
 332++CC71              ;                          LL128                Contains an RTS
 333++CC71 CD CE CC     LL123:                  call    LL129                       ; Call LL129 to do the following: Q = XX12+2   = line gradient  A = S EOR XX12+3 = S EOR slope direction (S R) = |S R| So A contains the sign of S * slope direction
 334++CC74 F5                                   push    af                          ; Store A on the stack so we can use it later
 335++CC75 C5                                   push    bc                          ; If T is non-zero, so it's more horizontal than vertical, jump down to LL121 to calculate this
 336++CC76 47                                   ld      b,a
 337++CC77 3A 1D 80                             ld      a,(varT)                    ; instead : (Y X) = (S R) * Q *** this looks to be the wrong way roudn for Y!!!!
 338++CC7A FE 00                                cp      0
 339++CC7C 78                                   ld      a,b
 340++CC7D C1                                   pop     bc
 341++CC7E C2 BA CC                             jp      nz, .LL122
 342++CC81              ; The following calculates: (Y X) = (S R) / Q using the same shift-and-subtract algorithm that's documented in TIS2, its actually X.Y=R.S*256/Q
