 343++CC81 11 FE FF     .LL121:                 ld      de,$FFFE                    ; set XY to &FFFE at start, de holds XY
 344++CC84 2A 02 80                             ld      hl,(varRS)                  ; hl = RS
 345++CC87 3A 01 80                             ld      a,(varQ)
 346++CC8A 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; b = q
 347++CC8B              .LL130:                 ShiftHLLeft1                        ; RS *= 2
 347++CC8B CB 25       >			   sla l
 347++CC8D CB 14       >			   rl  h
 348++CC8F 7C                                   ld      a,h
 349++CC90 38 04                                jr      c,.LL131                    ; if S overflowed skip Q test and do subtractions
 350++CC92                                      JumpIfALTNusng b, .LL132            ; if S <  Q = 256/gradient skip subtractions
 350++CC92 B8          >                        cp      b
 350++CC93 DA 9E CC    >                        jp		c, .LL132
 351++CC96 3F           .LL131:                 ccf                                 ; compliment carry
 352++CC97 98                                   sbc     a,b                         ; q
 353++CC98 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; h (s)
 354++CC99 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; r
 355++CC9A DE 00                                sbc     a,0                         ; 0 - so in effect SR - Q*256
 356++CC9C 37                                   scf                                 ; set carry for next rolls
 357++CC9D 3F                                   ccf
 358++CC9E              .LL132:                 RollDELeft1                         ; Rotate de bits left
 358++CC9E CB 13       >               rl  e
 358++CCA0 CB 12       >               rl  d
 359++CCA2 38 E7                                jr      c,.LL130                    ;
 360++CCA4 ED 53 43 CA                          ld      (varYX),de
 361++CCA8 F1                                   pop     af              ; get back sign
 362++CCA9 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 363++CCAC C8                                   ret     z               ; if negative then return with value as is reversed sign
 364++CCAD 2A 43 CA     .LL133:                 ld      hl,(varYX)      ; may not actually need this?
 365++CCB0                                      NegHL
 365++CCB0 AF          >                    xor a
 365++CCB1 95          >                    sub l
 365++CCB2 6F          >                    ld l,a
 365++CCB3 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 365++CCB4 94          >                    sub h
 365++CCB5 67          >                    ld h,a
 366++CCB6 22 43 CA                             ld      (varYX),hl
 367++CCB9 C9           .LL128:                 ret
 368++CCBA              ; The following calculates:  (Y X) = (S R) * Q using the same shift-and-add algorithm that's documented in MULT1
 369++CCBA 3A 3E CA     .LL122:                 ld      a,(clipGradient)
 370++CCBD 32 01 80                             ld      (varQ),a; optimise
 371++CCC0 CD 0B 91                             call    HLequSRmulQdiv256
 372++CCC3 22 43 CA                             ld      (varYX),hl
 373++CCC6 F1                                   pop     af
 374++CCC7 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 375++CCCA CA AD CC                             jp      z,.LL133
 376++CCCD C9                                   ret
 377++CCCE
 378++CCCE              ; Do the following, in this order:  Q = XX12+2
 379++CCCE              ;                                   A = S EOR XX12+3
 380++CCCE              ;                                   (S R) = |S R|
 381++CCCE              ; This sets up the variables required above to calculate (S R) / XX12+2 and give the result the opposite sign to XX13+3.
 382++CCCE 3A 3E CA     LL129:                  ld      a,(clipGradient)
 383++CCD1 32 01 80                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Set Q = XX12+2
 384++CCD4 3A 03 80                             ld      a,(varS)                    ; If S is positive, jump to LL127
 385++CCD7 E5 F5                                push    hl,,af                      ; else
 386++CCD9 ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ;   if bit 7 is clear
 387++CCDC 28 0C                                jr      z,.LL127                    ;      RS = ABS RS
 388++CCDE 2A 02 80                             ld      hl,(varRS)                  ;      .
 389++CCE1                                      NegHL                               ;      .
 389++CCE1 AF          >                    xor a
 389++CCE2 95          >                    sub l
 389++CCE3 6F          >                    ld l,a
 389++CCE4 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 389++CCE5 94          >                    sub h
 389++CCE6 67          >                    ld h,a
 390++CCE7 22 02 80                             ld      (varRS),hl                  ;      .
 391++CCEA 21 3F CA     .LL127:                 ld      hl,clipDxySign              ;   hl = dxy sign
 392++CCED F1                                   pop     af                          ;
 393++CCEE AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; a = S XOR clipDxySign
 394++CCEF E1                                   pop     hl
 395++CCF0 C9                                   ret
 396++CCF1
 397++CCF1              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 398++CCF1              ; Thow away out of bounds by more than 250
 399++CCF1              ClipLineV3:             ;break
 400++CCF1                      IFDEF       CLIPVersion3
 401++CCF1 ~            ;My logic version
 402++CCF1 ~            .CheckYorder:
 403++CCF1 ~                                    ld      hl,(UbnkPreClipY1)
 404++CCF1 ~                                    ld      de,(UbnkPreClipY2)
 405++CCF1 ~                                    call    CompareHLDESgn
 406++CCF1 ~                                    jr      c,.LineP1toP2                          ; if Y1 < Y2 then we can use the points as is else we have to swap
 407++CCF1 ~            .LineP2toP1:            ld      bc,(UbnkPreClipY2)                      ; fetch and write out in reverse
 408++CCF1 ~                                    ld      ix,(UbnkPreClipY1)
 409++CCF1 ~                                    ld      de,(UbnkPreClipX1)
 410++CCF1 ~                                    ld      hl,(UbnkPreClipX2)
 411++CCF1 ~                                    ld      (UbnkPreClipY1),bc                      ; bc - XX15(2,3) Y1
 412++CCF1 ~                                    ld      (UbnkPreClipY2),ix                      ; ix - XX12(0,1) Y2
 413++CCF1 ~                                    ld      (UbnkPreClipX1),hl                      ; hl - XX15(0,1) X1
 414++CCF1 ~                                    ld      (UbnkPreClipX2),de                      ;  de - XX15(4,5) X2
 415++CCF1 ~                                    jp      .CheckNoClip
 416++CCF1 ~            .LineP1toP2             ld      bc,(UbnkPreClipY1)                      ; bc - XX15(2,3) Y1
 417++CCF1 ~                                    ld      ix,(UbnkPreClipY2)                      ; ix - XX12(0,1) Y2
 418++CCF1 ~                                    ld      hl,(UbnkPreClipX1)                      ; hl - XX15(0,1) X1
 419++CCF1 ~                                    ld      de,(UbnkPreClipX2)                      ; de - XX15(4,5) X2
 420++CCF1 ~            .CheckNoClip:           ld      a,b
 421++CCF1 ~                                    or      d
 422++CCF1 ~                                    or      h
 423++CCF1 ~                                    or      ixh
 424++CCF1 ~                                    jp      nz,.CheckXOffScreen                 ; if both Y1 and y2 have bit 7 set
 425++CCF1 ~                                    ld      a,c                                 ; then we clip
 426++CCF1 ~                                    and     ixl
 427++CCF1 ~                                    test    $80
 428++CCF1 ~                                    jp      z, .ClipComplete
 429++CCF1 ~            ;if either x1hi x2hi are 0 then we clip. if both <> 0and both same sign exit
 430++CCF1 ~            .CheckXOffScreen:       ld      a,h
 431++CCF1 ~                                    xor     d
 432++CCF1 ~                                    test    $80                                 ; non descructive test of bit 7 is set
 433++CCF1 ~                                    jp      nz,.X1X2OppositeSign                ; if bit 7 was set then x1 and x2 must be opposite signs so its on screen
 434++CCF1 ~            .X1X2SameSigns:         ld      a,h                                 ; so to get there h and d must be the same sign
 435++CCF1 ~                                    test    $80                                 ; if they are the same sign and at x1 is negative then x2 must be negative so off screen
 436++CCF1 ~                                    JumpIfAIsZero .X1X2CheckIfBothRight
 437++CCF1 ~            .X1X2BothNegative:      SetCarryFlag                                ; to get to here x1 and x2 must be high and off the same sign so its not to draw
 438++CCF1 ~                                    ret
 439++CCF1 ~            .X1X2CheckIfBothRight:  and     a                                   ; we have h in a already
 440++CCF1 ~                                    jr      z,.X1OnScreen
 441++CCF1 ~                                    ld      a,d
 442++CCF1 ~                                    and     a
 443++CCF1 ~                                    jr      z,.X2OnScreen
 444++CCF1 ~            .X1X2OffRightSide:      SetCarryFlag                                ; to get to here x1 and x2 must be high and off the same sign so its not to draw
 445++CCF1 ~                                    ret
 446++CCF1 ~            ;                       to get to here x1 and x2 either span -ve to +ve or from on screen to off screen
 447++CCF1 ~            .X1OnScreen:
 448++CCF1 ~            .X2OnScreen:
 449++CCF1 ~            .X1X2OppositeSign:
 450++CCF1 ~            ;                       Now check to see if Y is off screen
 451++CCF1 ~            .CheckYOffScreen:       ld      a,b                                     ; Check if y1 and y2 are opposite signs, fi so it spans screen so we are good
 452++CCF1 ~            .CheckBothYNegative:    xor     ixh
 453++CCF1 ~                                    test    $80                                     ; if bit 7 is set then opposite signs
 454++CCF1 ~                                    jp      nz,.Y1Y2OppositeSign                    ; if y1 and y2 are opposite signs its on screen and spans at least one side
 455++CCF1 ~            .Y1Y2SameSign:          ld      a,b                                     ; if they are the same sign then if one is negative, so is the other so off screen
 456++CCF1 ~                                    test    $80
 457++CCF1 ~                                    jp      z,.Y1Y2Positive
 458++CCF1 ~            .Y1Y2Negative:          SetCarryFlag
 459++CCF1 ~                                    ret
 460++CCF1 ~            .Y1Y2Positive:          ld      a,c                                     ; if its the same sign y1 or y2 could be 0 and if they are
 461++CCF1 ~                                    and     $80                                     ; this will test to see if b >0 or c > 127
 462++CCF1 ~                                    or      b                                       ;
 463++CCF1 ~                                    jp      z,.Y1OnScreen
 464++CCF1 ~                                    ld      a,ixl
 465++CCF1 ~                                    and     $80
 466++CCF1 ~                                    or      ixh
 467++CCF1 ~                                    jp      z,.Y2OnScreen
 468++CCF1 ~            .Y1Y2OffBottomSide:     SetCarryFlag
 469++CCF1 ~                                    ret
 470++CCF1 ~            .Y1OnScreen:
 471++CCF1 ~            .Y2OnScreen:
 472++CCF1 ~            .Y1Y2OppositeSign:
 473++CCF1 ~            .StartProcessing:       ld      hl,(UbnkPreClipX1)                      ; Now we can test and Clip
 474++CCF1 ~                                    ld      de,(UbnkPreClipX2)                      ; de - XX15(4,5)
 475++CCF1 ~                                    ld      iyh,0                                   ; set iyh flags to 0
 476++CCF1 ~            ; if x1hi or y1 high <> 0 or y1 > 127 then set bit 1 of clipcoord       ; we can optimise this later
 477++CCF1 ~                                    ld      a,h
 478++CCF1 ~                                    or      b
 479++CCF1 ~                                    jr      z,.CheckP1Ylo
 480++CCF1 ~            ;                       iyh     bit 0 - P1 Needs Clipping
 481++CCF1 ~            ;                               bit 1 - P2 Needs Clipping
 482++CCF1 ~            ;                               bit 2 - x1 >= x2 (left to right)
 483++CCF1 ~            ;                               bit 3 - y1 >= y2 (top to bottom)
 484++CCF1 ~            ;                               bit 4 -  DY/DX (steep)
 485++CCF1 ~            .P1OffScreen:           ld      iyh,1                                   ; if either p1 x or y was off screen set bit 0 to 1
 486++CCF1 ~                                    jp      .CheckP2OffScreen                       ; .
 487++CCF1 ~            .CheckP1Ylo:            ld      a,c                                     ; .
 488++CCF1 ~                                    and     $80                                     ; .
 489++CCF1 ~                                    jr      z,.CheckP2OffScreen                     ; .
 490++CCF1 ~                                    ld      iyh,1                                   ; .
 491++CCF1 ~            .CheckP2OffScreen:      ld      a,d                                     ; if x2hi or y2 off screen then set bit 2 of clipcoord to 1
 492++CCF1 ~                                    or      ixh                                     ; .
 493++CCF1 ~                                    jr      z,.CheckP2Ylo                           ; .
 494++CCF1 ~            .P2OffScreen:           ld      a,iyh                                   ; .
 495++CCF1 ~                                    or      2                                       ; .
 496++CCF1 ~                                    ld      iyh,a                                   ; .
 497++CCF1 ~                                    jp      .CheckXDirection                        ; .
 498++CCF1 ~            .CheckP2Ylo:            ld      a,ixl                                   ; .
 499++CCF1 ~                                    and     $80                                     ; .
 500++CCF1 ~                                    jr      z,.CheckXDirection                      ; .
 501++CCF1 ~                                    ld      a,iyh                                   ; .
 502++CCF1 ~                                    or      2                                       ; .
 503++CCF1 ~                                    ld      iyh,a                                   ; .
 504++CCF1 ~            .CheckXDirection:       push    de,,hl
 505++CCF1 ~                                    call    CompareHLDESgn                          ; IF HL equals DE, Z=1,C=0, IF HL is less than DE, Z=0,C=1, IF HL is more than DE, Z=0,C=0
 506++CCF1 ~                                    pop     de,,hl
 507++CCF1 ~                                    jp      c,.CalculateDx                          ;
 508++CCF1 ~            .X1gteX2:               ld      a,iyh                                   ; if x1 >= x2 then set bit 3 to denote -ve x direction, note we will eliminate horziontal / vertical early as an optimisation
 509++CCF1 ~                                    or      4                                       ; .
 510++CCF1 ~                                    ld      iyh,a                                   ; .
 511++CCF1 ~                                    ; Y Direction is now always top to bottom
 512++CCF1 ~            .CalculateDx:           ClearCarryFlag                                  ;                       calculate DX
 513++CCF1 ~                                    sbc     hl,de                                   ; .
 514++CCF1 ~            .ABSDX:                 ld      a,h                                     ; HL = | HL - DE |
 515++CCF1 ~                                    test    $80                                     ; .
 516++CCF1 ~                                    jr      z,.DXPositive                           ; .
 517++CCF1 ~                                    macronegate16hl                                 ; .
 518++CCF1 ~            .DXPositive:            ex      de,hl                                   ; de = abs delta x
 519++CCF1 ~            .CalculateDy:           ClearCarryFlag                                  ; hl = Y2 -Y1 as its pre sorted its always positive if on screen
 520++CCF1 ~                                    ld      hl,ix                                   ; iy = hl = Y2 - Y1
 521++CCF1 ~                                    sbc     hl,bc                                   ; .
 522++CCF1 ~            .DYPositive:            ; Scale DX and DY to 8 bit, by here hl = abs dy, de = abs dx
 523++CCF1 ~            ;calculate DY
 524++CCF1 ~            .ScaleLoop:             ld      a,h                                     ; At this point DX and DY are ABS values
 525++CCF1 ~                                    or      d                                       ; .
 526++CCF1 ~                                    jr      z,.ScaleDone                            ; .
 527++CCF1 ~                                    ShiftDERight1                                   ; .
 528++CCF1 ~                                    ShiftHLRight1                                   ; .
 529++CCF1 ~                                    jr      .ScaleLoop                              ; scaled down Dx and Dy to 8 bit, Dy may have been;;                                                                                               negative
 530++CCF1 ~            .ScaleDone:             ; hl = ABS DY, DE = ABS DX,  bc = Y1, ix = Y2,   note H and D will be zero
 531++CCF1 ~            ; if Dx = 0 then horizontal line and clip X1 & X2 only then exit
 532++CCF1 ~            ; if Dy = 0 then vertical line and clip Y1 & Y2 only then exit
 533++CCF1 ~
 534++CCF1 ~            ; if DX < DY  gradient = 256 * delta_x_lo / delta_y_lo
 535++CCF1 ~            ;        else gradient = 256 * delta_y_lo / delta_x_lo, set bit 5 of clipcord
 536++CCF1 ~            .CalculateDelta:        ld      a,e                                     ; if DX < DY goto DX/DY
 537++CCF1 ~                                    JumpIfALTNusng l,.DXdivDY                       ; else do DY/DX
 538++CCF1 ~            .DYdivDX:               ld      a,l                                     ;    A = DY
 539++CCF1 ~                                    ld      d,e                                     ;    D = DX
 540++CCF1 ~                                    call    AEquAmul256DivD                         ;    A = R = 256 * DY / DX
 541++CCF1 ~            .SaveGradientDYDX:      ld      (Gradient),a
 542++CCF1 ~                                    ld      a,iyh                                   ;    bit 5 of iyh denotes that its a DX/DY (steep), if its clear its DY/DX (shallow)
 543++CCF1 ~                                    or      16                                      ;    .
 544++CCF1 ~                                    ld      iyh,a                                   ;    .
 545++CCF1 ~                                    jp      .ClipP1                                 ;    .
 546++CCF1 ~            .DXdivDY:               ld      a,e                                     ;    A = DX
 547++CCF1 ~                                    ld      d,l                                     ;    D = DY
 548++CCF1 ~                                    call    AEquAmul256DivD                         ;    A = R = 256 * DX / DY
 549++CCF1 ~            .SaveGradientDXDY:      ld      (Gradient),a
 550++CCF1 ~            ; if bit 1 of clipccord is set call    LL118
 551++CCF1 ~            .ClipP1:                ld      a,iyh                                   ; if bit 1 is clear to say no need to clip pont 1 we just jump to point 2
 552++CCF1 ~                                    test    1                                       ; .
 553++CCF1 ~                                    jp      z,.ClipP2                               ; .
 554++CCF1 ~                                    call    LL118v3                                 ; else clip P1 first
 555++CCF1 ~                                    ld      a,b                                     ;      and if b or h have a value its failed to totally clip  as it may be only in bounds on just x or y
 556++CCF1 ~                                    or      h                                       ;      .
 557++CCF1 ~                                    jr      z, .P1Ygt127Check                       ;      .
 558++CCF1 ~            .P1HighOutofBounds:     SetCarryFlag                                    ;      .
 559++CCF1 ~                                    ret                                             ;      .
 560++CCF1 ~            .P1Ygt127Check:         ld      a,c                                     ;      or if y > 127 its failed to totally clip
 561++CCF1 ~                                    test    $80                                     ;      .
 562++CCF1 ~                                    SetCarryFlag                                    ;      .
 563++CCF1 ~                                    ret     nz                                      ;      .
 564++CCF1 ~                                    ld      (UbnkPreClipY1), bc                     ;      else its valid and clipped point 1 so save ti back
 565++CCF1 ~                                    ld      (UbnkPreClipX1), hl
 566++CCF1 ~            ; if bit 2 of clipcoord is set
 567++CCF1 ~            ;        swap x1y1 with x2y2
 568++CCF1 ~            ;        call    LL118
 569++CCF1 ~            .ClipP2:                ld      a,iyh                                   ; so now repeat all that for point 2
 570++CCF1 ~                                    and     2
 571++CCF1 ~                                    jp      z,.ClipComplete
 572++CCF1 ~                                    call    LL118v3PreSwap                          ; now clip p2
 573++CCF1 ~                                    ld      a,b                                     ; if either high is set then it failed to properly clip
 574++CCF1 ~                                    or      h                                       ; .
 575++CCF1 ~                                    jr      z, .P2Ygt127Check                       ; .
 576++CCF1 ~            .P2HighOutofBounds:     SetCarryFlag                                    ; .
 577++CCF1 ~                                    ret                                             ; .
 578++CCF1 ~            .P2Ygt127Check:         ld      a,c                                     ; if c > 127 then it also failed to clip
 579++CCF1 ~                                    test    $80                                     ; .
 580++CCF1 ~                                    SetCarryFlag                                    ; .
 581++CCF1 ~                                    ret     nz                                      ; .
 582++CCF1 ~                                    ld      (UbnkPreClipY2), bc                     ; bc - XX15(2,3);;
 583++CCF1 ~                                    ld      (UbnkPreClipX2), hl
 584++CCF1 ~            ;clip compelte exit
 585++CCF1 ~            .ClipComplete:          ld      bc,(UbnkPreClipY1)                      ; bc - XX15(2,3);;
 586++CCF1 ~                                    ld      hl,(UbnkPreClipX1)
 587++CCF1 ~                                    ld      ix,(UbnkPreClipY2)                      ; bc - XX15(2,3);;
 588++CCF1 ~                                    ld      de,(UbnkPreClipX2)
 589++CCF1 ~            .SaveClippedLine:       ld      a,c                                     ; Y1 = y1 lo, x2 = x2 lo, x1 = x1 lo y1 = y1 lo                                   -- Nothing off screen
 590++CCF1 ~                                    ld      (UBnkNewY1),a
 591++CCF1 ~                                    ld      a,ixl
 592++CCF1 ~                                    ld      (UBnkNewY2),a
 593++CCF1 ~                                    ld      a,l
 594++CCF1 ~                                    ld      (UBnkNewX1),a
 595++CCF1 ~                                    ld      a,e
 596++CCF1 ~                                    ld      (UBnkNewX2),a
 597++CCF1 ~                                    ClearCarryFlag                              ; we have a success so not carry
 598++CCF1 ~                                    ret
 599++CCF1 ~            ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 600++CCF1 ~            LL118v3PreSwap:         ld      bc,(UbnkPreClipY2)                  ; bc - XX15(2,3);;
 601++CCF1 ~                                    ld      hl,(UbnkPreClipX2)
 602++CCF1 ~                                    jp      LL118v3Fetched
 603++CCF1 ~            ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 604++CCF1 ~            LL118v3:                ld      bc,(UbnkPreClipY1)                  ; bc - XX15(2,3);;
 605++CCF1 ~                                    ld      hl,(UbnkPreClipX1)
 606++CCF1 ~            ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 607++CCF1 ~            LL118v3Fetched:
 608++CCF1 ~            ;                       At this point bc = y position, hl = x position both 16 bit
 609++CCF1 ~            ;                       if x < 0 then x = 0
 610++CCF1 ~            ;                                     adjust = -x */ gradient depending on if its steep or shallow
 611++CCF1 ~            ;                                     y = y +- adjust depending on if we are going +ve direction or negative direction  (or simplify it, that it will always be + for x1y1 and - for x2y2 as we pre-sort)
 612++CCF1 ~            ;                       if x > 255 then x = 255
 613++CCF1 ~            ;                                     adjust = x-255 */ gradient
 614++CCF1 ~            ;                                     y = y +- adjust depending on if we are going +ve direction or negative direction  (or simplify it, that it will always be + for x1y1 and - for x2y2 as we pre-sort)
 615++CCF1 ~            ;                       if y < 0 then y = 0
 616++CCF1 ~            ;                                     adjust = -y */ gradient
 617++CCF1 ~            ;                                     x = x +- adjust depending on if we are going left to right or visa versa
 618++CCF1 ~            ;                       if y >127 then y = 127
 619++CCF1 ~            ;                                     adjust = y-127 */ gradient
 620++CCF1 ~            ;                                     x = x +- adjust depending on if we are going left to right or visa versa
 621++CCF1 ~            ;
 622++CCF1 ~            ;                       iyh     bit 0 - P1 Needs Clipping
 623++CCF1 ~            ;                               bit 1 - P2 Needs Clipping
 624++CCF1 ~            ;                               bit 2 - x1 >= x2 (left to right)
 625++CCF1 ~            ;                               bit 3 - y1 >= y2 (top to bottom)
 626++CCF1 ~            ;                               bit 4 -  DY/DX (steep)
 627++CCF1 ~            ; if X1 hi <> 0
 628++CCF1 ~            LL118:                  ;break
 629++CCF1 ~                                    ld      a,h                                     ; if x1 high is 0 then we don't need to clip x at all
 630++CCF1 ~                                    and     a
 631++CCF1 ~                                    jp      z,.X1NoClipNeeded
 632++CCF1 ~            ;                       if x1 hi bit 7 is set (so negative)
 633++CCF1 ~            .CalcBlockX:            test    $80                                     ; if h is postiive then jump to the XPositive Calc block
 634++CCF1 ~                                    jr      z,.CalcBlockXPositive
 635++CCF1 ~            ;                       if clipccord bit 5 is set Adjust = abs(X1) / Gradient (may need to swap bit check?)
 636++CCF1 ~            .CalcBlockXNegative:    ld      a,iyh                                   ;
 637++CCF1 ~                                    test    16                                      ; bit 5 of iyh denotes that its a DY/DX, if its clear its DX/DY
 638++CCF1 ~                                    jr      nz,.CalcBlockXNegMulGrad
 639++CCF1 ~            .CaclBlockXNegDivGrad:  macronegate16hl
 640++CCF1 ~                                    ld      a,(Gradient)
 641++CCF1 ~                                    push    bc                                      ; abs(X1) / Gradient
 642++CCF1 ~                                    ld      h,c                     ; move offset into high byte of h
 643++CCF1 ~                                    ld      l,0
 644++CCF1 ~                                    ld      c,a
 645++CCF1 ~                                    call    div_hl_c
 646++CCF1 ~                                    pop     bc
 647++CCF1 ~                                    jp      .DoneXNegCalc
 648++CCF1 ~            ;                       else set Adjust = abs(X1) * Gradient
 649++CCF1 ~            .CalcBlockXNegMulGrad:  push    bc                                      ; abs(X1) * Gradient
 650++CCF1 ~                                    macronegate16hl
 651++CCF1 ~                                    ld      a,(Gradient)
 652++CCF1 ~                                    call    HLeqyHLmulAdiv256
 653++CCF1 ~                                    pop     bc
 654++CCF1 ~            ;                       y1 += adjust * (-1 if bit 4 of clipcoord is set)
 655++CCF1 ~            ;                       x1 = 0 then call into DonrX1Calc
 656++CCF1 ~            ;                       we can skip the test for negative Y direection
 657++CCF1 ~            .DoneXNegCalc:          macronegate16hl
 658++CCF1 ~            .XNegSkipNegate:        ld      de,bc
 659++CCF1 ~                                    ex      hl,de
 660++CCF1 ~                                    add     hl,de
 661++CCF1 ~                                    ld      bc,hl
 662++CCF1 ~                                    ld      hl,0
 663++CCF1 ~                                    jp      .DoneXCalc
 664++CCF1 ~            ;                       else x1 hi is positive
 665++CCF1 ~            ;                       if clipccord bit 5 is set Adjust = X1 lo / Gradient (may need to swap bit check?)
 666++CCF1 ~            .CalcBlockXPositive:    ld      a,iyh
 667++CCF1 ~                                    test    16
 668++CCF1 ~                                    jr      nz,.CalcBlockXPosMulGrad
 669++CCF1 ~            .CalcBlockXPosDivGrad:  ld      a,(Gradient)            ;Q = gradient
 670++CCF1 ~                                    push    bc
 671++CCF1 ~                                    ld      c,a
 672++CCF1 ~                                    ld      de,255
 673++CCF1 ~                                    sub     hl,de
 674++CCF1 ~                                    ld      h,l
 675++CCF1 ~                                    ld      l,0
 676++CCF1 ~                                    call    div_hl_c
 677++CCF1 ~                                    pop     bc
 678++CCF1 ~                                    jp      .DoneX2Calc
 679++CCF1 ~            ;                                 else set Adjust = X1 lo * Gradient
 680++CCF1 ~            .CalcBlockXPosMulGrad:  push    bc
 681++CCF1 ~                                    ld      a,(Gradient)            ;Q = gradient
 682++CCF1 ~                                    ld      de,255
 683++CCF1 ~                                    sub     hl,de
 684++CCF1 ~                                    call    HLeqyHLmulAdiv256       ; hl = YX = SR / Q
 685++CCF1 ~                                    pop     bc
 686++CCF1 ~            ;                       y1 += adjust * (-1 if bit 4 of clipcoord is set)
 687++CCF1 ~            ;                       x1 = 255
 688++CCF1 ~            ;                       we can skip the test for negative Y direection
 689++CCF1 ~            .DoneX2Calc:            macronegate16hl
 690++CCF1 ~            .X2SkipNegate:          ex      de,hl
 691++CCF1 ~                                    ld      hl,bc
 692++CCF1 ~                                    add     hl,de
 693++CCF1 ~                                    ld      bc,hl
 694++CCF1 ~                                    ld      hl,255
 695++CCF1 ~            ;                       if Y1 hi <> 0 or Y1 low >= 128 then y coordinate is good
 696++CCF1 ~            .DoneXCalc:             ld      a,b
 697++CCF1 ~                                    and     a
 698++CCF1 ~                                    jr      nz,.CalcBlockY1Test
 699++CCF1 ~                                    ld      a,c
 700++CCF1 ~                                    and     $80
 701++CCF1 ~                                    ClearCarryFlag                  ; speculative clear of carry in case its good
 702++CCF1 ~                                    ret     z
 703++CCF1 ~            ;                       if Y1 hi bit 7 is set
 704++CCF1 ~            .X1NoClipNeeded:
 705++CCF1 ~            .CalcBlockY1Test:       ld      a,b
 706++CCF1 ~                                    test    $80
 707++CCF1 ~                                    jr      z,.CalcBlockYPos       ; if Y is positive jump forward
 708++CCF1 ~            ;                       if clipccord bit 5 is set Adjust = abs(Y1) / Gradient (may need to swap bit check?)
 709++CCF1 ~                                    break
 710++CCF1 ~            .CalcBlockY1:           ld      a,iyh
 711++CCF1 ~                                    test    16
 712++CCF1 ~                                    jr      nz,.CalcBlockYNegMulGrad
 713++CCF1 ~            .CalcBlockYNegDivGrad:  macronegate16bc
 714++CCF1 ~                                    ld      a,(Gradient)            ;Q = gradient
 715++CCF1 ~                                    push    hl
 716++CCF1 ~                                    ld      h,c                     ; move offset into high byte of h
 717++CCF1 ~                                    ld      l,0
 718++CCF1 ~                                    ld      c,a
 719++CCF1 ~                                    call    div_hl_c;LLHLdivC;div_hl_c
 720++CCF1 ~                                    pop     de
 721++CCF1 ~                                    ex      de,hl
 722++CCF1 ~                                    jp      .DoneBlockY1
 723++CCF1 ~            ;                                 else set Adjust = abs(Y1) * Gradient
 724++CCF1 ~            .CalcBlockYNegMulGrad:  macronegate16bc
 725++CCF1 ~                                    push    hl
 726++CCF1 ~                                    ld      hl,bc
 727++CCF1 ~                                    ld      a,(Gradient)            ;Q = gradient
 728++CCF1 ~                                    call    HLeqyHLmulAdiv256       ; hl = YX = SR / Q
 729++CCF1 ~                                    pop     de
 730++CCF1 ~                                    ex      de,hl
 731++CCF1 ~            ;                       x1 += adjust * (-1 if bit 3 of clipcoord is set)
 732++CCF1 ~            ;                       y1 = 0
 733++CCF1 ~            ;                       ret
 734++CCF1 ~            ;                       now we have done the adjustment, if y or x are off screen then the line spans screen in only 1 dimension so doesn't get drawn
 735++CCF1 ~            .DoneBlockY1:           ld      a,iyh
 736++CCF1 ~                                    test    4
 737++CCF1 ~                                    jr      z,.Y1SkipNegate
 738++CCF1 ~                                    macronegate16de
 739++CCF1 ~            .Y1SkipNegate:          add     hl,de
 740++CCF1 ~                                    ld      bc,0
 741++CCF1 ~                                    ret
 742++CCF1 ~            ;                       if clipccord bit 5 is set Adjust = Y1 lo / Gradient (may need to swap bit check?)
 743++CCF1 ~            .CalcBlockYPos:         ld      a,iyh
 744++CCF1 ~                                    test    16
 745++CCF1 ~                                    jr      z,.CalcBlockYPosMulGrad
 746++CCF1 ~            .CalcBlockYPosDivGrad:  ld      a,(Gradient)            ;Q = gradient
 747++CCF1 ~                                    push    hl
 748++CCF1 ~                                    ld      hl,bc
 749++CCF1 ~                                    ld      de,127
 750++CCF1 ~                                    sub     hl,de
 751++CCF1 ~                                    ld      h,l
 752++CCF1 ~                                    ld      l,0
 753++CCF1 ~                                    ld      c,a
 754++CCF1 ~                                    call    div_hl_c;LLHLdivC
 755++CCF1 ~                                    pop     de
 756++CCF1 ~                                    ex      de,hl
 757++CCF1 ~                                    jp      .DoneBlockY2
 758++CCF1 ~            ;                                 else set Adjust = Y1 lo * Gradient
 759++CCF1 ~            .CalcBlockYPosMulGrad:  push    hl
 760++CCF1 ~                                    ld      hl,bc
 761++CCF1 ~                                    ld      de,127
 762++CCF1 ~                                    sub     hl,de
 763++CCF1 ~                                    ld      a,(Gradient)
 764++CCF1 ~                                    call    HLeqyHLmulAdiv256       ; hl = YX = SR / Q
 765++CCF1 ~                                    pop     de
 766++CCF1 ~                                    ex      de,hl
 767++CCF1 ~            ;                x1 += adjust * (-1 if bit 3 of clipcoord is set)
 768++CCF1 ~            ;                y1 = 127
 769++CCF1 ~            .DoneBlockY2:           ld      a,iyh
 770++CCF1 ~                                    test    4
 771++CCF1 ~                                    jr      nz,.Y2SkipNegate
 772++CCF1 ~                                    macronegate16de
 773++CCF1 ~            .Y2SkipNegate:          add     hl,de
 774++CCF1 ~                                    ld      bc,127
 775++CCF1 ~                                    ret
 776++CCF1                      ELSE
 777++CCF1 C9                       ret
 778++CCF2                      ENDIF
 779++CCF2              ; old code for on screen test
 780++CCF2              ;;;;;;; if y1 > 127 and y2 > 127 then same sing and exit
 781++CCF2              ;;;;;;
 782++CCF2              ;;;;;;;if y1hi y2hi are <> 0 and both same sign exit
 783++CCF2              ;;;;;;.CheckYOffScreen:       ld      a,b                                 ; y1 and y2 high tests
 784++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        and     ixh
 785++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        jp      .CheckYLow
 786++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        ld
 787++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        and     a                                   ; if either is zero then we can check for > 127
 788++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        jr      z,.YHighNegativeCheck               ;
 789++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,ixh                               ;
 790++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        and     a                                   ;
 791++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        ret     nz                                  ;
 792++CCF2              ;;;;;;;if y1h bit 7 and y2h bit 7 set then exit as both -ve
 793++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,b                                 ;
 794++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        and     ixh                                 ;
 795++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        and     $80                                 ;
 796++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        ret     z                                   ;
 797++CCF2              ;;;;;;;if y1h > 0 and y2h > 0 then exit as both are +ve high
 798++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,b                                 ;
 799++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        and     ixh                                 ;
 800++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        ret     nz                                  ;
 801++CCF2              ;;;;;;;if y1h or y2h is not 0 then proceed to clip
 802++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,b
 803++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        or      ixh
 804++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        jr      nz,.StartProcessing
 805++CCF2              ;;;;;;;if (y1l bit 7 is set and y1h is clear ) or (y2l bit 7 is set and y2h is clear) the proceed to clip
 806++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,c
 807++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        or      ixl
 808++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        and     $80
 809++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        jr      z,.StartProcessing
 810++CCF2              ;;;;;;
 811++CCF2              ;;;;;;.CheckYOffScreen:       ld      a,b                                 ;
 812++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        cp      0                                   ;
 813++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        jr      z,.Y1HighIsZero                     ;
 814++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,ixh                               ; if we get here Y1 high <> 0
 815++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        cp      0                                   ;
 816++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        jr      z,.Y2HighIsZero                     ; if they are both non zero we can do a sign check
 817++CCF2              ;;;;;;.CheckYSameSign:        ld      a,b                                 ; if we get here Y1 high and Y2 high are not zero
 818++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        xor     ixh                                 ; so same sign then bail out if they are
 819++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        and     $80                                 ;
 820++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        ret     z                                   ;
 821++CCF2              ;;;;;;;if we get here either y1hi or y2 hi are 0, now check and y1 low > 127 & y2 low > 127, exit
 822++CCF2              ;;;;;;.Y1HighIsZero:          ld      a,ixh                               ; as y1h is zero, if y2h is zero we do y1 y2 test
 823++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        cp      0                                   ;
 824++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        jr      nz,.Startprocessing                 ;
 825++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,c                                 ; so by here y1h and y2h must be zero
 826++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        and     ixl
 827++CCF2              ;;;;;;
 828++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        .CheckY2Lo                        ;
 829++CCF2              ;;;;;;.CheckY1Lo:             ld      a,c
 830++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        and     $80
 831++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        jr      z,.StartProcessing
 832++CCF2              ;;;;;;.CheckY2Lo:             ld      a,ixl
 833++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        and     $80
 834++CCF2              ;;;;;;                        ret     nz
 835++CCF2              ;;;;;;;clip = 0
# file closed: ././ModelRender/CLIP-LL145.asm
 734+ CCF2              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 735+ CCF2                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyRotmatToTransMat.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyRotmatToTransMat.asm
   1++CCF2              ; Set TransMatTo
   2++CCF2              ; XX16(1 0)   (3 2)   (5 4)   = sidev_x sidev_y sidev_z XX16(13,12) (15 14) (17 16)
   3++CCF2              ; XX16(7 6)   (9 8)   (11 10) = roofv_x roofv_y roofv_z XX16(7 6)   (9 8)   (11 10)
   4++CCF2              ; XX16(13 12) (15 14) (17 16) = nosev_x nosev_y nosev_z XX16(1 0)   (3 2)   (5 4)
   5++CCF2              ; This moves Side XYZ to position 0, Roof XYZ to position 1 annd nose XYZ to position 2 as a copy of each batch of 6 bytes
   6++CCF2              ; 18 byte fast copy
   7++CCF2
   8++CCF2              ; Fast copy using the stack                                                         ; T states
   9++CCF2 DD 21 00 00  CopyRotmatToTransMat:   ld      ix,0                                                ; 14
  10++CCF6 DD 39                                add     ix,sp                                               ; 15
  11++CCF8 31 29 C0                             ld      sp,UBnkrotmatSidevX ; Source                        ; 10
  12++CCFB E1                                   pop     hl                  ; UBnkrotmatSidevX              ; 10
  13++CCFC D1                                   pop     de                  ; UBnkrotmatSidevY              ; 10
  14++CCFD C1                                   pop     bc                  ; UBnkrotmatSidevZ              ; 10
  15++CCFE D9                                   exx                                                         ; 4
  16++CCFF E1                                   pop     hl                  ; UBnkrotmatRoofvX              ; 10
  17++CD00 D1                                   pop     de                  ; UBnkrotmatRoofvY              ; 10
  18++CD01 C1                                   pop     bc                  ; UBnkrotmatRoofvZ              ; 10
  19++CD02 31 6D C0                             ld      sp,UBnkTransmatRoofvZ+2 ; Target + 2 reversed       ; 10
  20++CD05 C5                                   push    bc                                                  ; 10
  21++CD06 D5                                   push    de                                                  ; 10
  22++CD07 E5                                   push    hl                                                  ; 10
  23++CD08 D9                                   exx                                                         ; 4
  24++CD09 C5                                   push    bc                                                  ; 10
  25++CD0A D5                                   push    de                                                  ; 10
  26++CD0B E5                                   push    hl                                                  ; 10
  27++CD0C 31 35 C0                             ld      sp,UBnkrotmatNosevX ; Source                        ; 10
  28++CD0F E1                                   pop     hl                  ; UBnkrotmatSidevX              ; 10
  29++CD10 D1                                   pop     de                  ; UBnkrotmatSidevY              ; 10
  30++CD11 C1                                   pop     bc                  ; UBnkrotmatSidevZ              ; 10
  31++CD12 31 73 C0                             ld      sp,UBnkTransmatNosevZ+2                             ; 10
  32++CD15 C5                                   push    bc                                                  ; 10
  33++CD16 D5                                   push    de                                                  ; 10
  34++CD17 E5                                   push    hl                                                  ; 10
  35++CD18 DD F9                                ld      sp,ix               ; restore stack                 ; 10
  36++CD1A C9                                   ret                                                         ; 10 Total 267 (LDI version is 318)
  37++CD1B
  38++CD1B
  39++CD1B
  40++CD1B              ;CopyRotmatToTransMat:
  41++CD1B              ;                        ld      hl,UBnkrotmatSidevX
  42++CD1B              ;                        ld      de,UBnkTransmatSidevX
  43++CD1B              ;                        SixLDIInstrunctions
  44++CD1B              ;                        ld      hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX
  45++CD1B              ;                        ld      de, UBnkTransmatRoofvX
  46++CD1B              ;                        SixLDIInstrunctions
  47++CD1B              ;                        ld      hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
  48++CD1B              ;                        ld      de, UBnkTransmatNosevX
  49++CD1B              ;                        SixLDIInstrunctions
  50++CD1B              ;                        ret
  51++CD1B
  52++CD1B              CopyRotToTransMacro:    MACRO
  53++CD1B ~                                    ld      hl,UBnkrotmatSidevX
  54++CD1B ~                                    ld      de,UBnkTransmatSidevX
  55++CD1B ~                                    SixLDIInstrunctions
  56++CD1B ~                                    SixLDIInstrunctions
  57++CD1B ~                                    SixLDIInstrunctions
  58++CD1B                                      ENDM
  59++CD1B
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyRotmatToTransMat.asm
 736+ CD1B                                      include "./Universe/Ships/TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15.asm
   1++CD1B              TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15:
   2++CD1B 2A AC C0             ld		hl,(UBnkXX12xLo)					; get X into HL
   3++CD1E 7C           		ld		a,h			                        ; get XX12 Sign
   4++CD1F E6 80        		and		$80									; check sign bit on high byte
   5++CD21 47           		ld		b,a									; and put it in of 12xlo in b
   6++CD22                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
   7++CD22 7C                   ld      a,h
   8++CD23 E6 7F                and     $7F
   9++CD25 67                   ld      h,a
  10++CD26                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  11++CD26 ED 5B 20 C0  		ld		de,(UBnKxlo)						;
  12++CD2A 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnKxsgn)						; get Ship Pos (low,high,sign)
  13++CD2D E6 80        		and		$80									; make sure we only have bit 7
  14++CD2F 4F           		ld		c,a									; and put sign of unkxsgn c
  15++CD30 CD 2F 00     		call 	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC		; this will result in HL = result and A = sign
  16++CD33 B4           		or		h									; combine sign in A with H to give 15 bit signed (*NOT* 2's c)
  17++CD34 67           		ld		h,a
  18++CD35 22 A6 C0     		ld		(UBnkXScaled),hl					; now write it out to XX15 X pos
  19++CD38              ; ..................................
  20++CD38 2A AE C0     		ld		hl,(UBnkXX12yLo)					; Repeat above for Y coordinate
  21++CD3B 7C           		ld		a,h
  22++CD3C E6 80        		and		$80
  23++CD3E 47           		ld		b,a
  24++CD3F                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  25++CD3F 7C                   ld      a,h
  26++CD40 E6 7F                and     $7F
  27++CD42 67                   ld      h,a
  28++CD43                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  29++CD43 ED 5B 23 C0  		ld		de,(UBnKylo)
  30++CD47 3A 25 C0     		ld		a,(UBnKysgn)
  31++CD4A E6 80        		and		$80									; make sure we only have bit 7
  32++CD4C 4F           		ld		c,a
  33++CD4D CD 2F 00     		call 	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC
  34++CD50 B4           		or		h									; combine sign in A with H
  35++CD51 67           		ld		h,a
  36++CD52 22 A8 C0     		ld		(UBnkYScaled),hl
  37++CD55              ; ..................................
  38++CD55 2A B0 C0     		ld		hl,(UBnkXX12zLo)					; and now repeat for Z cooord
  39++CD58 7C           		ld		a,h
  40++CD59 E6 80        		and		$80
  41++CD5B 47           		ld		b,a
  42++CD5C                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  43++CD5C 7C                   ld      a,h
  44++CD5D E6 7F                and     $7F
  45++CD5F 67                   ld      h,a
  46++CD60                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  47++CD60 ED 5B 26 C0  		ld		de,(UBnKzlo)
  48++CD64 3A 28 C0     		ld		a,(UBnKzsgn)
  49++CD67 E6 80        		and		$80									; make sure we only have bit 7
  50++CD69 4F           		ld		c,a
  51++CD6A CD 2F 00     		call 	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC
  52++CD6D B4           		or		h									; combine sign in A with H
  53++CD6E 67           		ld		h,a
  54++CD6F CB 7C        		bit		7,h                                 ; if sign if positive then we don't need to do the clamp so we ony jump
  55++CD71 20 16        		jr		nz,ClampZto4                        ; result was negative so we need to clamp to 4
  56++CD73 E6 7F                and     $7F                                 ; a = value unsigned
  57++CD75 20 06                jr      nz,NoClampZto4                      ; if high byte was 0 then we could need to clamp still by this stage its +v but and will set z flag if high byte is zero
  58++CD77 7D                   ld      a,l                                 ; get low byte now
  59++CD78              		JumpIfALTNusng 4,ClampZto4					; if its < 4 then fix at 4
  59++CD78 FE 04       >                        cp      4
  59++CD7A DA 89 CD    >                        jp		c, ClampZto4
  60++CD7D              NoClampZto4:
  61++CD7D 22 AA C0     		ld		(UBnkZScaled),hl					; hl = signed calculation and > 4
  62++CD80 7D           		ld		a,l									; in addition write out the z cooord to UT for now for backwards compat (DEBUG TODO remove later)
  63++CD81 32 1D 80             ld      (varT),a
  64++CD84 7C           		ld		a,h
  65++CD85 32 00 80             ld      (varU),a
  66++CD88 C9           		ret
  67++CD89              ClampZto4:											; This is where we limit 4 to a minimum of 4
  68++CD89 21 04 00     		ld		hl,4
  69++CD8C 22 AA C0     		ld		(UBnkZScaled),hl; BODGE FOR NOW
  70++CD8F 7D           		ld		a,l
  71++CD90 32 1D 80             ld      (varT),a                            ;                                                                           ;;;
  72++CD93 7C           		ld		a,h
  73++CD94 32 00 80             ld      (varU),a 						; compatibility for now
  74++CD97 C9           		ret
  75++CD98
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15.asm
 737+ CD98                                      include "./Maths/Utilities/ScaleNodeTo8Bit.asm"
# file opened: ././Maths/Utilities/ScaleNodeTo8Bit.asm
   1++CD98              ScaleNodeTo8Bit:								; TODO make signed
   2++CD98 ED 4B AA C0  	ld			bc,(UBnkZScaled)
   3++CD9C 2A A6 C0     	ld			hl,(UBnkXScaled)
   4++CD9F ED 5B A8 C0  	ld			de,(UBnkYScaled)
   5++CDA3              SetABSbc:
   6++CDA3 78           	ld			a,b
   7++CDA4 DD 67        	ld			ixh,a
   8++CDA6 E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit
   9++CDA8 47           	ld			b,a									; bc = ABS bc
  10++CDA9              SetABShl:
  11++CDA9 7C           	ld			a,h
  12++CDAA DD 6F        	ld			ixl,a
  13++CDAC E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit
  14++CDAE 67           	ld			h,a									; hl = ABS hl
  15++CDAF              SetABSde:
  16++CDAF 7A           	ld			a,d
  17++CDB0 FD 67        	ld			iyh,a
  18++CDB2 E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit
  19++CDB4 57           	ld			d,a									; de = ABS de
  20++CDB5              ScaleNodeTo8BitLoop:
  21++CDB5 78               ld          a,b		                            ; U	\ z hi
  22++CDB6 B4           	or			h                                   ; XX15+1	\ x hi
  23++CDB7 B2           	or			d                                   ; XX15+4	\ y hi
  24++CDB8 28 0F            jr          z,ScaleNodeDone                   ; if X, Y, Z = 0  exit loop down once hi U rolled to 0
  25++CDBA                  ShiftHLRight1
  25++CDBA CB 3C       >			   srl h
  25++CDBC CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  26++CDBE                  ShiftDERight1
  26++CDBE CB 3A       >			   srl d
  26++CDC0 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
  27++CDC2              	ShiftBCRight1
  27++CDC2 CB 38       >			   srl b
  27++CDC4 CB 19       >			   rr  c
  28++CDC6 C3 B5 CD         jp          ScaleNodeTo8BitLoop
  29++CDC9              ScaleNodeDone:										; now we have scaled values we have to deal with sign
  30++CDC9 DD 7C        	ld			a,ixh								; get sign bit and or with b
  31++CDCB E6 80        	and			SignOnly8Bit
  32++CDCD B0           	or			b
  33++CDCE 47           	ld			b,a
  34++CDCF              SignforHL:
  35++CDCF DD 7D        	ld			a,ixl								; get sign bit and or with b
  36++CDD1 E6 80        	and			SignOnly8Bit
  37++CDD3 B4           	or			h
  38++CDD4 67           	ld			h,a
  39++CDD5              SignforDE:
  40++CDD5 FD 7C        	ld			a,iyh								; get sign bit and or with b
  41++CDD7 E6 80        	and			SignOnly8Bit
  42++CDD9 B2           	or			d
  43++CDDA 57           	ld			d,a
  44++CDDB              SignsDoneSaveResult:
  45++CDDB ED 43 AA C0  	ld			(UBnkZScaled),bc
  46++CDDF 22 A6 C0     	ld			(UBnkXScaled),hl
  47++CDE2 ED 53 A8 C0  	ld			(UBnkYScaled),de
  48++CDE6 78           	ld			a,b
  49++CDE7 32 00 80     	ld			(varU),a
  50++CDEA 79           	ld			a,c
  51++CDEB 32 1D 80     	ld			(varT),a
  52++CDEE C9           	ret
  53++CDEF
# file closed: ././Maths/Utilities/ScaleNodeTo8Bit.asm

 753+ CE03 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; else do explosion needs all vertices                                                  ;;;
 754+ CE05 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ;  /=4  TODO add this into blueprint data for speed                                                           ;;; For loop = 15 to 0
 755+ CE07 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; b = Xreg = number of normals, faces
 756+ CE08 21 D2 C0                             ld      hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
 757+ CE0B 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF

 759+ CE0D 77           EE30:                   ld      (hl),a
 760+ CE0E 23                                   inc     hl
 761+ CE0F 10 FC                                djnz    SetAllFacesVisibleLoop
 762+ CE11 C9                                   ret
 763+ CE12              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 764+ CE12 3A 03 C4     SetAllFacesHidden:      ld      a,(FaceCtX4Addr)            ; (XX0),Y which is XX0[0C] or UBnkHullCopy+ShipHullFacesCount                           ;;; Faces count (previously loaded into b up front but no need to shave bytes for clarity
 765+ CE15 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; else do explosion needs all vertices                                                  ;;;
 766+ CE17 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ;  /=4                                                                                  ;;; For loop = 15 to 0
 767+ CE19 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; b = Xreg = number of normals, faces
 768+ CE1A 06 10                                ld      b,16
 769+ CE1C 21 D2 C0                             ld      hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
 770+ CE1F 3E 00                                ld      a,$00
 771+ CE21 77           SetAllFacesHiddenLoop:  ld      (hl),a
 772+ CE22 23                                   inc     hl

 786+ CE26                  DISPLAY "Tracing 3", $
 787+ CE26
 788+ CE26                                      include "Universe/Ships/NormaliseTransMat.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/Ships/NormaliseTransMat.asm
   1++CE26              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
   2++CE26 47           Norm256mulAdivQ:        ld      b,a
   3++CE27 0E 00                                ld      c,0
   4++CE29 16 00                                ld      d,0
   5++CE2B 3A 01 80                             ld      a,(varQ)
   6++CE2E 5F                                   ld      e,a
   7++CE2F              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
   8++CE2F              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
   9++CE2F 21 00 00     NormDIV16UNDOC:         ld      hl,0
  10++CE32 78                                   ld      a,b
  11++CE33 06 10                                ld      b,16
  12++CE35 CB 31        NormDIV16UNDOCLOOP:     sll	    c		; unroll 16 times
  13++CE37 17                                   rla	    		; ...
  14++CE38 ED 6A                                adc	    hl,hl		; ...
  15++CE3A ED 52                                sbc	    hl,de		; ...
  16++CE3C 30 02                                jr	    nc,NormDIV16UNDOCSKIP		; ...
  17++CE3E 19                                   add	    hl,de		; ...
  18++CE3F 0D                                   dec	    c		; ...
  19++CE40 10 F3        NormDIV16UNDOCSKIP:     djnz    NormDIV16UNDOCLOOP
  20++CE42 79                                   ld      a,c
  21++CE43 32 02 80                             ld      (varR),a
  22++CE46 C9                                   ret
  23++CE47
  24++CE47 FD 67        Norm256mulAdivQSignA:   ld      iyh,a
  25++CE49                                      ClearSignBitA
  25++CE49 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  26++CE4B CD 26 CE                             call    Norm256mulAdivQ              ; do 15 bit unsigned
  27++CE4E FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh                       ; now correct R reg
  28++CE50                                      SignBitOnlyA
  28++CE50 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  29++CE52 B1                                   or      c
  30++CE53 32 02 80                             ld      (varR),a
  31++CE56 C9                                   ret
  32++CE57
  33++CE57              ; Tested OK
  34++CE57              ;LL21
  35++CE57              NormaliseTransMat:
  36++CE57                      IFDEF LOGMATHS
  37++CE57 ~                            ld      hl,UBnkTransmatNosevZ+1     ; initialise loop
  38++CE57 ~                            ld      b,9                         ; total of 9 elements to transform
  39++CE57 ~                            MMUSelectMathsTables
  40++CE57 ~            .LL21Loop:      ld      d,(hl)
  41++CE57 ~                            dec     hl
  42++CE57 ~                            ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = hilo now   hl now = pointer to low byte
  43++CE57 ~                            ShiftDELeft1                        ; De = DE * 2
  44++CE57 ~                            ld      a,d                         ; a = hi byte after shifting
  45++CE57 ~                            push	hl
  46++CE57 ~                            push	bc
  47++CE57 ~                            call    AEquAmul256Div197Log        ; R = (2(hi).0)/ConstNorm - LL28 Optimised BFRDIV R=A*256/Q = delta_y / delta_x Use Y/X grad. as not steep
  48++CE57 ~                            ;ld      a,c                         ; BFRDIV returns R also in l reg
  49++CE57 ~                            pop		bc
  50++CE57 ~                            pop		hl							; bc gets wrecked by BFRDIV
  51++CE57 ~                            ld      (hl),a                      ; write low result to low byte so zlo = (zhl *2)/197, we keep hi byte in tact as we need the sign bit
  52++CE57 ~                            dec     hl                          ; now hl = hi byte of pre val e.g z->y->x
  53++CE57 ~                            djnz    .LL21Loop                   ; loop from 2zLo through to 0xLo
  54++CE57 ~                            MMUSelectROM0
  55++CE57 ~                            ret
  56++CE57                      ELSE
  57++CE57 21 72 C0                     ld      hl,UBnkTransmatNosevZ+1         ; initialise loop
  58++CE5A 0E C5                        ld      c,ConstNorm                 ; c = Q = norm = 197
  59++CE5C 79                           ld      a,c
  60++CE5D 32 01 80                     ld      (varQ),a                    ; set up varQ
  61++CE60 06 09                        ld      b,9                         ; total of 9 elements to transform
  62++CE62 56           LL21Loop:       ld      d,(hl)
  63++CE63 2B                           dec     hl
  64++CE64 5E                           ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = hilo now   hl now = pointer to low byte
  65++CE65                              ShiftDELeft1                        ; De = DE * 2
  65++CE65 CB 23       >			   sla e
  65++CE67 CB 12       >			   rl  d
  66++CE69 7A                           ld      a,d                         ; a = hi byte after shifting
  67++CE6A E5                           push	hl
  68++CE6B C5                           push	bc
  69++CE6C CD 26 CE                     call    Norm256mulAdivQ
  70++CE6F                              ;===call    RequAmul256divC				; R = (2(hi).0)/ConstNorm - LL28 Optimised BFRDIV R=A*256/Q = delta_y / delta_x Use Y/X grad. as not steep
  71++CE6F 79                           ld      a,c                         ; BFRDIV returns R also in l reg
  72++CE70 C1                           pop		bc
  73++CE71 E1                           pop		hl							; bc gets wrecked by BFRDIV
  74++CE72 77                           ld      (hl),a                      ; write low result to low byte so zlo = (zhl *2)/197, we keep hi byte in tact as we need the sign bit
  75++CE73 2B                           dec     hl                          ; now hl = hi byte of pre val e.g z->y->x
  76++CE74 10 EC                        djnz    LL21Loop                    ; loop from 2zLo through to 0xLo
  77++CE76 C9                           ret
  78++CE77                      ENDIF
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/NormaliseTransMat.asm
 789+ CE77              ;;;                        include "Universe/Ships/NormaliseXX15.asm"

 791+ CE77
 792+ CE77              ; Now we have
 793+ CE77              ;   * XX18(2 1 0) = (x_sign x_hi x_lo)
 794+ CE77              ;   * XX18(5 4 3) = (y_sign y_hi y_lo)
 795+ CE77              ;   * XX18(8 7 6) = (z_sign z_hi z_lo)
 796+ CE77              ;
 797+ CE77              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 798+ CE77                                      include "Universe/Ships/InverseXX16.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/Ships/InverseXX16.asm
   1++CE77              ; TESTEDOK
   2++CE77
   3++CE77              ;ScaleOrientationXX16:                       ; DEBUG TODO will combine with inverse later
   4++CE77              ;        ld      a,(XX17)
   5++CE77              ;        ld      ixl,a
   6++CE77              ;        ld      ixh,9
   7++CE77              ;        ld      hl,UBnkTransInv0x
   8++CE77              ;        ld      a,(hl)
   9++CE77              ;ScaleNode:
  10++CE77              ;        ld      b,ixl
  11++CE77              ;ScaleNodeLoop:
  12++CE77              ;        sla      a
  13++CE77              ;        djnz    ScaleNodeLoop
  14++CE77              ;        ld      (hl),a
  15++CE77              ;        inc     hl
  16++CE77              ;        inc     hl
  17++CE77              ;        dec     ixh
  18++CE77              ;        jr      nz,ScaleNode
  19++CE77              ;        ret
  20++CE77
  21++CE77
  22++CE77              InverseXX16:								; lead routine into .LL42	\ ->  &4B04 \ DO nodeX-Ycoords their comment  \  TrnspMat
  23++CE77              ; we coudl combine this with move to transmat later as an optimisation
  24++CE77              ; INPUT - All Scaled
  25++CE77              ;  They transmat has already been put into side, roof nose order
  26++CE77              ;  XX16   = |sidev_x| |sidev_y| |sidev_z|  1  0  3  2  5  4 note each bytepair is Scaled value in low and high byte just for sign
  27++CE77              ;  XX16   = |roofv_x| |roofv_y| |roofv_z|  7  6  8  9 11 10
  28++CE77              ;  XX16   = |nosev_x| |nosev_y| |nosev_z| 13 12 15 14 17 16
  29++CE77              ; OUTPUT
  30++CE77              ;  XX16(1 0)   ( 3 2) ( 5 4 ) =  sidev_x roofv_x nosev_x
  31++CE77              ;  XX16(7 6)   ( 8 9) (11 10) =  sidev_y roofv_y nosev_y
  32++CE77              ;  XX16(13 12) (15 14)(17 16) =  sidev_z roofv_z nosev_z
  33++CE77              ; First all side values become compoment 0 of each vector
  34++CE77 2A 61 C0             ld      hl,(UBnkTransmatSidevX)     ;
  35++CE7A ED 5B 67 C0          ld      de,(UBnkTransmatRoofvX)     ;
  36++CE7E ED 4B 6D C0          ld      bc,(UBnkTransmatNosevX)     ;
  37++CE82 22 79 C0             ld      (UbnkTransInvRow0x0),hl     ;
  38++CE85 ED 53 7B C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow0x1),de     ;
  39++CE89 ED 43 7D C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow0x2),bc     ;
  40++CE8D 2A 63 C0             ld      hl,(UBnkTransmatSidevY)     ;
  41++CE90 ED 5B 69 C0          ld      de,(UBnkTransmatRoofvY)     ;
  42++CE94 ED 4B 6F C0          ld      bc,(UBnkTransmatNosevY)     ;
  43++CE98 22 81 C0             ld      (UbnkTransInvRow1y0),hl     ;
  44++CE9B ED 53 83 C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow1y1),de     ;
  45++CE9F ED 43 85 C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow1y2),bc     ;
  46++CEA3 2A 65 C0             ld      hl,(UBnkTransmatSidevZ)     ;
  47++CEA6 ED 5B 6B C0          ld      de,(UBnkTransmatRoofvZ)     ;
  48++CEAA ED 4B 71 C0          ld      bc,(UBnkTransmatNosevZ)     ;
  49++CEAE 22 89 C0             ld      (UbnkTransInvRow2z0),hl     ;
  50++CEB1 ED 53 8B C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow2z1),de     ;
  51++CEB5 ED 43 8D C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow2z2),bc     ;
  52++CEB9 C9                   ret
  53++CEBA
  54++CEBA
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/InverseXX16.asm
 799+ CEBA              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 800+ CEBA              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 801+ CEBA              ;   XX12(1 0) = [x y z] . sidev  = (dot_sidev_sign dot_sidev_lo)  = dot_sidev
 802+ CEBA              ;   XX12(3 2) = [x y z] . roofv  = (dot_roofv_sign dot_roofv_lo)  = dot_roofv
 803+ CEBA              ;   XX12(5 4) = [x y z] . nosev  = (dot_nosev_sign dot_nosev_lo)  = dot_nosev
 804+ CEBA              ; Returns
 805+ CEBA              ;
 806+ CEBA              ;   XX12(1 0)            The dot product of [x y z] vector with the sidev (or _x)
 807+ CEBA              ;                        vector, with the sign in XX12+1 and magnitude in XX12
 808+ CEBA              ;
 809+ CEBA              ;   XX12(3 2)            The dot product of [x y z] vector with the roofv (or _y)
 810+ CEBA              ;                        vector, with the sign in XX12+3 and magnitude in XX12+2
 811+ CEBA              ;
 812+ CEBA              ;   XX12(5 4)            The dot product of [x y z] vector with the nosev (or _z)
 813+ CEBA              ;                        vector, with the sign in XX12+5 and magnitude in XX12+4
 814+ CEBA              ; TESTEDOK
 815+ CEBA              XX12DotOneRow:
 816+ CEBA              XX12CalcX:              N0equN1byN2div256 varT, (hl), (UBnkXScaled)       ; T = (hl) * regXX15fx /256
 816+ CEBA 3A A6 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)                        ;
 816+ CEBD 5F          >                        ld      e,a                         ; use e as var Q = value of XX15 [n] lo
 816+ CEBE 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)                        ; A = XX16 element
 816+ CEBF 57          >                        ld      d,a
 816+ CEC0 ED 30       >                        mul
 816+ CEC2 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
 816+ CEC3 32 1D 80    >                        ld      (varT),a                      ; Q         ; result variable = XX16[n] * XX15[n]/256
 817+ CEC6 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 818+ CEC7              XX12CalcXSign:          AequN1xorN2 UBnkXScaledSign,(hl)             ;
 818+ CEC7 3A A7 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkXScaledSign)
 818+ CECA AE          >                        xor     (hl)
 819+ CECB 32 03 80                             ld      (varS),a                            ; Set S to the sign of x_sign * sidev_x
 820+ CECE 23                                   inc     hl
 821+ CECF              XX12CalcY:              N0equN1byN2div256 varQ, (hl),(UBnkYScaled)       ; Q = XX16 * XX15 /256 using varQ to hold regXX15fx
 821+ CECF 3A A8 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)                        ;
 821+ CED2 5F          >                        ld      e,a                         ; use e as var Q = value of XX15 [n] lo
 821+ CED3 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)                        ; A = XX16 element
 821+ CED4 57          >                        ld      d,a
 821+ CED5 ED 30       >                        mul
 821+ CED7 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
 821+ CED8 32 01 80    >                        ld      (varQ),a                      ; Q         ; result variable = XX16[n] * XX15[n]/256
 822+ CEDB                                      ldCopyByte varT,varR                        ; R = T =  |sidev_x| * x_lo / 256
 822+ CEDB 3A 1D 80    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 822+ CEDE 32 02 80    >                        ld       (varR),a
 823+ CEE1 23                                   inc     hl
 824+ CEE2                                      AequN1xorN2 UBnkYScaledSign,(hl)             ; Set A to the sign of y_sign * sidev_y
 824+ CEE2 3A A9 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkYScaledSign)
 824+ CEE5 AE          >                        xor     (hl)
 825+ CEE6              ; (S)A = |sidev_x| * x_lo / 256  = |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo
 826+ CEE6 E5           STequSRplusAQ           push    hl
 827+ CEE7 CD BE 9C                             call    baddll38                            ; JSR &4812 \ LL38   \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ 1byte add (subtract)
 828+ CEEA E1                                   pop     hl
 829+ CEEB 32 1D 80                             ld      (varT),a                            ; T = |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo
 830+ CEEE 23                                   inc     hl
 831+ CEEF              XX12CalcZ:              N0equN1byN2div256 varQ,(hl),(UBnkZScaled)       ; Q = |sidev_z| * z_lo / 256
 831+ CEEF 3A AA C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)                        ;
 831+ CEF2 5F          >                        ld      e,a                         ; use e as var Q = value of XX15 [n] lo
 831+ CEF3 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)                        ; A = XX16 element
 831+ CEF4 57          >                        ld      d,a
 831+ CEF5 ED 30       >                        mul
 831+ CEF7 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
 831+ CEF8 32 01 80    >                        ld      (varQ),a                      ; Q         ; result variable = XX16[n] * XX15[n]/256
 832+ CEFB                                      ldCopyByte varT,varR                        ; R = |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo
 832+ CEFB 3A 1D 80    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 832+ CEFE 32 02 80    >                        ld       (varR),a
 833+ CF01 23                                   inc     hl
 834+ CF02                                      AequN1xorN2 UBnkZScaledSign,(hl)             ; A = sign of z_sign * sidev_z
 834+ CF02 3A AB C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
 834+ CF05 AE          >                        xor     (hl)
 835+ CF06              ; (S)A= |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo + |sidev_z| * z_lo
 836+ CF06 CD BE 9C                             call    baddll38                            ; JSR &4812 \ LL38   \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 837+ CF09              ; Now we exit with A = result S = Sign
 838+ CF09 C9                                   ret
 839+ CF0A
 840+ CF0A
 841+ CF0A                  DISPLAY "Tracing 4", $
 842+ CF0A
 843+ CF0A              ;-- LL51---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 844+ CF0A              ;TESTED OK
 845+ CF0A              ;XX12EquScaleDotOrientation:                         ; .LL51 \ -> &4832 \ XX12=XX15.XX16  each vector is 16-bit x,y,z
 846+ CF0A              XX12EquXX15DotProductXX16:
 847+ CF0A 01 00 00                             ld      bc,0                                ; LDX, LDY 0
 848+ CF0D 21 61 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatSidevX
 849+ CF10 CD BA CE                             call    XX12DotOneRow
 850+ CF13 32 AC C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a
 851+ CF16 3A 03 80                             ld      a,(varS)
 852+ CF19 32 AD C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xSign),a
 853+ CF1C 21 67 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatRoofvX
 854+ CF1F CD BA CE                             call    XX12DotOneRow
 855+ CF22 32 AE C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a
 856+ CF25 3A 03 80                             ld      a,(varS)
 857+ CF28 32 AF C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12ySign),a
 858+ CF2B 21 6D C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatNosevX
 859+ CF2E CD BA CE                             call    XX12DotOneRow

 861+ CF34 3A 03 80                             ld      a,(varS)
