  56++CFF0              XX15EquXX15AddXX18:
  57++CFF0              LL94Z:
  58++CFF0 26 00                ld      h,0                                                     ;           AddZ = FaceData (XX12)z +  ShipPos (XX18)z
  59++CFF2 16 00                ld      d,0                                                     ;
  60++CFF4 3A AA C0             ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)                                         ;
  61++CFF7 6F                   ld      l,a                                                     ;
  62++CFF8 3A AB C0             ld      a,(UBnkZScaledSign)                                     ;
  63++CFFB 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  64++CFFC 3A A0 C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)                                     ;
  65++CFFF 5F                   ld      e,a                                                     ;
  66++D000 3A A2 C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zSgn)                                    ;
  67++D003 4F                   ld      c,a                                                     ;
  68++D004 CD 2F 00             call    ADDHLDESignBC                                           ;
  69++D007 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  70++D008 7C                   ld      a,h                                                     ;
  71++D009 78                   ld      a,b                                                     ;           else  Scaled (XX15) Z = AddZ
  72++D00A 32 AB C0             ld      (UBnkZScaledSign),a                                     ;
  73++D00D 7D                   ld      a,l                                                     ;
  74++D00E 32 AA C0             ld      (UBnkZScaled),a                                         ;           endif
  75++D011              LL94X:
  76++D011 26 00                ld      h,0                                                     ;           AddZ = FaceData (XX12)z +  ShipPos (XX18)z
  77++D013 16 00                ld      d,0                                                     ;
  78++D015 3A A6 C0             ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)                                         ;
  79++D018 6F                   ld      l,a                                                     ;
  80++D019 3A A7 C0             ld      a,(UBnkXScaledSign)                                     ;
  81++D01C 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  82++D01D 3A 9A C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)                                     ;
  83++D020 5F                   ld      e,a                                                     ;
  84++D021 3A 9C C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xSgn)                                    ;
  85++D024 4F                   ld      c,a                                                     ;
  86++D025 CD 2F 00             call    ADDHLDESignBC                                           ;
  87++D028 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  88++D029 7C                   ld      a,h                                                     ;
  89++D02A 78                   ld      a,b                                                     ;           else  Scaled (XX15) Z = AddZ
  90++D02B 32 A7 C0             ld      (UBnkXScaledSign),a                                     ;
  91++D02E 7D                   ld      a,l                                                     ;
  92++D02F 32 A6 C0             ld      (UBnkXScaled),a                                         ;           endif
  93++D032              LL94Y:
  94++D032 26 00                ld      h,0                                                     ;           AddZ = FaceData (XX12)z +  ShipPos (XX18)z
  95++D034 16 00                ld      d,0                                                     ;
  96++D036 3A A8 C0             ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)                                         ;
  97++D039 6F                   ld      l,a                                                     ;

 100++D03E 3A 9D C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)                                     ;
 101++D041 5F                   ld      e,a                                                     ;
 102++D042 3A 9F C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0ySgn)                                    ;
 103++D045 4F                   ld      c,a                                                     ;
 104++D046 CD 2F 00             call    ADDHLDESignBC                                           ;
 105++D049 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
 106++D04A 7C                   ld      a,h                                                     ;
 107++D04B 78                   ld      a,b                                                     ;           else  Scaled (XX15) Z = AddZ
 108++D04C 32 A9 C0             ld      (UBnkYScaledSign),a                                     ;
 109++D04F 7D                   ld      a,l                                                     ;
 110++D050 32 A8 C0             ld      (UBnkYScaled),a                                         ;

 869+ D054                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ToScaled.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ToScaled.asm
   1++D054              CopyXX12ToScaled:
   2++D054              CopyResultToScaled:
   3++D054                      ldCopyByte  XX12+0,UBnkXScaled      ; xnormal lo
   3++D054 3A AC C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+0)
   3++D057 32 A6 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaled),a
   4++D05A                      ldCopyByte  XX12+2,UBnkYScaled      ; ynormal lo
   4++D05A 3A AE C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+2)
   4++D05D 32 A8 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaled),a
   5++D060                      ldCopyByte  XX12+4,UBnkZScaled      ; znormal lo and leaves a holding zscaled normal
   5++D060 3A B0 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+4)
   5++D063 32 AA C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaled),a
   6++D066 C9                   ret
   7++D067
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ToScaled.asm
 870+ D067              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 871+ D067                                      include "./Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm"
# file opened: ././Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm
   1++D067              ;;; Q = XX12 xLo ,A = XX15 xLo
   2++D067              ;;; T = A * Q/256 Usgined  (FMLTU)
   3++D067              ;;; S = XX12 XSign Xor XX15 XSign
   4++D067              ;;; Q = XX12 Ynormal Lo, A = XX15+2 (y lo)
   5++D067              ;;; Q = A * Q/256 Usigned (FMLTI)
   6++D067              ;;; R = T
   7++D067              ;;; A = XX12+3 (ySign) Xor XX15+3 (ySign)
   8++D067              ;;; T = BADD s(A) = R + Q(SA) (xdot + ydot)
   9++D067              ;;; Q = XX12+4 (znormal lo) A = XX15+4 z lo
  10++D067              ;;; Q = A * Q /256 usigned (zdot)
  11++D067              ;;; R = T
  12++D067              ;;; A - XX15+ 5 Zsign Xor XX12+5 Z Sign
  13++D067
  14++D067
  15++D067
  16++D067
  17++D067
  18++D067              MacroAequDxEdiv256usgn:	MACRO
  19++D067 ~            						mul
  20++D067 ~            						ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
  21++D067              						ENDM
  22++D067              DotProductXX12XX15:
  23++D067 3A AC C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12xLo)         ; Use e as var Q for xnormal lo
  24++D06A                      JumpIfAIsZero dotxskipzero
  24++D06A A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  24++D06B CA 88 D0    >                        jp	    z, dotxskipzero
  25++D06E 5F                   ld          e,a
  26++D06F 3A A6 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)         ; use d as XX12 world xform x, e = norm x
  27++D072 57                   ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
  28++D073                      JumpIfAIsZero dotxskipzero
  28++D073 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  28++D074 CA 88 D0    >                        jp	    z, dotxskipzero
  29++D077 ED 30        		mul
  30++D079 42                   ld          b,d                     ; b = result
  31++D07A 3A AD C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
  32++D07D 21 A7 C0             ld          hl,UBnkXScaledSign
  33++D080 AE                   xor         (hl)
  34++D081 E6 80                and         $80                     ; so sign bit only
  35++D083 FD 67                ld          iyh ,a                   ; we actually need to preserve sign in iyh here
  36++D085 C3 8C D0             jp          dotmuly
  37++D088              dotxskipzero:
  38++D088 AF                   xor         a
  39++D089 47                   ld          b,a
  40++D08A FD 67                ld          iyh,a
  41++D08C              dotmuly:
  42++D08C              ; now we have b = XX12 x &d  norm x signed
  43++D08C 3A AE C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
  44++D08F                      JumpIfAIsZero dotyskipzero
  44++D08F A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  44++D090 CA AF D0    >                        jp	    z, dotyskipzero
  45++D093 5F                   ld          e,a
  46++D094 3A A8 C0             ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)         ; XX15+2
  47++D097                      JumpIfAIsZero dotyskipzero
  47++D097 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  47++D098 CA AF D0    >                        jp	    z, dotyskipzero
  48++D09B 57                   ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
  49++D09C ED 30                mul
  50++D09E 4A                   ld          c,d                     ; c = result
  51++D09F DD 69                ld          ixl,c
  52++D0A1 3A AF C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12ySign)       ; A = ysg
  53++D0A4 21 A9 C0             ld          hl, UBnkYScaledSign     ; a= y sign XOR Y scaled sign
  54++D0A7 AE                   xor         (hl)                    ; XX15+3
  55++D0A8 E6 80                and         $80                     ; do b = x mul c = y mul, iyh = sign for b and a = sign for c
  56++D0AA DD 67                ld          ixh,a
  57++D0AC C3 B3 D0             jp          dotaddxy
  58++D0AF              dotyskipzero:
  59++D0AF AF                   xor         a
  60++D0B0 4F                   ld          c,a
  61++D0B1 DD 67                ld          ixh,a
  62++D0B3              dotaddxy:
  63++D0B3              ; Optimise later as this is 16 bit
  64++D0B3 26 00                ld          h,0                     ;
  65++D0B5 68                   ld          l,b                     ; hl = xlo + x scaled
  66++D0B6 16 00                ld          d,0                     ;
  67++D0B8 59                   ld          e,c                     ; de = ylo + yscaled
  68++D0B9 FD 44                ld          b,iyh                   ; b = sign of xlo + xscaled
  69++D0BB 4F                   ld          c,a                     ; c = sign of ylo + yscaled
  70++D0BC CD 2F 00             call ADDHLDESignBC                  ; so now hl = result so will push sign to h
  71++D0BF 47                   ld          b,a                     ; b = resultant sign , hl = add so far
  72++D0C0 3A B0 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12zLo)         ;
  73++D0C3                      JumpIfAIsZero dotzskipzero
  73++D0C3 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  73++D0C4 CA E9 D0    >                        jp	    z, dotzskipzero
  74++D0C7 5F                   ld          e,a                     ;
  75++D0C8 3A AA C0             ld          a,(UBnkZScaled)         ;
  76++D0CB                      JumpIfAIsZero dotzskipzero
  76++D0CB A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  76++D0CC CA E9 D0    >                        jp	    z, dotzskipzero
  77++D0CF 57                   ld          d,a
  78++D0D0 ED 30                mul
  79++D0D2 E5                   push        hl                      ; save prev result
  80++D0D3 3A AB C0             ld          a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
  81++D0D6 21 B1 C0             ld          hl, UBnkXX12zSign       ; XX15+5
  82++D0D9 AE                   xor         (hl)                    ; hi sign
  83++D0DA E6 80                and         $80                     ; a = sign of multiply
  84++D0DC 4F                   ld          c,a                     ; c = sign of z lo & z scaled
  85++D0DD E1                   pop         hl
  86++D0DE 5A                   ld          e,d
  87++D0DF 16 00                ld          d,0
  88++D0E1 CD 2F 00             call ADDHLDESignBC
  89++D0E4 32 03 80             ld          (varS),a
  90++D0E7 7D                   ld          a,l
  91++D0E8 C9                   ret                                 ; returns with A = value, varS = sign
  92++D0E9              dotzskipzero:                               ; if we got here then z was zero so no component so just tidy up from last add
  93++D0E9 78                   ld          a,b
  94++D0EA 32 03 80             ld          (varS),a
  95++D0ED 7D                   ld          a,l
  96++D0EE C9                   ret
  97++D0EF              ;;;;       DotProductXX12XX15:
  98++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12xLo)         ; Use e as var Q for xnormal lo
  99++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          e,a
 100++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)         ; use d as XX12 world xform x, e = norm x
 101++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
 102++D0EF              ;;;;		; FMLTU	\ A=A*Q/256unsg using D as A and E as Q
 103++D0EF              ;;;;		mul
 104++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          b,d                     ; b as var T
 105++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
 106++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          hl,UBnkXScaledSign
 107++D0EF              ;;;;       xor         (hl)
 108++D0EF              ;;;;       and         $80                     ; so sign bit only
 109++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          (varS),a                ; we did use c as S \ S	\ x-sign, but we actually need it in varS for BADD
 110++D0EF              ;;;; now we have b = XX12 x & norm x signed
 111++D0EF              ;;;; by here B = xlo & xscaled C = result sign
 112++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
 113++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          e,a
 114++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)         ; XX15+2
 115++D0EF              ;;;;		ld          d,a						; MISSED THIS EARLIER BUG FIX
 116++D0EF              ;;;;       mul
 117++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          a,d
 118++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          (varQ),a                ; Q = Y y-dot
 119++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          a,b                     ; get back T from above held in b
 120++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          (varR),a                ; R= b \ T	\ x-dot
 121++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12ySign)       ; A = ysg
 122++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          hl, UBnkYScaledSign     ; a= y sign XOR Y scaled sign
 123++D0EF              ;;;;       xor         (hl)                    ; XX15+3
 124++D0EF              ;;;;       and         $80
 125++D0EF              ;;;;       call        baddll38                ; LL38	\ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 126++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          (varT),a                ; var T	\ xdot+ydot
 127++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12zLo)         ; use d as  varQ        ; XX12+4	\ znormal lo to varQ
 128++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          e,a                     ; use e as var Q
 129++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkZScaled)         ;
 130++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          d,a
 131++D0EF              ;;;;       mul
 132++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          a,d
 133++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          (varQ),a                ; Q	\ zdot
 134++D0EF              ;;;;       ldCopyByte  varT,varR               ; copy T to R so R = resutl of previous calc
 135++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
 136++D0EF              ;;;;       ld          hl, UBnkXX12zSign       ; XX15+5
 137++D0EF              ;;;;       xor         (hl)                    ; hi sign
 138++D0EF              ;;;;       and         $80
 139++D0EF              ;;;;       call        baddll38                ; LL38	\ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 140++D0EF              ;;;;       ret                                 ; returns with A = value, varS = sign
 141++D0EF
# file closed: ././Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm
 872+ D0EF              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 873+ D0EF              ; scale Normal. IXL is xReg and A is loaded with XX17 holds the scale factor to apply
 874+ D0EF              ; Not Used in code      include "Universe/Ships/ScaleNormal.asm"
 875+ D0EF              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 876+ D0EF                                      include "./Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm
   1++D0EF              ScaleObjectDistance:
   2++D0EF              ; ">ScaleObjectDistance, scales camera location and returns c = scaling factor (equiv of X reg)"
   3++D0EF 3A 09 C4             ld      a,(QAddr)                   ; Hull byte #18 normals scaled by 2^Q% DtProd^XX2  their comment   Dot product gives  normals' visibility in XX2
   4++D0F2 4F                   ld      c,a                         ; c = Q factor for scaling of normals
   5++D0F3              LL90:                                       ; scaling object distance
   6++D0F3 3A A1 C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zHi)         ; z_hi
   7++D0F6 47                   ld      b,a                         ; z_hi (yReg)
   8++D0F7                      ReturnIfAIsZero                     ; if zHi 0 test ifis object close/small, i.e. zhi already zero then we are done
   8++D0F7 A7          >                        and     a
   8++D0F8 C8          >                        ret     z
   9++D0F9              LL90Loop:
  10++D0F9              ; Loop dividing camera by 2 until zhi is 0 and updating scale factor
  11++D0F9 0C                   inc     c                           ; LL90+3 \ repeat INWK z brought closer, take Qscale X up
  12++D0FA                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0yLo    ; cam Y /= 2
  12++D0FA 2A 9D C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)
  12++D0FD CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  12++D0FF CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  12++D101 22 9D C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),hl
  13++D104                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0xLo    ; cam X /= 2
  13++D104 2A 9A C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)
  13++D107 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  13++D109 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  13++D10B 22 9A C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),hl
  14++D10E                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0zLo    ; cam Z /= 2
  14++D10E 2A A0 C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)
  14++D111 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  14++D113 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  14++D115 22 A0 C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),hl
  15++D118 7C                   ld      a,h                         ; last shift will result in zhi adjusted into h reg.
  16++D119                      JumpIfAIsNotZero LL90Loop           ; loop until z hi = 0 this gives scalinging in c
  16++D119 A7          >                        and     a
  16++D11A C2 F9 D0    >                        jp	    nz,LL90Loop
  17++D11D C9                   ret
  18++D11E
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm
 877+ D11E              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 878+ D11E
 879+ D11E              ; Backface cull
 880+ D11E              ; is the angle between the ship -> camera vector and the normal of the face as long as both are unit vectors soo we can check that normal z > 0
 881+ D11E              ; normal vector = cross product of ship ccordinates
 882+ D11E              ;
 883+ D11E                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX15.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX15.asm
   1++D11E 7E           CopyFaceToXX15:         ld      a,(hl)                      ; get Normal byte 0                                                                    ;;;     if visibility (bits 4 to 0 of byte 0) > XX4
   2++D11F 47                                   ld      b,a                                                    ;;;
   3++D120 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   4++D122 32 A7 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaledSign),a           ; write Sign bits to x sign                                                            ;;;
   5++D125 78                                   ld      a,b
   6++D126 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
   7++D128 47                                   ld      b,a
   8++D129 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   9++D12B 32 A9 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaledSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  10++D12E 78                                   ld      a,b
  11++D12F CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
  12++D131 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  13++D133 32 AB C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaledSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  14++D136 23                                   inc     hl                          ; move to X ccord
  15++D137 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;   XX12 x,y,z lo = Normal[loop].x,y,z
  16++D138 32 A6 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaled),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  17++D13B 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  18++D13C 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  19++D13D 32 A8 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaled),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  20++D140 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  21++D141 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  22++D142 32 AA C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
  23++D145 C9                                   ret
  24++D146
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX15.asm
 884+ D146                                      include "./Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm
   1++D146 7E           CopyFaceToXX12:         ld      a,(hl)                      ; get Normal byte 0                                                                    ;;;     if visibility (bits 4 to 0 of byte 0) > XX4
   2++D147 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; save sign bits to b
   3++D148 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   4++D14A 32 AD C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xSign),a           ; write Sign bits to x sign                                                            ;;;
   5++D14D 78                                   ld      a,b
   6++D14E CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
   7++D150 47                                   ld      b,a
   8++D151 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   9++D153 32 AF C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12ySign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  10++D156 78                                   ld      a,b
  11++D157 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
  12++D159 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  13++D15B 32 B1 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  14++D15E 23                                   inc     hl                          ; move to X ccord
  15++D15F 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;   XX12 x,y,z lo = Normal[loop].x,y,z
  16++D160 32 AC C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  17++D163 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  18++D164 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  19++D165 32 AE C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  20++D168 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  21++D169 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  22++D16A 32 B0 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a
  23++D16D C9                                   ret
  24++D16E
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm
 885+ D16E              ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 886+ D16E              ; Original loginc in EE29 (LL9 4 of 12)
 887+ D16E              ; Enters with XX4 = z distnace scaled to 1 .. 31
 888+ D16E              ; get number of faces * 4      FaceCntX4
 889+ D16E              ; return if no faces
 890+ D16E              ; get Face Normal scale factor FaceScale (XX17)
 891+ D16E              ; get ship pos z hi     (XX18)
 892+ D16E              ; While Z hi <> 0
 893+ D16E              ;    FaceScale = FaceScale + 1           (XX17)
 894+ D16E              ;    Ship pos y = ship pos y / 2         (XX18)
 895+ D16E              ;    ship pos x = ship pos x / 2         (XX18)
 896+ D16E              ;    ship pos z = ship pos z / 2         (XX18)
 897+ D16E              ; Loop
 898+ D16E              ; Copy Ship Pos (XX18) to Scaled         (XX15)
 899+ D16E              ; Get Dot Product of Scaled (XX15) and XX16 (pre inverted) into XX12
 900+ D16E              ; Copy XX12 into XX18
 901+ D16E              ; For each face
 902+ D16E              ;     Get Face sign and visibility distance byte
 903+ D16E              ;     if normal visibility range  < XX4
 904+ D16E              ;        Get Face data into XX12
 905+ D16E              ;        if FaceScale (XX17) >= 4
 906+ D16E              ;            Copy Ship Pos (XX18) to scaled (XX15)                                                                  ::LL143
 907+ D16E              ;        else
 908+ D16E              ;           Copy FaceScale scaled to X  (XX17)
 909+ D16E              ;LabelOverflowLoop:
 910+ D16E              ;           Copy FaceData (XX12) to Scaled (XX15)                                                                   ::LL92
 911+ D16E              ;           While X >= 0
 912+ D16E              ;              X--                                                                                                  ::LL93
 913+ D16E              ;              if  x >= 0
 914+ D16E              ;                  XX15x = XX15x / 2
 915+ D16E              ;                  XX15y = XX15y / 2
 916+ D16E              ;                  XX15y = XX15y / 2
 917+ D16E              ;           loop
 918+ D16E              ;           AddZ = FaceData (XX12)z +  ShipPos (XX18)z                                                              ::LL94
 919+ D16E              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
 920+ D16E              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
 921+ D16E              ;               X = 1
 922+ D16E              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
 923+ D16E              ;           else
 924+ D16E              ;              Scaled (XX15) Z = AddZ
 925+ D16E              ;           endif
 926+ D16E              ;           AddX = FaceData (XX12)x +  ShipPos (XX18)x
 927+ D16E              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
 928+ D16E              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
 929+ D16E              ;               X = 1
 930+ D16E              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
 931+ D16E              ;           else
 932+ D16E              ;              Scaled (XX15) X = AddX
 933+ D16E              ;           endif
 934+ D16E              ;           AddY = FaceData (XX12)y +  ShipPos (XX18)y
 935+ D16E              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
 936+ D16E              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
 937+ D16E              ;               X = 1
 938+ D16E              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
 939+ D16E              ;           else
 940+ D16E              ;              Scaled (XX15) Y = AddY
 941+ D16E              ;           endif
 942+ D16E              ;        endif
 943+ D16E              ;        calculate dot product XX12.XX15  (XX15x * XX12x /256 + XX15y * XX12y /256 + XX15z * XX12z /256)        ::LL89
 944+ D16E              ;        if dot product < 0
 945+ D16E              ;           set face visible
 946+ D16E              ;        else
 947+ D16E              ;           set face invisible
 948+ D16E              ;        end if
 949+ D16E              ;     else
 950+ D16E              ;       Set FaceVisibility to true
 951+ D16E              ;     end if
 952+ D16E              ; Next Face
 953+ D16E
 954+ D16E              ;line of sight vector = [x y z] + face normal vector
 955+ D16E
 956+ D16E              ;               [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]   [ normal_x ]
 957+ D16E              ;  visibility = [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ] . [ normal_y ]
 958+ D16E              ;               [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]   [ normal_z ]
 959+ D16E              ;
 960+ D16E              ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 961+ D16E              ; line of sight (eye outwards dot face normal vector < 0
 962+ D16E              ; So lin eof sight = vector from 0,0,0 to ship pos, now we need to consider teh ship's facing
 963+ D16E              ; now if we add teh veector for teh normal(times magnitude)) to teh ship position we have the true center of the face
 964+ D16E              ; now we can calcualt teh dot product of this caulated vector and teh normal which if < 0 is goot. this means we use rot mat not inverted rotmat.
 965+ D16E                  include "./ModelRender/BackfaceCull.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/BackfaceCull.asm
   1++D16E              ;    DEFINE DEBUGDRAWDISTANCE 1
   2++D16E                  DEFINE CHECKDOTSHIPDATA  1
   3++D16E               ;   DEFINE DEBUGFORCEFACEDRAW 1
   4++D16E 00           CurrentNormIdx  DB 0
   5++D16F              ; SomeFacesVisible:
   6++D16F              ; EE29:
   7++D16F
   8++D16F              ;   Backface cull logic  line of sight vector . face normal vector
   9++D16F              ;       line of sight vector . face normal vector
  10++D16F              ;       => line of sight vector = [x y z] + face normal vector
  11++D16F              ;       Where [x y z] =
  12++D16F              ;                                               [ [x y z] . sidev ]
  13++D16F              ;                    projected [x y z] vector = [ [x y z] . roofv ]
  14++D16F              ;                                               [ [x y z] . nosev ]
  15++D16F              ;
  16++D16F              ;   so project the [x y z] vector into the face's normal space
  17++D16F              ;  line of sight vector = projected [x y z] vector + face normal vector
  18++D16F              ;                         [ [x y z] . sidev ]   [ normal_x ]
  19++D16F              ;                       = [ [x y z] . roofv ] + [ normal_y ]
  20++D16F              ;                         [ [x y z] . nosev ]   [ normal_z ]
  21++D16F              ;
  22++D16F              ;                         [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]
  23++D16F              ;                       = [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ]
  24++D16F              ;                         [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]
  25++D16F              ;
  26++D16F              ; so
  27++D16F              ;              visibility = [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]   [ normal_x ]
  28++D16F              ;                            [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ] . [ normal_y ]
  29++D16F              ;                           [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]   [ normal_z ]
  30++D16F              ;
  31++D16F              ; where face is visible if visibility < 0
  32++D16F              ;
  33++D16F              ;   so we set XX15 to [x y z] . sidev
  34++D16F              ;                     [x y z] . roofv
  35++D16F              ;                     [x y z] . nosev
  36++D16F              ;
  37++D16F
  38++D16F
  39++D16F
  40++D16F 3A A1 C0     ScaleDrawcam:           ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zHi)         ; if z hi is 0 then we have scaled XX18
  41++D172                                      JumpIfAIsZero .ScaleDone            ;
  41++D172 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  41++D173 CA 9F D1    >                        jp	    z, .ScaleDone
  42++D176 2A 9A C0                             ld      hl,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)        ; pull postition into registers
  43++D179 ED 5B 9D C0                          ld      de,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)        ; we only pull in if needed to save fetches
  44++D17D ED 4B A0 C0                          ld      bc,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)        ;
  45++D181 FD 2C        .ScaleNormalLoop:       inc     iyl                         ; Q goes up by one
  46++D183                                      ShiftHLRight1                       ; divide cam position by 2
  46++D183 CB 3C       >			   srl h
  46++D185 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  47++D187                                      ShiftDERight1                       ;
  47++D187 CB 3A       >			   srl d
  47++D189 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
  48++D18B                                      ShiftBCRight1                       ;
  48++D18B CB 38       >			   srl b
  48++D18D CB 19       >			   rr  c
  49++D18F 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; loop if not scaled down
  50++D190                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero .ScaleNormalLoop     ;
  50++D190 A7          >                        and     a
  50++D191 C2 81 D1    >                        jp	    nz,.ScaleNormalLoop
  51++D194 22 9A C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),hl        ; save position back to XX18
  52++D197 ED 53 9D C0                          ld      (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),de        ;
  53++D19B ED 43 A0 C0                          ld      (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),bc        ;
  54++D19F FD 7D        .ScaleDone:             ld      a,iyl
  55++D1A1 32 08 80                             ld      (varXX17),a                  ; XX17 = normal scale factor for current ship adjusted for camera
  56++D1A4 C9                                   ret
  57++D1A5
  58++D1A5 3A 28 C0     CheckVisible:           ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                 ; Is the ship behind us
  59++D1A8 E6 80        .CheckBehind:           and     SignOnly8Bit                 ; which means z sign is negative
  60++D1AA 20 31                                jr      nz,.ShipNoDraw               ; .
  61++D1AC 2A 26 C0     .CheckViewPort:         ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                 ; now check to see if its within 90 degree arc
  62++D1AF 7C                                   ld      a,h
  63++D1B0                                      JumpIfAGTENusng ShipMaxDistance, .ShipNoDraw
  63++D1B0 FE C0       >                        cp     ShipMaxDistance
  63++D1B2 D2 DD D1    >                        jp		nc,.ShipNoDraw
  64++D1B5 ED 5B 20 C0  .CheckXAxis:            ld      de,(UBnKxlo)                 ; if abs x > abx z then its out side of view port
  65++D1B9 CD A7 99                             call    compare16HLDE
  66++D1BC 38 1F                                jr      c,.ShipNoDraw               ; ship is too far out on the X Axis
  67++D1BE ED 5B 23 C0  .CheckYAxis:            ld      de,(UBnKylo)                ; if abs y > abx z then its out side of view port
  68++D1C2 CD A7 99                             call    compare16HLDE
  69++D1C5 38 16                                jr      c,.ShipNoDraw               ; ship is too far out on the X Axis
  70++D1C7                                      IFDEF   CHECKDOTSHIPDATA
  71++D1C7 3A 04 C4     .CheckDotV2:                ld      a,(DotAddr)
  72++D1CA                                          JumpIfAGTENusng h, .DrawFull
  72++D1CA BC          >                        cp     h
  72++D1CB D2 D1 D1    >                        jp		nc,.DrawFull
  73++D1CE C3 E3 D1                                 jp      .ShipIsADot
  74++D1D1 3A 54 C0     .DrawFull:                  ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)            ; its visible but a dot
  75++D1D4 F6 40                                    or      ShipIsVisible               ; Visible and not a dot
  76++D1D6 E6 F7                                    and     ShipIsNotDot                ;
  77++D1D8 32 54 C0                                 ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a            ;
  78++D1DB                                          ClearCarryFlag
  78++D1DB B7          >                        or a
  79++D1DC C9                                       ret
  80++D1DD                                      ELSE
  81++D1DD ~            .CalculateXX4:              ShiftHLRight1                       ; hl = z pos / 8
  82++D1DD ~                                        ShiftHLRight1                       ; .
  83++D1DD ~                                        ShiftHLRight1                       ; .
  84++D1DD ~                                        ld      a,h
  85++D1DD ~                                        srl     a                           ; if a / 16 <> 0 then ship is a dot
  86++D1DD ~            .DrawAsDotCheck:            JumpIfNotZero   .ShipIsADot
  87++D1DD ~                                        ; Check visbility distance
  88++D1DD ~            .SetXX4Dist:                ;break
  89++D1DD ~                                        ld      a,l
  90++D1DD ~                                        rra                                 ; l may have had bit 0 of h carried in
  91++D1DD ~                                        srl     a                           ; so move it to bit 4 giving A as distance $000xxxxx
  92++D1DD ~                                        srl     a
  93++D1DD ~                                        srl     a
  94++D1DD ~                                        ld      (UBnkDrawAllFaces),a        ; XX4 = "all faces" distance
  95++D1DD ~                                        ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)            ; its visible but a dot
  96++D1DD ~                                        or      ShipIsVisible               ; Visible and not a dot
  97++D1DD ~                                        and     ShipIsNotDot                ;
  98++D1DD ~                                        ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a            ;
  99++D1DD ~                                        ClearCarryFlag
 100++D1DD ~                                        ret
 101++D1DD                                      ENDIF
 102++D1DD              .ShipNoDraw:            ClearMemBitN  UBnkaiatkecm  , ShipIsVisibleBitNbr ; Assume its hidden
 102++D1DD 21 54 C0    >                        ld      hl,UBnkaiatkecm
 102++D1E0 CB B6       >                        res     ShipIsVisibleBitNbr,(hl)
 103++D1E2 C9                                   ret
 104++D1E3 3A 54 C0     .ShipIsADot:            ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)            ; its visible but a dot
 105++D1E6                                      IFDEF DEBUGDRAWDISTANCE
 106++D1E6 ~                                        or      ShipIsVisible   ;
 107++D1E6                                      ELSE
 108++D1E6 F6 48                                    or      ShipIsVisible | ShipIsDot   ;
 109++D1E8                                      ENDIF
 110++D1E8 32 54 C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a            ;
 111++D1EB C9                                   ret
 112++D1EC
 113++D1EC                                                  DISPLAY "TODO:remove all teh processing of rotmat to load craft to camera as its already been done"
 114++D1EC              CullV2:                 ReturnIfMemisZero FaceCtX4Addr      ;
 114++D1EC 3A 03 C4    >                        ld   a,(FaceCtX4Addr)
 114++D1EF A7          >                        and a
 114++D1F0 C8          >                        ret    z
 115++D1F1                                     ; break
 116++D1F1 CD F2 CC                             call    CopyRotmatToTransMat        ; XX16 = UBNKRotMat
 117++D1F4 CD 9A 7B                             call    ScaleXX16Matrix197          ; scale rotation matrix in XX16
 118++D1F7 CD AA CF                             call    LoadCraftToCamera           ; XX18 = camera
 119++D1FA                                      ;call    CopyCameraToXX15Signed      ; Copy the camera to XX15 as signed 15 bit
 120++D1FA 3A 09 C4     .BackfaceLoop:          ld      a,(QAddr)                   ;
 121++D1FD FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = scale factor
 122++D1FF              ; By this point XX18 = scaled draw cam and iyl = scale factor
 123++D1FF CD 6F D1                             call    ScaleDrawcam                ; XX18 = scaled camera XX17 = scale
 124++D202 CD CE CF                             call    CopyCameraToXX15Signed      ; Xx18 -> xx15 sign + 15 bit
 125++D205 CD 2D 7B     .LL91:                  call    XX12EquNodeDotXX16          ; xx12 = Scaled Camera . Rotation matrix (Note Xx16 no Xx16 inv)
 126++D208 CD 3B CF                             call    CopyXX12ScaledToXX18        ; now xx18 = XX12 = xx15.xx16
 127++D20B 21 C9 C5     .PrepNormals:           ld      hl,UBnkHullNormals                                                                                                 ;;; V = address of Normal start
 128++D20E 22 07 7F                             ld      (varV),hl
 129++D211 3A 03 C4                             ld      a,(FaceCtX4Addr)                                        ; For each face
 130++D214 CB 3F                                srl     a                                              ;
 131++D216 CB 3F                                srl     a                                              ;
 132++D218 47                                   ld      b,a                                            ;
 133++D219 AF                                   xor     a
 134++D21A 32 6E D1                             ld      (CurrentNormIdx),a                                          ; used to increment up face incdex as b decrements
 135++D21D E5           .ProcessNormalsLoop:    push    hl
 136++D21E C5                                   push    bc
 137++D21F 7E           .LL86:                  ld      a,(hl)                                         ; Get Face sign and visibility distance byte
 138++D220 E6 1F                                and     $1F                                            ; if normal visibility range  < XX4
 139++D222 E5                                   push    hl
 140++D223 21 52 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkDrawAllFaces
 141++D226 BE                                   cp      (hl)
 142++D227 E1                                   pop     hl
 143++D228                                      IFDEF DEBUGFORCEFACEDRAW
 144++D228 ~                                        jp      .FaceVisible
 145++D228                                      ELSE
 146++D228 DA 6D D3                                 jp      c,.FaceVisible              ; then we always draw
 147++D22B                                      ENDIF
 148++D22B              ; This bit needs to be added to force face visible
 149++D22B CD 46 D1     .LL87:                  call    CopyFaceToXX12              ; XX12 = normal (repolaced scale version) as a working copy
 150++D22E 3A 08 80                             ld      a,(XX17)                    ; a = q scale XX17 cauclated by the call to ScaleDrawcam
 151++D231 47                                   ld      b,a
 152++D232                                      JumpIfALTNusng 4,.ScaleNormByXX17   ; if q >= 4 then is so big we don;t factor in + normal for dot product
 152++D232 FE 04       >                        cp      4
 152++D234 DA 6F D2    >                        jp		c, .ScaleNormByXX17
 153++D237 CD 85 CF     .LL143:                 call    CopyXX18toXX15              ; and we just set XX15 = scaled Camera dot rotation matrix
 154++D23A C3 FE D2                             jp      .DoneScalingIntoXX15        ; Now Process XX12 normal
 155++D23D 3A 9A C0     .Ovflw:                 ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)         ; divide camera by 2 if overflow
 156++D240 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; which is held in XX18
 157++D242 32 9A C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),a         ; .
 158++D245 3A A0 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)         ; .
 159++D248 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; .
 160++D24A 32 A0 C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),a         ; .
 161++D24D 3A 9D C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)         ; .
 162++D250 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; .
 163++D252 32 9D C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),a        ; .
 164++D255 06 01        .ScaleXScaledAgain:     ld      b,1                         ; set scale to 1 so we divide original normal by 2 into face and try again and hope we didn't scaled down XX12 earlier so if we did then we must be in the do doo as the object was obscenely large and very close
 165++D257                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkXScaled         ; Divide XX15 by 2^B
 165++D257 3A A6 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)
 165++D25A CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 165++D25C 32 A6 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkXScaled),a
 166++D25F                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkYScaled         ;
 166++D25F 3A A8 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)
 166++D262 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 166++D264 32 A8 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkYScaled),a
 167++D267                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkZScaled         ;
 167++D267 3A AA C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)
 167++D26A CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 167++D26C 32 AA C0    >                    ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
 168++D26F              ; if we jumped to here scale factor < 4 so we copy in normal to XX15 (scaled) LL92
 169++D26F              .ScaleNormByXX17:       ;ld      b,a
 170++D26F CD 60 CF                             call    CopyXX12toXX15
 171++D272 05           .LL93                   dec     b
 172++D273 FA 92 D2                             jp      m, .ScaledNorm
 173++D276              .LL93Loop:              ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkXScaled        ; Divide XX15 by 2^B, I think this should be really XX12 and is a bug in the original code
 173++D276 3A A6 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)
 173++D279 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 173++D27B 32 A6 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkXScaled),a
 174++D27E                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkYScaled        ;
 174++D27E 3A A8 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)
 174++D281 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 174++D283 32 A8 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkYScaled),a
 175++D286                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkZScaled        ;
 175++D286 3A AA C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)
 175++D289 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 175++D28B 32 AA C0    >                    ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
 176++D28E 05                                   dec     b                          ;
 177++D28F F2 76 D2                             jp      p,.LL93Loop                ; Now we have XX15 as scaled Normal, XX15 as camera, don;t really knwo why as cals work on XX12 and XX18
 178++D292              .ScaledNorm:            ;ORIG CODE DOES NOT HAVE THIS call    CopyXX15ToXX12 ; DEBUG as XX15 shoudl be a sacled nromal
 179++D292              ; Add normal to XX15
 180++D292              ; if we jumped here direct from LL143 then XX15 = drawcam scaled by Q, XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX18 = drawcam scaled also
 181++D292              ; if we jumped here via scaling       then XX15 = normal scaled by Q,  XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX16 = drawcam scaled
 182++D292              ; if we hit an overflow               then XX15 = drawcam scaled by Q  XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX18 = (drawcam scaled / 2 ) / 2^ nbr overflows (if we cam in vai scaling then its a mess?
 183++D292              ; So LL94 is wrong as it shoud be operating on XX12 not XX15
 184++D292              .LL94:                  ldCopyByte UBnkZScaled, varR        ; ldCopyByte  UBnkZScaled,     varR  ; if we jumped direct XX15 = drawcam scaled, Xx12 = normal xx18 = drawcam
 184++D292 3A AA C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkZScaled)
 184++D295 32 02 80    >                        ld       (varR),a
 185++D298                                      ldCopyByte UBnkXX12zSign, varS      ; ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled,     varS  ; if we did scaling then xx15 = norm scaled XX18 = drawcam
 185++D298 3A B1 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12zSign)
 185++D29B 32 03 80    >                        ld       (varS),a
 186++D29E                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0zLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam Z signed
 186++D29E 3A A0 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)
 186++D2A1 32 01 80    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 187++D2A4 3A A2 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zSgn)        ; .
 188++D2A7 CD BE 9C                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = drawcam Z dot + z
 189++D2AA DA 3D D2                             jp      c,.Ovflw
 190++D2AD 32 AA C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaled),a             ; XX15Z = SA
 191++D2B0                                      ldCopyByte  varS, UBnkZScaledSign   ;
 191++D2B0 3A 03 80    >                        ld       a,(varS)
 191++D2B3 32 AB C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaledSign),a
 192++D2B6                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXScaled,     varR   ; SR = normal X
 192++D2B6 3A A6 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXScaled)
 192++D2B9 32 02 80    >                        ld       (varR),a
 193++D2BC                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12xSign,   varS   ; .
 193++D2BC 3A AD C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
 193++D2BF 32 03 80    >                        ld       (varS),a
 194++D2C2                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0xLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam x dot
 194++D2C2 3A 9A C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)
 194++D2C5 32 01 80    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 195++D2C8 3A 9C C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xSgn)        ; .
 196++D2CB CD BE 9C                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = normal x + drawcam x dot
 197++D2CE DA 3D D2                             jp      c,.Ovflw
 198++D2D1 32 A6 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaled),a             ; XX15Z = SA
 199++D2D4                                      ldCopyByte  varS, UBnkXScaledSign   ; .
 199++D2D4 3A 03 80    >                        ld       a,(varS)
 199++D2D7 32 A7 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaledSign),a
 200++D2DA                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled, varR       ; SR = normal Y
 200++D2DA 3A A8 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkYScaled)
 200++D2DD 32 02 80    >                        ld       (varR),a
 201++D2E0                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12ySign, varS     ; .
 201++D2E0 3A AF C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12ySign)
 201++D2E3 32 03 80    >                        ld       (varS),a
 202++D2E6                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0yLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam y dot
 202++D2E6 3A 9D C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)
 202++D2E9 32 01 80    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 203++D2EC 3A 9F C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0ySgn)        ; .
 204++D2EF CD BE 9C                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = normal y + drawcam y dot
 205++D2F2 DA 3D D2                             jp      c,.Ovflw                    ; .
 206++D2F5 32 A8 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaled),a             ; XX15 Y = SA
 207++D2F8                                      ldCopyByte   varS, UBnkYScaledSign  ; .
 207++D2F8 3A 03 80    >                        ld       a,(varS)
 207++D2FB 32 A9 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaledSign),a
 208++D2FE              ; calculate dot product LL89
 209++D2FE              .DoneScalingIntoXX15:   ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12xLo, varQ       ; Q = norm X XX12
 209++D2FE 3A AC C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12xLo)
 209++D301 32 01 80    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 210++D304 3A A6 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)             ; A = XX15 X
 211++D307 CD 29 9C                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 212++D30A 32 1D 80                             ld      (varT),a                    ; T = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 213++D30D 3A AD C0                             ld      a,(UBnkXX12xSign)           ; S = sign of XX15 X * XX12 X
 214++D310 21 A7 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkXScaledSign          ; .
 215++D313 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 216++D314 32 03 80                             ld      (varS),a                    ; .
 217++D317                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12yLo, varQ       ; Q = norm Y XX12
 217++D317 3A AE C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
 217++D31A 32 01 80    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 218++D31D 3A A8 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)             ; A = XX15 Y
 219++D320 CD 29 9C                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 220++D323 32 01 80                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q = XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 221++D326                                      ldCopyByte  varT,varR               ; R = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 221++D326 3A 1D 80    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 221++D329 32 02 80    >                        ld       (varR),a
 222++D32C 3A AF C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkXX12ySign)         ; A = sign of XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 223++D32F 21 A9 C0                             ld      hl, UBnkYScaledSign         ; .
 224++D332 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 225++D333 CD BE 9C                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = SR+AQ = (X calc) + (Y calc)
 226++D336 32 1D 80                             ld      (varT),a                    ; T = usigned (X calc) + (Y calc)
 227++D339                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12zLo, varQ       ; Q = XX12 Z
 227++D339 3A B0 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12zLo)
 227++D33C 32 01 80    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 228++D33F 3A AA C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkZScaled)           ; A = XX15 Z
 229++D342 CD 29 9C                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 230++D345 32 01 80                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q = XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 231++D348                                      ldCopyByte  varT, varR              ; R = usigned (X calc) + (Y calc)
 231++D348 3A 1D 80    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 231++D34B 32 02 80    >                        ld       (varR),a
 232++D34E 3A AB C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkZScaledSign)       ; A = sign of XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 233++D351 21 B1 C0                             ld      hl, UBnkXX12zSign           ; .
 234++D354 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 235++D355 CD BE 9C                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = ((X+Y signed)) (Z signed)
 236++D358 FE 00                                cp      0                           ; was the result 0, if so then there are scenarios where SAEquSRPlusAQ can return -ve 0
 237++D35A 28 08                                jr      z,.FaceNotVisible           ; in which case face is not visible
 238++D35C 3A 03 80                             ld      a,(varS)                    ; if the cacl was a negative number then its visible
 239++D35F ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ; this should test S not A
 240++D362 20 09                                jr      nz,.FaceVisible                                      ;        if dot product < 0 set face visible
 241++D364 3A 6E D1     .FaceNotVisible:         ld          a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 242++D367 CD F8 CD                             call        SetFaceAHidden                                      ;           set face invisible
 243++D36A C3 73 D3                             jp          .ProcessNormalLoopEnd                                ;        end if
 244++D36D 3A 6E D1     .FaceVisible:            ld          a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 245++D370 CD EF CD                             call        SetFaceAVisible
 246++D373 21 6E D1     .ProcessNormalLoopEnd:  ld          hl, CurrentNormIdx
 247++D376 34                                   inc         (hl)                    ; move index pointer up by one
 248++D377 C1                                   pop         bc
 249++D378 E1                                   pop         hl                      ; get normal data pointer back
 250++D379 3E 04                                ld          a,4
 251++D37B ED 31                                add         hl,a                    ; move to next normal entry
 252++D37D 22 07 7F                             ld          (varV),hl               ; save as we need it again
 253++D380 05                                   dec         b
 254++D381 C2 1D D2                             jp          nz,.ProcessNormalsLoop
 255++D384 C9                                   ret
 256++D385

 968+ D385              TransposeXX12NodeToXX15:
 969+ D385                      ldCopyByte  UBnKxsgn,UbnkXPointSign           ; UBnkXSgn => XX15+2 x sign
 969+ D385 3A 22 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnKxsgn)

 973+ D393              ; XX15 [0,1] = INWK[0]+ XX12[0] + 256*INWK[1]                                                                                       ;;;          while any of x,y & z hi <> 0
 974+ D393              NodeXPositiveX:
 975+ D393 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; We picked up XX12+0 above in bc Xlo
 976+ D394 06 00                ld          b,0                                 ; but only want to work on xlo                                                           ;;;              XX15xHiLo = XX12HiLo + xpos lo             XCALC
 977+ D396 2A 20 C0             ld          hl,(UBnKxlo)                       ; hl = XX1 UBNKxLo

 979+ D39B 09                   add         hl,bc                               ; its a 16 bit add

 992+ D3B4              NodeXNegSignChangeX:
 993+ D3B4              ; If we get here the result is 2'c compliment so we reverse it and flip sign
 994+ D3B4 CD C8 93             call        negate16hl                          ; Convert back to positive and flip sign
 995+ D3B7 3A A8 C0             ld          a,(UbnkXPointSign)                 ; XX15+2
 996+ D3BA EE 80                xor         $80                                 ; Flip bit 7
 997+ D3BC 32 A8 C0             ld          (UbnkXPointSign),a                 ; XX15+2
 998+ D3BF              SetAndMopX:

1052+ D418              NegativeNodeZ:

1058+ D422 ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; 6502 used carry flag compliment
1059+ D424 7D                   ld          a,l

1064+ D42F              LL56Overflow:

1066+ D431 20 16                jr          nz,NodeAdditionsDone                ; Enter Node additions done, UT=z
1067+ D433 3A 1D 80             ld          a,(varT)                            ; T \ restore z lo
1068+ D436                      ReturnIfAGTENusng 4                              ; >= 4 ? zlo big enough, Enter Node additions done.

1068+ D438 D0          >                        ret	 nc
1069+ D439              MakeNodeClose:
1070+ D439              LL140:                                                  ; else make node close
