1077+ D443              ProcessVisibleNode:
1078+ D443              RotateNode:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1079+ D443 CD 0A CF             call        XX12EquXX15DotProductXX16                                                                                       ;;;           call      XX12=XX15.XX16
1080+ D446              LL52LL53LL54LL55
1081+ D446              TransposeNode:
1082+ D446 CD 85 D3             call        TransposeXX12NodeToXX15
1083+ D449
1084+ D449              ; ......................................................                                                         ;;;
1085+ D449              NodeAdditionsDone:
1086+ D449              Scale16BitTo8Bit:
1087+ D449              LL57:                                                   ; Enter Node additions done, z=T.U set up from LL55
1088+ D449 3A 00 80             ld          a,(varU)                            ; U \ z hi
1089+ D44C 21 A7 C0             ld          hl,UbnkXPointHi
1090+ D44F B6                   or          (hl)                                ; XX15+1    \ x hi
1091+ D450 21 AA C0             ld          hl,UbnkYPointHi
1092+ D453 B6                   or          (hl)                                ; XX15+4    \ y hi
1093+ D454              AreXYZHiAllZero:
1094+ D454 28 2B                jr          z,NodeScalingDone                   ; if X, Y, Z = 0  exit loop down once hi U rolled to 0
1095+ D456              DivideXYZBy2:
1096+ D456                      ShiftMem16Right1    UbnkXPoint                  ; XX15[0,1]
1096+ D456 2A A6 C0    >                    ld    hl,(UbnkXPoint)
1096+ D459 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
1096+ D45B CB 1D       >                    rr    l
1096+ D45D 22 A6 C0    >                    ld    (UbnkXPoint),hl
1097+ D460                      ShiftMem16Right1    UbnkYPoint                  ; XX15[3,4]
1097+ D460 2A A9 C0    >                    ld    hl,(UbnkYPoint)
1097+ D463 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
1097+ D465 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
1097+ D467 22 A9 C0    >                    ld    (UbnkYPoint),hl
1098+ D46A 3A 00 80             ld          a,(varU)                            ; U \ z hi
1099+ D46D 67                   ld          h,a
1100+ D46E 3A 1D 80             ld          a,(varT)                            ; T \ z lo
1101+ D471 6F                   ld          l,a
1102+ D472                      ShiftHLRight1
1102+ D472 CB 3C       >			   srl h
1102+ D474 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
1103+ D476 7C                   ld          a,h
1104+ D477 32 00 80             ld          (varU),a
1105+ D47A 7D                   ld          a,l
1106+ D47B 32 1D 80             ld          (varT),a                            ; T \ z lo
1107+ D47E C3 49 D4             jp          Scale16BitTo8Bit                    ; loop U
1108+ D481              NodeScalingDone:
1109+ D481              LL60:                                                   ; hi U rolled to 0, exited loop above.
1110+ D481              ProjectNodeToScreen:
1111+ D481                      ldCopyByte  varT,varQ                           ; T =>  Q   \ zdist lo
1111+ D481 3A 1D 80    >                        ld       a,(varT)
1111+ D484 32 01 80    >                        ld       (varQ),a
1112+ D487 3A A6 C0             ld          a,(UbnkXPointLo)                    ; XX15  \ rolled x lo
1113+ D48A 21 01 80             ld          hl,varQ
1114+ D48D BE                   cp          (hl)                                ; Q
1115+ D48E                      JumpIfALTusng DoSmallAngle                      ; LL69 if xdist < zdist hop over jmp to small x angle
1115+ D48E DA 97 D4    >                        jp		c,DoSmallAngle
1116+ D491 CD 35 9D             call        RequAdivQ                           ; LL61  \ visit up  R = A/Q = x/z
1117+ D494 C3 9F D4             jp          SkipSmallAngle                      ; LL65  \ hop over small xangle
1118+ D497              DoSmallAngle:                                           ; small x angle
1119+ D497              LL69:
1120+ D497              ; TODO check if we need to retain BC as this trashes it
1121+ D497              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
1122+ D497              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
1123+ D497 47                   ld      b,a
1124+ D498 CD 48 96             call    DIV16UNDOC
1125+ D49B 79                   ld      a,c
1126+ D49C 32 02 80             ld      (varR),a
1127+ D49F               ;;;       call        RequAmul256divQ                     ; LL28  \ BFRDIV R=A*256/Q byte for remainder of division
1128+ D49F              SkipSmallAngle:
1129+ D49F              ScaleX:
1130+ D49F              LL65:                                                   ; both continue for scaling based on z
1131+ D49F 3A A8 C0             ld          a,(UbnkXPointSign)                  ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
1132+ D4A2                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,NegativeXPoint                 ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
1132+ D4A2 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1132+ D4A4 C2 B7 D4    >                        jp      nz,NegativeXPoint
1133+ D4A7              ; ......................................................
1134+ D4A7              PositiveXPoint:
1135+ D4A7 3A 02 80             ld          a,(varR)
1136+ D4AA 6F                   ld          l,a
1137+ D4AB 3A 00 80             ld          a,(varU)
1138+ D4AE 67                   ld          h,a
1139+ D4AF 3E 80                ld          a,ScreenCenterX
1140+ D4B1 ED 31                add         hl,a
1141+ D4B3 EB                   ex          de,hl
1142+ D4B4 C3 C7 D4             jp          StoreXPoint
1143+ D4B7              NegativeXPoint:
1144+ D4B7              LL62:                                                   ; Arrive from LL65 just below, screen for -ve RU onto XX3 heap, index X=CNT ;;;
1145+ D4B7 3A 02 80             ld          a,(varR)
1146+ D4BA 6F                   ld          l,a
1147+ D4BB 3A 00 80             ld          a,(varU)
1148+ D4BE 67                   ld          h,a
1149+ D4BF 0E 80                ld          c,ScreenCenterX
1150+ D4C1 06 00                ld          b,0
1151+ D4C3                      ClearCarryFlag
1151+ D4C3 B7          >                        or a
1152+ D4C4 ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = RU-ScreenCenterX
1153+ D4C6 EB                   ex          de,hl
1154+ D4C7              StoreXPoint:                                            ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1155+ D4C7 FD 73 00             ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point
1156+ D4CA FD 72 01             ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
1157+ D4CD FD 23                inc         iy
1158+ D4CF FD 23                inc         iy
1159+ D4D1              ; ......................................................
1160+ D4D1              LL66:
1161+ D4D1              ProcessYPoint:
1162+ D4D1 AF                   xor         a                                   ; y hi = 0
1163+ D4D2 32 00 80             ld          (varU),a                            ; U
1164+ D4D5                      ldCopyByte  varT,varQ                           ; Q \ zdist lo
1164+ D4D5 3A 1D 80    >                        ld       a,(varT)
1164+ D4D8 32 01 80    >                        ld       (varQ),a
1165+ D4DB 3A A9 C0             ld          a,(UbnkYPointLo)                    ; XX15+3 \ rolled y low
1166+ D4DE 21 01 80             ld          hl,varQ
1167+ D4E1 BE                   cp          (hl)                                ; Q
1168+ D4E2                      JumpIfALTusng SmallYHop                         ; if ydist < zdist hop to small yangle
1168+ D4E2 DA EB D4    >                        jp		c,SmallYHop
1169+ D4E5              SmallYPoint:
1170+ D4E5 CD 35 9D             call        RequAdivQ                           ; LL61  \ else visit up R = A/Q = y/z
1171+ D4E8 C3 EE D4             jp          SkipYScale                          ; LL68 hop over small y yangle
1172+ D4EB              SmallYHop:
1173+ D4EB              LL67:                                                   ; Arrive from LL66 above if XX15+3 < Q \ small yangle
1174+ D4EB CD 12 9D             call        RequAmul256divQ                     ; LL28  \ BFRDIV R=A*256/Q byte for remainder of division
1175+ D4EE              SkipYScale:
1176+ D4EE              LL68:                                                   ; both carry on, also arrive from LL66, yscaled based on z
1177+ D4EE 3A AB C0             ld          a,(UbnkYPointSign)                  ; XX15+5 \ sign of X dist
1178+ D4F1 CB 7F                bit         7,a
1179+ D4F3 C2 06 D5             jp          nz,NegativeYPoint                   ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
1180+ D4F6              PositiveYPoint:
1181+ D4F6 3A 02 80             ld          a,(varR)
1182+ D4F9 6F                   ld          l,a
1183+ D4FA 3A 00 80             ld          a,(varU)
1184+ D4FD 67                   ld          h,a
1185+ D4FE 3E 60                ld          a,ScreenHeightHalf
1186+ D500 ED 31                add         hl,a
1187+ D502 EB                   ex          de,hl
1188+ D503 C3 16 D5             jp          LL50
1189+ D506              NegativeYPoint:
1190+ D506              LL70:                                                   ; Arrive from LL65 just below, screen for -ve RU onto XX3 heap, index X=CNT ;;;
1191+ D506 3A 02 80             ld          a,(varR)
1192+ D509 6F                   ld          l,a
1193+ D50A 3A 00 80             ld          a,(varU)
1194+ D50D 67                   ld          h,a
1195+ D50E 0E 60                ld          c,ScreenHeightHalf
1196+ D510 06 00                ld          b,0
1197+ D512                      ClearCarryFlag
1197+ D512 B7          >                        or a
1198+ D513 ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = RU-ScreenCenterX
1199+ D515 EB                   ex          de,hl
1200+ D516              LL50:                                                   ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1201+ D516 FD 73 00             ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point
1202+ D519 FD 72 01             ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
1203+ D51C FD 23                inc         iy
1204+ D51E FD 23                inc         iy
1205+ D520 C9                   ret
1206+ D521              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1207+ D521              ;;;     Byte 0 = X magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1208+ D521              ;;;     Byte 1 = Y magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1209+ D521              ;;;     Byte 2 = Z magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1210+ D521              ;;;     Byte 3 = Sign Bits of Vertex 7=X 6=Y 5 = Z 4 - 0 = visibility beyond which vertix is not shown
1211+ D521              CopyNodeToXX15:
1212+ D521                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkXScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1212+ D521 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1212+ D522 32 A6 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaled),a
1213+ D525 23                   inc         hl
1214+ D526                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkYScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1214+ D526 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1214+ D527 32 A8 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaled),a
1215+ D52A 23                   inc         hl
1216+ D52B                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkZScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1216+ D52B 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
1216+ D52C 32 AA C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaled),a
1217+ D52F 23                   inc         hl
1218+ D530              PopulateXX15SignBits:
1219+ D530              ; Simplfied for debugging, needs optimising back to original DEBUG TODO
1220+ D530 7E                   ld          a,(hl)
1221+ D531 4F                   ld          c,a                                 ; copy sign and visibility to c
1222+ D532 47                   ld          b,a
1223+ D533 E6 80                and         $80                                 ; keep high 3 bits
1224+ D535 32 A7 C0             ld          (UBnkXScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1225+ D538 78                   ld          a,b
1226+ D539 E6 40                and         $40
1227+ D53B CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1228+ D53D 32 A9 C0             ld          (UBnkYScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1229+ D540 78                   ld          a,b
1230+ D541 E6 20                and         $20
1231+ D543 CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1232+ D545 CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1233+ D547 32 AB C0             ld          (UBnkZScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1234+ D54A 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; returns a with visibility sign byte
1235+ D54B E6 1F                and         $1F                                 ; visibility is held in bits 0 to 4                                                              ;;;     A = XX15 Signs AND &1F (to get lower 5 visibility)
1236+ D54D 32 1D 80             ld          (varT),a                            ; and store in varT as its needed later
1237+ D550 C9                   ret
1238+ D551
1239+ D551              ;;;     Byte 4 = High 4 bits Face 2 Index Low 4 bits = Face 1 Index
1240+ D551              ;;;     Byte 5 = High 4 bits Face 4 Index Low 4 bits = Face 3 Index
1241+ D551              ;..............................................................................................................................
1242+ D551              ProcessANode:                                           ; Start loop on Nodes for visibility, each node has 4 faces associated with ;;; For each node (point) in model                  ::LL48
1243+ D551              LL48GetScale:
1244+ D551 3A F2 7E             ld          a,(LastNormalVisible)               ; get Normal visible range into e before we copy node
1245+ D554 5F                   ld          e,a
1246+ D555 CD 21 D5             call        CopyNodeToXX15
1247+ D558              LL48GetVertices:
1248+ D558              LL48GetVertSignAndVisDist:
1249+ D558                      JumpIfALTNusng e,NodeIsNotVisible               ; if XX4 > Visibility distance then vertext too far away , next vertex.                                             ;;;        goto LL50 (end of loop)
1249+ D558 BB          >                        cp      e
1249+ D559 DA 96 D5    >                        jp		c, NodeIsNotVisible
1250+ D55C              CheckFace1:                                                                                                                         ;;;     if all FaceVisile[point face any of idx1,2,3 or 4] = 0
1251+ D55C                      CopyByteAtNextHL varP                           ; vertex byte#4, first 2 faces two 4-bit indices 0:15 into XX2 for 2 of the ;;;     get point face idx from byte 4 & 5 of normal
1251+ D55C 23          >                    inc         hl                                  ; vertex byte#1
1251+ D55D 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ;
1251+ D55E 32 01 7F    >                    ld          (varP),a                     ; SunXX15+2 = (V),Y
1252+ D561 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; use d to hold a as a temp                                                 ;;;
1253+ D562 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; face 1                                                                    ;;;
1254+ D564 E5                   push        hl                                  ; we need to save HL                                                        ;;;
1255+ D565                      ldHLIdxAToA UbnkFaceVisArray                    ; visibility at face 1                                                Byte 4;;;
1255+ D565 21 D2 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
1255+ D568 ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
1255+ D56A 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)
1256+ D56B E1                   pop         hl                                  ;                                                                           ;;;
1257+ D56C                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1257+ D56C A7          >                        and     a
1257+ D56D C2 9C D5    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1258+ D570              CheckFace2:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1259+ D570 7A                   ld          a,d                                                                                                             ;;;
1260+ D571 ED 23                swapnib                                                                                                                     ;;;
1261+ D573 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; this is face 2                                                            ;;;
1262+ D575                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1262+ D575 A7          >                        and     a
1262+ D576 C2 9C D5    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1263+ D579              CheckFace3:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1264+ D579                      CopyByteAtNextHL varP                           ; vertex byte#4, first 2 faces two 4-bit indices 0:15 into XX2 for 2 of the ;;;
1264+ D579 23          >                    inc         hl                                  ; vertex byte#1
1264+ D57A 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ;
1264+ D57B 32 01 7F    >                    ld          (varP),a                     ; SunXX15+2 = (V),Y
1265+ D57E 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; use d to hold a as a temp                                                 ;;;
1266+ D57F E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; face 1                                                                    ;;;
1267+ D581 E5                   push        hl                                  ; we need to save HL                                                        ;;;
1268+ D582                      ldHLIdxAToA UbnkFaceVisArray                  ; visibility at face 1                                                Byte 5;;;
1268+ D582 21 D2 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
1268+ D585 ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
1268+ D587 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)
1269+ D588 E1                   pop         hl                                  ;                                                                           ;;;
1270+ D589                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1270+ D589 A7          >                        and     a
1270+ D58A C2 9C D5    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1271+ D58D              CheckFace4:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1272+ D58D 7A                   ld          a,d                                                                                                             ;;;
1273+ D58E ED 23                swapnib                                                                                                                     ;;;
1274+ D590 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; this is face 2                                                            ;;;
1275+ D592                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1275+ D592 A7          >                        and     a
1275+ D593 C2 9C D5    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
1276+ D596              NodeIsNotVisible:                                                                                                                   ;;;
1277+ D596 01 04 00             ld          bc,4
1278+ D599 FD 09                add         iy,bc                               ; if not visible then move to next element in array anyway                  ;;;
1279+ D59B                      ;;; Should we be loading FFFFFFFF into 4 bytes or just ignore?
1280+ D59B C9                   ret                                                                                                      ;;;        goto LL50 (end of loop)
1281+ D59C              NodeIsVisible:
1282+ D59C              LL49:
1283+ D59C CD 43 D4             call        ProcessVisibleNode                  ; Process node to determine if it goes on heap
1284+ D59F C9                   ret
1285+ D5A0
1286+ D5A0                  DISPLAY "Tracing 6", $
1287+ D5A0
1288+ D5A0              ProjectNodeToEye:
1289+ D5A0 ED 4B AA C0      ld          bc,(UBnkZScaled)                    ; BC = Z Cordinate. By here it MUST be positive as its clamped to 4 min
1290+ D5A4 79               ld          a,c                                 ;  so no need for a negative check
1291+ D5A5 32 01 80         ld          (varQ),a                            ; VarQ = z
1292+ D5A8 3A A6 C0         ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)                     ; XX15  \ rolled x lo which is signed
1293+ D5AB CD 31 96         call        DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC                 ; result in BC which is 16 bit TODO Move to 16 bit below not just C reg
1294+ D5AE 3A A7 C0         ld          a,(UBnkXScaledSign)                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
1295+ D5B1                  JumpOnBitSet a,7,EyeNegativeXPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
1295+ D5B1 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1295+ D5B3 C2 BE D5    >                        jp      nz,EyeNegativeXPoint
1296+ D5B6              EyePositiveXPoint:                                  ; x was positive result
1297+ D5B6 2E 80            ld          l,ScreenCenterX                     ;
1298+ D5B8 26 00            ld          h,0
1299+ D5BA 09               add         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre + X
1300+ D5BB C3 C5 D5         jp          EyeStoreXPoint
1301+ D5BE              EyeNegativeXPoint:                                 ; x < 0 so need to subtract from the screen centre position
1302+ D5BE 2E 80            ld          l,ScreenCenterX
1303+ D5C0 26 00            ld          h,0
1304+ D5C2                  ClearCarryFlag
1304+ D5C2 B7          >                        or a
1305+ D5C3 ED 42            sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre - X
1306+ D5C5              EyeStoreXPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1307+ D5C5 EB               ex          de,hl
1308+ D5C6 FD 73 00         ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point TODO this bit is 16 bit aware just need to fix above bit
1309+ D5C9 FD 72 01         ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
1310+ D5CC              EyeProcessYPoint:
1311+ D5CC ED 4B AA C0      ld          bc,(UBnkZScaled)                    ; Now process Y co-ordinate
1312+ D5D0 79               ld          a,c
1313+ D5D1 32 01 80         ld          (varQ),a
1314+ D5D4 3A A8 C0         ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)                     ; XX15  \ rolled x lo
1315+ D5D7 CD 31 96         call        DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC                 ; a = Y scaled * 256 / zscaled
1316+ D5DA 3A A9 C0         ld          a,(UBnkYScaledSign)                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
1317+ D5DD                  JumpOnBitSet a,7,EyeNegativeYPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap top of screen is Y = 0
1317+ D5DD CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1317+ D5DF C2 EA D5    >                        jp      nz,EyeNegativeYPoint
1318+ D5E2              EyePositiveYPoint:                                  ; Y is positive so above the centre line
1319+ D5E2 2E 60            ld          l,ScreenCenterY
1320+ D5E4                  ClearCarryFlag
1320+ D5E4 B7          >                        or a
1321+ D5E5 ED 42            sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = ScreenCentreY - Y coord (as screen is 0 at top)
1322+ D5E7 C3 EF D5         jp          EyeStoreYPoint
1323+ D5EA              EyeNegativeYPoint:                                  ; this bit is only 8 bit aware TODO FIX
1324+ D5EA 2E 60            ld          l,ScreenCenterY
1325+ D5EC 26 00            ld          h,0
1326+ D5EE 09               add         hl,bc                               ; hl = ScreenCenterY + Y as negative is below the center of screen
1327+ D5EF              EyeStoreYPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1328+ D5EF EB               ex          de,hl
1329+ D5F0 FD 73 02         ld          (iy+2),e                            ; Update Y Point
1330+ D5F3 FD 72 03         ld          (iy+3),d                            ; Update Y Point
1331+ D5F6 C9               ret
1332+ D5F7
1333+ D5F7
1334+ D5F7
1335+ D5F7              ; Pitch and roll are 2 phases
1336+ D5F7              ; 1 - we apply our pitch and roll to the ship position
1337+ D5F7              ;       x -> x + alpha * (y - alpha * x)
1338+ D5F7              ;       y -> y - alpha * x - beta * z
1339+ D5F7              ;       z -> z + beta * (y - alpha * x - beta * z)
1340+ D5F7              ; which can be simplified as:
1341+ D5F7              ;       1. K2 = y - alpha * x
1342+ D5F7              ;       2. z = z + beta * K2
1343+ D5F7              ;       3. y = K2 - beta * z
1344+ D5F7              ;       4. x = x + alpha * y
1345+ D5F7              ; 2 - we apply our patch and roll to the ship orientation
1346+ D5F7              ;      Roll calculations:
1347+ D5F7              ;
1348+ D5F7              ;        nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
1349+ D5F7              ;        nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
1350+ D5F7              ;      Pitch calculations:
1351+ D5F7              ;
1352+ D5F7              ;        nosev_y = nosev_y - beta * nosev_z_hi
1353+ D5F7              ;        nosev_z = nosev_z + beta * nosev_y_hi
1354+ D5F7
1355+ D5F7
1356+ D5F7              ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1357+ D5F7                          INCLUDE "./Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm"
# file opened: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm
   1++D5F7
   2++D5F7              ; Full version
   3++D5F7              ; 1. K2 = y - alpha * x
   4++D5F7              ; 2. z = z + beta * K2
   5++D5F7              ; 3. y = K2 - beta * z
   6++D5F7              ; 4. x = x + alpha * y
   7++D5F7
   8++D5F7
   9++D5F7              APPequPosPlusAPP:       MACRO    Position, PositionSign
  10++D5F7 ~                                    push    bc
  11++D5F7 ~                                    ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  12++D5F7 ~                                    ld      a,(PositionSign)
  13++D5F7 ~                                    ld      b,a
  14++D5F7 ~                                    ld      a,c
  15++D5F7 ~                                    xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  16++D5F7 ~                                    jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  17++D5F7 ~            ; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  18++D5F7 ~                                    ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  19++D5F7 ~                                    ld      hl,(Position)
  20++D5F7 ~                                    add     hl,de
  21++D5F7 ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  22++D5F7 ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  23++D5F7 ~                                    pop     bc
  24++D5F7 ~                                    ret
  25++D5F7 ~            ; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  26++D5F7 ~            .MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  27++D5F7 ~                                    ld      hl,(Position)
  28++D5F7 ~                                    or      a
  29++D5F7 ~                                    sbc     hl,de
  30++D5F7 ~                                    jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  31++D5F7 ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  32++D5F7 ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  33++D5F7 ~                                    xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  34++D5F7 ~                                    pop     bc
  35++D5F7 ~                                    ret
  36++D5F7 ~            .MV51:                  NegHL
  37++D5F7 ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl
  38++D5F7 ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  39++D5F7 ~                                    pop     bc
  40++D5F7 ~                                    ret
  41++D5F7                                      ENDM
  42++D5F7
  43++D5F7
  44++D5F7              APPequXPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKxlo, UBnKxsgn
  44++D5F7 C5          >                        push    bc
  44++D5F8 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  44++D5F9 3A 22 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)
  44++D5FC 47          >                        ld      b,a
  44++D5FD 79          >                        ld      a,c
  44++D5FE A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  44++D5FF FA 10 D6    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  44++D602             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  44++D602 ED 5B 02 7F >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  44++D606 2A 20 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
  44++D609 19          >                        add     hl,de
  44++D60A 22 02 7F    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  44++D60D 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  44++D60E C1          >                        pop     bc
  44++D60F C9          >                        ret
  44++D610             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  44++D610 ED 5B 02 7F >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  44++D614 2A 20 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
  44++D617 B7          >                        or      a
  44++D618 ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
  44++D61A 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  44++D61C 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  44++D61D 22 02 7F    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  44++D620 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  44++D622 C1          >                        pop     bc
  44++D623 C9          >                        ret
  44++D624             >.MV51:                  NegHL
  44++D624 AF          >                    xor a
  44++D625 95          >                    sub l
  44++D626 6F          >                    ld l,a
  44++D627 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  44++D628 94          >                    sub h
  44++D629 67          >                    ld h,a
  44++D62A 22 02 7F    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
  44++D62D 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  44++D62E C1          >                        pop     bc
  44++D62F C9          >                        ret
  45++D630
  46++D630              APPequYPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKylo, UBnKysgn
  46++D630 C5          >                        push    bc
  46++D631 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  46++D632 3A 25 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
  46++D635 47          >                        ld      b,a
  46++D636 79          >                        ld      a,c
  46++D637 A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  46++D638 FA 49 D6    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  46++D63B             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  46++D63B ED 5B 02 7F >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  46++D63F 2A 23 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
  46++D642 19          >                        add     hl,de
  46++D643 22 02 7F    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  46++D646 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  46++D647 C1          >                        pop     bc
  46++D648 C9          >                        ret
  46++D649             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  46++D649 ED 5B 02 7F >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  46++D64D 2A 23 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
  46++D650 B7          >                        or      a
  46++D651 ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
  46++D653 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  46++D655 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  46++D656 22 02 7F    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  46++D659 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  46++D65B C1          >                        pop     bc
  46++D65C C9          >                        ret
  46++D65D             >.MV51:                  NegHL
  46++D65D AF          >                    xor a
  46++D65E 95          >                    sub l
  46++D65F 6F          >                    ld l,a
  46++D660 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  46++D661 94          >                    sub h
  46++D662 67          >                    ld h,a
  46++D663 22 02 7F    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
  46++D666 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  46++D667 C1          >                        pop     bc
  46++D668 C9          >                        ret
  47++D669
  48++D669              APPequZPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKzlo, UBnKzsgn
  48++D669 C5          >                        push    bc
  48++D66A 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
  48++D66B 3A 28 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)
  48++D66E 47          >                        ld      b,a
  48++D66F 79          >                        ld      a,c
  48++D670 A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
  48++D671 FA 82 D6    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
  48++D674             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
  48++D674 ED 5B 02 7F >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
  48++D678 2A 26 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)
  48++D67B 19          >                        add     hl,de
  48++D67C 22 02 7F    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
  48++D67F 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
  48++D680 C1          >                        pop     bc
  48++D681 C9          >                        ret
  48++D682             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
  48++D682 ED 5B 02 7F >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
  48++D686 2A 26 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)
  48++D689 B7          >                        or      a
  48++D68A ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
  48++D68C 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
  48++D68E 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
  48++D68F 22 02 7F    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
  48++D692 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
  48++D694 C1          >                        pop     bc
  48++D695 C9          >                        ret
  48++D696             >.MV51:                  NegHL
  48++D696 AF          >                    xor a
  48++D697 95          >                    sub l
  48++D698 6F          >                    ld l,a
  48++D699 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  48++D69A 94          >                    sub h
  48++D69B 67          >                    ld h,a
  48++D69C 22 02 7F    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
  48++D69F 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
  48++D6A0 C1          >                        pop     bc
  48++D6A1 C9          >                        ret
  49++D6A2
  50++D6A2              ; rollWork holds Alpha intermidate results
  51++D6A2 00 00 00     rollWork      DS 3
  52++D6A5              rollWorkp1    equ rollWork
  53++D6A5              rollWorkp2    equ rollWork+1
  54++D6A5              rollWorkp3    equ rollWork+2
  55++D6A5
  56++D6A5              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  57++D6A5              ; based on MVEIT part 4 of 9
  58++D6A5 3A 1B 7F     ApplyMyRollAndPitch:    ld      a,(ALP1)                    ; get roll magnitude
  59++D6A8 21 0F 7F                             ld      hl,BET1                     ; and pitch
  60++D6AB B6                                   or      (hl)
  61++D6AC CA 78 D8                             jp      z,.NoRotation               ; if both zero then don't compute
  62++D6AF              ; If the xsgn,ysng or zsng are not 0 or $80 then we use 24 bit routines
  63++D6AF              ; else we can just continue to use 16 bit
  64++D6AF 3A 22 C0     .CheckFor24Bit:         ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)
  65++D6B2 21 25 C0                             ld      hl,UBnKysgn
  66++D6B5 B6                                   or      (hl)
  67++D6B6 21 28 C0                             ld      hl,UBnKzsgn
  68++D6B9 B6                                   or      (hl)
  69++D6BA E6 7F                                and     $7F
  70++D6BC C2 A8 D8                             jp      nz,ApplyMyRollAndPitch24Bit
  71++D6BF                                      ;break
  72++D6BF              ; P[210] = x * alph (we use P[2]P[1] later as result/256
  73++D6BF 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; e = roll magnitude
  74++D6C0 2A 20 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)                ; hl = ship x pos
  75++D6C3 CD B4 91                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MULTU2-2 AHL = UbnkXlo * Alp1 both unsigned
  76++D6C6 32 03 7F                             ld      (varPhi2),a                 ; set P[2] to high byte to help with ./256
  77++D6C9 22 01 7F                             ld      (varP),hl                   ; P (2 1 0) = UbnkXlo * Alph1
  78++D6CC              ; A = Flip sign
  79++D6CC 3A 1C 7F                             ld      a,(ALP2)                ; flip the current roll angle alpha and xor with x sign
  80++D6CF 21 22 C0                             ld      hl,UBnKxsgn                 ; and xor with x pos sign
  81++D6D2 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; so now  (A P+2 P+1) = - (x_sign x_hi x_lo) * alpha / 256
  82++D6D3              ; AP[2]P[1] =Y + AP[2]P[1] (i.e. Previous APP/256)
  83++D6D3 CD 30 D6                             call    APPequYPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6 calculate APP = y - (x * alpha / 256)
  84++D6D6              ; K2 = AP[2][1] K2(3 2 1) = (A P+2 P+1) = y - x * alpha / 256
  85++D6D6 32 A4 D6                             ld      (rollWorkp3),a               ; k2+3 = sign of result
  86++D6D9 22 A2 D6                             ld      (rollWorkp1),hl             ; k2+1,2 = result
  87++D6DC              ; P[210] = K2[2 1] * Beta  = (A ~P) * X
  88++D6DC 3A 0F 7F                             ld      a,(BET1)                    ; a = magnitude of pitch
  89++D6DF 5F                                   ld      e,a
  90++D6E0 CD B4 91                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MLTU2-2 AHL = (P+2 P+1) * BET1 or by now ((UbnkXlo * Alph1)/256 * Bet1)
  91++D6E3 32 03 7F                             ld      (varPp2),a                   ; save highest byte in P2
  92++D6E6 22 01 7F                             ld      (varP),hl
  93++D6E9              ; Fetch sign of previosu cal and xor with BETA inverted
  94++D6E9 3A A4 D6                             ld      a,(rollWorkp3)
  95++D6EC 5F                                   ld      e,a
  96++D6ED 3A 10 7F                             ld      a,(BET2)
  97++D6F0 AB                                   xor     e                           ; so we get the sign of K3 and xor with pitch sign
  98++D6F1              ; Z = P[210] =Z + APP
  99++D6F1 CD 69 D6                             call    APPequZPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6
 100++D6F4 32 28 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a                ; save result back into z
 101++D6F7 22 26 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl
 102++D6FA              ; A[P1]P[0] = z * Beta
 103++D6FA 3A 0F 7F                             ld      a,(BET1)                    ; get pitch back again for mulitply in original it was kept in Q so no fetch needed
 104++D6FD 5F                                   ld      e,a
 105++D6FE CD B4 91                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MULTU2 P2 P1 was already in hl (A P+1 P) = (z_hi z_lo) * beta
 106++D701 32 03 7F                             ld      (varPp2),a                  ; P2 = high byte of result
 107++D704 22 01 7F                             ld      (varP),hl                   ; P (2 1 0) = UbnkXlo & Alph1
 108++D707              ; A xor BET2,Zsign
 109++D707 3A A4 D6                             ld      a,(rollWorkp3)               ; get K3 (sign of y) and store it in y pos
 110++D70A 32 25 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a                ; save result back into y
 111++D70D 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; a = y sign Xor pitch rate sign
 112++D70E 3A 10 7F                             ld      a,(BET2)                    ;
 113++D711 AB                                   xor     e                           ;
 114++D712 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; now xor it with z sign too
 115++D713 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                ;
 116++D716 AB                                   xor     e                           ; so now a = sign of y * beta * sign y * sign z
 117++D717 F2 26 D7                             jp      p,.MV43                     ; if result is pve beta * z and y have differetn signs
 118++D71A 2A 02 7F                             ld      hl,(varPp1)
 119++D71D ED 5B A2 D6                          ld      de,(rollWorkp1)
 120++D721 B7                                   or      a
 121++D722 19                                   add     hl,de
 122++D723 C3 40 D7                             jp      .MV44
 123++D726 2A A2 D6     .MV43:                  ld      hl,(rollWorkp1)
 124++D729 ED 5B 02 7F                          ld      de,(varPp1)
 125++D72D B7                                   or      a
 126++D72E ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                       ; (y_hi y_lo) = K2(2 1) - P(2 1)
 127++D730 30 0E                                jr      nc,.MV44                    ; if there was no over flow carry on
 128++D732                                      NegHL
 128++D732 AF          >                    xor a
 128++D733 95          >                    sub l
 128++D734 6F          >                    ld l,a
 128++D735 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 128++D736 94          >                    sub h
 128++D737 67          >                    ld h,a
 129++D738 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)                ; flip sign bit TODO, we may have to remove xor as planets and Univs are sign + 23 bit xpos
 130++D73B EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 131++D73D 32 25 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a
 132++D740              ; by here we have (y_sign y_hi y_lo) = K2(2 1) - P(2 1) = K2 - beta * z
 133++D740 22 23 C0     .MV44:                  ld      (UBnKylo),hl                ; we do save here to avoid two writes if MV43 ended up with a 2s'c conversion
 134++D743 3A 1B 7F                             ld      a,(ALP1)                    ; get roll magnitude
 135++D746 5F                                   ld      e,a
 136++D747 2A 23 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
 137++D74A CD B4 91                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MLTU2-2 AHL = (y_hi y_lo) * alpha
 138++D74D 32 03 7F                             ld      (varPp2),a                  ; store high byte P(2 1 0) = (y_hi y_lo) * alpha
 139++D750 22 01 7F                             ld      (varP),hl
 140++D753 3A 1D 7F                             ld      a,(ALP2FLIP)
 141++D756 5F                                   ld      e,a
 142++D757 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
 143++D75A AB                                   xor     e                           ; a = sign of roll xor y so now we have (A P+2 P+1) = (y_sign y_hi y_lo) * alpha / 256
 144++D75B CD F7 D5                             call    APPequXPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6 Set (A P+2 P+1) = (x_sign x_hi x_lo) + (A P+2 P+1) = x + y * alpha / 256
 145++D75E 32 22 C0                             ld      (UBnKxsgn),a                ; save resutl stright into X pos
 146++D761 22 20 C0                             ld      (UBnKxlo),hl
 147++D764                                      ;break
 148++D764                                      ; if its not a Univ then apply to local orientation
 149++D764                                      ApplyMyRollToVector ALPHA, UBnkrotmatNosevX, UBnkrotmatNosevY   ; ApplyMyRollToNosev:
 149++D764             >                        ldCopyByte ALPHA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
 149++D764 3A 1A 7F    >                        ld       a,(ALPHA)
 149++D767 32 01 80    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 149++D76A             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
 149++D76A 2A 37 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevY)
 149++D76D 22 02 80    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 149++D770             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatNosevX, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
 149++D770 3A 35 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX)
 149++D773 32 01 7F    >                        ld       (varP),a
 149++D776 3A 36 C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
 149++D779 EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
 149++D77B CD 39 91    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
 149++D77E ED 53 37 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
 149++D782             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevX, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
 149++D782 2A 35 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevX)
 149++D785 22 02 80    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 149++D788 3A 38 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
 149++D78B CD 39 91    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
 149++D78E ED 53 35 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevX),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
 150++D792                                      ApplyMyRollToVector ALPHA, UBnkrotmatSidevX, UBnkrotmatSidevY   ; ApplyMyRollToSidev:
 150++D792             >                        ldCopyByte ALPHA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
 150++D792 3A 1A 7F    >                        ld       a,(ALPHA)
 150++D795 32 01 80    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 150++D798             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
 150++D798 2A 2B C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevY)
 150++D79B 22 02 80    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 150++D79E             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatSidevX, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
 150++D79E 3A 29 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatSidevX)
 150++D7A1 32 01 7F    >                        ld       (varP),a
 150++D7A4 3A 2A C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
 150++D7A7 EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
 150++D7A9 CD 39 91    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
 150++D7AC ED 53 2B C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
 150++D7B0             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevX, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
 150++D7B0 2A 29 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevX)
 150++D7B3 22 02 80    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 150++D7B6 3A 2C C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
 150++D7B9 CD 39 91    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
 150++D7BC ED 53 29 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevX),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
 151++D7C0                                      ApplyMyRollToVector ALPHA, UBnkrotmatRoofvX, UBnkrotmatRoofvY   ; ApplyMyRollToRoofv:
 151++D7C0             >                        ldCopyByte ALPHA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
 151++D7C0 3A 1A 7F    >                        ld       a,(ALPHA)
 151++D7C3 32 01 80    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 151++D7C6             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
 151++D7C6 2A 31 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY)
 151++D7C9 22 02 80    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 151++D7CC             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatRoofvX, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
 151++D7CC 3A 2F C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX)
 151++D7CF 32 01 7F    >                        ld       (varP),a
 151++D7D2 3A 30 C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
 151++D7D5 EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
 151++D7D7 CD 39 91    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
 151++D7DA ED 53 31 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
 151++D7DE             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvX, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
 151++D7DE 2A 2F C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX)
 151++D7E1 22 02 80    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 151++D7E4 3A 32 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
 151++D7E7 CD 39 91    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
 151++D7EA ED 53 2F C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvX),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
 152++D7EE                                      ApplyMyRollToVector BETA, UBnkrotmatNosevZ, UBnkrotmatNosevY    ; ApplyMyPitchToNosev:
 152++D7EE             >                        ldCopyByte BETA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
 152++D7EE 3A 0D 7F    >                        ld       a,(BETA)
 152++D7F1 32 01 80    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 152++D7F4             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
 152++D7F4 2A 37 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevY)
 152++D7F7 22 02 80    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 152++D7FA             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatNosevZ, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
 152++D7FA 3A 39 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ)
 152++D7FD 32 01 7F    >                        ld       (varP),a
 152++D800 3A 3A C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
 152++D803 EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
 152++D805 CD 39 91    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
 152++D808 ED 53 37 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
 152++D80C             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevZ, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
 152++D80C 2A 39 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ)
 152++D80F 22 02 80    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 152++D812 3A 38 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
 152++D815 CD 39 91    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
 152++D818 ED 53 39 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevZ),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
 153++D81C                                      ApplyMyRollToVector BETA, UBnkrotmatSidevZ, UBnkrotmatSidevY    ; ApplyMyPitchToSidev:
 153++D81C             >                        ldCopyByte BETA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
 153++D81C 3A 0D 7F    >                        ld       a,(BETA)
 153++D81F 32 01 80    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 153++D822             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
 153++D822 2A 2B C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevY)
 153++D825 22 02 80    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 153++D828             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatSidevZ, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
 153++D828 3A 2D C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatSidevZ)
 153++D82B 32 01 7F    >                        ld       (varP),a
 153++D82E 3A 2E C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatSidevZ+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
 153++D831 EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
 153++D833 CD 39 91    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
 153++D836 ED 53 2B C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
 153++D83A             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevZ, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
 153++D83A 2A 2D C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevZ)
 153++D83D 22 02 80    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 153++D840 3A 2C C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
 153++D843 CD 39 91    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
 153++D846 ED 53 2D C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevZ),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
 154++D84A                                      ApplyMyRollToVector BETA, UBnkrotmatRoofvZ, UBnkrotmatRoofvY    ; ApplyMyPitchToRoofv:
 154++D84A             >                        ldCopyByte BETA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
 154++D84A 3A 0D 7F    >                        ld       a,(BETA)
 154++D84D 32 01 80    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 154++D850             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
 154++D850 2A 31 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY)
 154++D853 22 02 80    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 154++D856             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatRoofvZ, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
 154++D856 3A 33 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ)
 154++D859 32 01 7F    >                        ld       (varP),a
 154++D85C 3A 34 C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
 154++D85F EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
 154++D861 CD 39 91    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
 154++D864 ED 53 31 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
 154++D868             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvZ, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
 154++D868 2A 33 C0    >                        ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ)
 154++D86B 22 02 80    >                        ld       (varR),hl
 154++D86E 3A 32 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
 154++D871 CD 39 91    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
 154++D874 ED 53 33 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvZ),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
 155++D878 3A FB 7F     .NoRotation:            ld      a,(DELTA)                   ; get speed
 156++D87B 16 00                                ld      d,0
 157++D87D 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; de = speed in low byte
 158++D87E 2A 26 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                ; hl = z position
 159++D881 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                ; b = z sign
 160++D884 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;
 161++D885 0E 80                                ld      c,$80                       ; c = -ve as we are always moving forwards
 162++D887 CD 2F 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC               ; update speed
 163++D88A 22 26 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl                ; write back to zpos
 164++D88D 32 28 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a                ;
 165++D890 C9                                   ret
 166++D891
 167++D891              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 168++D891              ; 24 bit version of pitch and roll is a 24 bit calculation 1 bit sign + 23 bit value
 169++D891              ; Need to write a test routine for roll and pitchs
 170++D891              ; Minsky Roll       Minsky Pitch
 171++D891              ;  y -= alpha * x    y -= beta * z
 172++D891              ;  x += alpha * y    z += beta * y
 173++D891              ; or once combined
 174++D891              ;   1. K2 = y - alpha * x
 175++D891              ;   2. z = z + beta * K2
 176++D891              ;   3. y = K2 - beta * z
 177++D891              ;   4. x = x + alpha * y
 178++D891              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 179++D891              ; Based on non optimised version of Planet pitch and roll is a 24 bit calculation 1 bit sign + 23 bit value
 180++D891              ; Now at least rolls the correct direction
 181++D891 00 00 00 00  UnivAlphaMulX               DB $00,$00, $00, $00
 182++D895 00 00 00 00  UnivAlphaMulY               DB $00,$00, $00, $00
 183++D899 00 00 00 00  UnivAlphaMulZ               DB $00,$00, $00, $00
 184++D89D 00 00 00 00  UnivBetaMulZ                DB $00,$00, $00, $00
 185++D8A1 00 00 00 00  UnivBetaMulY                DB $00,$00, $00, $00
 186++D8A5 00 00 00     UnivK2                      DS 3
 187++D8A8
 188++D8A8 3A 1A 7F     ApplyMyRollAndPitch24Bit: 	ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; no roll or pitch, no calc needed
 189++D8AB A7           .CheckForRoll:              and		a
 190++D8AC C4 D4 D8     							call	nz,Univ_Roll
 191++D8AF 3A 0D 7F     .CheckForPitch:				ld		a,(BETA)
 192++D8B2 A7           							and		a
 193++D8B3 C4 3A D9     							call	nz,Univ_Pitch
 194++D8B6 3A FB 7F     .ApplySpeed:            	ld      a,(DELTA)                   ; BCH = - Delta
 195++D8B9              							ReturnIfAIsZero
 195++D8B9 A7          >                        and     a
 195++D8BA C8          >                        ret     z
 196++D8BB 0E 00        							ld      c,0                         ;
 197++D8BD 67           							ld      h,a                         ;
 198++D8BE 06 80        							ld      b,$80                       ;
 199++D8C0 ED 5B 27 C0  							ld      de,(UBnKzhi)                ; DEL = z position
 200++D8C4 3A 26 C0     							ld      a,(UBnKzlo)                 ; .
 201++D8C7 6F           							ld      l,a                         ; .
 202++D8C8 CD 10 01     							call    AddBCHtoDELsigned           ; update speed
 203++D8CB ED 53 27 C0  							ld      (UBnKzhi),DE                ; write back to zpos
 204++D8CF 7D           							ld      a,l
 205++D8D0 32 26 C0     							ld      (UBnKzlo),a                ;
 206++D8D3 C9           							ret
 207++D8D4              ; Performs minsky rotation
 208++D8D4              ; Joystick left          Joystick right
 209++D8D4              ; ---------------------  ---------------------
 210++D8D4              ; x :=  x      + y / 64  x :=  x -  y / 64  so rather than /64  is z * alpha / 256
 211++D8D4              ; y :=  y      - x /64   y :=  y +  x / 64
 212++D8D4              ;
 213++D8D4              ; Joystick down          Joystick up
 214++D8D4              ; ---------------------  ---------------------
 215++D8D4              ; y :=  y      + z / 64  y :=  y - z / 64
 216++D8D4              ; z :=  z      - y / 64  z :=  z + y / 64
 217++D8D4              ;
 218++D8D4              ; get z, multiply by alpha, pick top 3 bytes with sign
 219++D8D4              ; get x, multiply by alpha, pick top 3 bytes with sign
 220++D8D4              ; if alpha +ve subtract x = x - z adj, z =z + x adj , else x += z adj z -= z adj
 221++D8D4 3A 1A 7F     Univ_Roll:				    ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; get roll value
 222++D8D7 E6 7F        							and 	$7F
 223++D8D9 57           							ld      d,a                         ; .
 224++D8DA 3A 23 C0     							ld      a,(UBnKylo)                ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
 225++D8DD 5F           							ld      e,a                         ; .
 226++D8DE 2A 24 C0     							ld      hl,(UBnKyhi)               ; .
 227++D8E1 CD 4B 92     							call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * alpha, so DEL = X * -alpha / 256
 228++D8E4 7D           							ld		a,l
 229++D8E5 32 95 D8     							ld		(UnivAlphaMulY),a			; save result
 230++D8E8 ED 53 96 D8  							ld		(UnivAlphaMulY+1),de		; save result
 231++D8EC 3A 1A 7F     							ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; get roll value
 232++D8EF E6 7F        							and 	$7F
 233++D8F1 57           							ld      d,a                         ; .
 234++D8F2 3A 20 C0     							ld      a,(UBnKxlo)                ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
 235++D8F5 5F           							ld      e,a                         ; .
 236++D8F6 2A 21 C0     							ld      hl,(UBnKxhi)               ; .
 237++D8F9 CD 4B 92     							call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * alpha, so DEL = X * -alpha / 256
 238++D8FC 7D           							ld		a,l
 239++D8FD 32 91 D8     							ld		(UnivAlphaMulX),a			; save result
 240++D900 ED 53 92 D8  							ld		(UnivAlphaMulX+1),de		; save result
 241++D904 3A 1A 7F     							ld		a,(ALPHA)
 242++D907 E6 80        							and		$80
 243++D909 CA 23 D9     							jp		z,.RollingRight
 244++D90C DD 21 20 C0  .RollingLeft:				ld		ix,UBnKxlo
 245++D910 FD 21 95 D8  							ld		iy,UnivAlphaMulY
 246++D914 CD 8C 00     							call	AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 247++D917 DD 21 23 C0  							ld		ix,UBnKylo
 248++D91B FD 21 91 D8  							ld		iy,UnivAlphaMulX
 249++D91F CD C9 00     							call	SubAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 250++D922 C9           							ret
 251++D923 DD 21 20 C0  .RollingRight:				ld		ix,UBnKxlo
 252++D927 FD 21 95 D8  							ld		iy,UnivAlphaMulY
 253++D92B CD C9 00     							call	SubAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 254++D92E DD 21 23 C0  							ld		ix,UBnKylo
 255++D932 FD 21 91 D8  							ld		iy,UnivAlphaMulX
 256++D936 CD 8C 00     							call	AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 257++D939 C9           							ret
 258++D93A
 259++D93A 3A 0D 7F     Univ_Pitch:				    ld      a,(BETA)                   ; get roll value
 260++D93D E6 7F        							and 	$7F
 261++D93F 57           							ld      d,a                         ; .
 262++D940 3A 23 C0     							ld      a,(UBnKylo)                ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
 263++D943 5F           							ld      e,a                         ; .
 264++D944 2A 24 C0     							ld      hl,(UBnKyhi)               ; .
 265++D947 CD 4B 92     							call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * alpha, so DEL = X * -alpha / 256
 266++D94A 7D           							ld		a,l
 267++D94B 32 A1 D8     							ld		(UnivBetaMulY),a			; save result
 268++D94E ED 53 A2 D8  							ld		(UnivBetaMulY+1),de		; save result
 269++D952 3A 0D 7F     							ld      a,(BETA)                   ; get roll value
 270++D955 E6 7F        							and 	$7F
 271++D957 57           							ld      d,a                         ; .
 272++D958 3A 26 C0     							ld      a,(UBnKzlo)                ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
 273++D95B 5F           							ld      e,a                         ; .
 274++D95C 2A 27 C0     							ld      hl,(UBnKzhi)               ; .
 275++D95F CD 4B 92     							call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * alpha, so DEL = X * -alpha / 256
 276++D962 7D           							ld		a,l
 277++D963 32 9D D8     							ld		(UnivBetaMulZ),a			; save result
 278++D966 ED 53 9E D8  							ld		(UnivBetaMulZ+1),de		; save result
 279++D96A 3A 0D 7F     							ld		a,(BETA)
 280++D96D E6 80        							and		$80
 281++D96F CA 89 D9     							jp		z,.Climbing
 282++D972 DD 21 23 C0  .Diving:					ld		ix,UBnKylo
 283++D976 FD 21 9D D8  							ld		iy,UnivBetaMulZ
 284++D97A CD 8C 00     							call	AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 285++D97D DD 21 26 C0  							ld		ix,UBnKzlo
 286++D981 FD 21 A1 D8  							ld		iy,UnivBetaMulY
 287++D985 CD C9 00     							call	SubAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 288++D988 C9           							ret
 289++D989 DD 21 23 C0  .Climbing:		     		ld		ix,UBnKylo
 290++D98D FD 21 9D D8  							ld		iy,UnivBetaMulZ
 291++D991 CD C9 00     							call	SubAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 292++D994 DD 21 26 C0  							ld		ix,UBnKzlo
 293++D998 FD 21 A1 D8  							ld		iy,UnivBetaMulY
 294++D99C CD 8C 00     							call	AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 295++D99F C9           							ret
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm
1358+ D9A0                          INCLUDE "./Universe/Ships/ApplyShipRollAndPitch.asm"
