   1++D9A0
   2++D9A0              ; A = value for rotation
   3++D9A0              ; HL = address of value for rotation
   4++D9A0              ; TODO logic for permanent spin, I thik this it -127??
   5++D9A0              SplitAndDampenZ:        MACRO
   6++D9A0 ~                                    ld      b,a
   7++D9A0 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit            ; if abs (Rotz) is 0 then skip
   8++D9A0 ~                                    jp      z,.ProcessRoll
   9++D9A0 ~                                    ld      a,b                     ; b = rotate counter S7
  10++D9A0 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit            ; a = sign rat2 = c = sign
  11++D9A0 ~                                    ld      c,a                     ; .
  12++D9A0 ~                                    ld      (univRAT2),a            ; .
  13++D9A0 ~                                    ld      a,b                     ; a = abs b
  14++D9A0 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit            ; .
  15++D9A0 ~                                    dec     a                       ; dampen
  16++D9A0 ~                                    ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  17++D9A0 ~                                    or      c                       ; make S7 again after dampening
  18++D9A0 ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
  19++D9A0                                      ENDM
  20++D9A0
  21++D9A0              SplitAndDampenX:        MACRO
  22++D9A0 ~                                    ld      b,a
  23++D9A0 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit            ; exit early is ABS = 0
  24++D9A0 ~                                    and     a                       ; .
  25++D9A0 ~                                    ret     z                       ; .
  26++D9A0 ~                                    ld      a,b                     ; a = rotate counter S7
  27++D9A0 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit            ; rat2 = c = sign
  28++D9A0 ~                                    ld      c,a                     ; .
  29++D9A0 ~                                    ld      (univRAT2),a            ; .
  30++D9A0 ~                                    ld      a,b                     ; a = abs b
  31++D9A0 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit            ; .
  32++D9A0 ~                                    dec     a                       ; dampen
  33++D9A0 ~                                    ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  34++D9A0 ~                                    or      c                       ; make S7 again after dampening
  35++D9A0 ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
  36++D9A0                                      ENDM
  37++D9A0
  38++D9A0
  39++D9A0              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  40++D9A0              ; based on MVEIT part 4 of 9
  41++D9A0              ; x and z counters are proper 2's c values
  42++D9A0 3A 49 C0     ApplyShipRollAndPitch:  ld      a,(UBnKRotZCounter)
  43++D9A3 FE FF                                cp      $FF
  44++D9A5 28 18                                jr      z,.PitchSAxes
  45++D9A7                                      SplitAndDampenZ
  45++D9A7 47          >                        ld      b,a
  45++D9A8 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit            ; if abs (Rotz) is 0 then skip
  45++D9AA CA EC D9    >                        jp      z,.ProcessRoll
  45++D9AD 78          >                        ld      a,b                     ; b = rotate counter S7
  45++D9AE E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit            ; a = sign rat2 = c = sign
  45++D9B0 4F          >                        ld      c,a                     ; .
  45++D9B1 32 4F C0    >                        ld      (univRAT2),a            ; .
  45++D9B4 78          >                        ld      a,b                     ; a = abs b
  45++D9B5 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit            ; .
  45++D9B7 3D          >                        dec     a                       ; dampen
  45++D9B8 32 50 C0    >                        ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  45++D9BB B1          >                        or      c                       ; make S7 again after dampening
  45++D9BC 32 49 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
  46++D9BF                                      ;ld      a,(UBnKRotZCounter)
  47++D9BF 21 2F C0     .PitchSAxes:            ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX; UBnkrotmatSidevY
  48++D9C2 22 E6 7E                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  49++D9C5 21 35 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX; UBnkrotmatSidevZ
  50++D9C8 22 E8 7E                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  51++D9CB CD 38 DA                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  52++D9CE 21 31 C0     .PitchRAxes:            ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvY
  53++D9D1 22 E6 7E                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  54++D9D4 21 37 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatNosevY;UBnkrotmatRoofvZ
  55++D9D7 22 E8 7E                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  56++D9DA CD 38 DA                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  57++D9DD 21 33 C0     .PitchNAxes:            ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvZ; UBnkrotmatNosevY
  58++D9E0 22 E6 7E                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  59++D9E3 21 39 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatNosevZ
  60++D9E6 22 E8 7E                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  61++D9E9 CD 38 DA                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  62++D9EC 3A 48 C0     .ProcessRoll:           ld      a,(UBnKRotXCounter)
  63++D9EF FE FF                                cp      $FF
  64++D9F1 28 17                                jr      z,.RollSAxis
  65++D9F3                                      SplitAndDampenX
  65++D9F3 47          >                        ld      b,a
  65++D9F4 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit            ; exit early is ABS = 0
  65++D9F6 A7          >                        and     a                       ; .
  65++D9F7 C8          >                        ret     z                       ; .
  65++D9F8 78          >                        ld      a,b                     ; a = rotate counter S7
  65++D9F9 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit            ; rat2 = c = sign
  65++D9FB 4F          >                        ld      c,a                     ; .
  65++D9FC 32 4F C0    >                        ld      (univRAT2),a            ; .
  65++D9FF 78          >                        ld      a,b                     ; a = abs b
  65++DA00 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit            ; .
  65++DA02 3D          >                        dec     a                       ; dampen
  65++DA03 32 50 C0    >                        ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  65++DA06 B1          >                        or      c                       ; make S7 again after dampening
  65++DA07 32 48 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
  66++DA0A 21 2F C0     .RollSAxis:           	ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX; UBnkrotmatSidevX
  67++DA0D 22 E6 7E                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  68++DA10 21 29 C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatSidevX; UBnkrotmatSidevY
  69++DA13 22 E8 7E                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  70++DA16 CD 38 DA                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  71++DA19 21 31 C0     .RollRAxis:             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvY; UBnkrotmatRoofvX
  72++DA1C 22 E6 7E                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  73++DA1F 21 2B C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatSidevY; UBnkrotmatRoofvY
  74++DA22 22 E8 7E                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  75++DA25 CD 38 DA                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  76++DA28 21 33 C0     .RollNAxis:             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvZ; UBnkrotmatNosevX
  77++DA2B 22 E6 7E                             ld	    (varAxis1),hl
  78++DA2E 21 2D C0                             ld	    hl,UBnkrotmatSidevZ; UBnkrotmatNosevY
  79++DA31 22 E8 7E                             ld	    (varAxis2),hl
  80++DA34 CD 38 DA                             call    MVS5RotateAxis
  81++DA37 C9                                   ret
  82++DA38
  83++DA38
  84++DA38
  85++DA38              ; Roate around axis
  86++DA38              ; varAxis1 and varAxis2 point to the address of the axis to rotate
  87++DA38              ; so the axis x1 points to roofv  x , y or z
  88++DA38              ;             x2           nosev or sidev  x, y or z
  89++DA38              ;   Axis1 = Axis1 * (1 - 1/512)  + Axis2 / 16
  90++DA38              ;   Axis2 = Axis2 * (1 - 1/512)  - Axis1 / 16
  91++DA38              ; var RAT2 gives direction
  92++DA38              ; for pitch x we come in with Axis1 = roofv_x and Axis2 = nosev_x
  93++DA38              ;-Set up S R -----------------------------------------
  94++DA38              ; optimised we don't deal with sign here just the value of roof axis / 512
  95++DA38 2A E6 7E     MVS5RotateAxis:         ld      hl,(varAxis1)   ; work on roofv axis to get (1- 1/152) * roofv axis
  96++DA3B 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
  97++DA3C 23                                   inc     hl
  98++DA3D 56                                   ld      d,(hl)          ; de = Axis1 (roofv x for pitch x)
  99++DA3E EB                                   ex      de,hl           ; hl = Axis1 (roofv x for pitch x)
 100++DA3F 7C                                   ld      a,h
 101++DA40 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 102++DA42 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; iyh = sign Axis1
 103++DA44 7C                                   ld      a,h
 104++DA45 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = Axis1 (roof hi axis  unsigned)
 105++DA47 CB 3F                                srl     a               ; a = Axis1/2
 106++DA49 5F                                   ld      e,a             ;
 107++DA4A FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; A = Axis 1 sign
 108++DA4C 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = signed Axis1 / 512
 109++DA4D B7                                   or      a               ; clear carry
 110++DA4E CD 71 01                             call    subHLDES15      ; hl = roof axis - (roof axis /512) which in effect is roof * (1-1/512)
 111++DA51              ;-Push to stack roof axis - (roofaxis/152)  ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 112++DA51 E5                                   push    hl              ; save hl on stack PUSH ID 1 (roof axis - roofv aixs /512)
 113++DA52 7D                                   ld      a,l
 114++DA53 32 02 80                             ld      (varR),a
 115++DA56 7C                                   ld      a,h
 116++DA57 32 03 80                             ld      (varS),a        ;  RS now equals (1- 1/152) * roofv axis or (roof axis - roofv aixs /512)
 117++DA5A              ;-calculate roofv latter half of calc
 118++DA5A 2A E8 7E                             ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; now work on nosev axis to get nosev axis / 16
 119++DA5D 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 120++DA5E 23                                   inc     hl
 121++DA5F 56                                   ld      d,(hl)          ; de = value of roof axis
 122++DA60 7A                                   ld      a,d
 123++DA61 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 124++DA63 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save sign
 125++DA65 7A                                   ld      a,d
 126++DA66 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = nosev hi axis  unsigned
 127++DA68 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = abs (nosev)
 128++DA69                                      ShiftDERight1
 128++DA69 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 128++DA6B CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 129++DA6D                                      ShiftDERight1
 129++DA6D CB 3A       >			   srl d
 129++DA6F CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 130++DA71                                      ShiftDERight1
 130++DA71 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 130++DA73 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 131++DA75                                      ShiftDERight1           ; de = nosev /16 unsigned
 131++DA75 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 131++DA77 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 132++DA79 3A 4F C0                             ld      a,(univRAT2)     ; need to consider direction, so by defautl we use rat2, but flip via sign bit
 133++DA7C FD AC                                xor     iyh             ; get the sign back we saveded from DE in so de = nosev axis / 16 signed
 134++DA7E E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 135++DA80 B2                                   or      d
 136++DA81 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = nosev /16 signed and ready as if we were doing a + or - based on RAT2
 137++DA82              ;;; ld      a,e
 138++DA82              ;;;     or      iyh
 139++DA82              ;;; ld      (varP),a        ; PA now equals nosev axis / 16 signed
 140++DA82              ;-now AP = nosev /16  --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 141++DA82 E1                                   pop     hl              ; get back RS POP ID 1
 142++DA83                  ;ex     de,hl           ; swapping around so hl = AP and de = SR , shoud not matter though as its an add
 143++DA83              ;-now DE = (roofaxis/512) hl - abs(nosevaxis) --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 144++DA83 CD 52 00                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4 ; do add using hl and de
 145++DA86 E5                                   push    hl              ; we use stack to represent var K here now varK = Nosev axis /16 + (1 - 1/512) * roofv axis PUSH ID 2
 146++DA87              ;-push to stack nosev axis + roofvaxis /512  which is what roofv axis will be ------------------------------------------------
 147++DA87              ;-- Set up SR = 1 - 1/512 * nosev-----------------------
 148++DA87 2A E8 7E                             ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; work on nosev again to get nosev - novesv / 512
 149++DA8A 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 150++DA8B 23                                   inc     hl
 151++DA8C 56                                   ld      d,(hl)
 152++DA8D EB                                   ex      de,hl
 153++DA8E 7C                                   ld      a,h
 154++DA8F E6 80                                and     $80
 155++DA91 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a
 156++DA93 7C                                   ld      a,h
 157++DA94 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = roof hi axis  unsigned
 158++DA96 CB 3F                                srl     a               ; now A = unsigned 15 bit nosev axis hi / 2 (or in effect nosev / 512
 159++DA98 5F                                   ld      e,a
 160++DA99 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
 161++DA9B 57                                   ld      d,a
 162++DA9C B7                                   or      a               ; clear carry
 163++DA9D CD 71 01                             call    subHLDES15
 164++DAA0              ;   sbc     hl,de           ; hl = nosev - novesv / 512
 165++DAA0 E5                                   push    hl              ; save hl on stack  PUSH ID 3
 166++DAA1 7D                                   ld      a,l
 167++DAA2 32 01 7F                             ld      (varP),a        ; p = low of resuilt
 168++DAA5 7C                                   ld      a,h
 169++DAA6 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = roof hi axis  unsigned
 170++DAA8 32 1D 80                             ld      (varT),a        ; t = high of result
 171++DAAB              ;-- Set up TQ
 172++DAAB 2A E6 7E                             ld      hl,(varAxis1)   ; now work on roofv axis / 16
 173++DAAE              ;   ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; work on nosev again
 174++DAAE 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 175++DAAF 23                                   inc     hl
 176++DAB0 56                                   ld      d,(hl)
 177++DAB1 7A                                   ld      a,d
 178++DAB2 E6 80                                and     $80
 179++DAB4 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save sign
 180++DAB6 7A                                   ld      a,d
 181++DAB7 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = nosev hi axis  unsigned
 182++DAB9 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = abs (nosev)
 183++DABA                                      ShiftDERight1
 183++DABA CB 3A       >			   srl d
 183++DABC CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 184++DABE                                      ShiftDERight1
 184++DABE CB 3A       >			   srl d
 184++DAC0 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 185++DAC2                                      ShiftDERight1
 185++DAC2 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 185++DAC4 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 186++DAC6                                      ShiftDERight1           ; de = nosev /16 unsigned
 186++DAC6 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 186++DAC8 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 187++DACA 3A 4F C0                             ld      a,(univRAT2)
 188++DACD FD AC                                xor     iyh             ; get the sign back in so de = nosev axis / 16 signed
 189++DACF E6 80                                and     $80
 190++DAD1 B2                                   or      d
 191++DAD2 57                                   ld      d,a
 192++DAD3              ;;; ld      a,e
 193++DAD3              ;;;     or      iyh
 194++DAD3              ;;; ld      (varP),a        ; PA now equals nosev axis / 16 signed
 195++DAD3 E1                                   pop     hl              ; get back RS   POP ID 3
 196++DAD4              ;   ex      de,hl           ; swapping around so hl = AP and de = SR , shoud not matter though as its an add
 197++DAD4 CD 71 01                             call    subHLDES15 ; do add using hl and de
 198++DAD7              ;-- Update nosev ---------------------------------------
 199++DAD7 EB                                   ex      de,hl           ; save hl to de
 200++DAD8 2A E8 7E                             ld      hl,(varAxis2)
 201++DADB 73                                   ld      (hl),e
 202++DADC 23                                   inc     hl
 203++DADD 72                                   ld      (hl),d          ; copy result into nosev
 204++DADE              ;-- Update roofv ---------------------------------------
 205++DADE D1                                   pop     de              ; get calc saved on stack POP ID 2
 206++DADF 2A E6 7E                             ld      hl,(varAxis1)
 207++DAE2 73                                   ld      (hl),e
 208++DAE3 23                                   inc     hl
 209++DAE4 72                                   ld      (hl),d          ; copy result into nosev
 210++DAE5 C9                                   ret
 211++DAE6
 212++DAE6
# file closed: ././Universe/Ships/ApplyShipRollAndPitch.asm

1438+ DC78 4F                                   ld      c,a                              ; XX20 also c = number of vertices * 6 (or XX20)
1439+ DC79 16 06                                ld      d,6
1440+ DC7B CD 61 96                             call    asm_div8                         ; asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
1441+ DC7E 41                                   ld      b,c                              ; c = number of vertices
1442+ DC7F FD 21 F0 C0                          ld      iy,UBnkNodeArray
1443+ DC83              LL48:
1444+ DC83 C5           PointLoop:              push    bc                                  ; save counters
1445+ DC84 E5                                   push    hl                                  ; save verticies list pointer
1446+ DC85 FD E5                                push    iy                                  ; save Screen plot array pointer
1447+ DC87 78                                   ld      a,b
1448+ DC88                                      ;break
1449+ DC88 CD 21 D5                             call    CopyNodeToXX15                      ; copy verices at hl to xx15
1450+ DC8B 3A A7 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkXScaledSign)
1451+ DC8E CD FC 7A                             call    XX12EquNodeDotOrientation
1452+ DC91 CD 1B CD                             call    TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15
1453+ DC94 CD 98 CD                             call    ScaleNodeTo8Bit                     ; scale to 8 bit values, why don't we hold the magnitude here?x
1454+ DC97 FD E1                                pop     iy                                  ; get back screen plot array pointer
1455+ DC99 CD A0 D5                             call    ProjectNodeToEye                     ; set up screen plot list entry
1456+ DC9C                 ; ld      hl,UbnkLineArrayLen
1457+ DC9C                ;  inc     (hl)                                ; another node done
1458+ DC9C FD E5        ReadyForNextPoint:      push    iy                                  ; copy screen plot pointer to hl
1459+ DC9E E1                                   pop     hl
1460+ DC9F 3E 04                                ld      a,4
1461+ DCA1 ED 31                                add     hl,a
1462+ DCA3 E5                                   push    hl                                  ; write it back at iy + 4
1463+ DCA4 FD E1                                pop     iy                                  ; and put it in iy again
1464+ DCA6 E1                                   pop     hl                                  ; get hl back as vertex list
1465+ DCA7 3E 06                                ld      a,6
1466+ DCA9 ED 31                                add     hl,a                                ; and move to next vertex
1467+ DCAB C1                                   pop     bc                                  ; get counter back
1468+ DCAC 10 D5                                djnz    PointLoop
1469+ DCAE              ; ......................................................
1470+ DCAE                                      ClearCarryFlag
1470+ DCAE B7          >                        or a
1471+ DCAF C9                                   ret
1472+ DCB0              ; ...........................................................
1473+ DCB0 CD A5 D1     ProcessShip:            call    CheckVisible                ; checks for z -ve and outside view frustrum, sets up flags for next bit
1474+ DCB3 3A 54 C0     .IsItADot:              ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)
1475+ DCB6 E6 68                                and     ShipIsVisible | ShipIsDot | ShipExploding  ; first off set if we can draw or need to update explosion
1476+ DCB8 C8                                   ret     z                           ; if none of these flags are set we can fast exit
1477+ DCB9                                      JumpOnABitSet ShipExplodingBitNbr, .ExplodingCloud; we always do the cloud processing even if invisible
1477+ DCB9 CB 6F       >                        bit 	ShipExplodingBitNbr, a
1477+ DCBB C2 FC DC    >                        jp      nz,.ExplodingCloud
1478+ DCBE              ;............................................................
1479+ DCBE              .DetermineDrawType:     ReturnOnBitClear    a, ShipIsVisibleBitNbr          ; if its not visible exit early
1479+ DCBE CB 77       >                        bit 	ShipIsVisibleBitNbr,a
1479+ DCC0 C8          >                        ret		z
1480+ DCC1                                      JumpOnABitClear ShipIsDotBitNbr, .CarryOnWithDraw   ; if not dot do normal draw
1480+ DCC1 CB 5F       >                        bit 	ShipIsDotBitNbr, a
1480+ DCC3 CA EA DC    >                        jp      z,.CarryOnWithDraw
1481+ DCC6              ;............................................................
1482+ DCC6 CD EC DB     .itsJustADot:           call    ProcessDot
1483+ DCC9                                      SetMemBitN  UBnkaiatkecm , ShipIsDotBitNbr ; set is a dot flag
1483+ DCC9 21 54 C0    >                        ld      hl,UBnkaiatkecm
1483+ DCCC CB DE       >                        set     ShipIsDotBitNbr,(hl)
1484+ DCCE ED 4B F0 C0                          ld      bc,(UBnkNodeArray)          ; if its at dot range get X
1485+ DCD2 ED 5B F2 C0                          ld      de,(UBnkNodeArray+2)        ; and Y
1486+ DCD6 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; if high byte components are not 0 then off screen
1487+ DCD7 B2                                   or      d                           ;
1488+ DCD8 C0                                   ret     nz                          ;
1489+ DCD9 7B                                   ld      a,e
1490+ DCDA E6 80                                and     %10000000                   ; check to see if Y > 128
1491+ DCDC C0                                   ret     nz
1492+ DCDD 43                                   ld      b,e                         ; now b = y and c = x
1493+ DCDE 3E FF                                ld      a,L2ColourWHITE_1           ; just draw a pixel
1494+ DCE0 3E E0                                ld      a,224
1495+ DCE2                                      MMUSelectLayer2                     ; then go to update radar
1495+ DCE2 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
1496+ DCE6 CD F8 E2                             call    ShipPixel                   ;
1497+ DCE9 C9                                   ret
1498+ DCEA              ;............................................................
1499+ DCEA CD 61 DC     .CarryOnWithDraw:       call    ProcessNodes                ; process notes is the poor performer or check distnace is not culling
1500+ DCED                                     ; break
1501+ DCED                                  IFDEF PLOTPOINTSONLY
1502+ DCED ~                                    ld      a,$F6
1503+ DCED ~                                    ld      (line_gfx_colour),a
1504+ DCED ~                                    call    PlotAllNodes
1505+ DCED                                  ELSE
1506+ DCED 3E E3                                ld      a,$E3
1507+ DCEF 32 B5 E2                             ld      (line_gfx_colour),a
1508+ DCF2 CD EC D1                             call    CullV2
1509+ DCF5 CD A4 DE                             call    PrepLines                       ; With late clipping this just moves the data to the line array which is now x2 size
1510+ DCF8 CD 8E DB                             call    DrawLinesLateClipping
1511+ DCFB                                  ENDIF
1512+ DCFB                                  IFDEF OVERLAYNODES
1513+ DCFB ~                                    ld      a,$CF
1514+ DCFB ~                                    ld      (line_gfx_colour),a
1515+ DCFB ~                                    call    PlotAllNodes
1516+ DCFB                                  ENDIF
1517+ DCFB                                  IFDEF FLIPBUFFERSTEST
1518+ DCFB ~                                    DISPLAY "Univ_ship_data flip buffer test Enabled"
1519+ DCFB ~                                    call   l2_flip_buffers
1520+ DCFB ~                                    call   l2_flip_buffers
1521+ DCFB                                  ELSE
1522+ DCFB                                      DISPLAY "Univ_ship_data flip buffer test Disabled"
1523+ DCFB                                  ENDIF
1524+ DCFB C9                                   ret
1525+ DCFC              ;............................................................
1526+ DCFC CD 61 DC     .ExplodingCloud:        call    ProcessNodes
1527+ DCFF                                      ClearMemBitN  UBnkaiatkecm, ShipKilledBitNbr ; acknowledge ship exploding
1527+ DCFF 21 54 C0    >                        ld      hl,UBnkaiatkecm
1527+ DD02 CB A6       >                        res     ShipKilledBitNbr,(hl)
1528+ DD04 3A 5F C0     .UpdateCloudCounter:    ld      a,(UBnKCloudCounter)        ; counter += 4 until > 255
1529+ DD07 C6 04                                add     4                           ; we do this early as we now have logic for
1530+ DD09 DA CB DD                             jp      c,.FinishedExplosion        ; display or not later
1531+ DD0C 32 5F C0                             ld      (UBnKCloudCounter),a        ; .
1532+ DD0F              .SkipHiddenShip:        ReturnOnMemBitClear  UBnkaiatkecm , ShipIsVisibleBitNbr
1532+ DD0F 3A 54 C0    >                        ld     a,(UBnkaiatkecm)
1532+ DD12 CB 77       >                        bit 	ShipIsVisibleBitNbr,a
1532+ DD14 C8          >                        ret		z
1533+ DD15              .IsShipADot:            JumpOnABitSet ShipIsDotBitNbr, .itsJustADot ; if its dot distance then explosion is a dot, TODO later we will do as a coloured dot
1533+ DD15 CB 5F       >                        bit 	ShipIsDotBitNbr, a
1533+ DD17 C2 C6 DC    >                        jp      nz,.itsJustADot
1534+ DD1A 2A 26 C0     .CalculateZ:            ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                ; al = hl = z
1535+ DD1D 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; .
1536+ DD1E                                      JumpIfALTNusng 32,.CalcFromZ        ; if its >= 32 then set a to FE and we are done
1536+ DD1E FE 20       >                        cp      32
1536+ DD20 DA 28 DD    >                        jp		c, .CalcFromZ
1537+ DD23 26 FE                                ld      h,$FE                       ; .
1538+ DD25 C3 33 DD                             jp      .DoneZDist                  ; .
1539+ DD28              .CalcFromZ:             ShiftHLLeft1                        ; else
1539+ DD28 CB 25       >			   sla l
1539+ DD2A CB 14       >			   rl  h
1540+ DD2C                                      ShiftHLLeft1                        ; hl = hl * 2
1540+ DD2C CB 25       >			   sla l
1540+ DD2E CB 14       >			   rl  h
1541+ DD30                                      SetCarryFlag                        ; h = h * 3 rolling in lower bit
1541+ DD30 37          >                        scf
1542+ DD31 CB 14                                rl  h                               ;
1543+ DD33 06 00        .DoneZDist:             ld      b,0                         ; bc = cloud z distance calculateed
1544+ DD35 4C                                   ld      c,h                         ; .
1545+ DD36 3A 5F C0     .CalcCloudRadius:       ld      a,(UBnKCloudCounter)        ; de = cloud counter * 256
1546+ DD39                      IFDEF LOGMATHS
1547+ DD39 ~                                    MMUSelectMathsTables
1548+ DD39 ~                                    ld      b,h
1549+ DD39 ~                                    call    AEquAmul256DivBLog
1550+ DD39 ~                                    ld      d,a
1551+ DD39 ~                                    MMUSelectROM0
1552+ DD39                      ELSE
1553+ DD39 57                                   ld      d,a                         ;
1554+ DD3A 1E 00                                ld      e,0                         ;
1555+ DD3C CD A5 95                             call    DEequDEDivBC                ; de = cloud counter * 256 / z distance
1556+ DD3F 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ; if radius >= 28
1557+ DD40                      ENDIF
1558+ DD40                                      JumpIfALTNusng  28,.SetCloudRadius  ; then set raidus in d to $FE
1558+ DD40 FE 1C       >                        cp      28
1558+ DD42 DA 4A DD    >                        jp		c, .SetCloudRadius
1559+ DD45 16 FE        .MaxCloudRadius:        ld      d,$FE                       ;
1560+ DD47 C3 56 DD                             jp      .SizedUpCloud               ;
1561+ DD4A              .SetCloudRadius:        ShiftDELeft1                        ; de = 8 * de
1561+ DD4A CB 23       >			   sla e
1561+ DD4C CB 12       >			   rl  d
1562+ DD4E                                      ShiftDELeft1                        ; .
1562+ DD4E CB 23       >			   sla e
1562+ DD50 CB 12       >			   rl  d
1563+ DD52                                      ShiftDELeft1                        ; .
1563+ DD52 CB 23       >			   sla e
1563+ DD54 CB 12       >			   rl  d
1564+ DD56 7A           .SizedUpCloud:          ld      a,d                         ; cloudradius = a = d or (cloudcounter * 8 / 256)
1565+ DD57 32 60 C0                             ld      (UBnKCloudRadius),a         ; .
1566+ DD5A DD 67                                ld      ixh,a                       ; ixh = a = calculated cloud radius
1567+ DD5C 3A 5F C0     .CalcSubParticleColour: ld      a,(UBnKCloudCounter)        ; colur fades away
1568+ DD5F ED 23                                swapnib                             ; divive by 16
1569+ DD61 E6 0F                                and     $0F                         ; mask off upper bytes
1570+ DD63 CB 2F                                sra     a                           ; divide by 32
1571+ DD65 21 D7 DD                             ld      hl,DebrisColourTable
1572+ DD68 ED 31                                add     hl,a
1573+ DD6A 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
1574+ DD6B FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = pixel colours
1575+ DD6D 3A 5F C0     .CalcSubParticleCount:  ld      a,(UBnKCloudCounter)        ; cloud counter = abs (cloud counter) in effect if > 127 then shrinks it
1576+ DD70                                      ABSa2c                              ; a = abs a
1576+ DD70 CB 7F       >                        bit     7,a
1576+ DD72 CA 77 DD    >                        jp      z,.DoneABSa
1576+ DD75 ED 44       >                        neg
1576+ DD77             >.DoneABSa:
1577+ DD77 CB 2F        .ParticlePositive:      sra a                               ; iyh = (a /8)
1578+ DD79 CB 2F                                sra a                               ; .
1579+ DD7B CB 2F                                sra a                               ; .
1580+ DD7D F6 01                                or  1                               ; bit 0 set so minimum 1
1581+ DD7F DD 6F        .DoneSubParticleCount:  ld      ixl,a                       ; ixl = nbr particles per vertex
1582+ DD81 3A FE C3     .ForEachVertex:         ld      a,(VertexCountAddr)         ; load vertex count into b
1583+ DD84 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; .
1584+ DD85 21 F0 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkNodeArray            ; hl = list of vertices
1585+ DD88 C5 E5        .ExplosionVertLoop:     push    bc,,hl                      ; save vertex counter in b and pointer to verticles in hl
1586+ DD8A DD 68                                    ld      ixl,b                   ; save counter
1587+ DD8C 4E                                       ld      c,(hl)                  ; get vertex into bc and de
1588+ DD8D 23                                       inc     hl                      ; .
1589+ DD8E 46                                       ld      b,(hl)                  ; .
1590+ DD8F 23                                       inc     hl                      ; .
1591+ DD90 5E                                       ld      e,(hl)                  ; .
1592+ DD91 23                                       inc     hl                      ; .
1593+ DD92 56                                       ld      d,(hl)                  ; now hl is done with and we can use it
1594+ DD93 DD 7D        .LoopSubParticles:          ld      a,ixl                   ; iyh = loop iterator for nbr of particles per vertex
1595+ DD95 FD 67                                    ld      iyh,a                   ;
1596+ DD97                                          ;break
1597+ DD97 D5 C5        .ProcessAParticle:          push    de,,bc                  ; save y then x coordinates
1598+ DD99 EB                                           ex      de,hl               ; hl = de (Y)
1599+ DD9A DD 54                                        ld      d,ixh               ; d = cloud radius
1600+ DD9C CD DF DD                                     call    HLEquARandCloud     ; vertex = vertex +/- (random * projected cloud side /256)
1601+ DD9F 7C                                           ld      a,h                 ; if off screen skip
1602+ DDA0                                              JumpIfAIsNotZero  .NextIteration
1602+ DDA0 A7          >                        and     a
1602+ DDA1 C2 BC DD    >                        jp	    nz,.NextIteration
1603+ DDA4 EB                                           ex      de,hl               ; de = result for y which was put into hl
1604+ DDA5 E1                                           pop     hl                  ; get x back from bc on stack
1605+ DDA6 E5                                           push    hl                  ; put bc (which is now in hl) back on the stack
1606+ DDA7 D5                                           push    de                  ; save de
1607+ DDA8 DD 54                                        ld      d,ixh               ; d = cloud radius
1608+ DDAA CD DF DD                                     call    HLEquARandCloud     ; vertex = vertex +/- (random * projected cloud side /256)
1609+ DDAD D1                                           pop     de                  ; get de back doing pop here clears stack up
1610+ DDAE 7C                                           ld      a,h                 ; if high byte has a value then off screen
1611+ DDAF                                              JumpIfAIsNotZero .NextIteration ;
1611+ DDAF A7          >                        and     a
1611+ DDB0 C2 BC DD    >                        jp	    nz,.NextIteration
1612+ DDB3 43                                           ld      b,e                 ; bc = y x of pixel from e and c regs
1613+ DDB4 4D                                           ld      c,l                 ; iyl already has colour
1614+ DDB5                                              MMUSelectLayer2             ; plot it with debris code as this can chop y > 128
1614+ DDB5 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
1615+ DDB9 CD 00 E3                                     call    DebrisPixel         ; .
1616+ DDBC C1 D1        .NextIteration:             pop    de,,bc                   ; ready for next iteration, get back y and x coordinates
1617+ DDBE FD 25                                    dec    iyh                      ; one partcile done
1618+ DDC0 20 D5                                    jr      nz,.ProcessAParticle    ; until all done
1619+ DDC2 E1 C1        .NextVert:              pop     bc,,hl                      ; recover loop counter and source pointer
1620+ DDC4 3E 04                                ld      a,4                         ; move to next vertex group
1621+ DDC6 ED 31                                add     hl,a                        ;
1622+ DDC8 10 BE                                djnz    .ExplosionVertLoop          ;
1623+ DDCA C9                                   ret
1624+ DDCB              .FinishedExplosion:     ;break
1625+ DDCB 3A 3F C0                             ld      a,(UBnKSlotNumber)          ; get slot number
1626+ DDCE CD CB 84                             call    ClearSlotA                  ; gauranted to be in main memory as non bankables
1627+ DDD1                                      ClearMemBitN UBnkaiatkecm, ShipExplodingBitNbr
1627+ DDD1 21 54 C0    >                        ld      hl,UBnkaiatkecm
1627+ DDD4 CB AE       >                        res     ShipExplodingBitNbr,(hl)
1628+ DDD6 C9                                   ret
1629+ DDD7
1630+ DDD7
1631+ DDD7 FC D8 B4 90  DebrisColourTable:      DB L2ColourYELLOW_1, L2ColourYELLOW_2, L2ColourYELLOW_3, L2ColourYELLOW_4, L2ColourYELLOW_5, L2ColourYELLOW_6, L2ColourYELLOW_7,L2ColourGREY_4
1631+ DDDB 6C 48 24 25
1632+ DDDF                                      ; set flags and signal to remove from slot list
1633+ DDDF
1634+ DDDF              ; Hl = HlL +/- (Random * projected cloud size)
1635+ DDDF              ; In - d = z distance, hl = vert hi lo
1636+ DDDF              ; Out hl = adjusted distance
1637+ DDDF              ; uses registers hl, de
1638+ DDDF E5           HLEquARandCloud:        push    hl                          ; random number geneator upsets hl register
1639+ DDE0 CD 9C 85                             call    doRandom                    ; a= random * 2
1640+ DDE3 E1                                   pop     hl
1641+ DDE4 17                                   rla                                 ;
1642+ DDE5 38 0A                                jr      c,.Negative                 ; if buit 7 went into carry
1643+ DDE7 5F           .Positive:              ld  e,a
1644+ DDE8 ED 30                                mul
1645+ DDEA 5A                                   ld  e,d
1646+ DDEB 16 00                                ld  d,0
1647+ DDED                                      ClearCarryFlag
1647+ DDED B7          >                        or a
1648+ DDEE ED 5A                                adc     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + a
1649+ DDF0 C9                                   ret
1650+ DDF1 5F           .Negative:              ld  e,a
1651+ DDF2 ED 30                                mul
1652+ DDF4 5A                                   ld  e,d
1653+ DDF5 16 00                                ld  d,0
1654+ DDF7                                      ClearCarryFlag
1654+ DDF7 B7          >                        or a
1655+ DDF8 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + a
1656+ DDFA C9                                   ret
1657+ DDFB
1658+ DDFB              GetExperiencePoints:    ; TODO calculate experience points
1659+ DDFB                                      ; TODO mission updates check
1660+ DDFB C9                                   ret
1661+ DDFC
1662+ DDFC              ; ......................................................
1663+ DDFC 3A 0D C4     KillShip:               ld      a,(ShipTypeAddr)            ; we can't destroy stations in a collision
1664+ DDFF FE 02                                cp      ShipTypeStation             ; for destructable one we will have a special type of ship
1665+ DE01 C8                                   ret     z
1666+ DE02 3A 54 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)            ; remove AI, mark killed, mark exploding
1667+ DE05 F6 30                                or      ShipExploding | ShipKilled  ; .
1668+ DE07 E6 7F                                and     ShipAIDisabled              ; .
1669+ DE09 32 54 C0                             ld      (UBnkaiatkecm),a            ; .
1670+ DE0C                                      SetMemToN   UBnKexplDsp, ShipExplosionDuration ; set debris cloud timer, also usered in main to remove from slots
1670+ DE0C 3E 4B       >                        ld      a,ShipExplosionDuration
1670+ DE0E 32 51 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKexplDsp),a
1671+ DE11                                      ldWriteZero UBnKEnergy              ; Zero ship energy
1671+ DE11 AF          >                        xor      a
1671+ DE12 32 58 C0    >                        ld       (UBnKEnergy),a
1672+ DE15 32 60 C0                             ld      (UBnKCloudRadius),a
1673+ DE18 3E 12                                ld      a,18
1674+ DE1A 32 5F C0                             ld      (UBnKCloudCounter),a        ; Zero cloud
1675+ DE1D                                      ; TODO logic to spawn cargo/plates goes here
1676+ DE1D C9                                   ret
1677+ DE1E
1678+ DE1E              ; in a = damage
1679+ DE1E 47           DamageShip:             ld      b,a                         ; b = a = damage comming in
1680+ DE1F 3A 0D C4                             ld      a,(ShipTypeAddr)            ; we can't destroy stations in a collision
1681+ DE22 FE 02                                cp      ShipTypeStation             ; for destructable one we will have a special type of ship
1682+ DE24 C8                                   ret     z
1683+ DE25 3A 58 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKEnergy)              ; get current energy level
1684+ DE28                                      ClearCarryFlag
1684+ DE28 B7          >                        or a
1685+ DE29 98                                   sbc     a,b                         ; subtract damage
1686+ DE2A D2 31 DE     .Overkilled:            jp      nc,.DoneDamage              ; if no carry then its not gone negative
1687+ DE2D CD FC DD                             call    KillShip                    ; else kill it
1688+ DE30 C9                                   ret
1689+ DE31 32 58 C0     .DoneDamage:            ld      (UBnKEnergy),a
1690+ DE34 C9                                   ret
1691+ DE35              ; need recovery for energy too
1692+ DE35              ; Shall we have a "jolt ship off course routine for when it gets hit by a blast or collision)
1693+ DE35
1694+ DE35              ;-LL49-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1695+ DE35              ;  Entering Here we have the following:
1696+ DE35              ;  XX15(1 0) = vertex x-coordinate but sign not populated
1697+ DE35              ;  XX15(3 2) = vertex y-coordinate but sign not populated
1698+ DE35              ;  XX15(5 4) = vertex z-coordinate but sign not populated
1699+ DE35              ;
1700+ DE35              ;  XX16(  1 0)sidev_x   (3 2)roofv_x   (5 4)nosev_x
1701+ DE35              ;  XX16(  7 6)sidev_y   (9 8)roofv_y (11 10)nosev_y
1702+ DE35              ;  XX16(13 12)sidev_z (15 14)roofv_z (17 16)nosev_z
1703+ DE35              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1704+ DE35              AddLaserBeamLine:
1705+ DE35              ; this code is a bag of shit and needs re-writing
1706+ DE35              GetGunVertexNode:
1707+ DE35 3A FC C3             ld          a,(GunVertexAddr)                   ; Hull byte#6, gun vertex*4 (XX0),Y
1708+ DE38 21 F0 C0             ld          hl,UBnkNodeArray                    ; list of lines to read
1709+ DE3B ED 31                add         hl,a                                ; HL = address of GunVertexOnNodeArray
1710+ DE3D FD 2E 00             ld          iyl,0
1711+ DE40              MoveX1PointToXX15:
1712+ DE40 4E                   ld          c,(hl)                              ;
1713+ DE41 23                   inc         hl
1714+ DE42 46                   ld          b,(hl)                              ; bc = x1 of gun vertex
1715+ DE43 23                   inc         hl
1716+ DE44 ED 43 A6 C0          ld          (UBnkX1),bc
1717+ DE48 0C                   inc         c
1718+ DE49 C8                   ret         z                                   ; was c 255?
1719+ DE4A 04                   inc         b
1720+ DE4B C8                   ret         z                                   ; was c 255?
1721+ DE4C              MoveY1PointToXX15:
1722+ DE4C 4E                   ld          c,(hl)                              ;
1723+ DE4D 23                   inc         hl
1724+ DE4E 46                   ld          b,(hl)                              ; bc = y1 of gun vertex
1725+ DE4F 23                   inc         hl
1726+ DE50 ED 43 A8 C0          ld          (UBnkY1),bc
1727+ DE54              SetX2PointToXX15:
1728+ DE54 01 00 00             ld          bc,0                                ; set X2 to 0
1729+ DE57 ED 43 AA C0          ld          (UBnkX2),bc
1730+ DE5B 3A 26 C0             ld          a,(UBnKzlo)
1731+ DE5E 4F                   ld          c,a
1732+ DE5F              SetY2PointToXX15:
1733+ DE5F ED 43 AC C0          ld          (UBnkY2),bc                         ; set Y2to 0
1734+ DE63 3A 22 C0             ld          a,(UBnKxsgn)
1735+ DE66                      JumpOnBitClear a,7,LL74SkipDec
1735+ DE66 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1735+ DE68 CA 70 DE    >                        jp      z,LL74SkipDec
1736+ DE6B              LL74DecX2:
1737+ DE6B 3E FF                ld          a,$FF
1738+ DE6D 32 AA C0             ld          (UBnkX2Lo),a                        ; rather than dec (hl) just load with 255 as it will always be that at this code point
1739+ DE70              LL74SkipDec:
1740+ DE70 CD F1 CC             call        ClipLineV3                            ; LL145 \ clip test on XX15 XX12 vector, returns carry
1741+ DE73 38 5A                jr          c,CalculateNewLines
1742+ DE75              ;        jr          c,CalculateNewLines                 ; LL170 clip returned carry set so not visibile if carry set skip the rest (laser not firing)
1743+ DE75              ; Here we are usign hl to replace VarU as index
1744+ DE75 2A 04 80             ld          hl,(varU16)
1745+ DE78 3A A6 C0             ld          a,(UBnKx1Lo)
1746+ DE7B 77                   ld          (hl),a
1747+ DE7C 23                   inc         hl
1748+ DE7D 3A A8 C0             ld          a,(UbnKy1Lo)
1749+ DE80 77                   ld          (hl),a
1750+ DE81 23                   inc         hl
1751+ DE82 3A AA C0             ld          a,(UBnkX2Lo)
1752+ DE85 77                   ld          (hl),a
1753+ DE86 23                   inc         hl
1754+ DE87 3A AC C0             ld          a,(UbnKy2Lo)
1755+ DE8A 77                   ld          (hl),a
1756+ DE8B FD 2C                inc         iyl                                 ; iyl holds as a counter to iterations
1757+ DE8D 23                   inc         hl
1758+ DE8E FD 2C                inc         iyl                                 ; ready for next byte
1759+ DE90 22 04 80             ld          (varU16),hl
1760+ DE93 C9                   ret
1761+ DE94
1762+ DE94                  DISPLAY "Tracing 7", $

   5++DE94                  INCLUDE "./ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1.asm
   1++DE94              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++DE94              ; a = byteoffset to node array as its pre computed to x4 bytes
   3++DE94 21 F0 C0     getVertexNodeAtAToDE:   ld          hl,UBnkNodeArray                    ; hl = edgelist  current pointer
   4++DE97 ED 31                                add         hl,a                                ; hl = address of Node
   5++DE99 7E                                   ld          a,(hl)                              ; get edge list nbr 1 edge
   6++DE9A ED A0                                ldi                                             ; x1 lo
   7++DE9C ED A0                                ldi                                             ; x1 hi
   8++DE9E ED A0                                ldi                                             ; y1 lo
   9++DEA0 ED A0                                ldi                                             ; y1 hi
  10++DEA2 C9                                   ret
  11++DEA3
  12++DEA3              ;getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1: ld          hl,UBnkNodeArray                    ; hl = edgelist  current pointer
  13++DEA3              ;                        add         hl,a                                ; hl = address of Node

   6++DEA3

   9++DEA3                  INCLUDE "./ModelRender/getVertexNodeAtAToX2Y2.asm"

  10++DEA3                      DISPLAY "Tracing 10", $
  11++DEA3
  12++DEA3                  INCLUDE "./ModelRender/GetFaceAtA.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/GetFaceAtA.asm
   1++DEA3              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++DEA3              GetFaceAtA:         MACRO
   3++DEA3 ~                                ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
   4++DEA3 ~                                add         hl,a
   5++DEA3 ~                                ld          a,(hl)                              ; get face visibility
   6++DEA3                                  ENDM
   7++DEA3
# file closed: ././ModelRender/GetFaceAtA.asm
  13++DEA3                      DISPLAY "Tracing 11", $
  14++DEA3
  15++DEA3              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  16++DEA3              ; LL72 Goes through each edge in to determine if they are on a visible face, if so load start and end to line array as clipped lines
  17++DEA3               ;   DEFINE NOBACKFACECULL 1
  18++DEA3 00           PLEDGECTR           DB          0
  19++DEA4
  20++DEA4              PrepLines:
  21++DEA4              ; FOR NOW BRUTE FORCE IF OFF SCREEN
  22++DEA4
  23++DEA4              ; TODO add in onced DOEXP is finished
  24++DEA4              ;        ld          a,(UBnkexplDsp)                     ; INWK+31  \ display/exploding state|missiles
  25++DEA4              ;        JumpOnBitClear  a,5,EE31                        ; bit5 of mask, if zero no explosion
  26++DEA4              ;        or          8
  27++DEA4              ;        ld          (UBnkexplDsp),a                     ; else else set bit3 to erase old line
  28++DEA4              ;        jp          DOEXP                               ; erase using Do Explosion and use implicit return
  29++DEA4              ;EE31:                                                   ; no explosion
  30++DEA4              ;        JumpOnBitClear  a,3,LL74                        ; clear is hop to do New lines
  31++DEA4              ;        call        ClearLine                           ; LL155    \ else erase lines in XX19 heap at LINEstr down
  32++DEA4              ;        ld          a, $08                              ; set bit 3 of a and fall into LL74
  33++DEA4              ;
  34++DEA4              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  35++DEA4
  36++DEA4              InitialiseLineRead:
  37++DEA4                      ;break
  38++DEA4                      ldWriteZero UbnkLineArrayLen                    ; current line array index = 0
  38++DEA4 AF          >                        xor      a
  38++DEA5 32 EA C3    >                        ld       (UbnkLineArrayLen),a
  39++DEA8 32 EB C3             ld          (UbnkLineArrayBytes),a              ; UbnkLineArrayBytes= nbr of bytes of lines laoded = array len * 4
  40++DEAB 32 A3 DE             ld          (PLEDGECTR),a
  41++DEAE 3A 00 C4             ld          a,(EdgeCountAddr)
  42++DEB1 DD 67                ld          ixh,a                               ; ixh = XX17 = Total number of edges to traverse
  43++DEB3 FD 2E 00             ld          iyl,0                               ; ixl = current edge index
  44++DEB6 21 30 C2             ld          hl,UbnkLineArray                    ; head of array
  45++DEB9 22 04 80             ld          (varU16),hl                         ; store current line array pointer un varU16
  46++DEBC                      ldCopyByte  EdgeCountAddr, XX17                 ; XX17  = total number of edges to traverse edge counter
  46++DEBC 3A 00 C4    >                        ld       a,(EdgeCountAddr)
  46++DEBF 32 08 80    >                        ld       (XX17),a
  47++DEC2 3A 51 C0             ld          a,(UBnKexplDsp)                     ; get explosion status
  48++DEC5                      JumpOnBitClear a,6,CalculateNewLines            ; LL170 bit6 of display state clear (laser not firing) \ Calculate new lines
  48++DEC5 CB 77       >                        bit 	6,a
  48++DEC7 CA CF DE    >                        jp      z,CalculateNewLines
  49++DECA E6 BF                and         $BF                                 ; else laser is firing, clear bit6.
  50++DECC 32 51 C0             ld          (UBnKexplDsp),a                     ; INWK+31
  51++DECF              ;   TODO commentedout as teh subroutine is a mess   call        AddLaserBeamLine                    ; add laser beam line to draw list
  52++DECF              ; NOw we can calculate hull after including laser line
  53++DECF              CalculateNewLines:
  54++DECF              LL170:                                                  ;(laser not firing) \ Calculate new lines   \ their comment
  55++DECF              CheckEdgesForVisibility:
  56++DECF 21 01 C5             ld          hl,UBnkHullEdges
  57++DED2                      ; TODO change heap to 3 separate arrays and break them down during copy of ship hull data
  58++DED2 22 07 7F             ld          (varV),hl                           ; V \ is pointer to where edges data start
  59++DED5 3A FB C3             ld          a,(LineX4Addr)
  60++DED8 47                   ld          b,a                                 ; nbr of bytes of edge data
  61++DED9              LL75Loop:                                               ; count Visible edges
  62++DED9              IsEdgeInVisibilityRange:
  63++DED9 2A 07 7F             ld          hl,(varV)
  64++DEDC E5                   push        hl
  65++DEDD FD E1                pop         iy
  66++DEDF                     ; DEFINE NOBACKFACECULL 1
  67++DEDF                      IFDEF NOBACKFACECULL
  68++DEDF ~                        jp          VisibileEdge; DEBUGTODO
  69++DEDF                      ENDIF
  70++DEDF 3A F2 7E             ld          a,(LastNormalVisible)               ; XX4 is visibility range
  71++DEE2 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; d holds copy of XX4
  72++DEE3              ; Get Edge Byte 0
  73++DEE3 FD 7E 00             ld          a,(IY+0)                            ; edge data byte#0 is visibility distance
  74++DEE6                      JumpIfALTNusng d,LL78EdgeNotVisible             ; XX4   \ visibility LLx78 edge not visible
  74++DEE6 BA          >                        cp      d
  74++DEE7 DA 42 DF    >                        jp		c, LL78EdgeNotVisible
  75++DEEA              EdgeMayBeVisibile:
  76++DEEA              ; Get Edge Byte 1
  77++DEEA              IsFace1Visibile:                                        ; edges have 2 faces to test
  78++DEEA FD 7E 01             ld          a,(IY+1)                            ; (V),Y \ edge data byte#1 bits 0 to 3 face 1 4 to 7 face 2
  79++DEED 4F                   ld          c,a                                 ;  c = a copy of byte 1
  80++DEEE E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ;
  81++DEF0                      GetFaceAtA
  81++DEF0 21 D2 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
  81++DEF3 ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
  81++DEF5 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ; get face visibility
  82++DEF6              ;       jp  VisibileEdge; DEBUG BODGE TEST TODO
  83++DEF6                      JumpIfAIsNotZero VisibileEdge                     ; LL70 visible edge
  83++DEF6 A7          >                        and     a
  83++DEF7 C2 0B DF    >                        jp	    nz,VisibileEdge
  84++DEFA              IsFace2Visibile:
  85++DEFA 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; restore byte 1 from c register
  86++DEFB ED 23                swapnib                                         ;
  87++DEFD E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; swap high byte into low byte
  88++DEFF E5                   push        hl
  89++DF00                      GetFaceAtA
  89++DF00 21 D2 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
  89++DF03 ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
  89++DF05 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ; get face visibility
  90++DF06 E1                   pop         hl
  91++DF07                      JumpIfAIsZero LL78EdgeNotVisible                ; edge not visible
  91++DF07 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  91++DF08 CA 42 DF    >                        jp	    z, LL78EdgeNotVisible
  92++DF0B              VisibileEdge:                                           ; Now we need to node id from bytes 2 - start and 3 - end
  93++DF0B              ;LL79--Visible edge--------------------------------------
  94++DF0B              ; Get Edge Byte 2
  95++DF0B FD 7E 02             ld          a,(IY+2)                            ; get Node id
  96++DF0E 11 A6 C0             ld          de,UBnkX1
  97++DF11 CD 94 DE             call        getVertexNodeAtAToDE; getVertexNodeAtAToX1Y1              ; get the points X1Y1 from node
  98++DF14 FD 7E 03             ld          a,(IY+3)
  99++DF17 11 AA C0             ld          de,UBnkX2
 100++DF1A CD 94 DE             call        getVertexNodeAtAToDE; getVertexNodeAtAToX2Y2              ; get the points X2Y2 from node
 101++DF1D
 102++DF1D                      IFDEF       CLIPVersion3
 103++DF1D ~                        call        ClipLineV3
 104++DF1D ~                        jr          nc,.SkipBreak1
 105++DF1D ~                        nop
 106++DF1D ~                        nop
 107++DF1D ~                        ;break
 108++DF1D ~            .SkipBreak1:
 109++DF1D ~                        jr          c,LL78EdgeNotVisible
 110++DF1D ~            //COMMENEDOUT FOR LATECLIPPING        ELSE
 111++DF1D ~            //COMMENEDOUT FOR LATECLIPPING            call        ClipLine
 112++DF1D ~            //COMMENEDOUT FOR LATECLIPPING            jr          c,LL78EdgeNotVisible                ; LL78 edge not visible
 113++DF1D                      ENDIF
 114++DF1D              LL80:                                                   ; ll80 \ Shove visible edge onto XX19 ship lines heap counter U
 115++DF1D                      IFDEF       LATECLIPPING
 116++DF1D ED 5B 04 80                  ld          de,(varU16)                         ; clipped edges heap address
 117++DF21 21 A6 C0                     ld          hl,UbnkPreClipX1
 118++DF24                              FourLDIInstrunctions
 118++DF24 ED A0       >                        ldi
 118++DF26 ED A0       >                        ldi
 118++DF28 ED A0       >                        ldi
 118++DF2A ED A0       >                        ldi
 119++DF2C                              FourLDIInstrunctions
 119++DF2C ED A0       >                        ldi
 119++DF2E ED A0       >                        ldi
 119++DF30 ED A0       >                        ldi
 119++DF32 ED A0       >                        ldi
 120++DF34 ED 53 04 80                  ld          (varU16),de                         ; update U16 with current address
 121++DF38                      ELSE
 122++DF38 ~                            ld          de,(varU16)                         ; clipped edges heap address
 123++DF38 ~                            ld          hl,UBnkNewX1
 124++DF38 ~                            FourLDIInstrunctions
 125++DF38 ~                            ld          (varU16),de                         ; update U16 with current address
 126++DF38                      ENDIF
 127++DF38 21 EA C3             ld          hl,UbnkLineArrayLen                 ; we have loaded one line
 128++DF3B 34                   inc         (hl)
 129++DF3C 7E                   ld          a,(hl)
 130++DF3D                      JumpIfAGTENusng LineArraySize,CompletedLineGeneration   ; have we hit max lines for a model hop over jmp to Exit edge data loop
 130++DF3D FE 32       >                        cp     LineArraySize
 130++DF3F D2 58 DF    >                        jp		nc,CompletedLineGeneration
 131++DF42              ; If we hit here we skip the write of line arryay u16
 132++DF42              LL78EdgeNotVisible:                                     ; also arrive here if Edge not visible, loop next data edge.
 133++DF42              LL78:
 134++DF42 2A 07 7F             ld          hl,(varV)                           ; varV is current edge address
 135++DF45 3E 04                ld          a,4
 136++DF47 ED 31                add         hl,a
 137++DF49 22 07 7F             ld          (varV),hl
 138++DF4C 21 A3 DE             ld          hl,PLEDGECTR                        ;
 139++DF4F 34                   inc         (hl)                                ;
 140++DF50 7E                   ld          a,(hl)                              ; current edge index ++
 141++DF51                      JumpIfANEMemusng XX17,LL75Loop                  ; compare with total number of edges
 141++DF51 21 08 80    >                        ld    hl,XX17
 141++DF54 BE          >                        cp    (hl)
 141++DF55 C2 D9 DE    >                        jp      nz,LL75Loop
 142++DF58              CompletedLineGeneration:
 143++DF58              LL81:
 144++DF58              LL81SHPPT:                                              ; SHPPT ship is a point arrives here with Acc=2, bottom entry in heap
 145++DF58 3A EA C3             ld          a,(UbnkLineArrayLen)                ; UbnkLineArrayLen = nbr of lines loaded
 146++DF5B CB 27                sla         a
 147++DF5D CB 27                sla         a                                   ; multiple by 4 to equal number of bytes
 148++DF5F                      IFDEF       LATECLIPPING
 149++DF5F CB 27                        sla         a                           ; multiple by 8 to equal number of bytes
 150++DF61                      ENDIF
 151++DF61 32 EB C3             ld          (UbnkLineArrayBytes),a              ; UbnkLineArrayBytes= nbr of bytes of lines laoded = array len * 4
 152++DF64              ExitEdgeDataLoop:
 153++DF64 C9                   ret
 154++DF65
# file closed: ./Universe/Ships/PrepLines.asm

# file opened: ./Universe/Sun/sun_data.asm
   1+ C000              ; In  flight ship data tables
   2+ C000              ; In  flight ship data tables
   3+ C000              ; In  flight ship data tables
   4+ C000              ; There can be upto &12 objects in flight.
   5+ C000              ; To avoid hassle of memory heap managment, the free list
   6+ C000              ; will correspond to a memory bank offset so data will be held in
   7+ C000              ; 1 bank per universe object. Its a waste of a lot of memory but really
   8+ C000              ; 1 bank per universe object. Its a waste of a lot of memory but really
   9+ C000              ; simple that way. Each bank will be 8K and swapped on 8K slot 7 $E000 to $FFFF
  10+ C000              ; This means each gets its own line list, inwork etc
  11+ C000
  12+ C000              ; "Runtime Ship Data paged into in Bank 7"
  13+ C000              ;                      0123456789ABCDEF
  14+ C000 53 75 6E 20  StartOfSun:        DB "Sun Data ......."
  14+ C004 44 61 74 61
  14+ C008 20 2E 2E 2E
  14+ C00C 2E 2E 2E 2E
  15+ C010              ; NOTE we can cheat and pre allocate segs just using a DS for now
  16+ C010              CheckRowHLOnScreen:     MACRO   failtarget
  17+ C010 ~                                    ld      a,h                             ; is h byte set, i.e > 256 or < 0
  18+ C010 ~                                    and     a                               ; .
  19+ C010 ~                                    jr      nz,failtarget                   ; h <> 0 so fails (covers <0 and > 255
  20+ C010 ~                                    ld      a,l                             ; l bit 7 0?
  21+ C010 ~                                    and     Bit7Only                        ; covers l > 127 (screen draw area is 0 to 192 / 3 * 2 (128)
  22+ C010 ~                                    jr      nz,failtarget                   ;
  23+ C010                                      ENDM
  24+ C010
  25+ C010              ; IY = SBnKLineArray + rowValue*2
  26+ C010              IYEquRowN:              MACRO   rowValue                        ; set up iy as target address
  27+ C010 ~                                    ld      a,rowValue
  28+ C010 ~                                    ld      hl,SBnKLineArray
  29+ C010 ~                                    add     hl,a
  30+ C010 ~                                    add     hl,a
  31+ C010 ~                                    push    hl
  32+ C010 ~                                    pop     iy
  33+ C010                                      ENDM

  61+ C081 00 00 00...  SunXX15Save                 DS  8

  69+ C091              SunLineArraySize            equ 128 * 2
