   1+ 0000
   2+ 0000              ; Adds DE to HL, in form S15 result will also be S15 rather than 2's C
   3+ 0000 7C           AddDEtoHLSigned:        ld      a,h                         ; extract h sign to b
   4+ 0001 E6 80                                and     $80                         ; hl = abs (hl)
   5+ 0003 47                                   ld      b,a
   6+ 0004 7C                                   ld      a,h
   7+ 0005 E6 7F                                and     $7F
   8+ 0007 67                                   ld      h,a
   9+ 0008 7A                                   ld      a,d                         ; extract d sign to c
  10+ 0009 E6 80                                and     $80                         ; de = abs (de)
  11+ 000B 4F                                   ld      c,a
  12+ 000C 7A                                   ld      a,d
  13+ 000D E6 7F                                and     $7F
  14+ 000F 57                                   ld      d,a
  15+ 0010 78                                   ld      a,b
  16+ 0011 A9                                   xor     c
  17+ 0012 C2 1A 00                             jp      nz,.OppositeSigns
  18+ 0015 19           .SameSigns              add     hl,de                       ; same signs so just add
  19+ 0016 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; and bring in the sign from b
  20+ 0017 B4                                   or      h                           ; note this has to be 15 bit result
  21+ 0018 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; but we can assume that
  22+ 0019 C9                                   ret
  23+ 001A              .OppositeSigns:         ClearCarryFlag
  23+ 001A B7          >                        or a
  24+ 001B ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  25+ 001D 38 04                                jr      c,.OppsiteSignInvert
  26+ 001F 78           .OppositeSignNoInvert:  ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  27+ 0020 B4                                   or      h
  28+ 0021 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
  29+ 0022 C9                                   ret
  30+ 0023              .OppsiteSignInvert:     NegHL                              ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
  30+ 0023 AF          >                    xor a
  30+ 0024 95          >                    sub l
  30+ 0025 6F          >                    ld l,a
  30+ 0026 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  30+ 0027 94          >                    sub h
  30+ 0028 67          >                    ld h,a
  31+ 0029 78                                   ld      a,b
  32+ 002A EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit               ; flip sign bit
  33+ 002C B4                                   or      h
  34+ 002D 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
  35+ 002E C9                                   ret
  36+ 002F
  37+ 002F 78           ADDHLDESignBC:          ld      a,b
  38+ 0030 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  39+ 0032 A9                                   xor     c                           ;if b sign and c sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
  40+ 0033                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN     ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
  40+ 0033 FA 41 00    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN
  41+ 0036 78           .ADDHLDEsBCSameSigns:   ld      a,b
  42+ 0037 B1                                   or      c
  43+ 0038                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg    ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  43+ 0038 FA 3D 00    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg
  44+ 003B 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; both positive so a will already be zero
  45+ 003C C9                                   ret
  46+ 003D 19           .ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg:      add     hl,de
  47+ 003E 78                                   ld      a,b
  48+ 003F                                      DISPLAY "TODO: don't bother with overflow for now"
  49+ 003F B1                                   or      c                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  50+ 0040 C9                                   ret
  51+ 0041              .ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN:       ClearCarryFlag
  51+ 0041 B7          >                        or a
  52+ 0042 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  53+ 0044 38 02                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEsBCOppInvert
  54+ 0046 78           .ADDHLDEsBCOppSGNNoCarry:ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  55+ 0047 C9                                   ret
  56+ 0048              .ADDHLDEsBCOppInvert:   NegHL                               ; if result was zero then set sign to zero (which doing h or l will give us for free)
  56+ 0048 AF          >                    xor a
  56+ 0049 95          >                    sub l
  56+ 004A 6F          >                    ld l,a
  56+ 004B 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  56+ 004C 94          >                    sub h
  56+ 004D 67          >                    ld h,a
  57+ 004E 78                                   ld      a,b
  58+ 004F EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
  59+ 0051 C9                                   ret
  60+ 0052
  61+ 0052 7C           ADDHLDESignedV4:        ld      a,h
  62+ 0053 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  63+ 0055 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
  64+ 0056 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
  65+ 0057                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN       ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
  65+ 0057 FA 6F 00    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
  66+ 005A 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:      ld      a,b
  67+ 005B B2                                   or      d
  68+ 005C                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg      ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  68+ 005C FA 61 00    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
  69+ 005F 19                                   add     hl,de
  70+ 0060 C9                                   ret
  71+ 0061 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:        ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
  72+ 0062 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  73+ 0064 67                                   ld      h,a
  74+ 0065 7A                                   ld      a,d
  75+ 0066 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  76+ 0068 57                                   ld      d,a
  77+ 0069 19                                   add     hl,de
  78+ 006A 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
  79+ 006C                                      DISPLAY "TODO:  dont bother with overflow for now"
  80+ 006C B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  81+ 006D 67                                   ld      h,a
  82+ 006E C9                                   ret
  83+ 006F 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit                     ; here HL and DE are opposite
  84+ 0070 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  85+ 0072 67                                   ld      h,a
  86+ 0073 7A                                   ld      a,d
  87+ 0074 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  88+ 0076 57                                   ld      d,a
  89+ 0077                                      ClearCarryFlag
  89+ 0077 B7          >                        or a
  90+ 0078 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  91+ 007A 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
  92+ 007C 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:  ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  93+ 007D B4                                   or      h
  94+ 007E 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
  95+ 007F C9                                   ret
  96+ 0080              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:      NegHL                                                   ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
  96+ 0080 AF          >                    xor a
  96+ 0081 95          >                    sub l
  96+ 0082 6F          >                    ld l,a
  96+ 0083 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  96+ 0084 94          >                    sub h
  96+ 0085 67          >                    ld h,a
  97+ 0086 78                                   ld      a,b
  98+ 0087 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
  99+ 0089 B4                                   or      h
 100+ 008A 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 101+ 008B C9                                   ret
 102+ 008C
 103+ 008C              ; extension to AddBCHtoDELsigned
 104+ 008C              ; takes ix as the address of the values to load into DEL
 105+ 008C              ;       iy as the address of the values to load into BCH
 106+ 008C DD 6E 00     AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed:  ld      l,(ix+0)            ; del = ix (sign hi lo)
 107+ 008F DD 5E 01                             ld      e,(ix+1)            ; .
 108+ 0092 DD 56 02                             ld      d,(ix+2)            ; .
 109+ 0095 FD 66 00                             ld      h,(iy+0)            ; bch = iy (sign, hi, lo)
 110+ 0098 FD 4E 01                             ld      c,(iy+1)            ; .
 111+ 009B FD 46 02                             ld      b,(iy+2)            ; .
 112+ 009E FD E5                                push    iy                  ; save iy as add function changes is
 113+ 00A0 CD 10 01                             call    AddBCHtoDELsigned   ; Perform del += bch
 114+ 00A3 FD E1                                pop     iy                  ; get iy back
 115+ 00A5 DD 75 00                             ld      (ix+0),l            ; put result into (ix)
 116+ 00A8 DD 73 01                             ld      (ix+1),e            ; .
 117+ 00AB DD 72 02                             ld      (ix+2),d            ; .
 118+ 00AE C9                                   ret
 119+ 00AF
 120+ 00AF              AddDELequAtIXPlusIY24Signed:
 121+ 00AF DD 6E 00                             ld      l,(ix+0)            ; del = ix (sign hi lo)
 122+ 00B2 DD 5E 01                             ld      e,(ix+1)            ; .
 123+ 00B5 DD 56 02                             ld      d,(ix+2)            ; .
 124+ 00B8 FD 66 00                             ld      h,(iy+0)            ; bch = iy (sign, hi, lo)
 125+ 00BB FD 4E 01                             ld      c,(iy+1)            ; .
 126+ 00BE FD 46 02                             ld      b,(iy+2)            ; .
 127+ 00C1 FD E5                                push    iy                  ; save iy as add function changes is
 128+ 00C3 CD 10 01                             call    AddBCHtoDELsigned   ; Perform del += bch
 129+ 00C6 FD E1                                pop     iy                  ; get iy back
 130+ 00C8 C9                                   ret
 131+ 00C9              ; extension to AddBCHtoDELsigned
 132+ 00C9              ; takes ix as the address of the values to load into DEL
 133+ 00C9              ;       iy as the address of the values to load into BCH
 134+ 00C9              ; subtracts iy from ix putting result in ix
 135+ 00C9 DD 6E 00     SubAtIXtoAtIY24Signed:  ld      l,(ix+0)            ; del = ix (sign hi lo)
 136+ 00CC DD 5E 01                             ld      e,(ix+1)            ; .
 137+ 00CF DD 56 02                             ld      d,(ix+2)            ; .
 138+ 00D2 FD 66 00                             ld      h,(iy+0)            ; bch = -iy (sign, hi, lo)
 139+ 00D5 FD 4E 01                             ld      c,(iy+1)            ; .
 140+ 00D8 FD 7E 02                             ld      a,(iy+2)            ; .
 141+ 00DB EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit        ; . this is where we flip sign to make add subtract
 142+ 00DD 47                                   ld      b,a                 ; .
 143+ 00DE FD E5                                push    iy                  ; save iy as add function changes is
 144+ 00E0 CD 10 01                             call    AddBCHtoDELsigned   ; perform del += bch which as we flipped bch sign means (ix [210] -= iy [210])
 145+ 00E3 FD E1                                pop     iy                  ; get iy back
 146+ 00E5 DD 75 00                             ld      (ix+0),l            ; put result into (ix)
 147+ 00E8 DD 73 01                             ld      (ix+1),e            ; .
 148+ 00EB DD 72 02                             ld      (ix+2),d            ; .
 149+ 00EE C9                                   ret
 150+ 00EF
 151+ 00EF              ; extension to AddBCHtoDELsigned
 152+ 00EF              ; takes ix as the address of the values to load into DEL
 153+ 00EF              ;       iy as the address of the values to load into BCH
 154+ 00EF              ; subtracts iy from ix leaving result in del
 155+ 00EF              SubDELequAtIXMinusAtIY24Signed:
 156+ 00EF DD 6E 00                             ld      l,(ix+0)            ; del = ix (sign hi lo)
 157+ 00F2 DD 5E 01                             ld      e,(ix+1)            ; .
 158+ 00F5 DD 56 02                             ld      d,(ix+2)            ; .
 159+ 00F8 FD 66 00                             ld      h,(iy+0)            ; bch = -iy (sign, hi, lo)
 160+ 00FB FD 4E 01                             ld      c,(iy+1)            ; .
 161+ 00FE FD 7E 02                             ld      a,(iy+2)            ; .
 162+ 0101 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit        ; . this is where we flip sign to make add subtract
 163+ 0103 47                                   ld      b,a                 ; .
 164+ 0104 FD E5                                push    iy                  ; save iy as add function changes is
 165+ 0106 CD 10 01                             call    AddBCHtoDELsigned   ; perform del += bch which as we flipped bch sign means (ix [210] -= iy [210])
 166+ 0109 FD E1                                pop     iy                  ; get iy back
 167+ 010B C9                                   ret
 168+ 010C
 169+ 010C
 170+ 010C              ;tested mathstestsun2
 171+ 010C              ; DEL = DEL - BCH signed, uses BC, DE, HL, IY, A
 172+ 010C              ; Just flips sign on b then performs add
 173+ 010C 78           SubBCHfromDELsigned:    ld      a,b
 174+ 010D EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 175+ 010F 47                                   ld      b,a
 176+ 0110              ; DEL = DEL + BCH signed, uses BC, DE, HL, IY, A
 177+ 0110 78           AddBCHtoDELsigned:      ld      a,b                 ; Are the values both the same sign?
 178+ 0111 AA                                   xor     d                   ; .
 179+ 0112 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 180+ 0114 20 19                                jr      nz,.SignDifferent   ; .
 181+ 0116 78           .SignSame:              ld      a,b                 ; if they are then we only need 1 signe
 182+ 0117 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; so store it in iyh
 183+ 0119 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ;
 184+ 011B 78                                   ld      a,b                 ; bch = abs bch
 185+ 011C E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 186+ 011E 47                                   ld      b,a                 ; .
 187+ 011F 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; del = abs del
 188+ 0120 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 189+ 0122 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
 190+ 0123 7C                                   ld      a,h                 ; l = h + l
 191+ 0124 85                                   add     l                   ; .
 192+ 0125 6F                                   ld      l,a                 ; .
 193+ 0126 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; e = e + c + carry
 194+ 0127 8B                                   adc     e                   ; .
 195+ 0128 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
 196+ 0129 78                                   ld      a,b                 ; d = b + d + carry (signed)
 197+ 012A 8A                                   adc     d                   ;
 198+ 012B FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; d = or back in sign bit
 199+ 012D 57                                   ld      d,a                 ;
 200+ 012E C9                                   ret                         ; done
 201+ 012F 78           .SignDifferent:         ld      a,b                 ; bch = abs bch
 202+ 0130 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = b sign
 203+ 0132 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 204+ 0134 47                                   ld      b,a                 ; .
 205+ 0135 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; del = abs del
 206+ 0136 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a               ; iyl = d sign
 207+ 0138 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 208+ 013A 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
 209+ 013B E5                                   push    hl                  ; save hl
 210+ 013C 60 69                                ld      hl,bc               ; hl = bc - de, if bc < de then there is a carry
 211+ 013E ED 52                                sbc     hl,de               ;
 212+ 0140 E1                                   pop     hl                  ;
 213+ 0141 38 0E                                jr      c,.BCHltDEL
 214+ 0143 20 1C                                jr      nz,.DELltBCH        ; if the result was not zero then DEL > BCH
 215+ 0145 7C           .BCeqDE:                ld      a,h                 ; if the result was zero then check lowest bits
 216+ 0146                                      JumpIfALTNusng l,.BCHltDEL
 216+ 0146 BD          >                        cp      l
 216+ 0147 DA 51 01    >                        jp		c, .BCHltDEL
 217+ 014A 20 15                                jr      nz,.DELltBCH
 218+ 014C              ; The same so its just zero
 219+ 014C AF           .BCHeqDEL:              xor     a                  ; its just zero
 220+ 014D 57                                   ld      d,a                ; .
 221+ 014E 5F                                   ld      e,a                ; .
 222+ 014F 6F                                   ld      l,a                ; .
 223+ 0150 C9                                   ret                        ; .
 224+ 0151              ;BCH is less than DEL so its DEL - BCH the sort out sign
 225+ 0151 7D           .BCHltDEL:              ld      a,l                ; l = l - h                      ; ex
 226+ 0152 94                                   sub     h                  ; .                              ;   01D70F DEL
 227+ 0153 6F                                   ld      l,a                ; .                              ;  -000028 BCH
 228+ 0154 7B                                   ld      a,e                ; e = e - c - carry              ;1.
 229+ 0155 99                                   sbc     c                  ; .                              ;
 230+ 0156 5F                                   ld      e,a                ; .                              ;
 231+ 0157 7A                                   ld      a,d                ; d = d - b - carry              ;
 232+ 0158 98                                   sbc     b                  ; .                              ;
 233+ 0159 57                                   ld      d,a                ; .                              ;
 234+ 015A FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl              ; as d was larger, take d sign
 235+ 015C E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit       ;
 236+ 015E B2                                   or      d                  ;
 237+ 015F 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
 238+ 0160 C9                                   ret
 239+ 0161 7C           .DELltBCH:              ld      a,h                ; l = h - l
 240+ 0162 95                                   sub     l                  ;
 241+ 0163 6F                                   ld      l,a                ;
 242+ 0164 79                                   ld      a,c                ; e = c - e - carry
 243+ 0165 9B                                   sbc     e                  ;
 244+ 0166 5F                                   ld      e,a                ;
 245+ 0167 78                                   ld      a,b                ; d = b - d - carry
 246+ 0168 9A                                   sbc     d                  ;
 247+ 0169 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
 248+ 016A FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh              ; as b was larger, take b sign into d
 249+ 016C E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit       ;
 250+ 016E B2                                   or      d                  ;
 251+ 016F 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
 252+ 0170 C9                                   ret
 253+ 0171              ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 254+ 0171              ; Subtract Functions
 255+ 0171              ;...subtract routines
 256+ 0171              ; we could cheat, flip the sign of DE and just add but its not very optimised
 257+ 0171 7C           subHLDES15:             ld      a,h
 258+ 0172 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 259+ 0174 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
 260+ 0175 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
 261+ 0176                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite therefore we can add
 261+ 0176 FA A4 01    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDEOppSGN
 262+ 0179 78           .SUBHLDESameSigns:      ld      a,b
 263+ 017A B2                                   or      d
 264+ 017B                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
 264+ 017B FA 85 01    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameNeg
 265+ 017E                                      ClearCarryFlag
 265+ 017E B7          >                        or a
 266+ 017F ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 267+ 0181                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 267+ 0181 FA 98 01    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 268+ 0184 C9                                   ret
 269+ 0185 7C           .SUBHLDESameNeg:        ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 270+ 0186 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 271+ 0188 67                                   ld      h,a
 272+ 0189 7A                                   ld      a,d
 273+ 018A E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 274+ 018C 57                                   ld      d,a
 275+ 018D                                      ClearCarryFlag
 275+ 018D B7          >                        or a
 276+ 018E ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 277+ 0190                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 277+ 0190 FA 98 01    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 278+ 0193                                                          DISPLAY "TODO:  don't bother with overflow for now"
 279+ 0193 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
 280+ 0194 F6 80                                or      SignOnly8Bit
 281+ 0196 67                                   ld      h,a
 282+ 0197 C9                                   ret
 283+ 0198              .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw:     NegHL
 283+ 0198 AF          >                    xor a
 283+ 0199 95          >                    sub l
 283+ 019A 6F          >                    ld l,a
 283+ 019B 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 283+ 019C 94          >                    sub h
 283+ 019D 67          >                    ld h,a
 284+ 019E 78                                   ld      a,b
 285+ 019F EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 286+ 01A1 B4                                   or      h
 287+ 01A2 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 288+ 01A3 C9                                   ret
 289+ 01A4 B7           .SUBHLDEOppSGN:         or      a
 290+ 01A5 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 291+ 01A6 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 292+ 01A8 67                                   ld      h,a
 293+ 01A9 7A                                   ld      a,d
 294+ 01AA E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 295+ 01AC 57                                   ld      d,a
 296+ 01AD 19                                   add     hl,de
 297+ 01AE 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 298+ 01AF B4                                   or      h
 299+ 01B0 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 300+ 01B1 C9                                   ret
 301+ 01B2              ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 302+ 01B2              ;-- checks to see if a postition is in range of another, e.g. missile hit
 303+ 01B2              ;-- ix = ship position    - pointer to xyz vector as 3 bytes per element
 304+ 01B2              ;-- oy = misisle position - pointer to xyz vector as 3 bytes per element
 305+ 01B2              ;-- sets carry if in blast range, else not carry
 306+ 01B2              ;-- blast range will always be an 8 bit value
 307+ 01B2              CheckInCollisionRange:
 308+ 01B2 CD EF 00     .CheckXDistance:        call    SubDELequAtIXMinusAtIY24Signed ; get distance between x coordinates
 309+ 01B5 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; check abs distance
 310+ 01B6 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; if high bytes are set
 311+ 01B8 B3                                   or      e                   ; then no hit
 312+ 01B9 C2 F8 01                             jp      nz,.NoCollision     ; if high bytes are set no collision
 313+ 01BC 7D                                   ld      a,l
 314+ 01BD                                      JumpIfAGTEMemusng  CurrentMissileBlastRange ,.NoCollision
 314+ 01BD 21 FB 80    >                        ld      hl,CurrentMissileBlastRange
 314+ 01C0 BE          >                        cp      (hl)
 314+ 01C1 D2 F8 01    >                        jp		nc,.NoCollision
 315+ 01C4 01 03 00     .CheckYDistance:        ld      bc,3                ; move ix and iy
 316+ 01C7 DD 09                                add     ix,bc               ; on 3 bytes
 317+ 01C9 FD 09                                add     iy,bc               ;
 318+ 01CB CD EF 00                             call    SubDELequAtIXMinusAtIY24Signed ; get distance between x coordinates
 319+ 01CE 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; check abs distance
 320+ 01CF E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; if high bytes are set
 321+ 01D1 B3                                   or      e                   ; then no hit
 322+ 01D2 C2 F8 01                             jp      nz,.NoCollision     ; if high bytes are set no collision
 323+ 01D5 7D                                   ld      a,l
 324+ 01D6                                      JumpIfAGTEMemusng  CurrentMissileBlastRange ,.NoCollision
 324+ 01D6 21 FB 80    >                        ld      hl,CurrentMissileBlastRange
 324+ 01D9 BE          >                        cp      (hl)
 324+ 01DA D2 F8 01    >                        jp		nc,.NoCollision
 325+ 01DD 01 03 00     .CheckZDistance:        ld      bc,3                ; move ix and iy
 326+ 01E0 DD 09                                add     ix,bc               ; on 3 bytes
 327+ 01E2 FD 09                                add     iy,bc               ;
 328+ 01E4 CD EF 00                             call    SubDELequAtIXMinusAtIY24Signed ; get distance between x coordinates
 329+ 01E7 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; check abs distance
 330+ 01E8 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; if high bytes are set
 331+ 01EA B3                                   or      e                   ; then no hit
 332+ 01EB C2 F8 01                             jp      nz,.NoCollision     ; if high bytes are set no collision
 333+ 01EE 7D                                   ld      a,l
 334+ 01EF                                      JumpIfAGTEMemusng  CurrentMissileBlastRange ,.NoCollision
 334+ 01EF 21 FB 80    >                        ld      hl,CurrentMissileBlastRange
 334+ 01F2 BE          >                        cp      (hl)
 334+ 01F3 D2 F8 01    >                        jp		nc,.NoCollision
 335+ 01F6              .CollisionDetected:     SetCarryFlag                ; collision in blast range
 335+ 01F6 37          >                        scf
 336+ 01F7 C9                                   ret
 337+ 01F8              .NoCollision:           ClearCarryFlag              ; no collision in blast range
 337+ 01F8 B7          >                        or a
 338+ 01F9 C9                                   ret
 339+ 01FA
 340+ 01FA              ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 341+ 01FA              ; -- Checks if 24 bit value at ix > iy and returns ix pointing to the correct value
 342+ 01FA              ; -- Sets carryflag if a swap occured as part of the Jump If A LessThan check
 343+ 01FA FD 7E 02     CompareAtIXtoIYABS:     ld      a,(iy+2)
 344+ 01FD E6 7F        .CheckSignByte:         and     SignMask8Bit
 345+ 01FF 47                                   ld      b,a
 346+ 0200 DD 7E 02                             ld      a,(ix+2)
 347+ 0203 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 348+ 0205                                      JumpIfALTNusng b,.SwapIXIY
 348+ 0205 B8          >                        cp      b
 348+ 0206 DA 1E 02    >                        jp		c, .SwapIXIY
 349+ 0209 DD 7E 01     .CheckHighByte:         ld      a,(ix+1)
 350+ 020C FD BE 01                             cp      (iy+1)
 351+ 020F                                      JumpIfALTNusng b,.SwapIXIY
 351+ 020F B8          >                        cp      b
 351+ 0210 DA 1E 02    >                        jp		c, .SwapIXIY
 352+ 0213 DD 7E 00     .CheckLowByte:          ld      a,(ix+0)
 353+ 0216 FD BE 00                             cp      (iy+0)
 354+ 0219                                      JumpIfALTNusng b,.SwapIXIY
 354+ 0219 B8          >                        cp      b
 354+ 021A DA 1E 02    >                        jp		c, .SwapIXIY
 355+ 021D C9                                   ret
 356+ 021E DD E5        .SwapIXIY               push    ix                  ; swap over ix and iy
 357+ 0220 FD E5                                push    iy                  ; this means that ix is always larger of two or ix if they are the same value
 358+ 0222 DD E1                                pop     ix                  ; iy is a smaller of the two values, or untouched in the same value
 359+ 0224 FD E1                                pop     iy                  ; Thsi means we can do a compare and pick which one we preferr after, carry says if swap occured if we need that
 360+ 0226 C9                                   ret
 361+ 0227
 362+ 0227              ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 363+ 0227              ; -- Manhattan distance
 364+ 0227              ; -- very quick distance calculation based on a cube
 365+ 0227              ; -- ix = pointer to vector of 3x3, iy = distance to check
 366+ 0227              ; simploy done by ABS (ix)
 367+ 0227              ; returns z if outside box, nz if inside box
 368+ 0227 DD 6E 00     ManhattanDistanceIXIY:  ld      l,(ix+0)            ; del = abs ix (sign hi lo)
 369+ 022A DD 5E 01     .checkX:                ld      e,(ix+1)            ; .
 370+ 022D DD 7E 02                             ld      a,(ix+2)            ; .
 371+ 0230 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ;
 372+ 0232 57                                   ld      d,a                 ;
 373+ 0233 FD 66 00                             ld      h,(iy+0)            ; bch = distiance to check
 374+ 0236 FD 4E 01                             ld      c,(iy+1)            ; .
 375+ 0239 FD 7E 02                             ld      a,(iy+2)            ; .
 376+ 023C EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit        ; . this is where we flip sign to make add subtract
 377+ 023E 47                                   ld      b,a                 ; .
 378+ 023F C5 E5                                push    bc,,hl              ; save this for 2nd and 3rd test
 379+ 0241 FD E5                                push    iy                  ; save iy as add function changes is
 380+ 0243 CD 10 01                             call    AddBCHtoDELsigned   ; perform del += bch which as we flipped bch sign means (ix [210] -= iy [210])
 381+ 0246 FD E1                                pop     iy                  ; get iy back
 382+ 0248 7A                                   ld      a,d
 383+ 0249 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 384+ 024B CA 84 02                             jp      z,.ClearUp          ; so if its positive then outside boundary
 385+ 024E E1 C1        .checkY:                pop     bc,,hl
 386+ 0250 C5 E5                                push    bc,,hl
 387+ 0252 DD 6E 03                             ld      l,(ix+3)            ; del = abs ix (sign hi lo)
 388+ 0255 DD 5E 04                             ld      e,(ix+4)            ; .
 389+ 0258 DD 7E 05                             ld      a,(ix+5)            ; .
 390+ 025B E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ;
 391+ 025D 57                                   ld      d,a                 ;
 392+ 025E FD E5                                push    iy                  ; save iy as add function changes is
 393+ 0260 CD 10 01                             call    AddBCHtoDELsigned   ; perform del += bch which as we flipped bch sign means (ix [210] -= iy [210])
 394+ 0263 FD E1                                pop     iy                  ; get iy back
 395+ 0265 7A                                   ld      a,d
 396+ 0266 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 397+ 0268 CA 84 02                             jp      z,.ClearUp          ; so if its positive then outside boundary
 398+ 026B E1 C1        .checkZ:                pop     bc,,hl
 399+ 026D DD 6E 06                             ld      l,(ix+6)            ; del = abs ix (sign hi lo)
 400+ 0270 DD 5E 07                             ld      e,(ix+7)            ; .
 401+ 0273 DD 7E 08                             ld      a,(ix+8)            ; .
 402+ 0276 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ;
 403+ 0278 57                                   ld      d,a                 ;
 404+ 0279 FD E5                                push    iy                  ; save iy as add function changes is
 405+ 027B CD 10 01                             call    AddBCHtoDELsigned   ; perform del += bch which as we flipped bch sign means (ix [210] -= iy [210])
 406+ 027E FD E1                                pop     iy                  ; get iy back
 407+ 0280 7A                                   ld      a,d
 408+ 0281 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 409+ 0283 C9                                   ret
 410+ 0284 E1 C1        .ClearUp:               pop     bc,,hl
 411+ 0286 C9                                   ret
 412+ 0287
# file closed: ./Maths/MathsBankedFns.asm
1245  0287                                  DISPLAY "Bank ",MathsBankedFnsAddr," - Bytes free ",/D, $2000 - ($-MathsBankedFnsAddr), " - BankMathsBankedAdd"
1246  0287                                  ASSERT $-MathsBankedFnsAddr <8912, Bank code leaks over 8K boundary
1247  0287
1248  0287                  SAVENEX OPEN "EliteN.nex", EliteNextStartup , TopOfStack
1249  0287                  SAVENEX CFG  0,0,0,1
1250  0287                  SAVENEX AUTO
1251  0287                  SAVENEX CLOSE
